32a7(dkon brtsegs): chags kyi me dang / zhe sdang gi me dang / gti mug gi mes kun tu 'bar ro/ /de ltar sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams kyang gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro/ /khyim
32b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag rnams/ gzugs kyi phung po kun tu 'bar te/ cis kun tu 'bar zhe na/ 'dod chags kyi me dang / zhe sdang gi me dang / gti mug gi mes kun tu 'bar ro/ /tshor ba'i phung po
32b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'du shes kyi phung po dang / 'du byed kyi phung po dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po yang de bzhin no/ /khyim bdag rnams/ sa'i khams kun tu 'bar te/ cis kun tu 'bar zhe
32b3(dkon brtsegs): na| 'dod chags kyi me dang / zhe sdang gi me dang / gti mug gi mes kun tu 'bar ro/ /khyim bdag rnams/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i
32b4(dkon brtsegs): khams kun tu 'bar te/ cis kun tu 'bar zhe na/ 'dod chags kyi me dang / zhe sdang gi me dang / gti mug gi mes kun tu 'bar ro/ /skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang
32b5(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pas kun tu 'bar te/ bdag gir bya ba sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bshad do/ /de bas na khyim
32b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag rnams/ mig blang bar mi bya'o/ /zhes khyim bdag rnams de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /de bzhin du khyim bdag rnams rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid blang bar mi
32b7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o| |zhes de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /de bas na khyim bdag rnams/ gzugs blang bar mi bya/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos blang bar mi bya'o/ /zhes de ltar bslab
33a1(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ /khyim bdag rnams/ gzugs kyi phung po blang bar mi bya'o/ /tshor ba'i phung po dang / 'du shes kyi phung po dang / 'du byed kyi phung po dang / rnam par
33a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i phung po blang bar mi bya'o/ /zhes de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /de bas na khyim bdag rnams/ sa'i khams blang bar mi bya'o/ /chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi
33a3(dkon brtsegs): khams dang / nam mkha'i khams blang bar mi bya'o/ /zhes de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /de bas na khyim bdag rnams/ rnam par shes pa'i khams blang bar mi bya'o/ /zhes de ltar
33a4(dkon brtsegs): bslab par bya'o/ /de bas na khyim bdag rnams/ 'jig rten 'di blang bar mi bya'o/ /'jig rten pha rol blang bar mi bya'o/ /zhes khyim bdag rnams de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /
33a5(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag khyed rnams nam mig mi len cing / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi len pa de na khyed rnams mig nas yid kyi bar la mi gnas par 'gyur ro/ /
33a6(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag khyed rnams nam gzugs mi len cing / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams mi len pa de na khyed rnams chos thams cad la mi gnas par 'gyur ro/ /
33a7(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag khyed rnams nam gzugs kyi phung po mi len cing / tshor ba'i phung po dang / 'du shes kyi phung po dang / 'du byed kyi phung po mi len pa de na khyed rnams 'du byed kyi phung po
33b1(dkon brtsegs): la mi gnas par 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag khyed rnams nam rnam par shes pa'i phung po mi len pa de na khyed rnams rnam par shes pa'i phung po la mi gnas par 'gyur ro/ /khyim
33b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag khyed rnams nam sa'i khams mi len cing / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams mi len pa de na khyed rnams nam mkha'i khams la mi
33b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas par 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag khyed rnams nam rnam par shes pa'i khams mi len pa de na khyed rnams rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas par 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag
33b4(dkon brtsegs): khyed rnams nam 'jig rten 'di mi len cing / 'jig rten pha rol mi len pa de na khyed rnams 'jig rten thams cad la mi gnas par 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag khyed rnams nam chos
33b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mi len pa de na khyed rnams chos thams cad la mi gnas par 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag khyed rnams nam chos thams cad la mi gnas pa de na khyed rnams mi 'byung
33b6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jig go/ khyed rnams nam mi 'byung mi 'jig pa de na khyed rnams skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang /
33b7(dkon brtsegs): yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ sdug bsngal las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bshad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don
34a1(dkon brtsegs): de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /skye ba dang ni 'chi ba yis/ /'jig rten 'di kun kun nas 'bar/ /byis pa
34a2(dkon brtsegs): skyabs med gtse ba ste/ /de dag 'phags pa'i lam las nyams/ /brgya lam 'jig rten snang mdzad pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dal ba chud zos ma byed
34a3(dkon brtsegs): par| |brtson 'grus brtan pa rtsom byos shig / gang la gnas te rnam sgom pa/ /shes rab kyis ni de yang ltos/ /shes rab kyis ni de mthong ste/ /rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur
34a4(dkon brtsegs): ro| |gang la gnas te sems sgom pa/ /thams cad stong par shes par bya/ /chos rnams stong par rig nas ni/ /byang chub nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ /'dod chags zhe sdang de bzhin
34a5(dkon brtsegs): gti mug dang / /me gsum de dag shin tu mi bzad pa/ /des na 'jig rten 'di kun rab 'bar yang / /byis pa rig nas gnyid log khong mi chud/ /skye dang rga dang na dang 'chi ba
34a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / /smre sngags 'don cing sdug bsngal yid mi bdes/ /'jig rten 'di dag gtses par rig nas ni/ /chos rnams kun la gnas par ma byed cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das
34a7(dkon brtsegs): la khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las rab tu byung ba rnyed par gyur cig /bdag
34b1(dkon brtsegs): cag rnams kyis bde bar gshegs pa las bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po rnyed par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag tshur shog ces gsungs pa dang / de
34b2(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa de dag rab tu byung bar gyur te/ de nyid kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang / de nyid kyis dge slong gi dngos por gyur to/ /'di la chos nyid ni/ 'di yin te/ de la
34b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bya'o/ /de dag gis ni ngur smrig bgos/ /de dag gis ni skra yang bregs/ /kun kyang lhung bzed thogs gyur nas/ /de nyid du ni dgra bcom gyur/ /ston pas dgra bcom rab
34b4(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen nas/ /dge slong gi ni dge 'dun dang / /lha rnams mdun du mngon sum du/ /ched du brjod pa ched du brjod/ /'jig rten gyi ni mgon po la/ /sngon chad sbyin pa byin pas na/ /gang
34b5(dkon brtsegs): na bde ba mang ba der/ /shin tu dga' zhing 'ongs par 'gyur/ /de dag gis ni nga mthong nas/ /dad pa rab tu skyes par gyur/ /de dag sems ni dang ba la/ /chos rnams kyi ni mchog bstan
34b6(dkon brtsegs): to| |dgra bcom gyi ni gsung thos nas/ /bdag tu lta ba rnam par bshig /stong nyid mngon du byas na ni/ /de dag skye pa kun las grol/ /khyim bdag gi le'u zhes bya ste/ dang po'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lam gyi bar du khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam po mi g.yo ba'i gnas la bkod nas kun nas mdzes pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs so/ /
35a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi lha rnams dang / gnod sbyin ci 'jigs 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gis 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas 'jig rten na
35a2(dkon brtsegs): shin tu dkon pa bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms dbul lo/ /snyam mo/ /de nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyis bsod snyoms kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs
35a3(dkon brtsegs): pa| ro phun sum tshogs pa/ reg phun sum tshogs pa bcom ldan 'das la phul nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod snyoms de
35a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhes so/ /bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyis bsod snyoms phul ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe steng gi bar snang las ci 'jigs kyi 'khor mang po gnod sbyin drug khri brgya
35a5(dkon brtsegs): stong gis legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te rjes su yi rang ba'i sgra phyung ngo / /de nas de'i phyir gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyis rang gi 'khor rnams la bos te/ bdag gis ni/ da
35a6(dkon brtsegs): gzod de bzhin gshegs pa la bsod snyoms phul gyi/ khyed kyis ni/ dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la phul cig /de ni/ khyed rnams kyi yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang /
35a7(dkon brtsegs): bde bar 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsod snyoms phul nas gnod sbyin de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kyang bsod
35b1(dkon brtsegs): snyoms blangs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs pa las des bsod snyoms blangs par mkhyen nas sa phyogs de nas slar log go /de
35b2(dkon brtsegs): ltar de'i tshe lha stong phrag du ma dang / klu stong phrag du ma dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po stong phrag du ma
35b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa stong phrag du ma dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma rnams bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa'i zham 'bring du dong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das
35b4(dkon brtsegs): sa phyogs yangs shing rgya che ba zhig tu gshegs te byon nas gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /de nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs 'khor dang bcas pas lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba dang /
35b5(dkon brtsegs): ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma blangs te bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/
35b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rab tu gtor ro/ /gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor nas thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan
35b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bsam pa yang mkhyen/ de'i 'khor gnod sbyin mang po'i bsam pa yang mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /chos nyid ni/ 'di yin te/ nam sangs
36a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de na zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang /
36a2(dkon brtsegs): dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu byung ste/ des 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa snang bas khyab par byas nas nyi ma dang / zla ba'i gzi brjid
36a3(dkon brtsegs): m ed par byas te sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te slar log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas te
36a4(dkon brtsegs): kha cig ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/ /kha cig ni/ phrag par nub bo/ /kha cig ni/ pus mor nub bo/ /chos nyid ni/ 'di yin te/ nam sangs rgyas bcom ldan
36a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams la lung ston pa de na 'od zer zhabs kyi 'og tu nub par 'gyur ro/ /nam dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams la lung
36a6(dkon brtsegs): ston pa de na 'od zer snam logs su nub par 'gyur ro/ /nam gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams la lung ston pa de na 'od zer mdun du nub par 'gyur ro/ /nam mi
36a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams la lung ston pa de na 'od zer g.yon du nub par 'gyur ro/ /nam lha rnams la lung ston pa de na 'od zer g.yas su nub par 'gyur ro/ /nam nyan thos rnams la lung ston pa
36b1(dkon brtsegs): de na 'od zer pus mor nub par 'gyur ro/ /nam rang sangs rgyas rnams la lung ston pa de na 'od zer phrag par nub par 'gyur ro/ /nam sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub
36b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa de na 'od zer steng gi dbu'i gtsug gi mtshams su nub par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan
36b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa mthong ste/ mthong nas chos gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal
36b4(dkon brtsegs): mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /ci rgyus 'jig rten snang mdzad pa/ /'jig rten kun la sman pa'i slad/ /'jig rten mgon po 'od
36b5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa/ /ci zhig slad du 'dzum pa bstan/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir/ /de ring su yis sa bon btab/ /de ring su la lung yang ston/ /gang zhig mthar phyin rab tu zhugs/ /dpa'
36b6(dkon brtsegs): bo rnam par 'dren pa rnams/ /rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum mi mdzad/ /thub pa ci slad 'dzum pa bstan/ /'od zer don ni bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
36b7(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis slar gsungs pa/ 'jig rten mgon po skyob pa la/ /ci 'jigs rab tu dang sems kyis/ /bsod snyoms dag ni phul bas na/ /
37a1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar de phyir 'dzum pa mdzad/ /gnod sbyin 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ /sum cu rtsa gsum 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sum cu gsum nas shi 'phos nas/ /'thab
37a2(dkon brtsegs): bral du yang 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'thab bral nas ni dga' ldan 'gro/ /'dod pa 'dod pas dgar byas nas/ /mi yi nang du skye 'gyur te/ /rgyal po rdzu 'phrul ldan par 'gyur/ /'khor
37a3(dkon brtsegs): los bsgyur ba mi yi dbang / /gling bzhi dag gi dbang po ste/ /mi yi 'jig rten shi 'phos nas/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bskal pa bye ba nyi shur ni/ /rtag
37a4(dkon brtsegs): tu bsti stang byas par 'gyur/ /lha yi nang dang mi nang du/ /yang dang yang du kun tu 'gro/ /phyis de rgyal srid bor nas ni/ /khyim med par yang rab tu byung / /rkyen gyis byang chub
37a5(dkon brtsegs): thob 'gyur te/ /de ni mthar yang thug par 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin dag ni sum khri dag/ gnod sbyin skye gnas 'phos gyur nas/ /sum cu rtsa gsum skye bar 'gyur/ /sangs
37a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas la ni gus byas nas/ /sangs rgyas byams pa mthong 'gyur zhing / /de na mthar ni thug 'gyur te/ /dgra bcom pa yang thob 'gyur na/ /ston pa la ni su mi mchod/ /gnod
37a7(dkon brtsegs): sbyin stong du tshang ba rnams/ /byang chub mchog la rab zhugs pas/ /de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ /nam du'ang ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur/ /kha cig srog chags kun phan phyir/ /
37b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub dam pa rab tshol zhing / /sangs rgyas 'dren pa stong rnams la/ /bkur sti dag ni byed par 'gyur/ /kha cig sangs rgyas byang chub phyir/ /stong phrag gnyis dang gsum dag
37b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang / /me tog phreng ba dri rnams kyis/ /mchod pa dag ni mchod par 'gyur/ /dag pa bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid can/ /'dren pa bye ba phrag stong la/ /kha cig bkur sti byed 'gyur te/ /
37b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag phyis ni byang chub reg /de nas ci 'jigs de yi bu/ /ri bo zhes bya rdzu 'phrul che/ /'jig rten sangs rgyas bdag gyur ces/ /des kyang sems ni bskyed par gyur/ /des ni sangs
37b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bsti stang byas/ /thams cad du yang smon lam btab/ /nga mthong nas ni mchod byas te/ /byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed do/ /de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ /ngan 'gro thams cad spangs
37b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas byams pa mthong nas ni/ /gdugs rnams bye ba 'bul bar 'gyur/ /gdugs rnams bye ba phul nas ni/ /na bza' bye ba 'bul bar 'gyur/ /na bza' bye ba phul
37b6(dkon brtsegs): nas ni| |de nyid du ni rab tu byung / /srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /byang chub dam pa rab tshol zhing / /lo yang lnga brgya tshang bar ni/ /tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'gyur/ /'di lta
37b7(dkon brtsegs): bu yi rnam grangs kyis/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims yang dag spyod/ /gang+gA'i bye ma ji snyed pa/ /de snyed bskal par spyod par 'gyur/ /dper gsungs pa ni de snyed du/ /de dag khyed kyis shes
38a1(dkon brtsegs): par gyis/ /de dag dper yang shes nas ni/ /de bas lhag par spyad par gyis/ /sngar ni dper rnams gang spyod pa/ /gang+gA'i yi ni bye snyed kyis/ /bye snyed sangs
38a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mthong gyur nas/ /de dag kun la bsti stang byed/ /e ma'o ye shes e ma shes/ /e ma'o bla na med pa'i sems/ /sems can kun gyi 'dren pa ni/ /de ltar zhum par mi
38a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /de phyir sems can kun gyi mchog /sangs rgyas su yang de 'gyur te/ /de na de yi mtshan btags pa/ /sman pa'i rgyal por rnam par grags/ /lo ni bye ba bdun cur
38a4(dkon brtsegs): yang / /srog chags rnams la chos bstan te/ /phyis gdod rkang gnyis gtso bo ni/ /de nas mya ngan 'das par 'gyur/ /rab tu dul ba'i sems rnams kyi/ /'dus pa dag ni
38a5(dkon brtsegs): nyi shur 'gyur/ /de la tha ma gcig po ni/ /dge slong bye ba nyi shur 'gyur/ /'dus pa rnams ni gang brjod pa'i/ /nyan thos dpag tu med pa ste/ /de yi nyan thos ji snyed pa/ /
38a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub zhugs pa'ang de snyed do/ /sems can rnams kyi don mdzad nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan 'das/ /lo ni brgya phrag stong dag tu/ /de yi dam chos gnas par
38a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur| |bskal pa lnga brgya tshang bar ni/ /sangs rgyas mang po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bskal pa gcig la'ang 'byung ba ni/ /de na stong rnams 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mi rnams
38b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa gang dag ni/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams bsnyen 'dod pa/ /tshul bzhin mang du thos pa dang / /rab tu 'dun pa nyid du bya/ /tshul bzhin ma yin rnam par spongs/ /tshul
38b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin la ni rtag tu sgoms/ /mang du thos par rab tu bya/ /des ni shes rab rnam par 'phel/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa yi/ /rtsa ba'i don ni chos bzhi ste/ /sbyin dang tshul
38b3(dkon brtsegs): khrims thos dang gtong / /byang chub kyi ni lam la bzang / /bla na med pa'i theg pa mchog /byang chub kyi ni lam yang bstan/ /the tshom gcod pa bzang po yis/ /nyan thos kyi ni lam
38b4(dkon brtsegs): bstan to/ /sems can gang dag 'di 'dod pa/ /de la ngas ni skabs dbye'o/ /chos rnams kyi ni mchog ston pa/ /'jig rten snang mdzad rnyed par dka'/ /de nas gnod sbyin ci
38b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs kyi bu ri bo 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di nas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gshegs zhes grag gi /bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la
38b6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po zhig bskyed do/ /snyam mo/ /de nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bos rang gi 'khor la smras pa/ grogs po dag shes par gyis shig /bcom ldan
38b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod phung po'i ri la gshegs kyi/ de la grogs po dag mthu ci yod pa dang / ci nus kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod
39a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i las la spro ba skyed cig / de nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bo g.yog dang bcas pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas bzung ste ri'i rgyal po bya
39a2(dkon brtsegs): rgod kyi phung po'i bar gyi lam de thams cad gseg ma dang / gyo mo dang / sdong dum dang / tsher ma rnams med par byas so/ /me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar dag par byas so/ /
39a3(dkon brtsegs): lam de dag thams cad bsal nas sbos kyi chus kun tu chag chag btab bo/ /lam der gos ni/ mtshams med par bting ngo / /lam der mi gang tsam du me tog gis
39a4(dkon brtsegs): chal bar bkram mo/ /lam de dag tu gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis shin tu brgyan to/ /lam der bdug spos dam pa'i snying po rab kyi snod nas bdugs
39a5(dkon brtsegs): so| |steng gi bar snang las dar gyi lda ldi dpyangs te shin tu brgyan to/ /lam der sil snyan sna tshogs kyi sgra 'khrol bar byas so/ /lam de nas mda' rgyang gang tshun chad tsam
39a6(dkon brtsegs): me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar pos khebs shing ngur pa sgra 'byin par byas so/ /lam de gser glebs pas rab tu g.yogs so/ /lam de gser gyi dra ba dang /
39a7(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bdun gyi dra bas rab tu g.yogs so/ /de nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bos lam du de lta bu'i bkod pa byas nas lus chen po mngon par sprul te 'khor dang
39b1(dkon brtsegs): bcas pas dga' mgu rangs rab tu dga' ste mos shing yid bde ba skyes nas dga' ba'i sems dang / bde ba'i sems dang / mnyen pa'i sems dang / rnam par dang ba'i sems dang /
39b2(dkon brtsegs): sgrib pa med pa'i sems dang / rab tu sim pa'i sems dang / sangs rgyas la gzhol ba'i sems dang / chos la gzhol ba'i sems dang / dge 'dun la gzhol ba'i sems dang / byang
39b3(dkon brtsegs): chub las mi g.yo ba'i sems dang / mi bskyod pa'i sems dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems dang / 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sems
39b4(dkon brtsegs): dang | sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / dga' ba'i sems dang / btang snyoms kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi snod du
39b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i sems dang / snying po'i sems dang / brtan pa'i sems dang / mi phyed pa'i sems dang / ma zhigs pa'i sems dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ba'i
39b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad sgrub pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
39b7(dkon brtsegs): te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bos thal mo sbyar te bcom
40a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten rnams kyi mchog /chos rnams kyi ni dam pa ston/ /'jig rten mgon
40a2(dkon brtsegs): la bdag gis ni/ /bla na ma mchis mchod par bgyis/ /'dren pa ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin/ /stobs bcu dang ni rab ldan te/ /mi 'jigs pa la rab gnas nas/ /sems
40a3(dkon brtsegs): can don rnams bgyid par shog / sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams dang / /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ldan/ /'jig rten mgon po 'od byed pa/ /'jig rten snang bar byed par
40a4(dkon brtsegs): shog / srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /snyan pa'i chos ni ra ba ston cing / /rnam pa bcu gnyis dam pa yi/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar shog /rgyal ba ji lta de bzhin
40a5(dkon brtsegs): du| |cho 'phrul rnams ni rab ston cing / /srog chags bye ba du ma yi/ /sems can rnams kyi don bgyid shog /dpa' chen gang rnams ma byon pa/ /'jig rten mgon po
40a6(dkon brtsegs): 'od mdzad ltar/ /byang chub dam par rtogs nas/ /lam de rab tu ston par shog /sems can ldongs pa kun gyi phyir/ /mig dang ldan pa nyid gyur te/ /gnas dang rten dang
40a7(dkon brtsegs): skyabs dag dang / /de bzhin dpung gnyen 'gyur bar shog/ ji ltar 'dren pa grol mdzad bzhin/ /'gro ba lngar ni skyes pa yi/ /srog chags rnams kyi mgon du shog/ bdag
40b1(dkon brtsegs): gi sdug bsngal kun las dgrol/ /'jig rten na ni mtshungs pa yod min pa/ /lha dbang lha ma yin dang klus mchod pa/ /gzi brjid dag ni mtha' yas 'od mdzad pa/ /rkang gnyis
40b2(dkon brtsegs): mchog la bdag gis mchod pa bgyis/ /bdag ni las mchog dam pa 'di dag gis/ /mi dbang sa steng mchog tu gyur pa bzhin/ /bsod nams rab mchog sum cu gnyis
40b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ldan/ /chos kyi bdag po de dang 'dra bar shog /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bo la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs pa/ chos kyi dam
40b4(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi phyir/ /ston pa'i rim gro gang byed pa/ /sems can rnams kyi mchog yin te/ /de dag byang chub rnyed mi dka'/ /'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa/ /'jig rten
40b5(dkon brtsegs): snang mdzad mchog la ni/ /lha dang klu dang mi rnams kyis/ /mchod pa bya bar 'os par 'gyur/ /byang chub mchog tu sangs rgyas nas/ /shing mchog drung du rab 'dug ste/ /sdig can
40b6(dkon brtsegs): bdud las rgyal nas ni/ /srog chags rnams la chos ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lha stong phrag du ma dang / gnod sbyin dang srin po stong phrag du ma dang / dri za dang mi'am
40b7(dkon brtsegs): ci dang lto 'phye chen po stong phrag du ma dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa stong phrag du ma dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas bskor zhing mdun du bdar nas sangs rgyas
41a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi mthu chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / sangs
41a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi gzi brjid chen pos 'od zer ni/ rab tu 'gyed/ zhing ni/ rab tu g.yo bar byas/ me tog gi char ni/ rab tu 'bebs/ sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig ni/ rab tu 'khrol
41a3(dkon brtsegs): bar byas te gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bos lam du bkod pa ji ltar mngon par byas pa bzhin du shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam gyi pad+ma la zhabs bzhag ste/ ri'i rgyal po
41a4(dkon brtsegs): bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan mchog /chos kyi gdan/ gdan dam
41a5(dkon brtsegs): pa| gdan bzang po/ 'jig rten gsum po kun las khyad par 'phags pa'i gdan/ sangs rgyas kyi gdan shoms shig /de bzhin gshegs pa gdan de la bzhugs te skye bo
41a6(dkon brtsegs): mang po la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / 'jig rten rnams la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i mdo sde
41a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la phan par rab tu bsngags pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu mthun pa 'chad par 'gyur te/ de'ang sems can thams cad the tshom du gyur pa la
41b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu ston pa/ sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi the tshom skye ba gcod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdo sde 'di 'chad par 'gyur zhes bka' stsal
41b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan bshams te/ de na lha bye ba drug cu rtsa brgyad kyis ras bcos bu re re de bzhin gshegs pa la phul te/ de dag kyang
41b3(dkon brtsegs): der gdan du bting bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa de la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de rnams la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
41b4(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa/ 'jig rten mgon gyi gdan du ni/ /lha yi gos rab dam pa mchog /lha yis rab tu bting ba ni/ /de la rnam par 'dren pa bzhugs/ /thams cad chos kyi pha rol phyin/ /
41b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bzhugs par gyur ma thag /'jig rten rnam pa drug g.yos shing / /skye bo rab tu dga' bar gyur/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni ri dang bcas/ /de na rab tu snang bar gyur/ /de na
41b6(dkon brtsegs): chos 'dod rnams la ni/ /skyob pas sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul ston/ /lha dang klu dang mi rnams dang / /grul bum yi dwags srul po rnams/ /de dag gcig gis gcig mthong ste/ /sgrib
41b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dag ni med par gyur/ /lha rnams bye ba phrag stong dang / /khrag khrig phrag ni brgya rnams dag /rnyed dka' yi ni tshig gsungs pa/ /sangs rgyas la ni dga' bas lta/ /rgyal po
42a1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs can snying po yang / /de tshe blon pos yongs bskor zhing / /'jig rten gyi ni mgon po mchog /sangs rgyas drung du 'ongs par gyur/ /ston pas lha dang klu
42a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / /mi rnams 'dus par mkhyen pa dang / /srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu rab gzigs nas/ /'jig rten the tshom gang yod pa/ /rkang
42a3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis mchog la dris shig dang / /the tshom dag ni dris pa rnams/ /rnam par 'dren pa ngas bshad do/ /de ltar de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
42a4(dkon brtsegs): k yi sems can ji snyed 'dus nas chos nyan pa de dag thams cad kyis dal bar shes nas sems thams cad kyis bsam ste phyag 'tshal nas chos nyan pa'i phyir rna ba blags
42a5(dkon brtsegs): te 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mau dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mau dgal gyi bu chen po/ dge slong ma 'dus pa rnams la som
42a6(dkon brtsegs): la ma lhags pa rnams kyang btsal te rgyang ring po na gnas pa rnams kyang sdus shig / de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po ri'i rgyal po kha ba can gyi lho phyogs kyi ngos la gnas
42a7(dkon brtsegs): so| |de nas tshe dang ldan pa mau dgal gyi bu chen pos bsam ste/ bsam nas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan
42b1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcun pa 'od srung chen po longs shig /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud du bcas pa dang / tshangs
42b2(dkon brtsegs): par bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa'i skye rgu rnams dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'khor gyi mdun du chos ston te/ ston pas bka' stsal gyi/
42b3(dkon brtsegs): bcun pa 'od srung / bdag cag gnyis kyi chos kyi bar chad du 'gyur du 'ong gi/ 'dong ngo / /de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos tshe dang ldan pa mau dgal gyi bu
42b4(dkon brtsegs): chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa mau dgal gyi bu chen po/ /khyod songs shig dang / kho bo yang khyod song ba'i rjes bzhin du 'ong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'di srung
42b5(dkon brtsegs): chen pos stan de la sprul pa sprul te rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por zhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 'khor bzhis bskor cing
42b6(dkon brtsegs): mdun du bdar nas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor
42b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi nang du ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mau dgal gyi bu chen pos sprul pa de mthong nas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bcom ldan
43a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das ga la ba der song ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa mau dgal gyi bu chen pos tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ha cang yang mi ring ba
43a2(dkon brtsegs): zhig tu 'khor gyi nang na phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa mthong ste mthong nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa 'od srung / khyod stan ga la ba de nas sprul te sprul nas mgyogs par
43a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du phyin te spyan sngar ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu 'khor gyi nang na phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa ni/ myur ba la brten pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan no/ /de skad
43a4(dkon brtsegs): ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos tshe dang ldan pa mau dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa mau dgal gyi bu chen po ni/ bcom ldan 'das
43a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog tu gsungs na/ 'di la kho bo'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa lta ci zhig tu 'gyur/ gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi le'u ste/ gnyis pa'o// //bam po gsum pa/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga
43a6(dkon brtsegs): la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la
43b1(dkon brtsegs): skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
43b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci
43b3(dkon brtsegs): dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA
43b4(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos du dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa dag lags/ ngag gi las
43b5(dkon brtsegs): kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa dang / yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa dang / lus kyi las yongs su dag pa dang / ngag gi las yongs su dag pa dang / yid kyi las yongs su
43b6(dkon brtsegs): dag pa dang / lus kyi las ma g.yos pa dang / ngag gi las ma g.yos pa dang / yid kyi las ma g.yos pa rnams lags/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa de las bdud dam
43b7(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis bskyod mi nus pa rnams lags/ sa nas sar 'phar ba la mkhas pa rnams lags/ sems can thams cad kyi 'dren par gyur pa dang / rnam par
44a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dren par gyur pa dang / yongs su 'dren par gyur pa dang / sgron mer gyur pa dang / stegs su gyur pa dang / zam par gyur pa dang / grur gyur pa dang /
44a2(dkon brtsegs): sgrol ba po dang / pha rol tu 'gro bar gyur pa dang / gnas dang / mgon dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen du gyur pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa de las
44a3(dkon brtsegs): bzlog par mi nus pa rnams lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis don de nyid kun zhus pa/ gang gis byang
44a4(dkon brtsegs): chub rab zhugs pa/ /dpa' po de yi don ci lags/ /gang gis dam pa 'tshang rgya ba/ /yon tan chos rnams brjod du gsol/ /srog chags kun la sman slad du/ /dpa' bo de
44a5(dkon brtsegs): dag ji ltar spyod/ /ji lta bu yi chos bsgoms pas/ /mi yi dam pa sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /byang chub snying por rab gnas nas/ /sdig can dag ni ji ltar 'dul/ /bye ba dag
44a6(dkon brtsegs): gi zhing bskyod nas/ /ji ltar byang chub mchog 'tshang rgya/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang gi don/ /'di 'dra'i tshig ni ci zhig lags/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi mchog rnams dang //
44a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub dag ni 'dir brjod gsol/ /srog chags kun la sman slad du/ /pad+ma bzhin du ma chags shing / /sems can bye ba grol mdzad par/ /'jig rten 'di na ji ltar
44b1(dkon brtsegs): spyod| |mkhas pa lha dang klu dag dang / /mi dang mi ma lags rnams kyis/ /ji lta bur ni mchod gyur pa/ /zhus pa de dag bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan
44b2(dkon brtsegs): pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos gcig dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag dang / gzhan yang dpag tu med pa dag yongs
44b3(dkon brtsegs): su 'dzin to/ /chos gcig po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems te/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos gcig po de dang ldan na/ sangs
44b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos 'di dag dang / gzhan yang dpag tu med pa dag yongs su 'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
44b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das| bsam pa ji lta bu/ byang chub kyi sems ji lta bu/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu/
44b6(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa zhes bya ba ni/ mi phyed pa'i phyir snying po'o/ /brtan pa'i phyir mi phyed pa'o/ /mi g.yo ba'i phyir brtan pa'o/ /ma 'khrul pa'i phyir mi g.yo ba'o/ /shin tu gnas pa'i phyir
44b7(dkon brtsegs): ma 'khrul ba'o/ /mi ldog pa'i phyir shin tu gnas pa'o/ /sems can la blta ba'i phyir mi bzlog pa'o/ /snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i phyir sems can la lta ba'o/ /yongs
45a1(dkon brtsegs): su mi skyo ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba'o/ /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i cho ga shes pa'i phyir yongs su mi skyo ba'o/ /bdag la bde ba ma yin
45a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i cho ga shes pa'o/ /lan du phan 'dogs par re ba med pa'i phyir bdag bde ba ma yin pa'o/ /zang zing med pa'i phyir lan du phan
45a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dogs par re ba med pa'o/ /sems can gyi phyir 'brang bas zang zing med pa'o/ /mthu chung ba'i sems can la blta ba'i phyir sems can gyi phyir 'brang ba'o/ /mgon du gyur
45a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir mthu chung ba'i sems can la blta ba'o/ /skyabs dang dpung gnyen gyi phyir mgon du gyur pa'o/ /ma 'khrugs pa'i phyir skyabs dang dpung gnyen no/ /shin tu yang dag
45a5(dkon brtsegs): par brtags pa'i phyir ma 'khrugs pa'o/ /rtsod pa med pa'i phyir shin tu yang dag par brtags pa'o/ /bsam pa dge ba'i phyir rtsod pa med pa'o/ /ci yang med pa'i phyir bsam
45a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dge ba'o/ /shin tu yongs su dag pa'i phyir ci yang med pa'o/ /rab tu byung bar byas pa'i phyir shin tu yongs su dag pa'o/ /nang dri ma med pa'i phyir rab tu byang bar byas pa'o//
45a7(dkon brtsegs): phyi shin tu yongs su dag pa'i phyir nang dri ma med pa'o/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu/ mi phyed pas snying po zhes bya ba nas phyi shin tu yongs su dag pa'i phyir nang dri ma med pa'i bar du ste/
45b1(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa ni/ de lta bu'o/ /byang chub kyi sems ji lta bu zhe na/ sems de ni/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi rdzi ba'o/ /sems de ni/ theg pa gzhan mi 'dod pa'i phyir 'brel pa
45b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa'o/ /sems de ni/ pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis mi 'phrog pa'i phyir brtan pa'o/ /sems de ni/ bdud thams cad kyis mi phyed pa'o/ /sems de ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs
45b3(dkon brtsegs): bsags pa'i phyir rtag pa'o/ /sems de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa'i phyir mi g.yo ba'o/ /sems de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu gnas pa'o/ /sems de ni/ gnyen
45b4(dkon brtsegs): po med pa'i phyir bla na med pa'o/ /sems de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad nges par phigs pa'i phyir rdo rje lta bu'o/ /sems de ni/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa la mi mnyam
45b5(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i phyir mnyam pa'o/ /sems de ni/ rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa'o/ /sems de ni/ shes rab kyis snang bar byed pa'i phyir
45b6(dkon brtsegs): dri ma med pa'o/ /sems de ni/ sems can thams cad la skabs 'byed pa'i phyir rgya che ba'o/ /sems de ni/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir yangs pa'o/ /sems de ni/
45b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la btang ba'i phyir sgrib pa med pa'o/ /sems de ni/ snying rje chen po ma bcad pa'i phyir thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'o/ /sems de ni/ mkhas pas
46a1(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa'i phyir mngon du 'gro bar byas pa'o/ /sems de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sa bon du gyur pa'o/ /sems de ni/ bde ba'i dngos po
46a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi gnas so/ /sems de ni/ tshul khrims kyis smon lam las byung ba'o/ /sems de ni/ bzod pas bsnyen par dka' ba'o/ /sems de ni/ brtson 'grus kyis thul
46a3(dkon brtsegs): bar dka' ba'o/ /sems de ni/ bsam gtan dag gis nye bar zhi ba'o/ /sems de ni/ shes rab kyi tshogs kyis gnod pa med pa'o/ /yang sems de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul
46a4(dkon brtsegs): khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po'i rtsa ba'o/ /sems de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol
46a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po'i rtsa ba'o/ /sems de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams
46a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi rtsa ba'o/ /yang shA ri'i bu/ sems de ni/ byang chub kyi rang bzhin te/ de'i phyir byang chub kyi sems zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dang / byang chub kyi
46a7(dkon brtsegs): sems de lta bu dang ldan pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /sems rgya chen po sems can mchog rab ces bya'o/ /'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du gyur
46b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems can zhes bya'o/ /lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ lus kyi las yongs su dag pa yin/
46b2(dkon brtsegs): ngag gi las yongs su dag pa yin/ yid kyi las yongs su dag pa yin/ lus kyi las ma g.yos pa yin/ ngag gi las ma g.yos pa yin/ yid kyi las ma g.yos pa yin te/ thams
46b3(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa de las bdud dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis bskyod mi nus pa yin/ sa nas sar 'phar ba la mkhas pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis
46b4(dkon brtsegs): ma gos pa yin/ sems can thams cad kyi 'dren par gyur pa yin/ rnam par 'dren par gyur pa yin/ yongs su 'dren par gyur pa dang / sgron mer gyur pa dang / stegs su gyur pa dang /
46b5(dkon brtsegs): zam par gyur pa dang / grur gyur ba dang / sgrol bar gyur pa dang / pha rol tu 'gro ba dang / gnas dang / mgon dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen no/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed
46b6(dkon brtsegs): pa de las bdud dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis bskyod mi nus pa yin no/ /de ltar na shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
46b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas dad pa yin no/ /dad pa mang ba dang / 'phags pa rnams mthong bar 'dod pa dang / chos nyan par 'dod pa yin/ ser sna med cing lhug par gtong ba
47a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / lag pa brkyang zhing rnam par gtong ba la dga' ba dang / sbyin pa 'ged pa la dga' ba yin/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems
47a2(dkon brtsegs): yin/ rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang / 'khrug pa med pa'i sems dang / ma 'dres pa'i sems dang / de las dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la mngon par dad pa dang / rab tu rtog
47a3(dkon brtsegs): cing yid ches pa dang / the tshom med cing som nyi med pa yin no/ /de nag po dang / dkar po'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu mi stor bar shes pas srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i las mi
47a4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa yin te/ de srog gcod pa spong ba yin/ ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log pa g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig kyal pa
47a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba spong ba yin te/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag spangs nas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yang dag par
47a6(dkon brtsegs): len cing spyod do/ /de dad pa dang ldan pas gang dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag yang dag par song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / dge ba'i
47a7(dkon brtsegs): chos can dang / mang du thos pa dang / thos pa la brtson pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan pa dang / dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / rtsod pa'i smra ba med pa dang / mi
47b1(dkon brtsegs): snyan par smra ba med pa dang / bsam pa des shing mi dge ba'i bsam pa med pa dang / dge ba la yang dag par sbyor ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su spangs pa dang / rgod pa
47b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / khengs pa ma yin pa dang / yab yab po med pa dang / mu cor mi smra ba dang / tshig ma 'dres pa dang / dran pa nye bar gnas pa dang / sems shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa de dag dang
47b3(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar srid par 'dren pa bcad pa dang / zug rngu phyung ba dang / khur bor ba dang / the tshom las brgal ba dang / som nyi las brgal ba dang / yang srid pa zad pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
47b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang / de lta bu'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig nas de dag la bsnyen cing brten te bsnyen bkur byed cing
47b5(dkon brtsegs): mgu bar byed kyi/ yid byung bar mi byed do/ /dga' bar byed kyi/ mi dga' bar mi byed de/ des dge ba'i bshes gnyen mgu bar byas pas de dag la chos kyis phan 'dogs par
47b6(dkon brtsegs): byed de/ chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston par byed/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed de/ sbyin pas longs
47b7(dkon brtsegs): spyod chen por 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims kyis mtho ris su skye ba dang / thos pas shes rab chen por 'gyur ba dang / bsgoms pas 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes yang dag par rab tu
48a1(dkon brtsegs): ston to/ /'di ni/ sbyin pa/ 'di ni/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu/ 'di ni/ ser sna/ 'di ni/ ser sna'i 'bras bu/ 'di ni/ tshul khrims/ 'di ni/ tshul khrims kyi rnam par
48a2(dkon brtsegs): smin pa/ 'di ni/ 'chal ba'i tshul khrims/ 'di ni/ 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni/ bzod pa/ 'di ni/ bzod pa'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni/ gnod sems/
48a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni/ gnod sems kyi rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni/ brtson 'grus/ 'di ni/ brtson 'grus kyi rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni/ le lo/ /'di ni/ le lo'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni/ bsam
48a4(dkon brtsegs): gtan/ 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni/ sems g.yeng ba/ 'di ni/ sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni/ shes rab/ 'di ni/ shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa/
48a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni/ 'chal ba'i shes rab/ 'di ni/ 'chal ba'i shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni/ lus kyi legs par spyod pa/ 'di ni/ lus kyi legs par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/
48a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni/ lus kyi nyes par spyod pa/ 'di ni/ lus kyi nyes par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni/ ngag gi legs par spyod pa/ 'di ni/ ngag gi legs par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/
48a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni/ ngag gi nyes par spyod pa/ 'di ni/ ngag gi nyes par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni/ yid kyi legs par spyod pa/ 'di ni/ yid kyi legs par spyod pa'i rnam par smin
48b1(dkon brtsegs): pa/ 'di ni/ yid kyi nyes par spyod pa/ 'di ni/ yid kyi nyes par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni/ dge ba/ 'di ni/ mi dge ba/ 'di ni/ bya ba/ 'di ni/ mi bya ba/ 'di ni/ byas na yun ring
48b2(dkon brtsegs): po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur/ 'di ni/ byas na yun ring por gnod pa dang / mi phan pa dang / mi bde bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes de ltar de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag gis
48b3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston te/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed de/ snod du gyur par yang shes nas zab mo'i gtam
48b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug ste/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi gtam dang / mtshan ma med pa'i gtam dang / smon pa med pa'i gtam dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i gtam dang / ma
48b5(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa'i gtam dang / ma byung ba'i gtam dang / bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa'i gtam dang / srog med pa'i gtam dang / gang zag med pa'i gtam dang / rten cing 'brel bar
48b6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba zab mo'i gtam rab tu ston to/ /'di lta ste/ 'di yod pas 'di 'byung / 'di skyes pa'i phyir 'di skye ba ste/ 'di ltar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi
48b7(dkon brtsegs): rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen
49a1(dkon brtsegs): gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /
49a2(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig
49a3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'di lta ste/ 'di med na 'di mi 'byung / 'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag ste/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag pa nas de ltar sdug bsngal
49a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'gag par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ 'di la ni/ chos gang yang skye ba'am 'gag pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad
49a5(dkon brtsegs): ni/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste/ bdag po med pa/ byed pa po med pa/ tshor ba po med pa/ rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba ste/ 'di la chos gang yang 'grub pa med/ ldog pa med/
49a6(dkon brtsegs): rjes su 'jug pa med de/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rmongs pas khams gsum 'dogs par 'gyur ro/ /nyon mongs pa'i lam dang / sdug bsngal gyi lam 'dogs par 'gyur ro/ /
49a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rmongs pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtags nas chos gang yang chos gang gi byed pa po ma yin no/ /gang la byed pa po med pa de la don dam par bya ba
49b1(dkon brtsegs): yang mi dmigs te/ de la chos gang yang 'byung ba med/ 'jig pa med do/ /zhes brjod do/ /des de lta bu'i chos zab mo thos nas the tshom mi za/ som nyi mi byed cing chos thams cad la chags
49b2(dkon brtsegs): pa med par 'jug ste/ de gzugs la mi chags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mi chags/ mig dang / gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa la
49b3(dkon brtsegs): mi chags/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / chos dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi chags te/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o/ /zhes dad
49b4(dkon brtsegs): do/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ltar dad pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas la lta ba las yongs su mi nyams/ chos nyan pa las yongs su mi nyams/ dge 'dun la bsnyen
49b5(dkon brtsegs): bkur byed pa las yongs su mi nyams so/ /de gang dang gang du skye ba de dang de dag tu sangs rgyas la blta ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ chos nyan pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ dge 'dun
49b6(dkon brtsegs): la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur te/ de dang de dag tu skyes nas kyang brtson 'grus rtsom zhing dge ba'i
49b7(dkon brtsegs): chos yongs su tshol ba la brtson par 'gyur ro/ /de brtson 'grus brtsams pas khyim gyi gnas mi 'dod par 'gyur/ bu pho dang bu mo 'dod par mi 'gyur/ bran pho dang / bran mo dang /
50a1(dkon brtsegs): las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dag mi 'dod par 'gyur/ yongs su bzung ba thams cad kyi ngor lta ba mi 'dod par 'gyur te/ de skyes nas 'dod pa la ma rtses
50a2(dkon brtsegs): par na tshod gzhon nur sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par myur du rab tu 'byung ngo / /de dad pas rab tu byung nas dge ba'i bshes
50a3(dkon brtsegs): gnyen mchog dang ldan zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rtog pas dge ba'i bsam pa rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /de dge ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pas
50a4(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i chos rnams nyan cing sgrub pa snying por byed par 'gyur te/ tshig lhur len pa'i blo dang ldan par mi 'gyur/ mang du thos pa yongs su tshol bas ngoms par mi 'gyur/ ji ltar
50a5(dkon brtsegs): thos pa'i chos rnams gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston te/ zang zing med pa'i sems kyis rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa la mi re zhing rang gi tshig
50a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mi spong bar gzhan la chos ston te/ ji ltar thos pa dang / ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du gzhan la chos ston to/ /chos nyan pa rnams la byams pa chen po rnyed par 'gyur/
50a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /de mang du thos pas lus dang srog la mi lta bar 'gyur/ 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes par 'gyur/ rab tu dben pa
50b1(dkon brtsegs): dang des par 'gyur/ gso sla ba dang / dgang sla ba dang / dgon pa la dga' ba dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don la nye bar rtog pa dang / don la rton gyi/ yi ge la mi rton pa yin/
50b2(dkon brtsegs): lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rten du gyur pa dang / bdag 'ba' zhig gi phyir zhugs pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi phyir 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen
50b3(dkon brtsegs): po bla na med pa sangs rgyas kyi ye shes/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes yongs su tshol lo/ /bag yod pa
50b4(dkon brtsegs): lhur byed par 'gyur te/ de la bag yod pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dbang po yang dag par sdom pa'o/ /de la dbang po yang dag par sdom pa gang zhe na/ gang mig gis gzugs mthong
50b5(dkon brtsegs): nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin/ mngon rtags su mi 'dzin/ gzugs la chags pa dang / nyes dmigs dang / 'byung ba yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /de bzhin du rna
50b6(dkon brtsegs): bas sgra dang / snas dri dang / lces ro dang / lus kyis reg bya dang / yid kyis chos shes nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin/ mngon rtags su mi 'dzin/ chos rnams la chags pa dang / nyes dmigs
50b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'di ni/ bag yod pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ bag yod pa zhes bya ba ni/ gang bdag gi sems dul ba dang / gzhan gyi
51a1(dkon brtsegs): sems srung ba dang / nyon mongs pa la dga' ba spong ba dang / chos la dga' ba'i rjes su 'gro ba dang / 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sems kyi rnam
51a2(dkon brtsegs): par rtog pa rnams mi 'byung ba dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams mi 'byung ba dang / chags pa'i mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mi 'byung ba dang / zhe sdang gi mi dge ba'i rtsa
51a3(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams mi 'byung ba dang / gti mug gi mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mi 'byung ba dang / lus kyi nyes par spyod pa dang / ngag gi nyes par spyod pa dang / yid kyi nyes par spyod pa mi
51a4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba dang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa mi 'byung ba dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad mi 'byung ba de ni/ bag yod pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu
51a5(dkon brtsegs): bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la rab tu sbyor ba ni/ gang yod pa de yang yod par rab tu shes/ gang med pa de yang med par rab tu shes so/ /de
51a6(dkon brtsegs): la ci yod ci med ce na/ yang dag pa la rab tu sbyor ba la ni/ 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba yod do/ /log pa la rab tu sbyor ba la ni/ 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba med do/ /
51a7(dkon brtsegs): las kyi rnam par smin pa ni/ yod do/ /gang gi las kyi rnam par smin pa de ni/ med do/ /gzhan yang mig ni/ yod do/ /gang gi mig de ni/ med do/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce
51b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / lus dang / yid ni/ yod do/ /gang gi yid de ni/ med do/ /gzhan yang gzugs mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'gyur ba'i chos can de ni/ yod do/ /gzugs rtag pa dang /
51b2(dkon brtsegs): brtan pa dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can dang / ther zug pa dang / de bzhin du gnas so/ /zhes bya ba de ni/ med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag
51b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'gyur ba'i chos can de ni/ yod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug pa dang / mi
51b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i chos can dang / yang dag par de bzhin du gnas so/ /zhes bya ba de ni/ med do/ /gzhan yang ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams yod kyi/ ma rig pa med na/ 'du byed
51b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa nas skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi'i bar du yod kyi/ skye ba med na/ rga shi med do/ /gzhan yang sbyin pas longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba ni/ yod do/ /sbyin pas dbul por 'gyur ba
51b6(dkon brtsegs): ni/ med do/ /tshul khrims kyis mtho ris su skye ba ni/ yod do/ /'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyis mtho ris su skye ba ni/ med do/ /thos pas shes rab chen por 'gyur ba ni/ yod do/ /
51b7(dkon brtsegs): 'chal ba'i shes rab kyis shes rab chen por 'gyur ba ni/ med do/ /bsgoms pas 'bral bar 'gyur ba ni/ yod do/ /bsgoms pas 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba ni/ med do/ /tshul
52a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pas kun tu sbyor ba ni/ yod do/ /tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pas 'bral ba ni/ med do/ /brtson 'grus
52a2(dkon brtsegs): brtsams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni/ byang chub yod do/ /le lo can la ni/ byang chub med do/ /nga rgyal med pa la ni/ rab tu byung bar lung bstan pa yod do/ /nga rgyal
52a3(dkon brtsegs): can la ni/ mya ngan las 'da' ba med do/ /gzhan yang thams cad du song ba'i stong ba nyid ni/ bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / skyes bu dang / gang
52a4(dkon brtsegs): zag go / zhes bya ba de ni/ med do/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu/ bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan pa ni/ gang yod par 'jig rten gyi mkhas pa
52a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis kun shes pa de la ni/ yod do/ /zhes 'dogs so/ /gang med par 'jig rten na mkhas pa rnams kyis kun shes pa de la ni/ med do/ /zhes 'dogs so/ /de yod
52a6(dkon brtsegs): ces tha snyad du 'dogs pa la yang yang dag par shes par mi byed/ med ces tha snyad du 'dogs pa la yang yang dag par shes par mi byed do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
52a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i yang dag pa'i don kyang khong du chud de/ chos thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas bsdus te/ chos kyi mdo bzhir 'dus par byas so/ /bzhi
52b1(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa dang / 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang / chos thams cad bdag med pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba'o/ /'du
52b2(dkon brtsegs): byed thams cad mi rtag pa zhes bya ba ni/ rtag par 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams kyi rtag par 'du shes pa spang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas bshad do/ /'du byed thams
52b3(dkon brtsegs): cad sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni/ bde bar 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams kyi bde bar 'du shes pa spang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas bshad do/ /chos thams cad bdag med pa
52b4(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba ni/ bdag tu 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams kyi bdag tu 'du shes pa spang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas bshad do/ /mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba zhes bya ba ni/ dmigs
52b5(dkon brtsegs): pas phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi dmigs pas phyin ci log tu gyur pa spang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas bshad do/ /'du byed thams cad mi rtag go /zhes
52b6(dkon brtsegs): thos nas shin tu mi rtag pa nyid la 'jug go / 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o/ /zhes thos nas smon lam dang bral ba bskyed do/ /chos thams cad bdag med pa'o/ /zhes
52b7(dkon brtsegs): thos nas stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo la sgom mo/ /mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba'o/ /zhes thos nas mtshan ma med pa yongs su 'dris par byed de/ dus
53a1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin par ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi byed do/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu/ de lta bu'i chos la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ dge ba'i
53a2(dkon brtsegs): chos las yongs su mi nyams te/ myur du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' brtag pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ gsum pa'o// //gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ de ltar dad pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bsam gyis mi
53a3(dkon brtsegs): khyab pa'i chos bcu la mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog /the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad du 'du shes bskyed do/ /bcu gang
53a4(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog/ the tshom mi za/ rgya cher
53a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad du 'du shes bskyed do/ /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs bsam gyis mi
53a6(dkon brtsegs): khyab pa la mngon par dad pa nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad du 'du shes bskyed pa'i bar du'o/ /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
53b1(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de
53b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul bsam gyis mi
53b3(dkon brtsegs): khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin
53b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di
53b5(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog /the tshom mi za/
53b6(dkon brtsegs): rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad du 'du shes bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi chos bcu po 'di rnams kyi phyir brtson 'grus
53b7(dkon brtsegs): cher rtsom zhing mi zhum/ mi 'gong / mi skyo ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi chos bcu po ma thob kyi bar du lus kyi pags pa dang / rgyus
54a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bri dang / dbugs dang / rus pa dag lta zhog la/ lus kyi sha dang / khrag bskams kyang bla'i/ brtson 'grus nyams par mi bya'o/ /snyam du de ltar sems
54a2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ltar dad pas mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi chos bcu po 'di rnams la
54a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog /the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i phyir de'i
54a4(dkon brtsegs): tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas sku ni bsam mi khyab/ /chos kyi sku yis rab tu phye/ /mtshan ma med cing snang med la/ /rgyal ba'i thugs sras dad
54a5(dkon brtsegs): par byed/ /'gro ba tha dad ji snyed kyi/ /sgra skad bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /thams cad du ni chos sgrog ste/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni spyod yul dang / /ji tsam sems can thams cad
54a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi/ /dus gsum dag gi dbang po kun/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni rab mkhyen te/ /bsam mi khyab la rab tu dad/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od mtha' yas/ /'od zer dra ba bsam mi
54a7(dkon brtsegs): khyab/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa/ /thams cad kyi ni phyogs su khyab/ /thub pa'i tshul khrims 'jig rten 'das/ /'jig rten chos la mi gnas te/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa
54b1(dkon brtsegs): bsam yas la/ /byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dad/ /sangs rgyas rtag tu mnyam par gzhag /rnam par thar pa bsam mi khyab/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ni/ /sems can kun gyis
54b2(dkon brtsegs): shes mi nus/ /chos kyi dbyings ni dbyer med la/ /gang gi stobs kyis shes 'gyur ba/ /drang srong chen po'i ye shes stobs/ /nam mkha' bzhin du mtha' yas pa/ /sems can gcig
54b3(dkon brtsegs): gi don phyir yang / /bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas par/ /'dul ba'i don la bzhugs pas na/ /de dag snying rje de 'dra'o/ /sems can thams cad gzhan dang gzhan/ /dri ba rgya mtsho
54b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dri byed kyang / /dris lan gcig gis tshim byed de/ /mi 'jigs pa ni bsam mi khyab/ /rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa/ /chos rnams thams cad thugs su chud/ /sangs rgyas
54b5(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams ma 'dres pa/ /thams cad du ni ye shes gzigs/ /dad pa la ni rab gnas pas/ /sangs rgyas kun chos chos nyid rnams/ /bsam gyis mi khyab 'di dag la/ /de dag
54b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dad par byed/ /shA ri'i bu/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad/ yid
54b7(dkon brtsegs): ches/ rab tu rtog /the tshom mi za /rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad du 'du shes bskyed ce na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni/ mi dge ba'i
55a1(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad spangs pa/ dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ mi gtsang ba dang / mchil ma dang / ngar snabs dang / snabs dang /
55a2(dkon brtsegs): rnag dang / khrag dang / bshang ba dang / gci ba dang bral ba/ rus pa dang / sha dang / khrag dang / rgyus pa las rnam par grol ba'o/ /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni/
55a3(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba/ yongs su dag pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri ma dang bral ba'o/ /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/
55a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni/ yon tan dpag tu med pa dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs bsags
55a5(dkon brtsegs): pas sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba'o/ /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni/ tshul khrims dpag tu med pa yongs su bsgoms pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab
55a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa dpag tu med pa yongs su bsgoms pas yon tan thams cad rab tu rgyas pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ de bzhin
55a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sku ni/ yongs su dag pa'i me long gi dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / chu la zla ba snang ba lta bu'o/ /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs
55b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku ni/ nam mkha'i dbyings su yang dag par 'du zhing chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni/ zag pa thams
55b2(dkon brtsegs): cad las log pas zad pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni/ 'dus byas thams cad dang bral bas 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i sku'o/ /mnyam pa med pa'i
55b3(dkon brtsegs): sku'o/ /'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sku'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni/ dpe med pa/ zla med pa/ mtshungs pa med pa'i sku ste/ dag pa/ dri ma
55b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/ rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o/ /de ni/ sngon gyi mthas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ phyi ma'i mthas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ da ltar byung bas rab
55b5(dkon brtsegs): tu phye ba ma yin/ skye ba dang / rus dang / rigs kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ gzugs kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ mtshan gyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ dpe byad bzang pos rab tu phye ba ma
55b6(dkon brtsegs): yin/ sems kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ yid kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ rnam par shes pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ lta bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ thos pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ dran
55b7(dkon brtsegs): pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ rnam par rig pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ phung pos rab tu phye ba ma yin/ khams kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ skye mched kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ skye bas rab tu phye ba ma
56a1(dkon brtsegs): yin| gnas pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ 'jig pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ 'dzin pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ 'dor bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ nges par 'byung bas
56a2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu phye ba ma yin/ spyod pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ kha dog gis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ rtags kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ dbyibs kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ 'ong bas rab tu phye
56a3(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin/ 'gro bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ tshul khrims yid la byed pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin gyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ shes rab kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ rnam par
56a4(dkon brtsegs): grol bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yid la byed pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ mtshan nyid kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ mtshan nyid mi mthun pas rab tu
56a5(dkon brtsegs): phye ba ma yin/ chos kyi mtshan nyid kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ stobs su sgro btags pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ mi 'jigs pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pas
56a6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu phye ba ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ snying rje chen pos rab tu phye ba ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par sgro btags pas rab tu phye ba ma yin te/ sgyu
56a7(dkon brtsegs): ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / rmi lam gyi rang bzhin lta bur skye ba'i sku'o/ /stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las byung ba'i sku'o/ /mi 'gyur ba'i sku'o//
56b1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'khrugs pa'i sku'o/ /rnam par mi rtog pa'i sku'o/ /mi gnas pa'i sku'o/ /mi snyems pa'i sku'o/ /gnas pa dang / rab tu gnas pa dang / mi g.yo ba thob pa'i sku'o/ /gzugs med
56b2(dkon brtsegs): ba| gzugs kyi rang bzhin ma yin pa'i sku'o/ /tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i sku'o/ /
56b3(dkon brtsegs): byung ba ma yin/ kun tu byung ba ma yin/ ma byung ba yang ma yin pa'i sku'o/ /rmad du byung ba/ rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sku'o/ /mig las byung ba ma yin/ /gzugs su gtogs pa ma
56b4(dkon brtsegs): yin| phyi rol ma yin/ rna ba la gnas pa ma yin/ sgrar gtogs pa ma yin/ phyi rol ma yin/ snas rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin/ drir gtogs pa ma yin/ phyi rol ma yin/
56b5(dkon brtsegs): lces bskyed pa ma yin/ ror gtogs pa ma yin/ phyi rol ma yin/ lus dang ldan pa ma yin/ reg byar gtogs pa ma yin/ phyi rol ma yin/ sems la 'jug pa ma yin/ yid la
56b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa la 'jug pa ma yin/ ldog pa ma yin/ rjes su 'jug pa ma yin/ gnas pa dang / mi g.yo ba thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa dang / nam
56b7(dkon brtsegs): mkha'i khams kyis mthas gtugs pa/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sku ste/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa
57a1(dkon brtsegs): ste| de la byang chub sems dpa' mngon par dang / yid ches/ rab tu rtog/ the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad
57a2(dkon brtsegs): du 'du shes bskyed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pa de skad ces gsungs nas ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad gsungs so/ /
57a3(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig dpag med par/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa rnam spyod cing / /las rnams gsum ni shin tu yongs dag par/ /mtshungs med bde bar gshegs
57a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku tshol lo/ /phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba kun la byams pa dang / /snying rje rgya cher bskyed nas sbyin pa byin/ /'dod la log par g.yem pa rtag spong zhing / /nam mkha' lta bu'i
57a5(dkon brtsegs): mchog gi sku tshol lo/ /gser ltar dag cing mdzes pa'i gos rnams ni/ /dpag tu med pa gang+gA'i bye ma snyed/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa rab spyod cing / /rgyal ba'i sras kyi 'jig
57a6(dkon brtsegs): rten mchog la phul/ /g.yag gi rnga ma bzhin du tshul khrims srung / /yan lag nying lag bcad kyang dgra la bzod/ /brtson 'grus kyi ni pha rol phyin spyod cing / /sangs rgyas sku
57a7(dkon brtsegs): la smon pa yongs mi skye/ /shes rab thabs dga' rgya cher bsam gtan pa/ /bsam gtan spyod yul dga' rgyal rnam par lta/ /chos dbyings dam pa bde bar gshegs pa'i sku//
57b1(dkon brtsegs): de 'drar bdag gyur ces ni de la smon/ /srid par 'gro ba dag tu dge byed cing / /mi mchog gis ni byang chub mtshungs med thob/ /dag pa dri med gtsang zhing rdul bral ba/ /nam mkha'
57b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba yangs pa'i sku thob bo/ /rang bzhin stong ste bdag dang sems can bral/ /mtshan ma med cing sgra dang bral ba thob/ /mig gi yul kun las ni rab 'das pa/ /de 'dra'i sku ni thub
57b3(dkon brtsegs): pas yang dag thob/ /gzod ma nas stong ma byas ma byung ba/ /gzugs dang sgra bral yid kyang rnam dag pa/ /de bzhin gshegs sku mi g.yo gang thob pa/ /des ni phyogs bcu'i bde bar
57b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa mthong / /ji ltar sgyu ma sprul pa sna tshogs lus/ /rta dang glang po bud med skyes pa'i gzugs/ /byis pa slu ba rdzun zhing phyin ci log /de bzhin stobs bcu rnams la lta
57b5(dkon brtsegs): par byos/ /gang dag 'das pa'i bde gshegs dpag med dang / /ma byon rgyal ba de bzhin gang snang dag /chos nyid gcig gyur mnyam pa med pa'i sku/ /chos kyi dbyings kyis klas
57b6(dkon brtsegs): shing nam mkha' 'dra/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu
57b7(dkon brtsegs): rtog/ the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad du 'du shes bskyed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa
58a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang / yid ches/ rab tu rtog pa nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi bar du 'du
58a2(dkon brtsegs): shes bskyed ce na/ 'di ltar shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir 'khor ji lta ba de bzhin du sgra 'byung ste/ sems can thams cad rab tu dga'
58a3(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ba'i phyir phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par byed mod kyi/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du ngas dge slong gi 'khor la ni/ 'di
58a4(dkon brtsegs): bshad| dge slong ma'i 'khor la ni/ 'di/ dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor la ni/ 'di/ bram ze'i 'khor la ni/ 'di/ rgyal rigs kyi 'khor la ni/ 'di/ khyim bdag gi 'khor la ni/
58a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di| lha'i 'khor la ni/ 'di/ tshangs pa'i 'khor la ni/ 'di ste/ 'di lta ste/ mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / lung du bstan pa'i sde dang / tshigs su bcad
58a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sde dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang / gleng gzhi'i sde dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang / de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde dang / shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang /
58a7(dkon brtsegs): rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang / gtan la dbab par bstan pa'i sde rnams bshad par bya'o/ /snyam du mi dgongs mod kyi/ 'on kyang shA ri'i bu/ 'khor ji lta bu 'dus par
58b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur ba tshangs pa'i 'khor gyi bar du 'dus par gyur pa de dag gi dbang po'i rim pa ci 'dra ba dang / sems can de dag la chos kyi mdo ji lta bur thos par bya dgos par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
58b2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi mdo thos par bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung bar yang dag par shes kyang chos bstan pa de gcig la gcig nges pa'i tshig mnod par 'gyur ba'ang med de/ thams cad kyang rang rang gi chos rnam par rig par kun shes so/
58b3(dkon brtsegs): /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa
58b4(dkon brtsegs): las mngon par grub pa bden pa'i rjes su 'brang bas 'jug go / yang shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs de ni/ 'jam par 'byung / yid du 'ong ba dang / yid dga' ba dang /
58b5(dkon brtsegs): dag pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / snyan pa dang / mnyan par 'os pa dang / shes par bya bar 'os pa dang / mi rtsub pa dang / mi brling ba dang / lus sim par byed pa dang / sems sim par
58b6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / snying dga' bar byed pa dang / dga' ba dang / bde ba skyed pa dang / kun shes par byed pa dang / gsal zhing 'thad pa dang / mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / yid du
58b7(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba dang / seng+ge'i skad kyi drag shul gyi nga ro'i sgra dang / sprin gyi sgra dbyangs dang / rgya mtsho'i sgra bsgrags pa'i dbyangs dang / mi'am ci'i glu'i dbyangs dang / ka la ping+ka'i nga ro'i sgra
59a1(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs dang / tshangs pa'i nga ro'i sgra dbyangs dang / rnga'i sgra dbyangs dang / dpal dang ldan pa dang / mnyen pa dang / zur phyin pa dang / bsgrags pa dang / sems
59a2(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi dbang po mgu bar byed pa dang / 'khor thams cad du grags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa dang / de dag dang / gzhan yon tan dpag tu med
59a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi dbyangs 'byung ste/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa
59a4(dkon brtsegs): ste| de la byang chub sems dpa' mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog /the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad du 'du shes bskyed do/ /'di
59a5(dkon brtsegs): la chos nyid ni/ 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /tshangs pa yi ni sgra dbyangs su/ /'dren pa gsung sgra rab 'byin te/ /tshangs pa rnams ni tshim par byed/ /'di 'dra'i chos ni
59a6(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs/ /de yi dbyangs ni byams dang ldan/ /snying rje las ni yang dag 'byung / /btang snyoms dang ni dga' ldan pa/ /thub pa'i dbyangs ni rab tu 'byung / /srog chags kun
59a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi 'dod chags me/ /zhe sdang dug ni zhi byed cing / /gti mug mun pa sel ba ste/ /phun sum tshogs dbyangs 'di 'dra'o/ /'dzam bu'i gling gi sna tshogs phyogs rnams na/ /mir
59b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa yi skad ni mtha' yas pa/ /kun na de yi sgra rnams sna tshogs pa/ /dbyangs 'di thos nas rjes su rtogs par 'gyur/ /sa bla dang ni de bzhin bar snang lha/ /de dag ci 'dra'i skad
59b2(dkon brtsegs): la 'jug pa ltar/ /de phyir thub dbang dbyangs ni rab zhugs te/ /rnam par nges thos mya ngan 'das reg 'gyur/ /rkang gnyis dag dang rkang bzhi rnams dang ni/ /rkang mang dag dang
59b3(dkon brtsegs): rkang pa med pa rnams/ /thams cad la ni de yi sgra dbyangs 'jug/ bskul nas rab tu 'chos shing tshar gcod byed/ /stong gsum 'di yi sgra rnams ji snyed pa/ /tha ma dang ni 'bring dang
59b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin rab/ /de dag rjes su 'jug dbyangs de sgrog ste/ /'dul ba'i sems can thar par reg par byed/ /rtog pa med cing rnam par mi rtog ste/ /bzung ba dang ni bcings las byung ma
59b5(dkon brtsegs): yin| |mnyam par bzhag pas 'phags pa'i bden pa 'chad/ /sems can thos nas nyon mongs zhi bar byed/ /sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin dge 'dun sgra/ /sbyin thos tshul khrims
59b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin bzod pa dag/ mtha' yas sgra ni sems can thos byed de/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs ni de 'dra'o/ /dbyangs kyang mtha' yas ye shes mtha' yas pa/ /de yi dbyangs
59b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshad ni yong med de/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' mkhas dad cing / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs la the tshom med/ shA ri'i bu/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin
60a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog /the tshom mi za/ thos nas rgya cher
60a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes bskyed ce na/ 'di ltar shA ri'i bu/ chos thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chags pa med pa'i ye shes gzigs
60a3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'jug ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog pa nas dad pas ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
60a4(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams te khyod la dpe bstan par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ yongs su brtag pa bzung ste gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rtswa dang /
60a5(dkon brtsegs): shing dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dang / chung ngu na sor bzhi'i tshad tsam yan chad ji snyed yod pa/ skyes bu la la zhig gis de dag gcig tu spungs te/ gcig tu
60a6(dkon brtsegs): spungs nas mes bsregs te tshig par gyur nas thal bar byas so/ /thal bar byas nas 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi rgya mtsho chen po ga na yod pa de dag tu blugs
60a7(dkon brtsegs): te lo stong du dkrugs kyang shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes de dang ldan pas
60b1(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho chen po de dang de dag nas thal ba de dag blangs te 'jig rten gyi khams de dang de dag tu 'di ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig gi shing 'di 'dra ba zhig gi thal ba'o/ /'di ni/
60b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig gi shing che ge mo zhig gi rtsa ba dang / che ge mo zhig gi sdong po dang / che ge mo zhig gi yal ga dang / che ge mo zhig gi lo ma dang / che ge mo zhig gi
60b3(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu'i thal ba'o/ /'di ni/ phyogs che ge mo zhig gi 'dab ma 'di 'dra ba zhig gi thal ba'o/ /zhes rab tu 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs
60b4(dkon brtsegs): pas chos dbyings rab tu rtogs te/ de rab tu rtogs nas de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar 'di ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig gi thal ba'o/ /zhes rab tu mkhyen pa nas
60b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas par byas te/ de ltar shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba'o/ /de ltar mthu che ba'o/ /'di ltar
60b6(dkon brtsegs): dbang che bar grags pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'di la dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog cing de bzhin gshegs pa
60b7(dkon brtsegs): byams pas yid la byed pa de dag thams cad ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di'i mtha' ma ma thob par sdug bsngal mthar 'byin to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs
61a1(dkon brtsegs): pas chos kyi dbyings shin tu rtogs te/ de shin tu rtogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las sems bskyed pa gcig kyang chud mi za'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ khyod la
61a2(dkon brtsegs): dper bya ste/ 'di la skyes bu mkhas pa kha cig dpes bshad pa'i don rnams kun shes te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shA ri'i bu/ skyes bu la la tshe lo brgya pa lo brgyar 'tsho ba zhig gis
61a3(dkon brtsegs): skra'i rtse mo bye ba brgyar btsal bas chu'i thigs pa blangs te nga gang na ba der 'ongs nas phyin pa dang 'di skad ces/ kye go'u ta ma/ bdag gis chu thigs pa 'di khyod la gtams kyi/ nam
61a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag la dgos par gyur pa de na slar byin cig ces zer ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas de blangs te/ de'i chu'i rgyun gyis bdas te 'dres nas lhan cig tu mthar gyis rgya mtsho chen
61a5(dkon brtsegs): por zhugs so/ /de nas skyes bu tshe lo brgya pa de lo brgya lon pa dang nga ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas 'di skad ces/ go'u ta ma/ bdag gi chu'i thigs pa de dgos kyi/ bdag la
61a6(dkon brtsegs): byin cig ces zer na/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yod de/ ye shes de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
61a7(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis skra'i rtse mo bye ba brgyar btsal bas chu'i thigs pa de rgya mtsho chen po de nas chu gzhan dang ma 'dres par blangs te skyes bu de la slar byin no/ /shA
61b1(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu/ 'di ltar don shes par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dper bstan te/ de gang gi don du blta zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shA ri'i bu/ skyes bu'i chu'i thigs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i lag
61b2(dkon brtsegs): tu bzhag pa yun ring po zhig lon yang chud mi za ba de bzhin du shA ri'i bu/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu la dad/ yid ches/
61b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu rtog cing / de bzhin gshegs pa byams pas yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la dmigs nas de'i phyir nam mkha' la me tog 'thor ba de dag thams cad dge
61b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rtsa ba mtha' ma ma thob par sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs te/ rab tu
61b5(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las sems gcig bskyed pa yang chud mi za'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
61b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gang rnam par shes pa ma mchis par 'jug pa mchis sam/ bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ de ni/ ma yin
61b7(dkon brtsegs): no/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ye shes ni/ gang lags/ rnam par shes pa ni/ gang lags/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di bzhi ni/ rnam par shes pa'i gnas te/ rnam par shes pa de la gnas so/ /'di
