62a1(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ rnam par shes pa gzugs la nye bar song zhing gnas/ gzugs la dmigs/ gzugs la gnas/ dga' ba la brten pas skye zhing 'phel te rgyas
62a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par shes pa tshor ba la nye bar song zhing gnas/ tshor ba la dmigs/ tshor ba la gnas/ dga' ba la brten pas skye zhing 'phel te rgyas par 'gyur
62a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / rnam par shes pa 'du shes la nye bar song zhing gnas/ 'du shes la dmigs/ 'du shes la gnas/ dga' ba la brten pas skye zhing 'phel te rgyas par 'gyur ba dang /
62a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa 'du byed la nye bar song zhing gnas/ 'du byed la dmigs/ 'du byed la gnas/ dga' ba la brten pas skye zhing 'phel nas rgyas par 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu/
62a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa bya'o/ /gang len pa'i phung po lnga la mi gnas par rnam par shes pa'i phung po yongs su shes pa de ni/ ye shes zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang rnam par shes
62a6(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba ni/ sa'i khams rnam par shes pa dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams rnam par shes pa ste/ 'di ni/ rnam par
62a7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa zhes bya'o/ /gang khams bzhi la mi gnas par rnam par shes pa'i chos kyi khams kun tu dbye ba shes pa 'di ni/ ye shes zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ rnam
62b1(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa zhes bya ba ni/ gang mig gis shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnam par rig pa dang / rna bas shes par bya ba'i sgra rnam par rig pa dang / snas shes par bya ba'i dri rnam par rig pa
62b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / lces shes par bya ba'i ro rnam par rig pa dang / lus kyis shes par bya ba'i reg bya rnam par rig pa dang / yid kyis shes par bya ba'i chos rnam par rig pa ste/ 'di ni/ rnam par
62b3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa zhes bya'o/ /gang nang nye bar zhi zhing phyi rol du mi rgyu ste/ ye shes kyi phyir 'brang zhing chos gang la yang mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog pa de ni/ ye shes zhes bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa
62b4(dkon brtsegs): ni/ dmigs pa las skyes so/ /rnam par shes pa ni/ yid la byed pa las skye'o/ /rnam par shes pa ni/ yongs su rtog pa las skye ste/ de ni/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/ /gang 'dzin
62b5(dkon brtsegs): pa med pas snyems pa dang / dmigs pa med rnam par rig pa med cing mi rtog pa de ni/ ye shes zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang 'dus byas la spyod pa'i chos la rnam par shes pa gnas shing /
62b6(dkon brtsegs): gang 'dus byas la spyod pa'i chos rnam par shes pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/ /'dus ma byas la rnam par shes pa rgyu ba med de/ gang 'dus ma byas shes pa de ni/ ye shes
62b7(dkon brtsegs): shes bya'o/ /gzhan yang gang skye ba dang / 'jig pa la rab tu gnas pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/ /gang skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa la gnas pa de ni/ ye shes
63a1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa/ 'di ni/ ye shes te/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs
63a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa de la mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog /the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad du 'du shes
63a3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /ji ltar gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dpag med pa/ de bzhin
63a4(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi rtswa rnams ni/ /de dag skyes bu la las mer bsregs thal bar byas/ /lo ni brgya stong dag tu rgya mtshor dkrugs pa rnams/ /de 'dra ba yi stobs
63a5(dkon brtsegs): bcu ye shes phra mnga' bas/ /thal ba blangs nas 'gro ba dag la lung ston pa/ /zhing rnams rab 'byams dag gi shing rigs 'di/ /de tshig thal ba 'di zhes rnam pa thams cad
63a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen/ /'di ltar phyogs bcu dag gi 'jig rten khams kyi rdul/ /thams cad rdul du byas nas rgyal ba rnams ston te/ /de dag thams cad bgrang yang chags med the tshom med/ /
63a7(dkon brtsegs): de ltar bde bar gshegs kyi ye shes nam mkha' bzhin/ /ji snyed phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud/ /gang dag 'dod chags spyod dang zhe sdang gti mug ldan/ /spyod
63b1(dkon brtsegs): pa kun gyi tshul shes bsam pa rnams dang ni/ /gang gi blangs nyams gang gi thar par 'gyur ba mkhyen/ /'jig rten mchog gi stobs bcu rnams kyi ye shes ni/ /ji snyed phyogs
63b2(dkon brtsegs): bcu'i chos kyi dbyings su rab zhugs kyang / /'dren pa rnams la rtog dang rnam par rtog mi 'byung / /bder gshegs sras po dad pa rgyal la dad par byed// //bam po bzhi pa/
63b3(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad/ yid cher/ rab tu rtog /the tshom
63b4(dkon brtsegs): mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed cing ngo mtshar dang / rmad du 'du shes bskyed ce na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs te/ de rab tu
63b5(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mngon par gshegs nas lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger mdzad do/ /de 'di lta ste/ dper na/
63b6(dkon brtsegs): sprin med pa'i nam mkha' la nyi ma mngon par shar nas lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge ba bzhin du/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
63b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mngon par gshegs nas lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger mdzad do/ /shA ri'i bu/ srin bu me khyer gyi 'od de bas ni/ gang
64a1(dkon brtsegs): 'bru mar gyi mar me'i 'od 'di shin tu 'phags/ shin tu mchog /shin tu kha dog dang ldan/ shin tu 'od gsal/ shin tu rgya che'o/ /'bru mar gyi mar me'i
64a2(dkon brtsegs): 'od de bas ni/ rtsig pa chen po'i 'od 'di shin tu 'phags/ shin tu mchog pa nas shin tu rgya che ba'i bar du'o/ /gang rtsig pa chen po'i 'od de bas ni/ me'i phung po chen po'i 'od
64a3(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa dang / sman dang / skar ma'i 'od gang yin pa'i bar du rgyas par bya ste/ zla ba'i 'od dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od dang / gzhal med
64a4(dkon brtsegs): khang dang / lus kyi rgyan rnams dang / de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan
64a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul dbang bye kyi lha rnams kyi ra ba dang / gzhal med khang dang / lus kyi rgyan rnams dang / gang tshangs pa rnams dang / tshangs ris pa rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don
64a6(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams dang / tshang 'khor ba rnams dang / tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi ra ba dang / gzhal med khang dang / lus kyi rgyan rnams kyi 'od 'di shin tu 'phags/ shin tu bzang /
64a7(dkon brtsegs): shin tu mchog /shin tu kha dog dang ldan/ shin tu 'od gsal/ shin tu rgya che'o/ /gang tshangs pa rnams dang / tshangs ris pa rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams
64b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / tshangs 'khor ba rnams dang / tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi 'od kyang rgyas par bya ste/ 'od chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal nas dge rgyas kyi bar dang / 'bras
64b2(dkon brtsegs): bu che ba dang / 'du shes can dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / shin tu mthong gi ra ba dang / gzhal
64b3(dkon brtsegs): med khang dang / lus kyi 'od dang / gang 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi ra ba dang / gzhal med khang rnams dang / lus kyi 'od 'di shin tu 'phags/ shin tu bzang / shin tu mchog /shin tu
64b4(dkon brtsegs): kha dog dang ldan / shin tu 'od gsal/ shin tu rgya che'o/ /gang 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi ra ba dang / gzhal med khang rnams dang / lus kyi 'od pas ni/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
64b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od 'di shin tu 'phags/ shin tu bzang / shin tu mchog /shin tu kha dog dang ldan/ shin tu 'od gsal/ shin tu rgya che'o/ /de
64b6(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims dpag tu med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa dang / shes rab dpag tu med pa dang / rnam par grol ba dpag tu med
64b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu/ ji tsam stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'od du btags pa gdags pas btags
65a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /de 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shA ri'i
65a2(dkon brtsegs): bu/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi nang du gser tha mal ba bzhag na/ snag tsha'i gar bu bzhin du 'gyur te/ lham mer mi 'gyur/ /lhan ner mi 'gyur/ /lhang nger mi 'gyur ro/ /
65a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du shA ri'i bu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'od du gdags pas btags pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i
65a4(dkon brtsegs): 'od kyi mdun na lham mer mi 'gyur/ lhan ner mi 'gyur/ lhang nger mi 'gyur ro/ /'od gsal bar mi 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od ni/ de dag gi nang na mchog
65a5(dkon brtsegs): ces bya/ rnam pa zhes bya/ bla na med pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa nyi tshe ba'i 'od/ las kyi rnam par smin pa las mngon par grub pa'i 'od des kyang stong gsum
65a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas shin tu khyab par 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu/ zla ba dang / nyi ma'i 'od kyi snang ba yang mi 'byung / nyin mor yang mi shes/ mtshan mor
65a7(dkon brtsegs): yang mi shes/ zla ba phyed pa dang / zla ba gcig par yang mi shes/ dus dang lor yang mi shes mod kyi/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems can la thugs brtse ba'i phyir 'od
65b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dom gang tsam du byin gyis rlob ste/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhed na/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa 'od kyis khyab
65b2(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ don de nyid rab tu rtogs par
65b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpe bstan to/ /shA ri'i bu/ skyes bu la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul ji snye pa thams cad rdul phra rab tu byas nas rdul de dag
65b4(dkon brtsegs): thu bar blugs te shar phyogs su song nas rdul phra mo de ji snyed pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas rdul phra rab gnyis pa bor zhing shar phyogs su song na/ shA ri'i bu/ rdul phra
65b5(dkon brtsegs): rang de thams cad ni/ zad bar 'gyur gyi/ shA ri'i bu/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ni/ zad pa med de/ de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang nas phyogs bcu kun gyi bar du'o/ /shA
65b6(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu/ de ji snyam du sems/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi mtha' dang mu gzung bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ mi nus so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ de ni/ mi nus
65b7(dkon brtsegs): so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhed na/ 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad 'od kyis khyab par mdzad
66a1(dkon brtsegs): d e| 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na ji tsam 'od du btags pa gdags pas btags pa de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi mdun na brgya'i char yang
66a2(dkon brtsegs): nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod de/ de ltar shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam
66a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /yang shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od la ni rtsig pa'am/ shing ngam/ ljon pa'am/ khor yug gi ri'am/ khor yug chen po'am/ ri spos kyi ngad
66a4(dkon brtsegs): ldang ngam/ ri btang bzung ngam/ ri btang bzung chen po'am/ gangs ri'am/ ri gnya' shing 'dzin tam/ de ma yin pa gzhan ri nag po'am/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / gang gis kyang
66a5(dkon brtsegs): sgrib par mi nus te/ de dag thams cad las thal nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par byas kyang dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams mos par
66a6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur te/ de la sems can la las ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od 'dom gang tsam du mthong ngo / /gang de bas rgya che ba de dag gis ni 'od 'dom do tsam du mthong ngo / /gang de bas
66a7(dkon brtsegs): s hin tu rgya che ba de dag gis ni 'od rgyang grags tsam du mthong ba nas gang de bas kyang shin tu rgya chen pos ni 'od stong gsum gyi stong chen po tsam gyi bar du mthong
66b1(dkon brtsegs): ste| de ltar na/ shA ri'i bu/ stong phrag brgya pa'i tshangs pas ni 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag brgya'i bar du 'od kyis khyab par mthong ste/ rgyas par bya'o/ /sa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpas
66b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa'i bar du khyab par mthong ngo / /de ltar shA ri'i bu/ nam mkha'i khams ci tsam pa sems can gyi khams kyang de tsam
66b3(dkon brtsegs): ste| de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la thugs brtse ba'i phyir de tsam du 'od kyis khyab par mdzad do/ /de byang chub sems dpas thos nas the tshom med/ som nyi mi za/ mngon par dad/
66b4(dkon brtsegs): yid ches/ rab tu rtog /rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad du 'du shes bskyed do/ /'di la chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /nyi ma zla ba'i
66b5(dkon brtsegs): 'od gang dang / /brgya byin tshangs 'od gang yod dang / /'og min bar gyi 'od rnams kyis/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /'og min gyi ni 'od rnams dang / /gang rnams stong gsum khyab
66b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur pas/ /sangs rgyas spu yi 'od zer gyi/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /nam mkha' dag ni ji tsam pa/ /de tsam 'od kyis khyab byed pa/ /blo gros rgya chen sems can gyis/ /de 'dra
66b7(dkon brtsegs): bar ni 'od mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas 'od ni mtha' yas te/ /nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs mnyam pa/ /ji ltar 'dul bar 'gyur rnams kyis/ /de 'dra bar ni 'od mthong ngo / /ji ltar skyes
67a1(dkon brtsegs): bu dmus long gis/ /nyi ma'i 'od ni de 'dra bar/ /ma mthong bas ni 'od de la/ /'od ni yod pa min zhes smras/ /de bzhin sems can dman pa gang / /rgyal ba'i 'od
67a2(dkon brtsegs): ni mi mthong ste/ /ma mthong bas na rgyal ba yi/ /'od ni yod pa min zhes zer/ /la las 'dom do tsam du mthong / /la las rgyang grags dpag tshad dang / /la las stong gsum thams
67a3(dkon brtsegs): cad du| |'od kyis khyab par gyur par mthong / /sa brgyad pa dang dgu pa dang / /bcu pa la ni gang gnas pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab che/ /sa chen la ni gang gnas pa/ /de dag
67a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od/ mtha' yas dkyil 'khor 'jug byed cing / /bsam yas sangs rgyas zhing rnams su/ /sangs rgyas dag gi bya ba byed/ /de ltar sangs rgyas bsam yas
67a5(dkon brtsegs): te| |sangs rgyas 'od zer bsam mi khyab/ /bsam mi khyab la dad byas nas/ /bsod nams phung po bsam mi khyab/ /yang shA ri'i bu/ ji ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
67a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang / yid ches/ rab tu rtog /the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste
67a7(dkon brtsegs): rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad du 'du shes bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par
67b1(dkon brtsegs): dad| yid ches/ rab tu rtog pa nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed ce na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar yang dag par smra bas smra ba tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i sems can 'jig
67b2(dkon brtsegs): rten du byung ste/ lus kyi las yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gi las yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyi las yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa 'jig rten du byung zhing skyes nas 'jig
67b3(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi chos kyis ma gos pa/ bram ze sdig pa spangs pa/ dge sbyong zhi ba/ bsam gtan pa'i mchog/ ting nge 'dzin dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i sems can 'jig rten du byung ba de ni/ de
67b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa yin par yang dag par smra bas smra'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / tshangs par bcas pa dang / bdud du bcas pa dang / dge sbyong
67b5(dkon brtsegs): du bcas pa dang / bram zer bcas pa'i skye rgu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
67b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas ltar tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yongs su dag pa tshad med pa de lta bu ngas ma mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ tshul khrims
67b7(dkon brtsegs): dang | ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa'i dpe tsam nyan
68a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'dod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar dge slong dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin
68a2(dkon brtsegs): pa las brtsams te dpe tsam bshad na/ bcom ldan 'das las 'di ltar thos pa de bzhin du 'dzin par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de'i dus ni/ 'di lags so/ /bde
68a3(dkon brtsegs): bar gshegs pa/ de'i dus ni/ 'di lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ de ji snyam du sems/ sems can gyi khams dang / sa'i khams gang
68a4(dkon brtsegs): mang | gsol pa/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gyi khams ni/ rab tu mang gi/ sa'i khams
68a5(dkon brtsegs): ni| ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu/ sems can gyi khams rab tu mang gi/ sa'i khams ni/ ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/
68a6(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed sgo nga las skyes pa'am/ mngal las skyes pa'am/ drod gsher las skyes pa'am/ brdzus te skyes
68a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'am/ gzugs can nam/ gzugs med pa'am/ 'du shes can nam/ 'du shes med pa'am/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi sems can rnams ji tsam du sems
68b1(dkon brtsegs): can du gdags pas btags pa de thams cad yongs su brtag pa bzung ste skad cig thang gcig yud tsam gcig gis snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ shA ri'i bu/
68b2(dkon brtsegs): mir gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad skad cig thang gcig yud tsam gcig gis snga phyi med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par
68b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur cing / yongs su brtag pa bzung ste de bzhin gshegs pa re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par sprul te/ de bzhin gshegs
68b4(dkon brtsegs): pa re re la yang dbu stong stong du gyur/ dbu re re la yang zhal stong stong du gyur/ zhal re re la yang ljags stong stong du gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad stobs
68b5(dkon brtsegs): bcu dang ldan par gyur/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / chags pa med pa sgrib pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa dang
68b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan par gyur la/ shA ri'i bu/ de lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams te bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
68b7(dkon brtsegs): stong du bsngags pa brjod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po de ni/ de 'dra ste/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yang mi zad/ de
69a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi shes rab dang spobs pa bla na med pa yang mi zad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad de'i bar du yongs su mya
69a2(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi shes rab dang spobs
69a3(dkon brtsegs): pa bla na med pa dang / de gnyis ni/ tshad med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ nam mkha' dang mnyam zhing mtshungs so/ /shA ri'i bu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
69a4(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams kyi sems can lta zhog la/ shA ri'i bu/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji snyed pa dang / de bzhin du lho dang / nub
69a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs dang / de bzhin du phyogs mtshams dang / phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can de dag
69a6(dkon brtsegs): t hams cad skad cig thang gcig yud tsam gcig gis mi'i lus thob par gyur nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par
69a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i bar du gong ma bzhin du rgyas par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi shes rab dang
69b1(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa bla na med pa dang / de gnyis tshad med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ nam mkha' dang mnyam zhing mtshungs te/ de ltar shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ tshul
69b2(dkon brtsegs): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dpe tsam du bya ba nyan par 'dod dam /
69b3(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ 'di ltar dge slong rnams bcom ldan 'das las thos nas de bzhin du 'dzin par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de'i dus 'di lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ de'i
69b4(dkon brtsegs): tshod 'di lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ de'i dus de'i tshod 'byung ste/ nyi ma bdun 'jig rten du byung bar gyur nas stong gsum gyi stong chen
69b5(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'bar/ kun 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar ba gcig
69b6(dkon brtsegs): tu gyur pa de'i phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal ba de'i sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi chos bcu dang ldan par
69b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ sa phyogs de lag mthil ltar mnyam par 'gyur te/ sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi chos dang po 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang shA
70a1(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa der sa phyogs gang na de bzhin
70a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs de gseg ma dang / gyo mo med cing mtho bar gyur pa'i gzugs su 'gyur te/ sa phyogs de
70a3(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi chos gnyis pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/
70a4(dkon brtsegs): 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas tshig pa der sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs de de bzhin gshegs pa
70a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir yangs shing mnyam par 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu/ sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi chos gsum pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang shA
70a6(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu| 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas tshig pa der sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag
70a7(dkon brtsegs): gam| bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs der rtswa sngo ba/ 'khyil ba/ 'jam pa/ g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa/ ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba/ dri rab tu
70b1(dkon brtsegs): zhim pa skye bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu/ sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi chos bzhi pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/
70b2(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas tshig pa der sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa
70b3(dkon brtsegs): phyogs der yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu grang ba/ yang ba/ 'jam pa/ dwangs pa/ rnyog pa med pa/ rab tu dwangs pa/ 'thung 'dod pa/ mang du 'thungs kyang nad du mi 'gyur ba/ yan
70b4(dkon brtsegs): lag 'di brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu/ sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi chos lnga pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ 'jig
70b5(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas tshig pa der sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs
70b6(dkon brtsegs): sam| bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs der de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa'i rab tu bsil ba'i rlung ldang ba de 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shA ri'i bu/
70b7(dkon brtsegs): sos ka'i tha ma'i zla ba tsha bas gdungs pa'i dus na skyes bu la la zhig gang+gA'i klung du zhugs nas lus bsil bar byas te rims dang snyoms pa thams cad zhi bar byas nas gang+gA'i
71a1(dkon brtsegs): klung nas byung zhing slar byung nas 'chag cing 'gro ba las ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na nags stug po yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma grib ma stug po
71a2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa chen po zhig mthong nas de nags stug po gang na yod pa der song ste phyin pa dang / nags stug po'i dbus na khri'i steng du phyar bu bting ba/ be'u ras kyis g.yogs
71a3(dkon brtsegs): pa| ka tsa lin di ka'i gding ba bting ba/ de'i steng dar gyis g.yogs pa/ ya thog ma thog tu sngas dma' bo bshams pa zhig mthong nas de de la 'dug go /de de la 'dug
71a4(dkon brtsegs): ste 'greng zhing phyogs bzhi kun nas bsil ba'i rlung ldang bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ shA ri'i bu/ sa phyogs der bsil ba'i rlung ldang bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu/ sa phyogs
71a5(dkon brtsegs): de ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi chos drug pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar
71a6(dkon brtsegs): te| 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas tshig pa der sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs der chu las skyes
71a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po skye bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu/ sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi chos bdun pa 'di dang ldan par
71b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas tshig pa der sa phyogs gang na de
71b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs der thang las skyes pa'i me tog 'di lta ste/ a d+hi muk+ta ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / sna ma'i me
71b3(dkon brtsegs): tog dang / pa ri sha ka dang / mya ngan 'tshang dang / skya snar dang / dong ka'i me tog dang / ta ra ni dang / ko ta ra ni la sogs pa thang las skyes pa'i me tog sna tshogs kha dog dang ldan pa/
71b4(dkon brtsegs): dri dang ldan pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu/ sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos brgyad pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ 'jig rten gyi khams
71b5(dkon brtsegs): 'bar| kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas tshig pa der sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs
71b6(dkon brtsegs): sam| mnal ba'i sa phyogs de sra zhing mi shigs pa/ sa gzhi rdo rjer 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu/ sa phyogs de ni/ ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi chos dgu pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan
71b7(dkon brtsegs): yang shA ri'i bu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lam me/ rab tu lam me/ kun tu rab tu lam me/ 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar
72a1(dkon brtsegs): pa gcig tu gyur nas tshig pa der sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'chag gam/ bzhengs
72a2(dkon brtsegs): sam| bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs de lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud du bcas pa dang / tshangs par bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye rgu
72a3(dkon brtsegs): dang | lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten du 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu/ sa phyogs de ni/ ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi chos bcu po de dag dang ldan par
72a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro| |yang shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings shin tu rtogs te/ de rtogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
72a5(dkon brtsegs): j i ltar mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems la gcig tu bde bar so so yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas bskal ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye
72a6(dkon brtsegs): ma snyed du bzhugs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su 'bri ba med par ngas bshad do/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsod snyoms gcig gis bskal
72a7(dkon brtsegs): par gnas sam/ bskal pa brgya'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa brgya stong phrag brgya'am/ bskal pa bye ba'am/ bskal pa bye ba brgya'am/ bskal pa bye ba stong ngam/
72b1(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa bye ba stong phrag brgya'am/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ngam/ de las lhag par yang bzhugs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
72b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog gi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ de ltar
72b3(dkon brtsegs): mthu che ba/ de ltar dbang che bar grags pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi lha'i nang du lha'i bu skyes pa de dmigs pa gcig
72b4(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa'i rnam par shes pas bskal pa brgyad khri bzhi stong du 'dug ste/ bsam gtan gyis tshe'i mtha' 'chi ba'i dus ma byas kyi bar du rnam par shes pa de las rnam par shes
72b5(dkon brtsegs): pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du shA ri'i bu/ gang gi nub mo de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /
72b6(dkon brtsegs): gang gi nub mo phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin las nyams pa med/ sems
72b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba med/ sems rgyu ba med/ sems rnam par rgyu ba med/ sems rab tu rgyu ba med/ sems rgyas pa med/ sems kyi 'dren pa med/ sems g.yeng ba med/ sems mtho ba med/
73a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dma' ba med/ sems kun tu srung ba med/ sems sbed pa med/ sems tshim pa med/ sems mi mthun pa med/ sems 'dud pa med/ sems
73a2(dkon brtsegs): g.yo ba med/ sems rab tu dga' bar byed pa med/ sems zhum pa med/ sems rtog pa med/ sems rnam par rtog pa med/ sems yongs su rtog pa med/ sems can gyi
73a3(dkon brtsegs): rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par shes pa med/ sems mig la gnas pa med/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas pa med/ gzugs la gnas pa med/ sems
73a4(dkon brtsegs): sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos la gnas pa med/ sems chos la 'jug pa med/ sems rnam par shes pa la 'jug pa med/ sems 'das pa la yang mi lta/
73a5(dkon brtsegs): sems ma 'ongs pa la yang mi lta/ sems da ltar byung ba la yang mi lta ste/ de ltar na/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
73a6(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas sems las chos gang yang btsal ba med mod kyi/ lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong bar 'jug
73a7(dkon brtsegs): go / 'di ltar shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral mod kyi/ gnas kyang mi 'dor te/ lhun gyis grub pa'i
73b1(dkon brtsegs): tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad kyang mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pa de skad gsungs nas ston pas yang 'di skad gsungs
73b2(dkon brtsegs): so| |bskal pa brgya stong dpag tu med cing gzhal yas par/ /sngon gyi srid pa'i 'gro bar byang chub spyod spyad tshe/ /tshul khrims dang ni thos dang ting 'dzin bag yod dang / /bzod pa
73b3(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang byang chub mchog phyir 'dren pas bsgoms/ /rgyal ba'i rtogs dang 'bras bu dge ba 'di 'dra bas/ /tshul khrims shin tu yongs dag 'jig rten kun gyi mchog /ji ltar nam
73b4(dkon brtsegs): mkha' dri med rnam shes spros med ltar/ /stobs bcu tshul khrims dri ma med pa nam mkha' bzhin/ /gang gi nub mo rgyal bas dang po byang chub rtogs/ /gang gi nub mo tha mar mya ngan
73b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das gshegs tshe/ /stobs bcu rnams la sems rgyu rab tu rgyu ba med/ /de bzhin bsam gtan ting 'dzin nyams pa nam yang med/ /stobs bcu rnams kyi tshul khrims phung po nyams
73b6(dkon brtsegs): med de| |rdzu 'phrul stobs dang rnam thar nyams pa'i char 'gyur med/ /bskal pa brgya phrag stong du sems ni gcig gis gnas/ /'dren pa la ni rtog dang rnam par rtog pa med/ /
73b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa rnams kyi rnam rtog spyod yul nam mkha' 'dra/ /dus gsum dag la sangs rgyas ye shes thogs med 'jug /stobs bcu rnams la sems yid rnam par rgyu ba dang / /rtog
74a1(dkon brtsegs): dang gtong ba med par sangs rgyas sras rnams dad/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs
74a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad/ yid ches rab tu rtog /som nyi med/ the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas ngo
74a3(dkon brtsegs): mtshar dang / rmad du 'du shes bskyed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bsam gyis
74a4(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab pa la mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog/ som nyi med/ the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad du 'du shes bskyed ce na/ shA
74a5(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu| de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'di skad du gnas brtan mau dgal gyi bu chen po 'di ni/ nga'i nyan thos rdzu 'phrul che ba'i nang
74a6(dkon brtsegs): na mchog go/ zhes gsungs te/ byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul de la 'jal zhing yongs su dpyod/ byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul la yang 'jal zhing yongs su
74a7(dkon brtsegs): dpyod do/ /gzhal te yongs su dpyad nas byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul dang mtshungs shing mnyam par ma mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul la gzhal zhing yongs
74b1(dkon brtsegs): su dpyad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul la 'jal zhing yongs su dpyod do/ /gzhal te yongs su dpyad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang mtshungs shing mnyam par ma
74b2(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /snyam nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul
74b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir rgya cher brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul las brtsams te dpe tsam du bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa las khyod
74b4(dkon brtsegs): nyan par 'dod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ de'i dus 'di lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ de'i tshod 'di lags so/ /'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la de bzhin
74b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul las brtsams te dpe bshad na/ dge slong rnams bcom ldan 'das las de thos nas de bzhin du 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
74b6(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa| de'i phyir shA ri'i bu/ legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin no/ /zhes gsol nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom
74b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ji snyam du sems/ gnas brtan mau dgal gyi bu chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba
75a1(dkon brtsegs): yin nam/ gsol pa/ dge slong nyan thos rdzu 'phrul che ba'i nang na 'di ltar gnas brtan mau dgal gyi bu chen po 'di ni/ mchog go /zhes bdag gis
75a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum du thos te/ mngon sum du bzung ngo / /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyan thos rdzu
75a3(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul chen po mau dgal gyi bu chen po lta bus 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bu ram shing stug po'am/ 'dam bu stug po'am/ 'od ma stug po'am/ til gyi zhing ngam/ 'bras kyi
75a4(dkon brtsegs): zhing bzhin du gang bar gyur la/ de ltar gcig tu 'dus pa'i nyan thos kyi tshogs de lta bus mthu dang / brtson 'grus thams cad dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gyi
75a5(dkon brtsegs): stobs thams cad bstan kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul gyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ stong gi char yang / brgya stong gi char yang / bye ba'i char yang / bye ba
75a6(dkon brtsegs): brgya'i char yang / bye ba stong gi char yang / bye ba brgya stong gi char yang / grangs su yang / char yang / bgrang bar yang / dper yang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /de ci'i
75a7(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shA
75b1(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas sa 'di la yungs kar gyi 'bru gcig bzhag na/ de bzhin gshegs pas yungs kar gyi 'bru bzhag pa de yang de lta bu'i nyan thos kyi tshogs
75b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi mthu dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / drag shul thams cad dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gyi stobs thams cad bstan kyang de bzhin gshegs pas bzhag
75b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yungs kar gyi 'bru skra'i rtse mo gcig tsam yang bskyod par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
75b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lta zhog la/ shA ri'i bu/ shar phyogs
75b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji snyed yod pa dang / de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs mtshams dang / phyogs
75b6(dkon brtsegs): bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji tsam sgo nga las skyes pa'am/ mngal nas skyes pa nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi bar gyi
75b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag thams cad yongs su brtag pa bzung ste nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mau dgal gyi bu chen po lta bur gyur la/ shA ri'i bu/ de lta bu'i nya
76a1(dkon brtsegs): thos kyi tshogs thams cad kyi stobs dang / mthu dang / drag shul thams cad dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gyi stobs thams cad bstan kyang yungs
76a2(dkon brtsegs): 'bru yang gdeg par mi nus te/ tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha tsam yang bskyod par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin
76a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ de ltar rdzu 'phrul che/ de ltar mthu che/ de ltar dbang che bar grags pa'o/ /de nas yang bcom
76a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ khyod kyis nam 'jig pa'i bskal pa'i dus kyi tsher gyur pa de na kun tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i
76a5(dkon brtsegs): rlung ldang ste/ rlung de langs pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / khor yug gi ri dang / khor yug gi ri chen po dang / gling
76a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po bzhi dang / gling brgyad khri dang / ri chen po dang / rgya mtsho chen po yang dpag tshad srid du mngon par 'phen cing rab tu 'thor bar 'gyur ba khyod kyis thos sam/
76a7(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las mngon sum du thos te mngon sum du bzung ngo / /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ nam 'jig pa'i rlung 'byung ba de na kun tu
76b1(dkon brtsegs): 'joms pa chen po zhes bya ba'i rlung ldang ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ri rab dang bcas/ khor yug dang bcas/ ri dang bcas/ rgya mtsho dang bcas
76b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dpag tshad brgyar mngon par 'phen zhing rab tu 'thor/ dpag tshad nyis brgya dang / dpag tshad sum brgya dang / dpag tshad bzhi brgya dang / dpag tshad lnga brgya dang / dpag tshad
76b3(dkon brtsegs): stong dang / dpag tshad nyis stong dang / sum stong dang / bzhi stong dang / lnga stong du mngon par 'phen zhing rab tu 'thor/ dpag tshad brgya phrag mang po dang / dpag tshad stong phrag mang
76b4(dkon brtsegs): po dang / dpag tshad brgya stong phrag mang por mngon par 'phen zhing rab tu 'thor te/ de dag gi rdul yang mi snang na/ ri dang rdo rnams lta ci smos/ 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi gzhal
76b5(dkon brtsegs): med khang rnams kyang dkrugs/ bcom/ rab tu gtor te/ de dag gi rdul yang mi snang na/ gzhal med khang rnams lta ci smos/ dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams
76b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bdud kyi ris rnams dang / tshangs pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang gi bar du de bzhin du rgyas
76b7(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ /ji ltar 'thab bral gyi dkrugs/ bcom/ rab tu gtor te/ dkrugs/ bcom/ rab tu gtor ba de dag gi rdul yang mi snang na/ gzhal med khang dang ra ba rnams
77a1(dkon brtsegs): lta ci smos/ shA ri'i bu/ gal te de lta bu'i rlung langs kyang des de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi mtha' ma'i rtse mo tsam yang g.yos par mi nus na/ chos
77a2(dkon brtsegs): gos sam/ chos gos kyi grwa lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdzu 'phrul
77a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spyod lam dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lam dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i snying rje chen po dang ldan no/ /shA ri'i bu/ gal te 'di lta bu'i rlung gi
77a4(dkon brtsegs): dkyil 'khor shar phyogs dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs mtshams dang / phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
77a5(dkon brtsegs): du rlung mngon par ldang yang / shA ri'i bu/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig par byed pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sor mo'i rtse mos bzlog kyang de bzhin
77a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gyi stobs bri ba yang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul
77a7(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rtog/ som nyi med/ the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang /
77b1(dkon brtsegs): rmad du 'du shes bskyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /khams gsum sems can ji snyed
77b2(dkon brtsegs): pa| |gnas brtan mo dgal bu bzhin du/ /rdzu 'phrul pha rol phyin pa yi/ /nyan thos mkhas par kun gyur pas/ /rdzu 'phrul thams cad rab bstan kyang / /de bzhin gshegs pas
77b3(dkon brtsegs): sa 'di la/ /yungs kar gyi ni 'bru bzhag pa/ /g.yo bar bya bar mi nus so/ /gang rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams/ /gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed/ /rnam 'thor rlung dang kun
77b4(dkon brtsegs): 'joms pa/ /rlung rnams phyogs bcur langs par gyur/ /de lta bu yi rlung chen des/ /thams cad gzigs pa'i chos gos kyi/ /mtha' ma skra yi rtse tsam yang / /g.yo bar bya
77b5(dkon brtsegs): bar mi nus so/ /thub pa chen po'i spu gcig gis/ /rlung de rab tu zlog par mdzad/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'di 'dra ba/ /mtha' yas pa ni nam mkha' bzhin/ /de ltar shA ri'i
77b6(dkon brtsegs): bu/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad/ yid ches pa nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad
77b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed do/ /yang shA ri'i bu/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa
78a1(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog /som nyi med/ the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad du 'du
78a2(dkon brtsegs): shes bskyed ce na/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ni/ bcu po 'di dag ste/ stobs de dag dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa
78a3(dkon brtsegs): khyu mchog gi gnas su dam 'cha' zhing / dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ sus kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba'i
78a4(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / las dang rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs
78a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / mos pa du ma dang mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / khams du ma dang khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / dbang po dang brtson 'grus kyi rim pa
78a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun
78a7(dkon brtsegs): nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba dang ldang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang /
78b1(dkon brtsegs): skye ba mngon du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / zag pa zad pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po de dag ste/ stobs de
78b2(dkon brtsegs): d ag dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du yang dag par seng+ge'i sgra sgrog cing khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che ba nas sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par
78b3(dkon brtsegs): ma bskor ba tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i bar du'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin
78b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis gnas kyang gnas su/ /gnas ma yin pa yang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
78b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen to/ /de la gnas gang / gnas ma yin pa gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ gang lus kyis nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa 'dod pa dang / sdug pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid
78b6(dkon brtsegs): du 'ong ba mngon par 'grub pa de ni/ gnas ma yin te/ skabs med do/ /gang lus kyis nyes par spyad pa dang / ngag gis nyes par spyad pa dang / yid kyis nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par
78b7(dkon brtsegs): smin pa mi 'dod pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / mi dga' ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba mngon par 'grub pa de ni/ gnas yin te/ skabs yod do/ /gang lus kyis legs par spyad pa dang /
79a1(dkon brtsegs): ngag gis legs par spyad pa dang / yid kyis legs par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa mi 'dod pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / mi dga' ba dang / yid du mi 'ong
79a2(dkon brtsegs): ba mngon par 'grub pa de ni/ gnas ma yin te/ skabs med do/ /gang lus kyis legs par spyad pa dang / ngag gis legs par spyad pa dang / yid kyis legs par spyad pa'i

79a4(dkon brtsegs): yin zhing skabs med de/ gang ser snas longs spyod chen po mngon par 'grub pa de ni/ gnas ma yin no/ /gang ser snas dbul por 'gyur ba de ni/ gnas yin te/ skabs

79a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas ma yin no/ /gang 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba de ni/ gnas yin te/ skabs

80a1(dkon brtsegs): bas nges par gyur pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba de ni/ gnas ma yin no/ /gang sems g.yeng bas nges par gyur pa la mi 'jug pa de ni/ gnas yin te/

80a3(dkon brtsegs): rtse gcig pa nges par gyur pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba de ni/ gnas yin te/ skabs yod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang 'chal ba'i shes rab kyis bag

80a7(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni/ gnas yin te/ skabs yod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang srog gcod pa'i skyes bu gang zag srog gcod pa'i rgyus tshe ring por 'gyur

80b7(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu gang zag chung ma 'gran zla med pa rnyed pa de ni/ gnas ma yin no/ /yang shA ri'i bu/ gang 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa'i skyes bu gang zag chung ma 'gran zla yod pa

83a1(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i gang zag ston pa gzhan tshol ba'am/ rgyal mtshan gzhan bzung nas spyod pa ni/ gnas ma yin no/ /lha gzhan med par

83a7(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ skabs yod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes thogs par 'gyur ba de ni/ gnas ma yin te/ skabs med do/ /gang sangs rgyas bcom

83b2(dkon brtsegs): tor la las bltar mthong ba de ni/ gnas ma yin no/ /gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gtsug tor bltar mi mthong ba ni/ gnas yin te/ skabs yod do/ /

83b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhag pa'i sems dmigs par 'gyur ba de ni/ gnas ma yin no/ /yang shA ri'i bu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyam par gzhag pa ni/ gnas yin te/
83b6(dkon brtsegs): skabs yod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa la mi bden pa'i tshig 'byung ba de ni/ gnas ma yin no/ /gang sangs
83b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams log par mi gsung zhing gzhan ma yin par gsung ba ni/ gnas yin te/ skabs yod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ gnas ma yin zhing skabs med
84a1(dkon brtsegs): de| gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la 'khrul ba dmigs par 'gyur ba de ni/ gnas ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
84a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das rnams la 'khrul pa med de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams tshig mi 'khrul ba ni/ gnas yin te/ skabs yod do/ /de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa
84a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams rgyas par bya ste/ shA ri'i bu/ gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa da
84a4(dkon brtsegs): ltar byung ba'i dus la chags pa dang sgrib par bcas pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa'i bar du de ni/ gnas ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams da
84a5(dkon brtsegs): ltar gyi dus la chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa ni/ gnas yin te/ skabs yod do/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
84a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs mtha' yas mu med do/ /'di ltar shA ri'i bu/ de bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen
84a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i stobs mtha' yas mu med de/ shA ri'i bu/ gang nam mkha'i mtha' 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
84b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs kyi mtha' 'dod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs bsam
84b2(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog /som nyi med/ the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad du 'du
84b3(dkon brtsegs): shes bskyed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas ston pas yang 'di skad gsungs so/ /ji ltar phyogs
84b4(dkon brtsegs): bcu'i nam mkha' tshad med mtha' yas pa/ /de bzhin rgyal ba'i gnas dang gnas min mkhyen mtha' yas/ /'gro ba'i gnas dang gnas min de bzhin rab mkhyen
84b5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ /ston pa chos mchog rgya chen yang dag rab tu 'chad/ /mi gang thar pa dag gi lam gyi snod gyur pa/ /ston pas de dag spyod pa mkhyen nas chos kyang 'chad/ /sems
84b6(dkon brtsegs): can gang dag snod du gyur pa ma yin pa/ /gnas dang gnas min rig nas de dag btang snyoms 'jog /nam mkha'i 'di g.yos sa la 'bras bu 'byung yang ni/ /bde bar
84b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i gnas dang gnas min gzhan mi 'gyur/ /'jig rten pa las 'jig rten 'das pa stobs bcu ldan/ /yon tan mchog 'chang rnams kyi ye shes bsam mi
85a1(dkon brtsegs): khyab| |shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang po ste/ stobs de dang ldan pas de bzhin
85a2(dkon brtsegs): g shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog ste khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che zhing tshangs
85a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'am/ brgya byin nam/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i bar du'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i las
85a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis 'das pa dang /
85a5(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las len pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa gnas dang rgyu yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce
85a6(dkon brtsegs): na| 'di la shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gang 'das pa'i las len pa dge ba'i rgyu las byung ba/ mi dge/
85a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang bral ba gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge ba'i rgyu 'byin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang mi dge ba'i rgyu las byung ba/ dge
85b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang bral ba gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na mi dge ba'i rgyu 'byin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dman pa la
85b2(dkon brtsegs): brten par 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang da ltar gyi dus na khyad par la brten par 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs
85b3(dkon brtsegs): pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang da ltar gyi dus na khyad par du brten la ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dman pa la brten par 'gyur pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas
85b4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang da ltar gyi dus na dman pa la brten la ma 'ongs pa'i dus na khyad par du brten par 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab
85b5(dkon brtsegs): tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang da ltar gyi dus na yang dman pa la brten la ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang dman pa la brten par 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs
85b6(dkon brtsegs): pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang da ltar gyi dus na yang khyad par du brten la ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang khyad par du brten par 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin
85b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang 'das pa'i dus na sbyor ba dman la ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sbyor ba rgya chen por 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs
86a1(dkon brtsegs): pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang rtsom pa chung la khyad par chen por 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /
86a2(dkon brtsegs): las len pa gang rtsom pa che la khyad par chung ngur 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang nyan thos su 'gyur ba'i rgyu 'byin
86a3(dkon brtsegs): pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang rang sangs rgyas kyi rgyu 'byin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /las len
86a4(dkon brtsegs): pa gang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i rgyu 'byin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang da ltar sdug bsngal la ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rnam
86a5(dkon brtsegs): par smin pa bde ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang da ltar bde la ma 'ongs pa na rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal ba de yang de bzhin
86a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang da ltar yang sdug bsngal la ma 'ongs pa na yang rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal ba de yang de bzhin gshegs
86a7(dkon brtsegs): pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang da ltar yang bde la ma 'ongs pa na yang rnam par smin pa bde ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /'di ltar
86b1(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi dus na sems can thams cad kyi las gang dang / rgyu gang dang / rnam par smin pa gang de bzhin dang / de bzhin nyid
86b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / gzhan ma yin pa dang / gzhan ma yin par bsten pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /mkhyen nas kyang de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas chos
86b3(dkon brtsegs): ston to| |de ltar na/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi las len pa'i
86b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyu gang yin pa dang / gnas gang yin pa dang / rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa gang yin pa de ni/ mtha' yas mu med do/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ shA ri'i bu/ nam mkha' mtha'
86b5(dkon brtsegs): yas mu med pa de bzhin du shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs de yang mtha' yas mu med do/ /shA ri'i bu/ gang de bzhin
86b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs kyi mtha' 'dod pa de ni/ nam mkha'i mtha' 'dod do/ /
86b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i las rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog /som
87a1(dkon brtsegs): nyi med/ the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed na nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang / rmad du 'du shes
87a2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed do/ /'di la chos nyid ni/ 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu dang smin la mkhas/ /spyan ldan las rnams kun gyi sgrub pa
87a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen| |dus gsum la ni rgyal ba chags pa med/ /sems can kun gyi spyod pa rab tu mkhyen/ /'gro ba lnga yi sems can thams cad kyi/ /bde dang sdug bsngal
87a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ni gang 'gyur dang / /'jug pa gang dag sdug bsngal rgyur 'gyur ba/ /de dag de bzhin bde gshegs rab tu mkhyen/ /dkar nag las rnams kyi ni rnam smin
87a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / /rgyu dang rnam smin ji ltar 'gyur ba yang / /de dag de bzhin bde gshegs rab mkhyen te/ /phyag gi mthil na yid bzhin nor bu bzhin/ /las gang rnam
87a6(dkon brtsegs): smin chung ngu'i rgyu dag las/ /'bras bu dag ni tshad med 'byin pa dang / /tshad med gang dag chung ngu'i rgyur 'gyur ba/ /de dag de bzhin bde gshegs rab tu mkhyen/ /
87a7(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos nyid du 'bras bu smin 'gyur dang / /rang rgyal byang chub rgyur ni gang 'gyur dang / /bla med ye shes stobs ni sbyin 'gyur ba/ /de dag ma lus bde gshegs
87b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen/ /las kyi rgyu gang sdug bsngal smin byed pa/ /de yang bde ba'i 'bras bu smin byed dang / /las kyi rgyu gang bde ba sbyin byed pa/ /sdug bsngal 'bras bu bya ba
87b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen/ /sdug bsngal rgyus ni sdug bsngal nyid gnas dang / /bde ba'i rgyus kyang bde ba nyid gnas dang / /las kyi rang bzhin rang bzhin ma yin pa/ /rgyu ldan
87b3(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen/ /'gro ba lnga yi sems can thams cad kyi/ /dus gsum sdug bsngal bgrod pa gang 'jug pa/ /nyams med de nyid de bzhin
87b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan min par/ /sangs rgyas mkhyen pas rgyal ba rab tu mkhyen/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
87b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis pa ste/ stobs de dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing / dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud
87b6(dkon brtsegs): dam| tshangs pa gang gis kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro/ / //bam po lnga pa/ gzhan yang shA ri'i
87b7(dkon brtsegs): bu| de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa du ma dang / mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs kyis sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag gi mos pa du
88a1(dkon brtsegs): ma dang / mos pa sna tshogs rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /skyes bu gang zag gang 'dod chags la gnas shing zhe sdang
88a2(dkon brtsegs): la mos pa'ang rgyas par bya ste/ gti mug la gnas shing zhe sdang la mos pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /gang zag gang mi dge ba la
88a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas shing mi dge ba la mos pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /gang zag gang dge ba la gnas shing dge ba la mos pa de dag kyang de
88a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /gang zag gang sbyor ba dman zhing rgya chen po la mos pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang
88a5(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /gang zag gang sbyor ba rgya che zhing dman pa la mos pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen
88a6(dkon brtsegs): to| |gang zag gang sbyor ba dman zhing khyad par la gnas par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag ba ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /mos pa gang gis
88a7(dkon brtsegs): khyad par la sbyor ba dman pa la gnas par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /mos pa gang gis log pa nyid du
88b1(dkon brtsegs): nges pa'i khams thob par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /mos pa gang gis yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i khams thob
88b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /mos pa gang gis yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i rnam par grol ba 'thob par
88b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /mos pa gang gis 'dod pa'i khams su 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs
88b4(dkon brtsegs): pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /mos pa gang gis gzugs kyi khams su 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab
88b5(dkon brtsegs): tu mkhyen to/ /mos pa gang gis gzugs med pa'i khams su 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /mos pa gang
88b6(dkon brtsegs): gis khams gsum du 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /mos pa gang gis dman pa la brten cing dman pa
88b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid gnon pa dang / khyad par la brten cing khyad par la gnon pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /mos pa gang gis khyad par
89a1(dkon brtsegs): du song nas dman pa la gnas par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /mos pa gang gis
89a2(dkon brtsegs): skye ba tha dad pa dang / kha dog tha dad pa dang / yongs su longs spyod tha dad pa rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab
89a3(dkon brtsegs): tu mkhyen to/ /mos pa gang gis rtse mo las nyams par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /mos pa gang gis rnam
89a4(dkon brtsegs): par grol ba thob par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /mkhyen nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to/ /de ltar na/
89a5(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/ mtha' yas mu med de/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing mnyam mo/ /byang chub
89a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs de thos nas mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog /som nyi med/ the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga'
89a7(dkon brtsegs): mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang / rmad du 'du shes bskyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgya cher
89b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /'jig rten 'di mos sna tshogs dang / /de bzhin blo gros tshad med pa/ /de dag gi ni mos pa'i sems/ /thams cad 'dren
89b2(dkon brtsegs): pas rab tu mkhyen/ /gang dag 'dod chags mos pa la/ /zhe sdang la ni gnas 'gyur dang / /zhe sdang gnas shing gti mug la/ /gang dag mos pa rab tu mkhyen/ /gti mug gnas shing
89b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags kyi/ /sems rgyud bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /bar bar du ni 'jug pa dag /de dag 'dren pas rab tu mkhyen/ /gang dag sbyor ba dman gyur la/ /rgya chen la ni mos pa dang / /sbyor
89b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dam pa de dag gi / dman par 'gyur ba 'dren pas mkhyen/ /log pa'i rjes su song ba dang / /'gro ba med par 'byung ba dang / /khams gsum las ni rnam grol ba'i/ /mos pa dag
89b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang rab tu mkhyen/ /skye dang kha dog tha dad dang / /nye bar spyod pa'i khyad par dang / /gang dag spyi bo las nyams pa/ /rkang gnyis gtso bos rab tu mkhyen/ /mos pa sna tshogs rab mkhyen
89b6(dkon brtsegs): nas| |'dren pa chos rnams ston pa mdzad/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni stobs gsum la/ /rgyal ba'i thugs sras rab tu mos/ /shA ri'i bu/ /'di ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin
89b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i stobs gsum pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa stobs de dag ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khyu mchog gi
90a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas su zhal gyis 'che zhing 'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog ste/ dge sbyong ngam/ /bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa sus kyang 'jig
90a2(dkon brtsegs): rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pas khams du ma dang / khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i
90a3(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis 'jig rten rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /khams gang gis 'jig rten bsod nams kyi 'du byed gsog pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang
90a4(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /khams gang gis bsod nams ma yin pa'i 'du byed gsog pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//
90a5(dkon brtsegs): khams gang gis mi g.yo ba'i 'du byed gsog pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /khams gang gis 'byung ba'i khams su 'jog par 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin
90a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par
90a7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid du rab tu mkhyen to/ /yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang /
90b1(dkon brtsegs): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid du rab tu mkhyen to/ /sa'i khams dang /
90b2(dkon brtsegs): chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams rab tu mkhyen to/ /ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ nam mkha'i khams ji lta ba de bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /'dod pa'i khams dang /
90b3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams rab tu mkhyen to/ /ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ kun tu rtog pa las myung bar rab tu mkhyen to/ /'dus byas kyi khams ni/ mngon
90b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid du rab tu mkhyen to/ /'dus ma byas kyi khams ni/ mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid du rab tu mkhyen to/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa'i khams ni/ phyis 'byung
90b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid du rab tu mkhyen to/ /rnam par byang ba'i khams ni/ rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid du rab tu mkhyen to/ /'du byed kyi khams ni/ tshul bzhin
90b6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid du rab tu mkhyen to/ /mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni/ tshul bzhin rig pa'i mtshan nyid du rab tu mkhyen to/ /'di ltar 'jig rten gnas pa'i khams
90b7(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa dang / 'jig rten gnas pa khams gang la gnas pa dang / khams gang la rjes su chags pa dang / khams gang la gnas pa dang / khams gang la sbyor ba dang / khams
91a1(dkon brtsegs): gang gis bsam pa dang / khams gang la nges par sems pa dang / khams gang la brten pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen
91a2(dkon brtsegs): to| |mkhyen nas kyang chos ston to/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i khams du ma dang / khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs mtha' yas mu med de/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs
91a3(dkon brtsegs): shing mnyam mo/ /byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa khams du ma dang / khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs la mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog /som nyi med/ the tshom
91a4(dkon brtsegs): mi za| rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang / rmad du 'du shes bskyed do/ /'di la chos nyid ni/ 'di yin te/ 'di la
91a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bya'o/ /'jig rten kun na sems can gang / /sna tshogs khams la gnas pa dag /khams gang 'jug pa ci 'dra ba/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni rab tu mkhyen/ /bsod nams
91a6(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams min mi g.yo/ /'byung bar 'gyur ba'ang de bzhin te/ /khams rnams gang la gnas nas su/ /mya ngan 'das pa zhi la reg /mig gi khams dang gzugs kyi khams/ /mig
91a7(dkon brtsegs): gi rnam par shes nyid dang / /rna ba sna dang lce dang lus/ /yid kyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen/ /chos kyi khams dang yid kyi ni/ /rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mkhyen/ /nang gi khams ni stong
91b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang | |phyi rol dag kyang stong par mkhyen/ /sa dang chu dang me dag dang / /rlung gi khams kyang de bzhin te/ /khams rnams bzhi po de dag ni/ /nam mkha' mtshungs par rab tu mkhyen/ /'dod pa'i
91b2(dkon brtsegs): khams dang gzugs kyi khams/ /gzugs med pa yi khams nyid kyang / /kun tu rtog las byung bar ni/ /de ltar sangs rgyas rab tu mkhyen/ /ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas pa/ de bzhin khams
91b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams mu med de/ /thams cad sangs rgyas rab mkhyen kyang / /mkhyen to snyam du rlom sems med/ /khams ni skye ba ma yin zhing / /rnam pa kun tu 'gag med de/ /khams 'di mya ngan 'das par ni/ /
91b4(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu dam pas rab tu mkhyen/ /ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas pa/ /sangs rgyas ye shes de 'dra ste/ /mos pa sna tshogs rab sprul pa/ /ye shes nges ni rab tu mkhyen/ /mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen
91b5(dkon brtsegs): nas su| |sems can bye ba rnam par 'dul/ /sangs rgyas stobs ni bzhi pa la/ /rgyal pa'i thugs sras dad par byed/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i
91b6(dkon brtsegs): stobs bzhi pa ste/ sus kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos dang mthun pa zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par bya'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi rim pa mkhyen
91b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i stobs kyis sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyi dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi rim pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ dbang po
92a1(dkon brtsegs): rtul ba'ang rab tu mkhyen to/ /dbang po bar ma yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /dbang po rno ba yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /dbang po khyad par du 'phags pa yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /dbang
92a2(dkon brtsegs): po dman pa yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /yongs su rtogs pa'i dbang po ji lta bus mthar phyin pa'i 'dod chags skye ba dang / mthar phyin pa'i zhe sdang skye ba dang / mthar phyin pa'i gti mug skye ba de
92a3(dkon brtsegs): yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /yongs su rtog pa'i dbang po ji lta bus 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug brtan pa skye ba de yang de
92a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /yongs su rtog pa'i dbang po ji lta bus 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug yang skye ba de yang de bzhin gshegs
92a5(dkon brtsegs): pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /yongs su rtog pa'i dbang po ji lta bus snrel zhi'i 'dong chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug skye ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag
92a6(dkon brtsegs): pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /yongs su rtog pa'i dbang po ji lta bus tshar bcad cing / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug skye ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta
92a7(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /dbang po gang dag mi dge ba'i rgyu las byung ba dang / dbang po gang dag dge ba'i rgyu las byung ba dang / dbang po gang dag mi g.yo ba'i rgyu las byung ba dang / dbang po
92b1(dkon brtsegs): gang dag 'byung ba'i rgyu las byung ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi dbang po yang dag
92b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen pa nas gong ma bzhin rab tu mkhyen pa nas gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi dbang po yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab
92b3(dkon brtsegs): tu mkhyen to/ /pho'i dbang po dang / mo'i dbang po dang / srog gi dbang po dang / bde ba'i dbang po dang / sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang / yid mi bde ba'i dbang po dang / yid bde ba'i dbang po dang /
92b4(dkon brtsegs): btang snyoms kyi dbang po yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi
92b5(dkon brtsegs): dbang po yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po yang yang dag pa ji lta
92b6(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /dbang po gang mig gi dbang po'i rgyu las byung la/ rna ba'i dbang po la gnas par 'gyur te/ sna la ma yin/ lce la ma yin/ lus kyi dbang po la ma yin pa de yang de bzhin
92b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /gang rna ba'i dbang po'i rgyu las byung la/ /sna'i dbang po la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / gang sna'i dbang po'i rgyu las byung la/ lce'i dbang po
93a1(dkon brtsegs): la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / gang lce'i dbang po'i rgyu las byung la/ lus kyi dbang po la gnas par 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rang
93a2(dkon brtsegs): tu mkhyen to/ /sems can gang sbyin pa'i dbang po can yin la/ de yang tshul khrims la sbyor ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas de la sbyin pa'i
93a3(dkon brtsegs): gtam ston to/ /gang zag tshul khrims kyi dbang po can yin la/ de yang sbyin pa la sbyor ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas tshul khrims
93a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi gtam ston to/ /sems can gang bzod pa'i dbang po can yin la/ de yang brtson 'grus la sbyor ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas
93a5(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa'i gtam ston to/ /sems can gang brtson 'grus kyi dbang po can yin la/ de yang bzod pa la sbyor ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa
93a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pas brtson 'grus kyi gtam ston to/ /sems can gang bsam gtan gyi dbang po can yin la/ de yang shes rab la sbyor ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang
93a7(dkon brtsegs): mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas bsam gtan gyi gtam ston to/ /sems can gang shes rab kyi dbang po can yin la/ de yang shes rab la sbyor ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po
93b1(dkon brtsegs): mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas shes rab kyi gtam ston to/ /gong ma bzhin du sbyar te byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad la yang bya'o/ /sems can gang nyan thos kyi theg pa'i dbang po
93b2(dkon brtsegs): can yin la/ /de yang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sbyor ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam ston to/ /sems can gang
93b3(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i dbang po can yin la/ de yang nyan thos kyi theg pa la sbyor ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
93b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gtam ston to/ /sems can gang theg pa chen po'i dbang po can yin la/ de yang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sbyor ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa
93b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pas theg pa chen po'i gtam ston to/ /sems can gang tha ma'i dbang po can yin la/ de yang theg pa chen po la sbyor ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen
93b6(dkon brtsegs): pas dbang po tha ma'i gtam ston to/ /sems can gang skal ba med pa'i dbang po can skal pa med par snang ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pas skal ba med cing snod ma yin par rig nas btang
93b7(dkon brtsegs): snyoms su 'jog go / sems can skal pa yod pa'i dbang po can skal ba yod par snang ba dag la de bzhin gshegs pas skal ba yod cing snod du rig nas ri mor byas shing
94a1(dkon brtsegs): chos ston te/ de ltar shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su smin pa rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen/ dbang
94a2(dkon brtsegs): po yongs su ma smin pa rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen/ 'byung ba'i dbang po rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen/ 'byung ba ma yin pa'i dbang po rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /sems can gyi
94a3(dkon brtsegs): dbang po'i rnam pa gang yin pa dang / sbyor ba gang yin pa dang / bsam pa gang yin pa dang / gang gi rgyu las byung ba dang / rkyen gang yin pa dang / dmigs pa gang yin pa dang /
94a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyu mthun pa gang yin pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po'i mtha' gang yin pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /bcom ldan
94a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis de skad gsungs te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad bka' stsal nas ston pas yang 'di skad gsungs so/ /'gro ba'i dbang po de ni dbang po'i pha rol song / /sems can
94a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spyod dang bsam pa'i cho ga mkhyen/ /'gro ba gang dag gi ni dbang po ci 'dra ba/ /de 'drar mi yi seng+ge de la chos 'chad do/ /dbang po dag ni rab 'bring tha mar gyur pa rnams/ /de
94a7(dkon brtsegs): la bde gshegs ye shes rmad du byung ba 'jug / sems can bsam pa thar pa'i snod du gyur mkhyen nas/ /spyod pa mkhyen cing mkhas pa mchog gi chos ston to/ /gang dag mthar
94b1(dkon brtsegs): phyin skye zhing nyon mongs brten pa dang / /mi gang rnams kyi dbang po yang bar gyur pa dang / /skyes bu gang gi dbang po snrel zhing gyur pa yi/ /spyod pa mkhyen nas de ltar mthun pa'i chos ston to/ /
94b2(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu gang gi dge ba'i dbang por gyur pa dang / /mi dge ba yi dbang por gyur pa rnams kyang de bzhin mkhyen/ /mig nas bzung ste yid kyi bar gyi dbang po dang / /yid mi bde dang sdug bsngal
94b3(dkon brtsegs): dbang mkhyen chos kyang ston/ /dad brtson dran dang ting 'dzin de bzhin shes rab dang / /skyes bu gang la dbang po 'di dag yod pa ni/ /de la dad pa'i gtam ston de bzhin brtson 'grus dang /
94b4(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan shes rab dag kyang dam pa'i don du ston/ /mi yi dbang po rnam pa spyod pa'i bye brag gang / /mi gang bsam pa ci 'jug de yi dbang po yang / /chos mchog rtogs pas de dag gi
94b5(dkon brtsegs): ni spyod pa mkhyen/ /sdug bsngal kun las thar par byed pa'i chos 'chad do/ /gang gi dbang po sangs rgyas byang chub phyir nges la/ /nyan thos shes pa'i rjes 'jug cho ga mi shes la/ /
94b6(dkon brtsegs): de la byang chub reg 'gyur rgya chen gtam rab ston/ /bde gshegs stobs ni mtha' yas thul dka' lnga pa'o/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs lnga pa
94b7(dkon brtsegs): ste| sus kyang 'jig rten 'di ni chos dang mthun pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin
95a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ yang dag par nges pa'i sems can
95a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams rab tu mkhyen/ yang dag par ma nges pa'i sems can gyi khams rab tu mkhyen/ log par nges pa'i sems can gyi khams rab tu mkhyen/ ma nges pa'i sems can
95a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams kyang de bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /rgyu'i stobs can sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa zur tsam gyis go ba/ dbang po rno ba'i sems can de dag la de bzhin gshegs
95a4(dkon brtsegs): pas chos bstan kyang rung / ma bstan kyang rung / de rnam par grol ba'i skal ba yod pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi rgyu'i stobs mkhyen nas de bzhin du mthun par chos ston
95a5(dkon brtsegs): to| |ma nges pa'i sems can gyi khams rkyen gyi stobs can yongs su smin par bya ba'i mtshan nyid can gal te mthun par 'doms shing rjes su ston pa dang phrad na/ rnam par grol bar
95a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur gyi/ rjes su ston pa dang ma phrad na/ rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur ba de dag la yang de bzhin gshegs pas de ltar rkyen dang / rgyu dang ldan pa'i gtam yang dag par gsungs te/
95a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa las chos de thos nas tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor bas 'bras bu thob par 'gyur te/ de dag gi don du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ngo / /
95b1(dkon brtsegs): log par nges pa'i sems can gyi khams yongs su sbyang ba ma byas pa/ kho re chung ba/ blun pa/ snod du ma gyur pa'i sems can de dag la de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan kyang rung / ma
95b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan kyang rung ste/ rnam par grol ba'i skal pa med pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas snod ma yin par rig nas btang snyoms su 'jog ste/ de dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams
95b3(dkon brtsegs): go gyon to/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod chags kyi lam rnam pa gsum rab tu mkhyen te/ /'dod chags kyi lam sdug pa'i rnam pa las skye ba yang yod/ /'dod
95b4(dkon brtsegs): chags kyi lam rjes su chags pa'i rnam pa las skye ba yang yod/ 'dod chags kyi lam sngon gyi rgyu las skye ba yang yod do/ /zhes sdang gi lam rnam pa gsum yang rab tu mkhyen te/ zhe sdang gi
95b5(dkon brtsegs): lam khong khro ba'i mtshan ma las skye ba yang yod/ bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa las skye ba yang yod/ sngon gyi bag la nyal ba las skye ba yang yod do/ /gti mug gi lam rnam pa gsum
