95b6(dkon brtsegs): yang rab tu mkhyen te/ gti mug gi lam ma rig pa'i rgyu las skye ba yang yod/ gti mug gi lam 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu las skye ba yang yod/ gti mug gi lam the tshom gyi rgyu las skye
95b7(dkon brtsegs): ba yang yod do/ /de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ dbang po rna ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa myur la sla ba'i lam yang de
96a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /dbang po rtul pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa bul la dka' ba'i lam yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /dbang po rno ba'i
96a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir mngon par shes pa myur la sla ba'i lam yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /dbang po rtul pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa bul la dka' ba'i lam yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /dmigs pa bor ba'i
96a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir mngon par shes pa bul la bul ba'i lam yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /lam gyi rgyun ma bcad pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa myur la bul ba'i lam yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /yongs
96a4(dkon brtsegs): su thug pa med par dbugs 'byin pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa bul la myur ba'i lam yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /de la ma chags pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa myur la bul ba'i
96a5(dkon brtsegs): lam yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /so sor rtog pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par byed la sgom pa'i stobs la ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/ sgom pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par byed
96a6(dkon brtsegs): la so sor rtog pa'i stobs la ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/ sgoms pa'i stobs dang / so sor rtog pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i lam yang yod/ so sor rtog pa'i
96a7(dkon brtsegs): stobs dang / sgom pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par mi byed pa'i lam yang yod de/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /bsam pa
96b1(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/ sbyor ba phun sum tshogs la bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/ bsam pa yang
96b2(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pa ma yin la sbyor ba yang phun sum tshogs pa ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/ bsam pa yang phun sum tshogs la sbyor ba yang phun sum tshogs pa'i lam yang yod/
96b3(dkon brtsegs): de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /lus sbyong la ngag la ma yin sems la ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/ ngag sbyong la lus la ma yin
96b4(dkon brtsegs): sems la ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/ sems sbyong la lus lam yin dag lam yin pa'i lam yang yod/ lus lam yin ngag lam yin la sems kyang mi sbyong ba'i lam yang yod/
96b5(dkon brtsegs): lus dang ngag dang sems sbyong ba'i lam yang yod de/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu/ sems can thams cad
96b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'jug pa'i rgyu dang / ldog pa'i rgyu'i lam ji snyed pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes thogs pa med par 'jug go/ de ltar shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun tu 'gro
96b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs de ni/ mtha' yas mu med nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing mnyam mo/ /byang chub sems dpas de thos nas mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog /som
97a1(dkon brtsegs): nyi med| the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed cing nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang / rmad du 'du shes bskyed
97a2(dkon brtsegs): do| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /thams cad lam ni bde gshegs rab tu mkhyen/ /sems
97a3(dkon brtsegs): can khams ni nges rgyu bcas pa mkhyen/ /yongs su smin pa'i mtshan nyid ma nges dang / /de bzhin dbang po rgyu dang ldan pa mkhyen/ /'dod chags lam ni rnam pa gsum dang ldan/ /
97a4(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang lam gsum de bzhin gti mug ldan/ /rnam gsum rgya chen mtha' yas nyon mongs ldan/ /lam la rkyen dang rgyu ni ston pas mkhyen/ /dka' ba'i lam la rno bar 'gyur
97a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / /de bzhin dbang po rtul zhing bul ba dang / /sla ba'i lam la rno bar 'gyur ba dang / /de bzhin bul ba'ang 'jig rten mgon pos mkhyen/ /bul ba'i lam la sbyor ba bul
97a6(dkon brtsegs): ba yod| |de bzhin bul ba yin la sbyor ba rno/ /myur ba'i lam la bul bar 'gyur ba dang / /de bzhin de la ma chags myur ba'ang yod/ /lam ni so sor rtog pa skyed byed la/ /yang
97a7(dkon brtsegs): dag sgom pa skyed pa ma yin dang / /sgom pa dag ni skyed par byed pa dang / /gnyis ka khyad par sbyor ldan skyed pa yod/ /lam ni bsam pa yongs su sbyong byed la/ /sbyor ba dag ni sbyong
97b1(dkon brtsegs): bar mi byed yod/ /res 'ga' gnyis ka sbyong bar byed pa'ang yod/ /de dag sangs rgyas thams cad gzigs pas mkhyen/ /lus ni rnam par sbyong la ngag mi sbyong / /sems kyang rnam par
97b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyong ba ma yin dang / /ngag rnams dang ni lus kyang rab sbyong la/ /sems ni res 'ga' mi sbyong ba yang yod/ /sems ni rab sbyong ngag la ma yin te/ /lus kyang rnam par sbyong ba ma yin
97b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / /ngag dang de bzhin sems kyang rab sbyong la/ /res 'ga' lus ni sbyong bar mi 'gyur yod/ /lus dang de bzhin ngag sems sbyong lam dang / /ji ltar ldog dang 'jug par 'gyur ba
97b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams| |sangs rgyas thams cad gzigs pas rab mkhyen te/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs kyi stobs drug pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi stobs drug pa
97b5(dkon brtsegs): ste| stobs de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che ba nas sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs
97b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang ldang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di
97b7(dkon brtsegs): la shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag dang / pha rol gyi bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
98a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par byang ba dang ldang ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu gang yin pa
98a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / rkyen gang yin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /sems can rnams kyi rnam par dag pa'i rgyu gang yin pa dang / rkyen gang yin pa de
98a3(dkon brtsegs): yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /de la rgyu gang / rkyen gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu ni/ tshul bzhin ma yin
98a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yid la byed pa'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rkyen ni/ ma rig pa'o/ /ma rig pa ni/ rgyu'o/ /'du byed ni/ rkyen to/ /'du byed ni/ rgyu'o/ /rnam par shes pa
98a5(dkon brtsegs): ni| rkyen to/ /rnam par shes pa ni/ rgyu'o/ /ming dang gzugs ni/ rkyen to/ /ming dang gzugs ni/ rgyu'o/ /skye mched drug ni/ rkyen to/ /skye mched drug ni/ rgyu'o/ /reg pa ni/ rkyen to/ /
98a6(dkon brtsegs): reg pa ni/ rgyu'o/ /tshor ba ni/ rkyen to/ /chor ba ni/ rgyu'o/ /sred pa ni/ rkyen to/ /sred pa ni/ rgyu'o/ /len pa ni/ rkyen to/ /len pa ni/ rgyu'o/ /srid pa ni/ rkyen to/ /srid pa ni/ rgyu'o/ /skye
98a7(dkon brtsegs): ba ni| rkyen to/ /skye ba ni/ rgyu'o/ /rga shi ni/ rkyen to/ /nyon mongs pa ni/ rgyu'o/ /las ni/ rkyen to/ /lta ba ni/ rgyu'o/ /sred pa ni/ rkyen to/ /bag la nyal ba ni/ rgyu'o/ /kun nas ldang ba ni/
98b1(dkon brtsegs): rkyen to/ /sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'i rgyu ni/ 'di/ rkyen ni/ 'di yin te/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /de la
98b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang / rkyen gang zhe na/ sems can rnams kyi rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gnyis/ rkyen gnyis te/ gzhan las rjes su mthun pa'i
98b3(dkon brtsegs): sgra dang / so so bdag nyid tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ zhi gnas la rtse gcig pa dang / lhag mthong la mkhas pa'o/ /gzhan yang rgyu gnyis dang / rkyen gnyis te/ 'gro ba
98b4(dkon brtsegs): med par shes pa dang / 'ong ba med par shes pa'o/ /gzhan yang rgyu gnyis dang / rkyen gnyis te/ skye ba med par rab tu rtog pa dang / nges par gyur ba la mi reg pa'o/ /gzhan yang rgyu
98b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis dang / rkyen gnyis te/ rkang par ldan pa dang / rig pas rnam par grol ba mngon sum du byed pa'o/ /gzhan yang rgyu gnyis dang / rkyen gnyis te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo la sgom pa
98b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / rang bzhin kyis rnam par grol bar shes pa'o/ /gzhan yang rgyu gnyis dang / rkyen gnyis te/ zad pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa'o/ /gzhan yang rgyu gnyis dang / rkyen gnyis te/
98b7(dkon brtsegs): bden pa rjes su rtogs pa dang / bden pa rjes su 'thob pa'o/ /rgyu de dang / rkyen de dag ni/ sems can rnams rnam par dag par 'gyur ba ste/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag
99a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa yang tshad med/ rnam par dag
99a2(dkon brtsegs): par dmigs pa yang tshad med do/ /yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pas kun nas nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa la 'jog pa yang yod do/ /yang
99a3(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pas rnam par dag pa la dmigs pa yang kun nas nyon mongs par dmigs pa la 'jog pa yang yod/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis 'dzin pas kun nas
99a4(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs par dmigs pa la 'jog pa dang / rnam par dag pa dmigs pa la 'jog pa'ang yod de/ de la snrel zhi'i rnam grangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'jug go /
99a5(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ ye shes 'di lta bu dang ldan pas 'dod pa dag las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang
99a6(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas nas 'gog pa las ldang
99a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs nas bsam gtan dang po las ldang ba'i bar du'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad la rjes su mthun par snyoms par 'jug go /mi mthun par yang
99b1(dkon brtsegs): snyoms par 'jug go / rjes su mthun pa dang mi mthun par snyoms par 'jug ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa dang po'o//
99b2(dkon brtsegs): nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ /sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa la sdug pa nyid du mos par 'gyur ba de
99b3(dkon brtsegs): ni| rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de ni/ rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms
99b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'jug pa de ni/ rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/ /ci yang med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de ni/ rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched
99b5(dkon brtsegs): la snyoms par 'jug pa de ni/ rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/ /'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa de ni/ rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ rnam par thar pa brgyad po 'di dag la rjes su mthun
99b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mi mthun par yang snyoms par 'jug /snrel zhir yang snyoms par 'jug go /ting nge 'dzin la yang ting nge 'dzin ston la/ snyoms par 'jug pas rtogs par ston kyang de
99b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la tha dad par 'gyur ba gang yang med/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ ting nge 'dzin la dmigs pa las ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag par bya ba med/
100a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ ting nge 'dzin gcig gis ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'grub bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ ting nge 'dzin las ma bzhengs par
100a2(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin thams cad la snyoms par 'jug kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ sems gcig nas gcig tu 'jug pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la sems mnyam par ma
100a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhag pa mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de sus kyang lta mi nus te/ nyan thos kyi ting nge 'dzin ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis zil gyis non to/ /
100a4(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis zil gyis non to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis zil gyis
100a5(dkon brtsegs): non to| |de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ zil gyis ma non pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ni/ zil gyis ma non par 'jug go /gdams pa gang dang rjes su bstan pa
100a6(dkon brtsegs): gang gis nyan thos rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin bskyed pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang
100a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /mkhyen nas kyang de bzhin du 'doms shing de bzhin du rjes su ston to/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan dang / rnam
100b1(dkon brtsegs): par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang ldang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs de ni/ mtha' yas mu med de/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs
100b2(dkon brtsegs): shing mnyam mo/ /byang chub sems dpa' de thos nas mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog /som nyi med/ the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed cing nam mkha' lta bur
100b3(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang / rmad du 'du shes bskyed do/ /'di la chos nyid ni/ 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /gang gis sems can nyon mongs shing / /gang
100b4(dkon brtsegs): gis sems can rnams dag 'gyur/ /de yang dpa' bo chen pos mkhyen/ /mkhyen nas gtam rnams ston par mdzad/ /gang du ma rig skye 'gyur ba/ /nyon mongs rgyu ni tshul bzhin min/ /
100b5(dkon brtsegs): de yi rkyen ni 'du byed de/ /sdug bsngal rab tu skye bar 'gyur/ /srid pa'i yan lag skyed pa yi/ /thams cad rtsa ba tshul bzhin min/ /de nyid sangs rgyas rab mkhyen nas/ /de bzhin du yang ston
100b6(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad/ /las kyi rtsa ba nyon mongs pa/ /mi mkhas mngon par 'du byed de/ /sdug bsngal 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i bar/ /de yi rkyen ni rnam par shes/ /gang gis sems can dag 'gyur ba/ /rgyu gnyis
100b7(dkon brtsegs): dang ni rkyen gnyis te/ /gzhan las rjes su mthun sgra dang / /nang du tshul bzhin lta ba'o/ /tshul bzhin rgyu ni zhi gnas te/ /lhag mthong bar ni rkyen yin no/ /sems can gang gis 'gror 'gyur
101a1(dkon brtsegs): ba| |de yang 'dren pas rab tu mkhyen/ /tshul khrims la ni rnal 'byor gnas/ /chos rnams stong par rab tu rtogs/ /thar pa'i sgo ni bsgoms pas na/ /
101a2(dkon brtsegs): srid pa dog las thar par 'gyur/ /de dag sangs rgyas rab mkhyen nas/ /rnam sbyong skyes bu bud med la/ /stong pa nyid dang mtshan med dang / /rnam par thar pa rab tu ston/ /bsam gtan
101a3(dkon brtsegs): la ni snyoms zhugs pa/ /rang rgyal dang ni nyan thos rnams/ /de dag rnams kyang dog par bshad/ /de yi 'gran zla yod par gsungs/ /sangs rgyas bsam gtan rnam thar la/ /dgra dang
101a4(dkon brtsegs): bcas med dog pa med/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni stobs bdun pa/ /pha rol rgol bas thul bar dka'/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
101a5(dkon brtsegs): bdun pa ste/ stobs de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che ba nas sus kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos dang mthun par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de la de
101a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa'i ye shes kyis bdag
101a7(dkon brtsegs): dang sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag gi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran no/ /'di lta ste/ skye ba gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi'am/ lnga'am
101b1(dkon brtsegs): bcu'am/ nyi shu'am/ sum cu'am/ bzhi bcu'am/ lnga bcu'am/ skye ba brgya'am/ skye ba stong ngam/ skye ba brgya stong nas skye ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bar du rjes su dran no/ /'jig
101b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bskal pa'am/ 'chags pa'i bskal pa'am/ 'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i bskal pa'am/ 'jig pa'i bskal pa du ma'am/ 'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma'am/ 'jig pa dang
101b3(dkon brtsegs): 'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma zhig na nga sngon che ge mo zhig tu byung ste/ ming ni/ 'di zhes bya/ rus ni/ 'di zhes bya/ rigs ni/ 'di zhes bya/ zas ni/ 'di lta bu zhig za za/ kha dog ni/
101b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu/ mtshan ma ni/ 'di lta bu/ dbyibs ni/ 'di lta bu/ tshe ni/ 'di tsam zhig thub/ yun ni/ 'di srid cig gnas/ bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ni/ 'di lta bu zhig myong ste/ bdag de nas
101b5(dkon brtsegs): shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so/ /bdag de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes so/ /zhes 'di lta bu'i rnam pa dang bcas/ yul phyogs dang bcas/ gzhi ci las gyur pa dang bcas par bdag
101b6(dkon brtsegs): dang gzhan gyi sngon gyi gnas du ma rjes su dran no/ /sems can gang gi sngon gyi rgyu ji lta bu dang / rgyu gang gis sems can du 'gyur ba'i rgyu de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen te/ mkhyen
101b7(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to/ /'das pa'i sems can thams cad kyi 'das pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu mkhyen no/ /sems gang gi 'og tu gang la dmigs pa'i sems skyes pa dang /
102a1(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa gang ma tshang bas 'gags pa de thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu/ gang sems can gcig gi sems
102a2(dkon brtsegs): gcig nas gcig tu sems 'di lta bu zhig gi 'og tu sems 'di lta bu zhig byung ngo / /zhes bya ba de ni/ bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du yang tshig gis bshad pas ston par mi nus te/
102a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi yang thams cad de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /tha ma'i mtha'i bar gyi bskal par de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de
102a4(dkon brtsegs): dag gi sems rnams bshad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthar thug bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum
102a5(dkon brtsegs): du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ tshad med/ grangs med/ brjod du med de/ de'i mtha'i gnas ni/ bde bar bstan mi nus so/ /sangs rgyas
102a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi khyu mchog tu gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can de dag la kye sems can rnams/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang / de sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'am/ nyan thos la bskyed pa'am/ rang
102a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'am/ chos la bskyed pa de dag dran par gyis shig ces dran par mdzad do/ /'di lta ste/ de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus dran par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs
102b1(dkon brtsegs): pas de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba la dmigs pa de las chos 'di lta bur ston te/ ci nas sems can de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing mos pa
102b2(dkon brtsegs): ji lta ba bzhin du la la ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pas/ la la ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /la la ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
102b3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed do/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du byed pa shes pa'i stobs ni/ mtha' yas mu med de/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing mnyam
102b4(dkon brtsegs): mo| |byang chub sems dpa' de thos nas mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog /som nyi med/ the tshom mi za ba nas nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bar du'o/ /bcom ldan
102b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis de skad gsungs te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad bka' stsal nas ston pas yang 'di skad gsungs so/ /bdag gi dang ni de bzhin gzhan dag gi /'jig rten sgron mas sngon
102b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi dran pa ni/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas pa/ /skyu ru ra lnga lag mthil bzhag pa bzhin/ /ming rus de bzhin kha dog rnam par rtog /tshe dang gnas dang 'chi 'pho 'gro ba dang /
102b7(dkon brtsegs): gang gi rgyu la sems can brtson ldan pa/ /de mkhyen pa ni de la chos kyang 'chad/ /'gro ba rnams kyi sems dang sems byung chos/ /gang dag 'das pa mtha' yas mu med pa/ /gang gi 'og tu
103a1(dkon brtsegs): sems gang byung ba kun/ rgyal ba'i ye shes chen po mnga' bas mkhyen/ /sems can gcig gi sems rgyud sngon 'das pa/ /bde bar gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen pa ni/ /bskal pa gang+gA'i
103a2(dkon brtsegs): klung gi bye snyed du/ /bshad kyang de yi mtha' mar phyin mi 'gyur/ /sngon gyi spyod pa ji snyed de dag ni/ /phyi ma'i mtha' yi bar du ngas bshad kyang / /mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes mi zad de/ /
103a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan ye shes rgya mtsho 'di 'dra'o/ /sngon gyi rgyal la bsti stang gang byas shing / /sems can gang dag dge ba'i bsam gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul stobs kyi shugs la
103a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas/ /sngon dag dge ba byas pa rnams kyang dran/ /sngon ni bsod nams ji 'dra byas pa rnams/ /de dag rnams kyang ston pa'i mthus dran te/ /de dag dran nas gnas ni gsum la
103a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khod/ /thar pa'i gnas las phyir yang mi ldog 'gyur/ /bde gshegs sngon gyi sbyor ba mtha' yas te/ /sems can thams cad kyis ni bsam mi nus/ /mtha' yas grags pa'i
103a6(dkon brtsegs): stobs ni brgyad pa la/ /rgyal sras bdag nyid chen po dad par 'gyur/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs brgyad pa ste/ stobs de dang
103a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pas zhes bya ba nas chos dang mthun pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i mig rjes su dran pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i
103b1(dkon brtsegs): bu| de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa'i ye shes dang / mi las shin tu 'das pa'i lha'i mig rnam par dag pas sems can rnams 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / bzang po dang / ngan
103b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / kha dog mdzes pa dang / kha dog mi sdug pa dang / bde 'gror 'gro ba dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba rnams gzigs so/ /sems can 'di dag ni/ lus kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/ ngag
103b3(dkon brtsegs): gis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/ yid kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ log par lta ba dag ste/ de dag log par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus
103b4(dkon brtsegs): lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye'o/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du'ang de bzhin no/ /yang sems can 'di dag
103b5(dkon brtsegs): ni| lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan/ ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan/ yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan te/ 'phags pa rnams la skur pa mi 'debs pa/ yang dag par
103b6(dkon brtsegs): lta ba ste| de dag yang dag par lta ba yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lhar skye'o/ /zhes sems can rnams kyi las ji ltar bsags pa rnams
103b7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen to/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i mig de ni/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nam mkha'i mtha' chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa brjod du med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma las
104a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang shin tu 'das pa thams cad na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ji snyed snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni/ 'tshig pa dang / 'jig pa dang / 'chags par gzigs
104a2(dkon brtsegs): so| |sems can gang dag kha cig snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni/ 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye bar gzigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag kha cig snang bar gyur pa de dag
104a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni/ dga' ldan gnas nas 'chi 'pho ba dang / ma'i rum du 'jug pa dang / btsa' ba dang / gom pa bdun 'dor ba dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi dang du 'jug pa dang / mngon par
104a4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar gzigs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag kha cig snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gzigs so/ /chos kyi 'khor
104a5(dkon brtsegs): lo rab tu bskor ba dang / tshe'i 'du byed 'dor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang gzigs so/ /nyan thos gang dag kha cig snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni/ shin tu
104a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gzigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas gang dag kha cig snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni/ rdzu 'phrul ston cing yon sbyong
104a7(dkon brtsegs): bar gzigs so/ /sems can gang dag snang bar ma gyur pa/ phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa rnams kyi mig gi lam du mi 'gro ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang
104b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang mthong bar mi 'gyur ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i mig gis gzigs so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pas shing rta'i 'phang lo'i tshad
104b2(dkon brtsegs): tsam la snang bar ma gyur pa'i sems can rnams gzigs pa de dag ni/ shin tu mang gi /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha dang mi rnams ni/ de ltar ma yin te/ de ltar mi
104b3(dkon brtsegs): snang bar gyur pa'i sems can gyi khams kyang tshad med do/ /'di ltar shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ lha'i mig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing na sems can gang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul bar 'gyur
104b4(dkon brtsegs): zhes sems can gyi khams la gzigs te/ sems can ji tsam sangs rgyas kyis 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dag gi mdun na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs shing / sems can de dag 'dul yang
104b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can gzhan gyis mi shes so/ /de ltar na/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i mig rjes su dran pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ni/ mtha' yas mu med de/ nam
104b6(dkon brtsegs): mkha' dang mtshungs shing mnyam mo/ /byang chub sems dpa' de thos nas mngon par dad pa nas nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
104b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis don 'di nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i lha'i mig dri med de/ bskal pa du mar dge ba'i las kyis sbyangs/ /des ni
105a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing / /rgya chen bsam gyis mi khyab rnams kyang gzigs/ /'byung ba dang ni 'jig pa ji snyed pa/ /kha cig me yis 'khor cing
105a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can gnas/ kha cig sangs rgyas ldan zhing kha cig stong / /thams cad rang byung gi ni spyan gyis gzigs/ /sems can khams ni rgya cher bsam mi khyab/ /gzugs can
105a3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs med gang dag ji snyed dang / /gang dag ngan 'gror 'gro dang bde 'gro ba/ /thams cad rang byung gi ni spyan gyis gzigs/ /sangs rgyas bye ba mang po gang bzhugs dang / /rang
105a4(dkon brtsegs): byung 'dren pa mya ngan gang 'das dang / /rang rgyal gang dang nyan thos gang yod pa/ /thams cad rang byung gi ni spyan gyis gzigs/ /byang chub sems dpa' srog chags phan 'dogs pa/ /
105a5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag byang chub spyod pa mchog spyod cing / /la la gzhi med gnas ni rtogs gyur pa/ /thams cad rang byung 'dren pa dag gis gzigs/ /gang gis srog chags shin tu phra mthong
105a6(dkon brtsegs): ba| |bde gshegs mig ni 'di 'dra dri ma med/ /mig stobs bsam gyis mi khyab dgu pa ste/ /rgyal sras des pa rnams ni mngon par dad/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs
105a7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dgu pa ste/ stobs de dang ldan pas khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che zhing 'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog pa nas
105b1(dkon brtsegs): sus kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos dang mthun pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i zag pa zad pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu/ de
105b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis zag pa thams cad zad pas bdag skye ba ni/ zad/ tshangs par spyod pa la ni/ bsten/ bya ba ni/
105b3(dkon brtsegs): byas te/ 'di la srid pa gzhan mi shes so/ /zhes zag pa med pa/ sems rnam par grol ba/ rang gi mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de la de
105b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i zag bzad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs de ni/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'o/ /nyan thos kyi theg pa'i zag pa zad pa ni/ tshad du byas
105b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bag chags yang dag par bcom pa'o/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi zag pa zad pa ni/ tshad yod pa ste/ snying rje chen po dang bral ba/ spobs pa dang bral ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zag pa
105b6(dkon brtsegs): zad pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par bcom pa/ snying rje chen pos kun tu bzung ba/ mi 'jigs pa dang spobs pa la
105b7(dkon brtsegs): lta ba| 'jig rten thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa ste/ skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la las kyi bag chags med/ nyon mongs pa'i bag chags
106a1(dkon brtsegs): med| spyod lam 'khrul pa'i bag chags med do/ /'di lta ste/ shA ri'i bu/ nam mkha' yongs su dag pas rdul dang du ba'i 'khrug pa dang lhan cig tu mi gnas
106a2(dkon brtsegs): pa de bzhin du/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs kyang nyon mongs pa'i bag chags thams cad dang lhan cig tu mi gnas so/ /de zag pa zad par
106a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa de lta bu la rab tu gnas nas zag pa dang bcas pa/ len pa dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams la zag pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /len pa spang bar bya ba'i phyir
106a4(dkon brtsegs): chos ston te/ kye ma sems can rnams ni/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa las byung ste/ zag pa dang len pa rnams mi skyed pa'i phyir yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khyod kyis rab tu rtogs
106a5(dkon brtsegs): shig / ces de dag la de bzhin gshegs pas dpe dang tshul gyis ci nas kyang zag pa rnams yang dag pa ma yin pa'o/ /zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes par 'gyur zhing /
106a6(dkon brtsegs): shes nas kyang chos gang yang mi len te/ len pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de lta de lta bur chos ston to/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems can
106a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi zag pa rnams rab tu mkhyen to/ /zag pa kun 'byung ba dang / zag pa 'gag pa dang / zag pa 'gag par 'gyur ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te/ mkhyen
106b1(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i zag pa zad pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs de thos nas mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog
106b2(dkon brtsegs): som nyi med cing the tshom mi za ba nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed do/ /'di la chos nyid ni/ 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /'dren pa'i zag pa med pa'i ye shes ni/ /
106b3(dkon brtsegs): rgya chen sgrib med dag pa tshad med do/ /stobs bcu'i stobs ni de dang ldan pas na/ zhi ba'i byang chub mchog 'di rab tu gsung / /nyan thos rnams kyi zag zad ye shes ni/ bag chags ma bcom
106b4(dkon brtsegs): tshad dang ldan pa yin/ /mi yi dam pa 'dren pa mchog rab kyi/ /bag chags bcom zhing tshad dang ldan ma yin/ /de bzhin rang rgyal byang chub gang reg pa/ /de la snying rje che dang spobs pa med/ /bcom
106b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ni zag pa yongs zad pa/ /snying rje che dang spobs pa tshad med do/ /sangs rgyas zag zad mkhyen la gnas nas ni/ /'gro ba'i zag pa yang dag ma yin zhing / /rigs pa'i gnas kyi tshul 'dir
106b6(dkon brtsegs): ma shes pas/ /chos 'di thams cad log par zhugs mkhyen te/ /de la rgyal ba snying rje cher bskyed nas/ /chos 'di mi rtag stong pa bdag med chos/ /dngos med gsog ste mchog tu zhi ba yi/ /
106b7(dkon brtsegs): sa la rtogs shig ltos zhes rab tu ston/ /'di la skyes bu srog dang gang zag dang / /shed skyes shed bu byad pa bo yang med/ /chos 'di thams cad log par nags pas na/ /ston pa snying rje
107a1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed nas thar ston kyang / /bde bar gshegs la skyo ba yod med de/ /yang dag ye shes nam yang nyams pa med/ /de phyir rgyal ba rtag tu rnal 'byor sbyor/ /
107a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro la phan phyir chos rnams rab tu ston/ /'di ni pha rol smra ba 'joms pa'i stobs/ /mtha' yas nam mkha' 'dra ba bcu pa ste/ /mgon po stobs bcu de la gnas gyur nas/ /
107a3(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs med 'khor lo dam pa rab tu bskor/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu pa ste/ stobs de dang ldan pas de bzhin
107a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che zhing 'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog ste/ 'jig rten 'dir dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'i bar du sus kyang chos dang mthun
107a5(dkon brtsegs): par ma bskor ba/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
107a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog pa nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed do// //bam po drug pa/ yang shA ri'i bu/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
107a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog /som nyi mi byed/ the tshom mi za ba nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi bar du
107b1(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes bskyed ce na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/ mi 'jigs pa de dag dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang
107b2(dkon brtsegs): du seng+ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing / khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che ste/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma
107b3(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas/ 'khor gyi
107b4(dkon brtsegs): nang du nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /zhes zhal gyis 'che ba de la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis de bzhin gshegs pa la khyod kyis chos 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma
107b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas so/ /zhes chos dang mthun par rgol bar byed mi nus so/ /de la ji ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos
107b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mi mnyam pa med par yang dag par mngon par sangs rgyas te so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i chos rnams gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
107b7(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa dang / slob pa'i chos rnams gang yin pa dang / mi slob pa'i chos rnams gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams
108a1(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa gang yin pa dang / 'jig rten gyi chos rnams gang yin pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams gang yin pa dang / kha na
108a2(dkon brtsegs): ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas de dag thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam
108a3(dkon brtsegs): par de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/ /de la mnyam pa nyid gang zhe na/
108a4(dkon brtsegs): lta ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid du mnyam mo/ /mtshan ma'i ngo bo nyid kyis mtshan ma med par mnyam mo/ /khams gsum pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis smon pa med par mnyam mo/ /skye ba'i
108a5(dkon brtsegs): ngo bo nyid kyis mi skye bar mnyam mo/ /mngon par 'du byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis mngon par 'du mi byed par mnyam mo/ /'byung ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis mi 'byung bar mnyam mo/ /kun
108a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhi'i ngo bo nyid kyis kun gzhi med par mnyam mo/ /dus gsum gyi ngo bo nyid kyis ji lta ba bzhin du mnyam mo/ /ma rig pa dang / srid pa dang / sred pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis rig pa dang
108a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol bar mnyam mo/ /'khor ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis mya ngan las 'das par mnyam mo/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam par mngon par
108b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa de yang 'khor thams cad shes
108b2(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa/ 'khor thams cad mgu bar byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi lus sim par byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi sems tshim pa skyed pa/ 'khor thams cad dga' ba dang / rab
108b3(dkon brtsegs): tu dga' ba dang / dad pa skyed pa/ snying rje chen pos sbyor ba/ de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam pa/ de kho na nyid/ de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa nyid/ mi 'gyur ba nyid/ mi 'khrugs
108b4(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid/ 'byung ba med pa nyid/ 'jig pa med pa nyid/ rtsod pa med pa nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa la rtsod pa gang yang med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs
108b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ni/ rtsod pa med pa/ 'thab pa med pa'o/ /de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam zhing chos kyi dbyings ngos mnyam pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams ma lus pa thams
108b6(dkon brtsegs): cad la thogs pa med pa'o/ /ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas 'di lta bu'i chos zab mo phra ba shes par bka' ba de dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de bzhin du/ snying rje
108b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po la gnas nas bstan pa sna tshogs dang / rnam grangs sna tshogs kyis sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la chos thams cad yang dag par rab tu ston te/ de'i
109a1(dkon brtsegs): chos de yang de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad pa'i phyir 'byung ngo / /gang ston pa ma yin la ston pa'o/ /zhes khas 'che ba/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
109a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas ma yin la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /zhes khas 'che ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pas zil gyis non nas de dag rgyags pa chad de
109a3(dkon brtsegs): phan tshun du 'bros so/ /'di ltar shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa mtha' yas mu med de/ 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' mtha' yas mu med pa de bzhin du/
109a4(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa yang mtha' yas mu med de/ shA ri'i bu/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i mtha' 'dod pa ni/ nam
109a5(dkon brtsegs): mkha'i mtha' 'dod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog pa nas ngo
109a6(dkon brtsegs): mtshar dang / rmad kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed do/ /'di ni/ mi 'jigs pa dang po'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i
109a7(dkon brtsegs): ye shes dang ldan pas 'khor gyi nang du gshegs nas nga zag pa zad do/ /zhes zhal gyis 'che ste/ de la khyod kyis zag pa 'di dag ma zad do/ /zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la lhar
109b1(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis chos dang mthun par rtsod par byed pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zag pa zad pa ni/ 'di dag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod pa'i zag pa las sems rnam
109b2(dkon brtsegs): par grol bas 'dod chags la spyod pa'i bag chags thams cad bcom mo/ /srid pa'i zag pa las sems rnam par grol bas zhe sdang la spyod pa'i bag chags thams cad bcom mo/ /ma
109b3(dkon brtsegs): rig pa'i zag pa las sems rnam par grol bas gti mug la spyod pa'i bag chags thams cad bcom mo/ /lta ba'i zag pa las sems rnam par grol bas nyon mongs pa la spyod pa'i bag
109b4(dkon brtsegs): chags thams cad bcom ste/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob bzung ste de bzhin gshegs pa zag pa zad pa'o/ /zhes bya'o/ /don dam par na 'phags pa'i shes rab dang ye shes kyi
109b5(dkon brtsegs): mdun na chos gang yongs su shes pa'am/ spang ba'am/ bsgom pa'am/ mngon du 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang mi 'dug go /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang zad pa zhes bya ba de ni/ nam du yang mi
109b6(dkon brtsegs): zad pa ma yin no/ /de ni/ shin tu zad pa nyid yin gyi/ gnyen pos zad pa zhes mi bya ste/ de ni/ ji lta ba bzhin du zad pa'o/ /gang ji lta ba bzhin du zad pa de la zad pa gang yang med do/ /gang
109b7(dkon brtsegs): la zad pa gang yang med pa de ni/ 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /de la skye ba med pa/ 'jig pa med pa/ gnas med de/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung ste/ chos
110a1(dkon brtsegs): nyid chos kyi dbyings ni/ gnas pa nyid de/ de bzhin du de la ye shes zhugs so/ /gang la 'jug pa med cing mi 'jug pa yang med pa yang de ltar zhugs te/ de lta
110a2(dkon brtsegs): bu'i chos kyi tshul gyis zag pa dang zad pa spong ba mi dmigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ snying rje chen po la gnas nas zag pa spong ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
110a3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jigs pa de ni/ 'khor thams cad shes par byed de/ 'khor thams cad mgu bar byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi lus sim par byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi sems tshim pa skyed
110a4(dkon brtsegs): pa| 'khor thams cad dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dad pa skyed pa/ snying rje chen pos sbyor ba/ de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam pa/ de kho na nyid/ de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa nyid/
110a5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ba nyid/ mi 'khrugs pa nyid/ 'byung ba med pa nyid/ 'jig pa med pa nyid/ rtsod pa med pa nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa la rtsod pa gang yang med do/ /de
110a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa ni/ rtsod pa med pa/ 'thab pa med pa'o/ /de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam zhing chos kyi dbyings ngos mnyam pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams ma lus
110a7(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad la thogs pa med do/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ grangs med/ dpag tu med pa'i chos dang ldan zhing snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin
110b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems kyis zag pa spong ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa nas
110b2(dkon brtsegs): gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i mtha' 'dod pa de nam mkha'i mtha' 'dod do/ /zhes pa'i bar du ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa
110b3(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog pas ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
110b4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jigs pa gnyis pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa de dang ldan zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten 'dir chos dang mthun par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin
110b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas/ 'khor gyi nang du gshegs nas bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams la bar du gcod do/ /zhes zhal gyis 'che ba de la
110b6(dkon brtsegs): gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'di ni/ bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos ma yin no/ /zhes rgol bar byed pa med pa'i bar du'o/ /de la
110b7(dkon brtsegs): bar du gcod pa'i chos gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos gcig ste/ gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bag med pa'i sems so/ /bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i
111a1(dkon brtsegs): chos gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ngo tsha mi shes pa dang / khrel med pa'o/ /bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta
111a2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ lus kyis nyes par spyad pa dang / ngag gis nyes par spyad pa dang / yid kyis nyes par spyad pa'o/ /bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'gro ba ma yin
111a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gro ba bzhi la/ 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba'o/ /bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos lnga ste/ lnga
111a4(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / chang 'thung ba'o/ /bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos drug ste/
111a5(dkon brtsegs): drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas la ma gus pa dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / bslab pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gtong ba la ma gus pa'o/ /bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos bdun
111a6(dkon brtsegs): te/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nga rgyal dang / che ba'i nga rgyal dang / nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / log pa'i nga rgyal dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang / cung zad snyam
111a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nga rgyal lo/ /bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ log pa'i lta ba dang / log pa'i rtog pa dang / log pa'i ngag dang / log pa'i las kyi mtha'
111b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / log pa'i 'tsho ba dang / log pa'i rtsol ba dang / log pa'i dran pa dang / log pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag
111b2(dkon brtsegs): la gnod pa byas so/ /zhes kun nas mnar sems bskyed pa dang / gnod pa byed do/ /zhes kun nas mnar sems bskyed pa dang / gnod par byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes kun nas mnar
111b3(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed pa dang / bdag gi mdza' bo la gnod pa byas so/ /byed do/ /byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes sems la kun nas mnar sems bskyed pa dang / bdag dang mi mdza' ba'i don byas
111b4(dkon brtsegs): so/ /byed do/ /byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes kun nas mnar sems bskyed pa'o/ /bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams
111b5(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig kyal pa dang /
111b6(dkon brtsegs): brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba'o/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang ldan pa'i kun tu sbyor ba ji snyed pa'i chos de dag gis ro myong ba la rjes
111b7(dkon brtsegs): su lta zhing / gnas pa dang / phyin ci log dang ldan pa dang / 'byung ba la kun nas ldang ba dang / sred pa dang / lta ba la mngon par zhen pa'i zang zing dang bcas/ phung po dang bcas pa'i lus kyi
112a1(dkon brtsegs): las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas bar du gcod par mkhyen to/ /bar du gcod par mkhyen nas kyang yang dag
112a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston to/ /chos bcu po de dag ni bar du gcod par 'gyur pa ste/ de dag zhi bar bya ba dang / nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang / spong bar bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa
112a3(dkon brtsegs): chos ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa de yang 'khor thams cad shes par byed pa/ 'khor thams cad mgu bar byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi lus sim par byed pa/
112a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor thams cad kyi sems tshim pa skyed pa/ 'khor thams cad dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dad pa bskyed pa dang / snying rje chen pos sbyor ba/ de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam pa/ de kho
112a5(dkon brtsegs): na nyid/ de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa nyid/ mi 'gyur ba nyid/ mi 'khrugs pa nyid/ 'byung ba med pa nyid/ 'jig pa med pa nyid/ rtsod pa med pa nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi
112a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa la rtsod pa gang yang med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa ni rtsod pa med pa/ 'thab pa med pa'o/ /de bzhin nyid dang mnyam zhing chos kyi dbyings ngos mnyam pa/
112a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams ma lus pa thams cad la thogs pa med do/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du med/ brjod du
112b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i chos dang ldan zhing snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin pa'i sems kyi bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams zhi bar bya ba dang / spang bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin
112b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa mtha' yas mu med pa nas gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i mtha' 'dod pa de nam mkha'i mtha' 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
112b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog /so ma nyi med/ the tshom mi za ba nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi bar du 'du shes
112b4(dkon brtsegs): bskyed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa gsum pa ste/ mi 'jigs pa de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du gshegs nas zhes bya ba
112b5(dkon brtsegs): nas sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas/ sems can
112b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams gang la brten pas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'phags pa'i nges par 'byung ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur ba'i lam rab tu mkhyen te/ de la 'di ni nges par 'byung
112b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lam ma yin no/ /zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis chos dang mthun pas rgol bar byed mi nus so/ /nges par 'byung ba'i lam gcig ste gcig gang zhe na/ 'di
113a1(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ste/ gang sems can rnams rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'o/ /nges par 'byung ba'i chos gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta
113a2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong ngo / /nges par 'byung ba'i chos gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o/ /nges par 'byung
113a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus su gtogs pa'i dran pa dang / tshor bar gtogs pa'i dran pa dang / sems su gtogs pa'i dran pa dang / chos su gtogs pa'i
113a4(dkon brtsegs): dran pa ste/ 'di ni/ nges par 'byung ba'i chos bzhi'o/ /nges par 'byung ba'i chos lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang
113a5(dkon brtsegs): po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ 'di ni/ nges par 'byung ba'i chos lnga'o/ /nges par 'byung ba'i chos drug ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes
113a6(dkon brtsegs): su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa ste/ 'di ni/ nges par
113a7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'i chos drug go / nges par 'byung ba'i chos bdun te/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan
113b1(dkon brtsegs): lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang
113b2(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ 'di bdun yang gong ma bzhin no/ /nges par 'byung ba'i chos brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i
113b3(dkon brtsegs): lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang
113b4(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ 'di brgyad kyang gong ma bzhin no/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i rtsa ba las skyes pa'i chos dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/
113b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ mchog tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dang / shin tu sbyangs pa dang / bde ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes mthong ba dang / mya ngan las 'das
113b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / rnam par grol ba ste/ 'di dgu yang gong ma bzhin no/ /nges par 'byung ba'i chos bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi
113b7(dkon brtsegs): lam mo/ /'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa spangs pa dang / ma byin par len pa spangs pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa dang / brdzun du smra ba spangs pa dang / phra ma
114a1(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa dang / ngag rtsub po spangs pa dang / tshil kyal pa spang pa dang / brnab sems spangs pa dang / gnod sems med pa dang / yang dag par lta ba
114a2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ 'di yang gong ma bzhin te/ lam de ni/ nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar shA ri'i bu/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi dge ba ji snyed pa/ tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ldan
114a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang ldan pa'am/ shes rab kyi phung po dang ldan pa'am/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang ldan pa'am/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po
114a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang ldan pa de dag kyang nges par 'byung ba'i lam zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang nges par 'byung ba zhes pa ni/ yang dag par sgrub pa gang yin pa ste/ gang
114a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par sgrub pa de la ni/ chos gang yang gsog pa'am/ 'bri ba'am/ blang ba'am/ dor ba'am/ gzung ba'am/ spang ba med do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag par sgrub pa la
114a6(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa ni/ gnyis la blo mi 'jug ste/ chos thams cad gnyis su med par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes mthong ba ni/ nges par 'byung ba'i lam ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa
114a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la nges par 'byung ba'i lam yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa de yang 'khor thams cad shes par byed pa/ 'khor thams cad
114b1(dkon brtsegs): mgu bar byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi lus sim par byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi sems tshim pa skyed pa/ 'khor thams cad dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dad pa skyed pa/
114b2(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen pos sbyor ba/ de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam pa/ de kho na nyid/ de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa nyid/ mi 'gyur ba nyid/ mi 'khrug pa nyid/ 'byung ba med pa nyid/ 'jig pa med
114b3(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid/ rtsod pa med pa nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa la rtsod pa gang yang med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa ni/ rtsod pa med pa/ 'thab pa med pa'o/ /de
114b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nyid dang mnyam zhing chos kyi dbyings ngos mnyam pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams ma lus pa thams cad la thogs pa med pa'o/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med/
114b5(dkon brtsegs): grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du med/ dpag tu med/ brjod du med pa'i chos dang ldan zhing snying rje chen pos zin pa'i sems kyis sems can rnams la nges par 'byung
114b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lam yang dag par rab tu ston te/ de so sor rtog pas sems can der 'jug pa rnams de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad cing nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di
114b7(dkon brtsegs): ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi pa ste/ mi 'jigs pa de dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra yang dag par
115a1(dkon brtsegs): sgrog cing / khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che ste/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ sus kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos
115a2(dkon brtsegs): dang mthun par ma bskor ba tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor to/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi mtha' yas mu med do/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/
115a3(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu/ nam mkha' mtha' yas mu med pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi yang mtha' yas mu med do/ /sems can thams cad kyis zad par mi 'gyur
115a4(dkon brtsegs): ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i mtha' 'dod pa de ni/ nam mkha'i mtha' 'dod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de
115a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog /som nyi med/ the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs
115a6(dkon brtsegs): pa rnyed nas nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
115a7(dkon brtsegs): gsungs so/ /chos kun mnyam pa nyid mnyam par/ /rang byung bas ni rjes su rtogs/ /de phyir yang dag mngon sangs rgyas/ /de bzhin gshegs pas mnyam pa gzigs/ /so so'i
115b1(dkon brtsegs): skye bo'i chos gang yin/ /de dag sangs rgyas chos dang mnyam/ /slob dang mi slob chos rnams dang / /rang rgyal gyi ni chos nyid dang / /gang dag 'jig rten chos rnams dang / gang dag 'jig rten 'das
115b2(dkon brtsegs): chos dang / /dge dang mi dge mi g.yo rnams/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam dang 'dra/ /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med/ /smon lam dag ni rnam par spangs/ /ma skyes mngon par 'du mi byed/ /'di
115b3(dkon brtsegs): ni mnyam pa nyid du bstan/ /'di dag mnyam pa nyid rtogs nas/ /thub pa chen po mi 'jigs pa/ gang gis sems can grol 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin du yang rab tu ston/ /'jig rten gsum
115b4(dkon brtsegs): las rnam par grol/ /rnam par thar pa rab tu ston/ /mi dbang gi ni mi 'jigs pa/ /gnyis pa yang dag rab tu bstan/ /rgyal bas gang chos rjes su sangs rgyas pa/ /ma bsten par ni rnam
115b5(dkon brtsegs): par grol mi 'thob/ /bag med pa dang khrel ba med gyur dang / /gang la ngo tsha ci yang med pa dang / /lus dang ngag rnams dang ni yid kyis su/ /gang dag sdom pa nam yang yod min dang / /'dun
115b6(dkon brtsegs): dang zhe sdang gti mug 'jigs pa dang / srog gcod pa dang gzhan la 'tshe ba dang / gzhan gyi chung ma de bzhin brdzun dang chang / /nga rgyal mi gus de bzhin bdun pa'o/ /gang dag log par smra
115b7(dkon brtsegs): ba brgyad pa ste/ thams cad rnam par grol ba'i lam rgyud gcod/ /gang dag mnar sems dgu dang nyes mang dang / mi dge bcu yi las kyi lam rnams dang / gang dag tshul min zhi ba mi
116a1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa| |de dag la ni nam yang thar pa med/ /phyin ci log la zhugs par rig gyur nas/ /bag med yang dag ma yin smra la chags/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi mi
116a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs gsum pa ste/ /chos nyid 'di dag la ni bsnyen par bya/ /gang dag rnam sbyong sgo ni tshad med la/ /mi gang ston pa byang chub reg par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba nyid kyis ma thos thams
116a3(dkon brtsegs): cad rig / shes nas mi 'chir 'gro ba'i chos 'chad do/ /ji tsam dge ba'i chos ni mang yod pa/ /byang chub phyogs dge rgyal bas bsngags pa la/ /bsten pa rnam par thar pa mi 'thab
116a4(dkon brtsegs): pa| |gnas med par ni stobs bcu rnams kyis bshad/ /tshul bzhin gyis ni nyon mongs mang po zhi/ /yang dag chos dge mnyam pa med ldan zhing / /chos dang chos ma yin la de mi
116a5(dkon brtsegs): chags| |zhi ba mya ngan med pa rnam grol reg / gsog gsob nam mkha' 'dra zhing ya ma brla/ /sgyu ma'i gzugs 'dra nam mkha' lta bu dang / /dge chos rnam pa gang gis rab shes
116a6(dkon brtsegs): pa| |de ni srid pa'i mtsho las thar par 'gyur/ /thub pa stobs bcu rnams kyi chos 'di ni/ /'gro ba gang mos srid par 'gro ba la/ /snying rje snying brtse byas nas thar byed de/ /mi 'jigs
116a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhi pa nam mkha' 'dra ba'o/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang / yid ches/ rab tu rtog
116b1(dkon brtsegs): som nyi med/ the tshom mi za ba nas nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs
116b2(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog/ som nyi med/ the tshom mi za ba nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi bar du 'du
116b3(dkon brtsegs): shes bskyed ce na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi snying rje chen po ni/ sems can thams cad rjes su mi gtong zhing rtag tu 'jug pa/ sems can yongs su smin par
116b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ste/ mi ldog par rig par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po de yang ji ltar dag gi las kyis kyang khong du chud par bya ba sla ba ma yin pa de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab/ de
116b5(dkon brtsegs): ltar mtshungs pa med/ de ltar dpag tu med/ de ltar brjod du med/ de ltar mi bzad cing khong du chud par dka'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub thob pa
116b6(dkon brtsegs): de ltar sems can la de bzhin gshegs pas snying rje chen po 'jug ste/ byang chub ci 'dra ba snying rje chen po yang de 'dra'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub ji ltar thob ce na/ de bzhin
116b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas rtsa ba med pa gnas med pa'i byang chub thob bo/ de la rtsa ba gang / gnas gang zhe na/ 'jig tshogs ni/ rtsa ba'o/ /yang dag pa ma yin pa kun tu rtog pa ni/ gnas so/ /
117a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir de dag mnyam par mkhyen te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas rtsa ba med pa gnas med pa'i byang chub
117a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes bya ste/ sems can 'di dag ni/ rtsa ba med pa/ gnas med pa mi shes pa de dag shes par bya'o/ /zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin
117a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go / gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ byang chub ni/ zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba'o/ /de ji ltar zhi/ ji ltar nye bar zhi zhe na/ nang zhi ba'o/ /phyi rol nye bar zhi
117a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'o| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig ni/ bdag gam bdag gis stong ste/ de'i rang bzhin ni/ 'di yin pas na/ de'i phyir zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang /
117a5(dkon brtsegs): lus dang / yid ni/ bdag dang bdag gis stong ste/ de'i rang bzhin 'di yin pas na/ de'i phyir zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /de mig stong par yongs su shes nas gzugs la mi rgyug ste/
117a6(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /yid kyi bar du yang stong par yongs su shes nas chos la mi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi zhes bya na/ sems can 'di dag ni/ zhi ba dang / nye
117a7(dkon brtsegs): bar zhi ba 'di mi shes te/ de dag shes par bya'o/ /zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ ngas ni/ rang bzhin gyis 'od
117b1(dkon brtsegs): gsal ba byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /ji ltar 'od gsal zhe na/ rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa ste/ nam mkha' lta bu'o/ /nam mkha'i
117b2(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin no/ /nam mkha' ni/ rjes su 'brang ba'o/ /nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa ste/ de ni/ rang bzhin gyis shin tu 'od gsal bas na/ rang bzhin gyis 'od
117b3(dkon brtsegs): gsal ba 'di khong du ma chud pas byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams glo bur gyi nyon mongs pas kun nas nyon mongs te/ sems can rnams rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba 'di mi shes pas/
117b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba khong du chud par bya'o/ /zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ ngas ni/ blang
117b5(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa dang / dor ba med par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /de la blang ba med pa gang / dor ba med pa gang zhe na/ blang ba med pa zhes bya ba ni/ chos thams cad mi
117b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa'o/ /dor ba med pa zhes bya ba ni/ chos thams cad rab tu 'dzin pa med pa'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pas blangs ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid mnyam pa nyid du gzigs
117b7(dkon brtsegs): te/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas tshu rol med pa dang / pha rol med par gzigs pa de ltar chos thams cad tshu rol dang / pha rol dang bral bar de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs
118a1(dkon brtsegs): par sangs rgyas te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o/ /blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de
118a2(dkon brtsegs): khong du chud par bya'o/ /zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ ngas mtshan ma med pa dang / dmigs pa med par byang
118a3(dkon brtsegs): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /de la mtshan ma med pa gang / dmigs pa med pa gang zhe na/ mig gis rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa ni/ mtshan ma med pa'o/ /
118a4(dkon brtsegs): gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ni/ dmigs pa med pa'o/ /yid kyis rnam par shes pa'i bar du mi dmigs pa ni/ mtshan ma med pa'o/ /chos yang dag par rjes su mi
118a5(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba ni/ dmigs pa med pa'o/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu/ mtshan ma med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa ni/ 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo/ /'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang
118a6(dkon brtsegs): zhe na| khams gsum pa ni/ 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul te/ gang 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul de ni/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin pas/ de
118a7(dkon brtsegs): khong du chud par bya'o/ /zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go /gang shA ri'i bu/ byang chub ni/ 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar
118b1(dkon brtsegs): byung ba ma yin te/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid 'khor gsum yongs su chad pa'o/ /de la 'khor gsum yongs su chad pa gang zhe na/ gang 'das pa la sems mi 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs
118b2(dkon brtsegs): pa la rnam par shes pa rjes su mi rgyug pa dang / da ltar byung ba la yid la byed pa mi 'jug pa ste/ de sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pas 'das pa la mi
118b3(dkon brtsegs): rtog / ma 'ongs pa la rlom sems su mi byed/ da ltar byung ba la spros par mi byed pa 'di ni/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa yin na/ sems can rnams
118b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis khong du ma chud pas de khong du chud par bya'o/ /zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go /shA ri'i bu/ ngas byang chub ni/ lus med pa/
118b5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'dus ma byas par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de ni/ mig gi rnam par shes pas rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar gyis rnam
118b6(dkon brtsegs): par shes par bya ba ma yin no/ /'dus ma byas zhes bya ba ni/ gang ma skyes pa/ mi 'jig pa/ mi gnas pa de ni/ 'khor gsum dang bral ba 'dus ma byas zhes bya'o/ /'dus ma byas ji lta bar 'dus
118b7(dkon brtsegs): byas kyang de ltar khong du chud par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /gang dngos po med pa de la gnyis su med de/ lus med pa/
119a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'dus ma byas pa de sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de khong du chud par bya'o/ /zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying
119a2(dkon brtsegs): rje chen po 'jug go / shA ri'i bu/ ngas byang chub ni/ dbyer med pa dang / gnas su mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /de la dbyer med pa gang / gnas gang zhe na/ de la de
119a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nyid ni/ gnas so/ /gnas med pa ni/ dbyer med pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings ni/ gnas so/ /tha dad pa med pa ni/ dbyer med pa'o/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' ni/ gnas so/ /
119a4(dkon brtsegs): g.yo ba med pa ni/ dbyer med pa'o/ /stong pa nyid ni/ gnas so/ /dmigs su med pa ni/ dbyer med pa'o/ /mtshan ma med pa ni/ gnas so/ /rnam par mi rtog pa ni/ dbyer
119a5(dkon brtsegs): med pa'o/ /smon pa med pa ni/ gnas so/ /'jug pa med pa ni/ dbyer med pa'o/ /sems can med pa ni/ gnas so/ /sems can med pa'i rang bzhin ni/ dbyer med pa'o/ /
119a6(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' ni/ gnas so/ /mi dmigs pa ni/ dbyer med pa'o/ /mi skye ba ni/ gnas so/ /mi 'gag pa ni/ dbyer med pa'o/ /'dus ma byas ni/ gnas so/ /rgyu ba med pa ni/ dbyer
119a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa'o/ /byang chub ni/ gnas so/ /nye bar zhi ba ni/ dbyer med pa'o/ /mya ngan las 'das pa ni/ gnas so/ /mngon par mi 'grub pa ni/ dbyer med pa'o/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu/
119b1(dkon brtsegs): dbyer med pa'i gnas 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de khong du chud par bya'o/ /zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ shA ri'i bu/
119b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub ni/ lus kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas te/ sems kyis kyang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus ni/ bem po/ /g.yo ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ rtswa dang /
119b3(dkon brtsegs): shing dang / rdo dang / mig yor lta bu'o/ /sems ni/ sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla lta bu ste/ gang gis lus dang / sems de ltar khong du chud pa de ni/ byang chub ces bya'o/ /byang chub
119b4(dkon brtsegs): ni| tha snyad tsam du bzung ba ste/ byang chub ni/ lus sam/ sems sam/ chos ma yin pa'am/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'am/ bden pa'am/ rdzun pa gang gis kyang
119b5(dkon brtsegs): brjod par bya ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni/ chos thams cad kyis brjod par bya ba ma yin te/ byang chub la ni/ gang gis kyang tshig gi tha snyad du 'gyur ba'i gnas cung
119b6(dkon brtsegs): zad kyang med do/ /ji ltar nam mkha' gnas med cing tshig med pa de bzhin du byang chub kyang gnas med pa/ brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tshol
119b7(dkon brtsegs): ba na chos thams cad tshig med pa ste/ chos la tshig med/ tshig la yang chos med do/ /de lta bu'i chos kyi tshul mi shes shing khong du ma chud pas de khong du chud par bya'o/ /zhes sems can
120a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub ni/ gzung ba med pa/ kun gzhi med pa'o/ /de la gzung ba med pa gang
120a2(dkon brtsegs): kun gzhi med pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mig yongs su shes pa ni/ gzung ba med pa'o/ /gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ni/ kun gzhi med pa'o/ /yid kyi bar du
120a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su shes pa ni/ gzung ba med pa'o/ /chos mi dmigs pa ni/ kun gzhi med pa ste/ de ltar shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pas gzung ba med pa/ kun gzhi med par byang
120a4(dkon brtsegs): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas mig mi 'dzin pa dang / gzugs kun gzhi med pas rnam par shes pa mi gnas so/ /yid
120a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bar du mi 'dzin cing chos kun gzhi med pas rnam par shes pa mi gnas so/ /de rnam par shes pa mi gnas pas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi gnas shes so/ /ji ltar
120a6(dkon brtsegs): shes she na/ sems can rnams kyi sems kyi gnas ni/ bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs ni/ sems kyi gnas so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
120a7(dkon brtsegs): ni| sems can rnams kyi sems kyi gnas te/ 'di bzhi ni/ sems can rnams kyi sems kyi gnas so/ /gnas de yang gnas med par de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/
120b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas med pa'i mtha' 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de khong du chud par bya'o/ /zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ shA ri'i bu/
120b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub ces bya ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /stong pa nyid gang gis byang chub stong pa'i stong pa nyid de'i chos thams cad stong ste/ de dag stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ de ltar de bzhin
120b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas mod kyi/ stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ni/ ma yin pas/ stong pa nyid dam
120b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni/ tshul gcig pa'i ye shes so/ /de la gnyis po gang gis stong pa nyid dang / byang chub tu gnyis su dbye ba'i gnyis gang yang med do/ /chos de ni/ gnyis su
120b5(dkon brtsegs): med cing gnyis su dbyar med de/ ming med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ 'jug pa med pa/ rab tu rgyu ba med pa/ spyod pa med pa'o/ /gang stong pa zhes bya ba ni/ mngon par chags pa dang /
120b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang bral ba'o/ /don dam pa'i chos gang yang mi dmigs pas/ stong pa nyid gang yin pa de stong zhes bya'o/ /ji ltar nam mkha' nam mkha' zhes kyang bya la/ nam mkha' ni/
120b7(dkon brtsegs): brjod par bya ba yang ma yin no/ /de bzhin du stong pa zhes kyang bya la/ stong pa nyid brjod par bya ba ma yin no/ /'di lta ste/ ming tsam du tha snyad 'dogs pa 'di ni/ chos thams cad la
121a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa ste/ ming de yang yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas so/ /ji ltar ming yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas pa de bzhin du/ chos ming gi
121a2(dkon brtsegs): tha snyad du 'dogs pa'i chos de yang yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas te/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mkhyen to/ /thog ma nas ma skyes ma byung bar de ltar
121a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pas de ltar rnam par gol te/ bcings pa yang med/ grol ba yang med na/ de byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de khong du chud par bya'o/ /zhes sems can
121a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go / shA ri'i bu/ byang chub ni/ nam mkha' dang mnyam ste/ nam mkha' ni/ mnyam pa yang ma yin/ mi mnyam pa'ang ma
121a5(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /byang chub kyang mnyam pa'ang ma yin/ /mi mnyam pa'ang ma yin te/ de ji ltar chos rnams yang dag par yongs su grub pa med de/ mnyam pa'am mi mnyam pa zhes brjod pa ma
121a6(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam pa yang ma yin/ mi mnyam pa yang ma yin par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /ji ltar
121a7(dkon brtsegs): chos rdul tsam yang mnyam par byas pa yang ma yin/ mi mnyam par byas pa yang ma yin pa de ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /chos ji snyed pa de dag kyang yang dag pa'i
121b1(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyis shes so/ /yang dag pa'i ye shes gang zhe na/ chos ma byung ba rnams 'byung ba dang / byung nas 'jig par 'gyur ba de dag ni/ bdag po med par 'byung / bdag po med par
121b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig ste/ rkyen gyis 'byung ba dang / 'jig par 'gyur zhing / 'di la 'jug pa'am/ ldog pa gang yang med de/ lam bcad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston to/ /lam
121b3(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas khong du chud par bya'o/ /zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub
121b4(dkon brtsegs): de ni/ ji lta ba bzhin gyi gnas so/ /byang chub ji lta bar gzugs kyang de bzhin te/ de bzhin nyid kyis mi 'byung ngo / /byang chub ji lta ba bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
121b5(dkon brtsegs): byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang de bzhin te/ de bzhin nyid kyis mi 'byung ngo / /byang chub ji lta ba bzhin du sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams
121b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang de bzhin te/ de bzhin nyid kyis mi 'byung ngo / /byang chub ji lta ba bzhin du mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas yid
121b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du'o/ /chos rnams kyi btags pa ni/ ming tsam du zad de/ de ni/ phung po dang / khams dang /
122a1(dkon brtsegs): skye mched rnams su btags pa ste/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /phyin ci ma log par mngon
122a2(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na/ sngon ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin/ bar du yang de bzhin te/ sngon gyi mtha' nas ma skyes/ phyi ma'i mthar mi 'pho'o/ /bar du'ang dben pa ste/
122a3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar de dag ni/ ji lta ba bzhin gyi gnas yin no/ /gcig ji lta ba bzhin thams cad kyang de bzhin no/ /thams cad ji lta bar gcig kyang de bzhin te/ ji lta ba bzhin ni/ gcig
122a4(dkon brtsegs): gam mang por mi 'gyur ro/ /ji lta ba bzhin gyi gnas de sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de khong du chud par bya'o/ /zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
122a5(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po 'jug go / shA ri'i bu/ byang chub ni/ rnam pa la 'jug pa/ rnam pa med pa la zhugs pa'o/ /de la rnam pa gang / rnam pa med pa gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ rnam pa
122a6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba ni/ dge ba'i chos rnams rtsom pa'o/ /rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba ni/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'o/ /rnam pa zhes bya ba ni/ mi gnas pa'i sems kyi gnas so/ /
122a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /rnam pa zhes bya ba ni/ sems gzhal ba dang / bgrang ba dang / so sor rtog pa'o/ /rnam pa
122b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa zhes bya ba ni/ gzhal ba las yang dag par 'das pa'o/ /gzhal ba las yang dag par 'das pa gang zhe na/ gang na rnam par shes pa'i las med pa'o/ /rnam pa zhes bya ba
122b2(dkon brtsegs): ni/ gang na 'dus byas la so sor rtog pa'o/ /rnam pa med pa ni/ 'dus ma byas mngon sum du byed pa ste/ rnam pa dang / rnam pa med pa la 'jug pa 'di byis pa so so'i skye bo
122b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de khong du chud par bya'o/ /zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub ni/ zag pa med
122b4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ len pa med pa'o/ /de la zag pa med pa gang / len pa med pa gang zhe na/ zag pa med pa zhes bya ba ni/ zag pa bzhi dang bral ba ste/ 'dod pa'i zag pa dang bral ba dang / srid
122b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i zag pa dang bral ba dang / ma rig pa'i zag pa dang bral ba dang / lta ba'i zag pa dang bral ba'o/ /nye bar len pa med pa zhes bya ba ni/ len pa bzhi dang bral ba ste/ 'dod pa'i len
122b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang bral ba dang / srid pa'i len pa dang bral ba dang / lta ba'i len pa dang bral ba dang / tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs kyis len pa dang bral ba'o/ /de la nye bar len pa bzhi po de
122b7(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cad ni/ ma rig pas ldongs par byas pa dang / sred pa'i chus g.yogs pa dang / bdag tu mngon par chags pas phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched len to/ /de
123a1(dkon brtsegs): la de bzhin gshegs pas bdag nye bar len pa'i rtsa ba yongs su mkhyen pa'i phyir bdag rnam par dag pas sems can rnam par dag par mkhyen to/ /bdag
123a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de la yongs su rtog pa gang gis tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed par 'gyur ba'i yongs su rtog pa gang yang med de/ de ni/ tshul bzhin yid la byed pa
123a3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pas ma rig pa kun nas mi slong ngo / /ma rig pa kun nas mi slong bas srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis kun nas mi ldang ba de ni/ skye ba med pa'o/ /gang skye ba med pa de ni/
123a4(dkon brtsegs): nges par gyur pa'o/ /gang nges par gyur pa de ni/ nges pa'i don to/ /gang nges pa'i don de ni/ don dam pa'o/ /gang don dam pa de gang zag med pa'i don to/ /gang gang zag med pa'i
123a5(dkon brtsegs): don de brjod du med pa'i don to/ /gang brjod du med pa'i don de rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i don to/ /gang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don de chos kyi don to/ /gang chos kyi don de de
123a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i don to/ /de'i phyir sus rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong ba des chos mthong ngo / /sus chos mthong ba des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/ 'di ltar de bzhin
123a7(dkon brtsegs): nyid du bcal na/ ci yang mi mthong ba de ltar mthong ngo / /de la ci yang zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan ma med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa'o/ /gang gis mtshan ma med pa dang /
123b1(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa med pa mthong ba des yang dag pa mthong ste/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mnyam par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /zag pa med
123b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / len pa med pa 'di byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de khong du chud par bya'o/ /zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go
123b3(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu/ byang chub ni/ dag pa/ dri ma med pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /de la dag pa gang / dri ma med pa gang / nyon mongs pa med pa gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid ni/ dag pa'o/ /mtshan
123b4(dkon brtsegs): ma med pa ni/ dri ma med pa'o/ /smon pa med pa ni/ nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /skye ba med pa ni/ dag pa'o/ /mngon par 'du mi byed pa ni/ dri ma med pa'o/ /nye bar len pa med pa ni/
123b5(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /rang bzhin ni/ dag pa'o/ /yongs su dag pa ni/ dri ma med pa'o/ /'od gsal ba ni/ nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /spros pa med pa ni/ dag pa'o/ /ma spros pa ni/
123b6(dkon brtsegs): dri ma med pa'o/ /spros pa nye bar zhi ba ni/ nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /de bzhin nyid ni/ dag pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings ni/ dri ma med pa'o/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' ni/ nyon mongs pa med
123b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ /go 'byed pa ni dag pa'o/ /nam mkha' ni/ dri ma med pa'o/ /nam mkha' ni/ nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /nang yongs su shes pa ni/ dag pa'o/ /phyi rol tu mi rgyu ba ni/ dri ma med
124a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ /phyi dang nang mi dmigs pa ni/ nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /phung po yongs su shes pa ni/ dag pa'o/ /khams kyi rang bzhin ni/ dri ma med pa'o/ /skye mched
124a2(dkon brtsegs): spong ba ni/ nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /'das pa la zad pa shes pa ni/ dag pa'o/ /ma 'ongs pa la mi skye ba shes pa ni/ dri ma med pa'o/ /da ltar byung ba la chos kyi dbyings la gnas
124a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ye shes ni/ nyon mongs pa med pa ste/ de ltar dag pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa gnas gcig tu 'jug par 'gyur ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ zhi ba'i gnas so/ /
124a4(dkon brtsegs): gang zhi ba de ni/ rab tu zhi ba/ de ni/ nye bar zhi ba ste/ thub pa zhes bya'o/ /de lta bas na/ /ji ltar nam mkha' ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin no/ /byang chub ji lta bar chos kyang de bzhin
124a5(dkon brtsegs): no/ /chos ji lta bar sems can yang de bzhin no/ /sems can ji lta bar zhing yang de bzhin no/ /zhing ji lta bar mya ngan las 'das pa yang de bzhin no/ /de bas na/ chos thams cad ni/ mya
124a6(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ste/ mthar thug pa'i rnam pas gnyen po med do/ /gnyen po med pa'i rnam pas thog ma nas rnam par dag pa'o/ /thog ma nas dri ma med pa'o/ /
124a7(dkon brtsegs): thog ma nas nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar gzugs can dang / gzugs med pa'i chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems
124b1(dkon brtsegs): can gyi khams la rnam par gzigs shing sems can rnams la dag pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pas rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ de ltar
124b2(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po dag pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / nyon mongs pa med par lhun gyis grub pas rtag tu 'jug ste/ phyis gtang bar bya ba med cing /
124b3(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams ma lus par thogs pa med do/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po ni/ mtha' yas mu med de/ gang de
