124b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po'i mtha' 'dod pa de ni/ nam mkha'i mtha' 'dod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa de
124b5(dkon brtsegs): thos nas mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog /som nyi med/ the tshom mi za ba nas nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi bar du 'du shes
124b6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /rtsa ba med cing gnas med par/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni
124b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub reg / ji ltar rtogs pa de bzhin du/ /srog chags rnams ni kun la ston/ /nang gi mig ni stong pa ste/ /phyi rol gzugs kyang stong ba'o/ /zhi dang nye bar zhi ba dang / /sangs
125a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyis ni byang chub reg / zhi dang nye bar zhi ba ste/ /sems can khong du ma chud bas/ /tshig don rtogs nas sems can la/ /de dag la ni snying rje 'jug
125a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub rang bzhin 'od gsal zhing / /rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra ba de/ /sems can rnams kyis mi shes pas/ /de dag la yang snying rje 'jug /chos rnams kun la 'dzin pa dang /
125a3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'dzin pa yod ma yin/ /blang med dor ba med pa yi/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub reg /sems can 'di dag mi shes pas/ /de dag la ni snying rje 'jug/ mtshan ma med cing
125a4(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa med/ /'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul 'di/ /byis pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni byang chub reg /gang dag mi mkhas bcings pa yi/ /so so'i
125a5(dkon brtsegs): skye bo mi shes pas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la/ /snying rje chen po rab tu 'jug /rang bzhin gyis ni 'dus ma byas/ /skye ba med cing 'jig pa med/ /de la gnas
125a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yod min te/ /mtshan nyid gsum las rnam par grol/ /'dus byas rnams kyi rang bzhin ni/ /byis pas khong du ma chud pas/ /de dag la yang snying rje 'jug /tshul 'di gang
125a7(dkon brtsegs): gis sangs rgyas pa/ /byang chub las kyis mi rtogs te/ /sems kyis kyang ni 'tshang mi rgya/ /lus ni bem po'i rang bzhin te/ /sems kyang sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /lus dang sems kyi rang bzhin
125b1(dkon brtsegs): te/ /byis pas khong du ma chud pas/ /tshul 'di khong du chud gyur nas/ /de dag la ni snying rje 'jug /rang byung ba ni byang chub dam pa rgya chen mchog reg ste/ /shing mchog drung du bzhugs nas
125b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can khams la rnam par gzigs/ /'khor ba'i 'khor lor zhugs shing 'gro rgyud sna tshogs 'khyams gyur pa/ /de dag gzigs nas sangs rgyas kyis ni snying rje mi bzad
125b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug / nga dang rgyags pa dag la chags shing lta ba'i dra bas gzings/ /sdug bsngal bde dang mi rtag rtag dang sdug par 'du shes shing / /bdag dang sems can dang ni srog tu lta bar
125b4(dkon brtsegs): chags pa rnams/ /gzigs nas de dag la ni sangs rgyas snying rje mi bzad 'jug /sems can khams ni gti mug ling tog khebs shing bsgribs pa kun/ /nyi ma sprin khebs bzhin
125b5(dkon brtsegs): du snang med lam med mi 'gyur ba/ /de dag gzigs nas ye shes snang ba dri med 'od bya zhes/ /de dag la yang sangs rgyas kyi ni snying rje mi bzad 'jug /ngan song 'gro bar zhugs shing
125b6(dkon brtsegs): lam stor rab tu 'khyams pa rnams/ /sems can sems can dmyal dang dud 'gro yi dwags rgyu lhung ba/ /de dag gzigs nas sngon gyi rgyal bas bsnyen pa'i lam bstan ces/ /de dag la
125b7(dkon brtsegs): yang sangs rgyas kyi ni snying rje mi bzad 'jug / de bzhin nyid ltar de bzhin nyid du chos rnams thams cad ni/ /nam mkha' mtshungs 'dra de dag ma bcings ma grol rab mkhyen te/ /'gro ba
126a1(dkon brtsegs): dag cing bzang ba'i chos rnams mi shes gzigs nas su/ /de dag la yang sangs rgyas kyi ni snying rje mi bzad 'jug /de ltar shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems
126a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog /som nyi med/ the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed
126a3(dkon brtsegs): nas nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang / rmad du 'du shes bskyed do// //bam po bdun pa/ yang shA ri'i bu/ ji ltar na/ byang chub
126a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog pa nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed ce na/ shA
126a5(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu| de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po 'di dag ste/ chos de dag dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra yang dag
126a6(dkon brtsegs): par sgrog cing khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che ste/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba/ tshangs
126a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu/ gang gi phyir lus kyi 'khrul pa gang las byis pa'am/ mkhas pa
126b1(dkon brtsegs): chos dang mthun par rgol bar byed pa'i lus kyi 'khrul ba de bzhin gshegs pa la med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ lus kyis las 'khrul pa med
126b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ste| de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam mdzes pas kun tu gzigs pa dang / rnam par gzigs pa dang / bskum pa dang / brkyang ba dang / chos gos snam sbyar dang / chos gos
126b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / lhung bzed bsnams pa dang / mngon du gshegs pa dang / slar gshegs pa dang / byon pa dang / bzhud pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / bzhugs pa dang / mnal ba dang / grong
126b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / grong khyer du 'jug pa dang / 'byung ba na zhabs kyi mthil sa la mi reg ste/ 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa sa las 'byung zhing dri yid du 'ong ba'i pad+ma mngon par 'byung ste/ de la de
126b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs 'jog go / de la gang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la reg na/ de dag zhag bdun du rab tu
126b6(dkon brtsegs): bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ shi 'phos nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la chos gos sor bzhi tsam gyis mi reg mod kyi/ rnam
126b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'thor rlung gis kyang bzlog par mi nus so/ /sku'i 'od kyis mnar med pa'i bar gyi sems can bde ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la 'khrul pa
127a1(dkon brtsegs): med ces bya'o/ /yang shA ri'i bu/ gang gi phyir ngag 'khrul pa gang las byis pa'am/ mkhas pa chos dang mthun par rgol bar byed pa'i ngag gi 'khrul pa de
127a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa la med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ dus su smra ba/ yang dag par smra ba/ bden par smra ba/ tshigs su smra ba/ ji skad
127a3(dkon brtsegs): smra ba de bzhin du byed pa'o/ /shin tu nges pa'i tshig go/ sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa'i tshig go /mi zlos pa'i tshig go /don dang yi ges shin tu brgyan pa'i tshig go /skad gcig
127a4(dkon brtsegs): brjod pas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa tshim par byed pa ste/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ngag gi las 'khrul pa med ces bya'o/ /yang shA ri'i bu/ sems
127a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khrul pa gang las byis pa'am/ mkhas pa chos dang mthun par rgol bar byed pa'i sems kyi 'khrul pa de bzhin gshegs pa la med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu/ de
127a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa ni/ mnyam par gzhag pa'i dngos po mi 'dor zhing / sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad byed kyang sems der mi gtong zhing chos thams cad la de'i chags pa med
127a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sems 'khrul pa med ces bya'o/ /ji ltar de'i sems 'khrul pa med pa de ltar sems can rnams kyi sems
127b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khrul pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang po'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ /ca co gang las bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu'am/ gzhan mu stegs
127b2(dkon brtsegs): can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ba'i ca co de bzhin gshegs par med do/ /yang shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ca co'am/ rjes su ca co 'byin pa med de/ de bzhin gshegs
127b3(dkon brtsegs): pa ni| rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang bral ba ste/ sems can thams cad kyis bkur sti byas kyang ma thos par mi sems/ sems can thams cad kyis bkur sti ma byas kyang 'khrug
127b4(dkon brtsegs): pa med do/ /de gang las 'gyod pa'am/ rjes su ca co 'byin par 'gyur ba'i bya ba mchog gam/ mthar phyin pa ci'ang de bzhin gshegs pa la med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ 'jig
127b5(dkon brtsegs): rten dang mi rtsod pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la ca co med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa ste/ nga yi ba med/ 'dzin pa med/ len pa med/ mdud
127b6(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la ca co med do/ /ji ltar de la ca co med pa de ltar sems can thams cad kyi ca co thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos ston te/
127b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gnyis pa'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ bsnyel ba gang las chos gang la yang rmongs par 'gyur ba'i bsnyel ba de bzhin gshegs pa la med do//
128a1(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la thogs pa med cing / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod
128a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / g.yo ba la rnam par blta ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la rmongs pa med do/ /so sor ci rigs par chos ston pa'i phyir kun tu nyams pa med do/ /'das pa dang / ma
128a3(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs pa dang / da ltar la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i phyir don dang / chos dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / spobs pa so sor yang dag par rig pa la kun tu nyams pa med do//
128a4(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar bdag kun tu nyams pa med cing 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba de ltar sems can thams cad brjed ngas par mi 'gyur
128a5(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/ 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gsum pa'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems
128a6(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal tam/ bshos gsol lam/ gsung ngam/ cang mi gsung bar gyur kyang
128a7(dkon brtsegs): rung ste/ rtag tu mnyam par bzhag cing ting nge 'dzin zab mo dam pa'i mthar phyin pa sgrib pa med pa'i bsam gtan la bsam gtan byed pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin
128b1(dkon brtsegs): gyis brlabs pa ma gtogs par sems can gyi ris na sems can gang mnyam par bzhag kyang rung / mnyam par ma bzhag kyang rung ste/ su yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems la lta bar
128b2(dkon brtsegs): nus pa med do/ /ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa de ltar ting nge 'dzin la lta bas sems can rnams la chos ston te/ 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs
128b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bzhi pa'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ de tha dad pa'i 'du shes gang las sems mi mnyam par gnas par 'gyur ba'i tha dad pa'i 'du shes de bzhin gshegs
128b4(dkon brtsegs): pa la med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha' bzhin du zhing mi zad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la zhing tha dad pa'i 'du shes med do/ /rang bzhin gyis tha dad pa med pa'i
128b5(dkon brtsegs): phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sems can tha dad pa'i 'du shes med do/ /chos kyi dbyings dbyer med cing mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sangs rgyas
128b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing tha dad pa'i 'du shes med do/ /'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la chos tha dad pa'i 'du shes med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ tshul
128b7(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang ldan pa'i sems can la yang rjes su chags pa med/ tshul khrims 'chal ba la yang khong khro ba med/ phan par gyur pa la yang lan du phan 'dogs pa med/ gnod
129a1(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa la yang gnod par byed pa med/ 'dul bar 'os pa la yang mnyam pa nyid du ma yin/ log par nges pa'i sems can la yang smod pa ma
129a2(dkon brtsegs): yin gyi| de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ chos thams cad la mnyam par gnas te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la tha dad pa'i 'du shes med ces bya'o/ /ji ltar de bzhin
129a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa de ltar sems can thams cad kyi tha dad pa'i 'du shes spang ba'i phyir chos ston te/ 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
129a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa lnga pa'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa la so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin
129a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni/ lam bsgoms pa'i yin te/ lam ma bsgoms pa'i ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni/ sems bsgoms pa dang /
129a6(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims bsgoms pa dang / shes rab bsgoms pa'i yin te/ shes rab ma bsgoms pa'i ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni/ ye shes dang
129a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i yin te/ gti mug dang ldan pa'i ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yin gyi/ 'jig rten pa'i rnam par lhung
129b1(dkon brtsegs): pa ni/ ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni/ 'phags pa nges par 'byung ba yin la 'phags pa ma yin pa nges par mi 'byung ba ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs
129b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i btang snyoms ni/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba ste/ sems can la snying rje dang bral ba ni/ ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni/ rang gi ngang gis grub
129b3(dkon brtsegs): pa ste| gnyen po'i rjes su song ba ni/ ma yin no/ /yang shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms de ni/ mtho ba yang ma yin/ dma' ba yang ma yin ste/ mtho dman
129b4(dkon brtsegs): med par gnas pa/ mi g.yo bar gyur pa/ gnyis dang bral ba/ rtog pa dang sel ba las shin tu 'das pa/ dus las lta ba/ dus las ma yol ba/ mi g.yo ba/ rlom sems med pa/
129b5(dkon brtsegs): ma brtags pa/ rnam par ma brtags pa/ ma bsgoms pa/ bstan du med pa/ yang dag pa de kho na/ de bzhin nyid/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid de/ shA
129b6(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu| de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ de lta bu'i btang snyoms phun sum tshogs pas sems can thams cad btang snyoms yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/ shA ri'i
129b7(dkon brtsegs): bu| 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa drug pa'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do/ /de la 'dun pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
130a1(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa'o/ /de yang gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do/ /snying rje chen po la 'dun pa nyams
130a2(dkon brtsegs): pa med do/ /chos ston pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do/ /sems can 'dul ba la 'dun pa nyams pa med do/ /rab tu dben pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do/ /byang chub sems
130a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' yang dag par 'dzud pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do/ /dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi gcod pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ 'dun pas 'gro ba
130a4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin gyi/ ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dun pa'o/ /sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen par 'dun pa yongs su rdzogs
130a5(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bdun pa'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus nyams pa med do/ /de la
130a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus 'di lta ste/ 'dul ba'i sems can la yal bar mi 'dor ba'i brtson 'grus dang / chos nyan pa la brnyas pa med pa'i brtson 'grus so/ /
130a7(dkon brtsegs): gal te de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi sde snod nyan pa gang bskal par nyan kyang skyo bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu brnyes na/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang chos ston cing zhal zas dang
130b1(dkon brtsegs): bral ba'i rgyud kyis bskal par yang mi bzhengs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la blta bas tha na gang na sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can gcig gi phyir yang sangs rgyas kyi
130b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'da' zhing bzhud de/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lus ngal ba'am/ ngag ngal ba'am/ sems ngal ba med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ lus dang
130b3(dkon brtsegs): sems shin tu sbyangs pa'o/ /brtson 'grus brtsams pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi bsngags pa gsung pa ste/ brtson 'grus kyis yang dag par rab tu sbyor ba gang gis sems can la
130b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus de sems can rnams la bsngags par mdzad de/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
130b5(dkon brtsegs): chos ma 'dres pa brgyad pa'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ thams cad kyi thams cad du rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du dran pa nyams pa med cing / de
130b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i dran pa ni/ bsnyel ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
130b7(dkon brtsegs): ma thag tu 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi sems can gyi sems kyi rgyud la rnam par bltas kyang de la de bzhin gshegs pa la phyis shin tu dran pa bsnyel ba med do/ /
131a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes kyang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes phyis gtang bar bya ba med do/ /phung po gsum du rnam par gzhag pa
131a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems can gyi dbang po la 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi bsam par 'jug pa la sems kyi spyod pa rnam par lta bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dran pa la yongs su nyams pa
131a3(dkon brtsegs): med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dran pa ni/ dran par bya ba dang / bsam par bya ba dang / brtag par bya ba med kyang sems can rnams la chos ston pa 'bri bar mi 'gyur
131a4(dkon brtsegs): ro| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i dran pa la nyams pa med do/ /de ji ltar dran pas bdag dran cing mi brjed pa de bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ 'di ni/ de
131a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dgu pa'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med do/ /gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
131a6(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin de ni/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de/ chos thams cad mi mnyam pa ma yin no/ /chos thams cad ni/ ji lta ba bzhin pa'o/ /ci'i phyir de
131a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin las mi nyams she na/ de bzhin nyid gang dang mnyam pa ting nge 'dzin kyang de dang mnyam mo/ /ting nge 'dzin gang dang mnyam pa de bzhin nyid kyang de
131b1(dkon brtsegs): dang mnyam ste/ mnyam pa nyid de la zhugs pas de'i phyir mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /'dod chags kyi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa 'dod chags med pa'i mtha' yang de dang mnyam mo/ /zhe
131b2(dkon brtsegs): sdang gi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa zhe sdang med pa'i mtha' yang de dang mnyam mo/ /gti mug gi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa gti mug med pa'i mtha' yang de dang mnyam mo/ /'dus
131b3(dkon brtsegs): byas kyi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa 'dus ma byas kyi mtha' yas de dang mnyam mo/ /'khor ba'i mtha' gang dang mnyam pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' yang de dang mnyam mo/ /
131b4(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med ces bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mnyam pa nyid las mi nyams/ yongs
131b5(dkon brtsegs): su mi nyams so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de yang mig dang ldan pa ma yin/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang ldan pa ma yin mod kyi/ de bzhin
131b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dbang po mtshang ba ma yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin ni/ sa'i khams la mi gnas/ chu dang / me dang / rlung gi khams la mi gnas/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang /
131b7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs med pa'i khams la mi gnas/ 'jig rten pha rol la mi gnas te/ mi gnas pas na nyams pa med do/ /de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin nyams pa
132a1(dkon brtsegs): med do| |sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnyed par bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs
132a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu pa'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab nyams pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab gang zhe na/
132a3(dkon brtsegs): gang chos thams cad rab tu shes pa ste/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par shes pa'o/ /sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la chos go bar byed pa'i shes pa'o/ /
132a4(dkon brtsegs): so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa la mkhas pa'i shes pa'o/ /tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba shes pa'o/ /tshig gcig la 'jug pas bskal pa brgya stong du mi chad par
132a5(dkon brtsegs): ston par shes pa'o/ /ji lta bu ci 'dra zhes dris pa ji lta ba bzhin du the tshom gcod pa'i shes pa'o/ /thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i shes pa'o/ /theg pa gsum rnam par
132a6(dkon brtsegs): dgod pa bstan pa shes pa'o/ /sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong yongs su shes pa'i shes pa'o/ /chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong ci rigs par
132a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rab tu ston par shes pa'o/ /'di ni/ shes rab ma zad pa bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab mtha' yas mu med zad mi shes pa'o/ /gang gi
132b1(dkon brtsegs): phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab nyams pa med pa de bzhin du/ sems can rnams kyi shes rab kyang mi zad par bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni/ de bzhin
132b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gcig pa'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba nyams pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs
132b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rnam par grol ba gang zhe na/ nyan thos rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ni/ sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'o/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ni/ rkyen khong du chud pa'o/ /
132b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ni/ chags pa dang / gnyis su 'dzin pa thams cad dang bral bas rnam par grol zhes bya ba ste/ sngon gyi mthar
132b5(dkon brtsegs): yang ma bcings/ phyi ma'i mthar yang mi 'pho/ da ltar byung ba la yang mi gnas te/ mig dang gzugs la gnyis su 'dzin pa las rnam par grol ba'o/ /de bzhin du rna ba
132b6(dkon brtsegs): dang sgra dang / sna dang dri dang / lce dang ro dang / lus dang reg bya la gnyis su 'dzin pa las rnam par grol ba ste/ mi 'dzin mngon par mi chags par gnas pa'i rnam par
132b7(dkon brtsegs): grol ba'o/ /sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba de bzhin du shes pas de'i phyir sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
133a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/ /ji ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sems can
133a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gnyis pa'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs
133a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / /lus kyi las de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs pas kyang sems can
133a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dul| gsungs pas kyang sems can 'dul/ cang mi gsung bas kyang sems can 'dul/ bshos gsol bas kyang sems can 'dul/ spyod lam gyis kyang sems
133a5(dkon brtsegs): can 'dul/ mtshan gyis kyang sems can 'dul/ dpe byad bzang pos kyang sems can 'dul/ gtsug tor bltar mi snang ba dang / bltas pa tsam dang / 'od gtong pa dang /
133a6(dkon brtsegs): gom pa 'dor ba dang / 'jog pa dang / grong khyer du 'jug pa dang / 'byung bas kyang sems can 'dul te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyod lam gang gis kyang sems
133a7(dkon brtsegs): can 'dul bar mi 'gyur ba med do/ /de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ste/ shA ri'i
133b1(dkon brtsegs): bu| 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gsum pa'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon
133b2(dkon brtsegs): du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni/ 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa'o/ /khyad par lung ston pa'o/ /shin tu nges
133b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshig smra ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag de yang kun shes par byed pa/ rnam par shes par byed pa/ mi mtho/ mi dma' nga / ma yo/ 'dar 'dar po ma yin pa/
133b4(dkon brtsegs): gya gyu med pa/ mi brlang ba/ mi rtsub pa/ gzing gzing ba ma yin/ mnyen pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ ma 'chal pa/ lag log med pa/ mi 'tshe ba/ mi myur ba/ rab tu myur ba ma
133b5(dkon brtsegs): yin pa/ shin tu rnam par phye ba/ shin tu nges pa'i tshig rab tu mnyen pa/ shin tu snyan pa/ dbyangs snyan pa/ rab tu gsal ba/ bsgrags pa/ nges pa/ 'jam pa/ phan
133b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang bcas pa/ dga' bar 'gyur ba/ mchod par 'gyur ba/ mdzes pa/ rdul med pa/ rdul dang bral ba/ tha ba med pa/ dri ma med pa/ ma rmongs pa/ gsal pa/ thogs
133b7(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa/ yang dag par spyor ba/ 'od gsal ba/ drang ba/ 'jungs pa ma yin pa/ dum bu ma yin pa/ dig dig po ma yin pa/ bde ba skyed pa/ lus sim par byed pa/ sems
134a1(dkon brtsegs): tshim par byed pa/ 'dod chags zhi bar byed pa/ zhe sdang zhi bar byed pa/ gti mug sel ba/ bdud 'joms pa/ sdig pa sel ba/ rgol ba 'dul ba/ go bar byed pa/
134a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgra/ mkhas pa dga' bar byed pa/ ka la ping+ka'i sgra dbyangs/ dbang po'i sgra/ tshangs pa'i sgra/ rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyi sgra/ sprin gyi sgra/ sa'i sgra dbyangs/ khrung khrung gi sgra/ rma
134a3(dkon brtsegs): bya'i sgra| khu byug gi sgra/ shang shang te'u'i sgra/ ngang pa'i sgra skad/ ri dwags kyi rgyal po'i sgra/ khong hu dang / pi bang dang / mkhar rnga dang / dung dang / sil snyan dang / rab tu bsgrags
134a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgra| kun shes par 'gyur ba/ rnam par shes par 'gyur ba/ zur phyin pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ mnyan par 'os pa/ zab pa/ lkugs shing dig pa ma yin pa/ bde ba/ dge ba'i
134a5(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba skyed pa/ tshig dang yi ge ma nyams pa/ shin tu nges par smra ba/ tshig 'bru dang / don gyi tshig dang ldan pa/ chos kyi tshig dang ldan pa/ dus dang ldan pa/ tshod dang ldan pa/ dus las
134a6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'da' ba/ dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pas bstan pa/ sbyin pas brgyan pa/ tshul khrims kyis sbyangs pa/ bzod pas bsgrubs/ brtson 'grus kyis 'bar bar
134a7(dkon brtsegs): byas pa/ bsam gtan gyis yid du 'ong bar byas pa/ shes rab kyis nges par brtags pa/ byams pas shin tu bsags pa/ snying rjes mi skyo ba/ dga' ba'i 'od gsal ba/ btang snyoms
134b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis nges par brtags pa/ theg pa gsum rnam par 'joms pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi gcod pa/ phung po gsum 'jog pa/ rnam par thar pa gsum sbyong ba/ bden pa yongs su bsgoms
134b2(dkon brtsegs): pa| ye shes yongs su bsgoms pa/ mkhas pas ma smad pa/ 'phags pas bstod pa/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'o/ /shA ri'i
134b3(dkon brtsegs): bu| de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag ni/ de 'dra ste/ de lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ste/ shA ri'i bu/
134b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni| de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu bzhi pa'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing
134b5(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ sems kyis brjod pa ma yin/ yid kyis ma yin/ rnam par shes pas ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs
134b6(dkon brtsegs): pa ni| ye shes kyis rab tu phye ba ste/ ye shes kyi dbang du gyur pa'o/ /gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes de yang sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rjes su song ba'o/ /sems can thams
134b7(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi yid kyi rjes su zhugs pa'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi rnam par shes pa las rab tu dben pa'o/ /chos thams cad la nges par sems pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi
135a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jog pa'o/ /dmigs pa las shin tu 'das pa'o/ /rkyen las skye ba dang bral ba'o/ /srid pa gsum gyi 'gro ba sel ba'o/ /nga rgyal gyi rnam pa thams cad
135a2(dkon brtsegs): las shin tu 'das pa'o/ /bdud kyi las thams cad las nges par grol ba'o/ /sgyu dang g.yo thams cad dang bral ba'o/ /ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa spangs pa'o/ /ma rig pa
135a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / gti mug gi mun pa dang / ling tog med pa'o/ /lam gyi yan lag shin tu yongs su bsgoms pa'o/ /nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing rnam par mi rtog pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings
135a4(dkon brtsegs): dang dbyer med pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ de lta bu ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'i yid kyi las so/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
135a5(dkon brtsegs): chos ma 'dres pa bco lnga pa'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ 'das pa'i dus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug go /ji ltar 'jug ce na/
135a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di la shA ri'i bu/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing byung ba dang ma byung ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bgrang ba'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par mkhyen te/ /sangs
135a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa de'i rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal byung ba de dag thams cad rab tu mkhyen to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa de'i sems can gyi tshogs
135b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can du btags pa byung ba de dag thams cad rab tu mkhyen to/ /de dag na sems can sna tshogs byung ba ji snyed pa gzugs tha dad pa la sogs pa rgyas par bya ste/ sangs rgyas byung
135b2(dkon brtsegs): ba ji snyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa re res chos bstan cing brjod pa ji snyed pa yang gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro/ /sems can ji snyed cig nyan thos kyi theg pas btul ba dang / ji
135b3(dkon brtsegs): snyed rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas btul ba yang gong ma bzhin du sbyar te sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par phye ba yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /dge slong gi dge 'dun rnam par phye ba dang / tshe'i tshad
135b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par phye ba yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /chos gnas pa rnam par phye ba yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /zas kyi mchog gi longs spyod kyang rab tu
135b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen to/ /sems can thams cad kyi 'das pa'i rnam pa dang / sha 'pho ba dang / skye ba yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /dbang po tha dad pa dang / spyod pa tha dad pa
135b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / bsam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /sems gang gi 'og tu sems gang 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis
135b7(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum gyi ye shes dang / rjes su 'gro ba'i ye shes kyis rab tu mkhyen to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la 'das par gtong ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyang mi dmigs te/ de bzhin
136a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ni/ de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas sems can gyi bsam pa la nyams pa med par chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni/ de bzhin
136a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu drug pa'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus la de bzhin gshegs pa ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong
136a3(dkon brtsegs): ba 'jug go/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa gang dag 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba tha dad pa de dag kyang rab tu
136a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen to/ /bskal ba mes tshig par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / chus sdud par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / rlung gis sdud par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnas
136a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sa'i khams ji snyed pa dang / rdul phra rab ji snyed pa dang / rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal ji snyed 'byung
136a6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba dang / skar ma'i gzugs ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byams re re na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
136a7(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / zas kyi longs spyod dang /
136b1(dkon brtsegs): dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dang / 'chags pa dang / 'dug pa dang / spyod lam ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rab 'byams re re las sems can ji snyed nyan thos kyi theg
136b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas rnam par thar par 'gyur ba dang / sems can ji snyed theg pa chen pos rnam par thar par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas
136b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byams re re na sems can skye ba'i gnas ji skad 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / sems dang sems las 'byung ba skye ba dang / skye bar 'gyur ba ji snyed
136b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'ongs pa'i sems kyi rgyud bskal par 'gyur
136b5(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas ma 'ongs pa la gzigs pas sems can rnams la chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu
136b6(dkon brtsegs): bdun pa'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ da ltar gyi dus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong pa 'jug go /ji ltar 'jug ce na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin
136b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa da ltar gyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad bgrang ba'i tshul rnam par gsum gyis rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar gyi chos thams cad rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar gyi byang
137a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / de bzhin du da ltar gyi nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar gyi skar ma'i gzugs thams cad kyang
137a2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar gyi rtsa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal thams cad kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar gyi phyogs bcu'i sa'i khams rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyi char brlags
137a3(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to/ /phyogs bcu'i chu'i khams skra'i rtse mos blangs pa'i thigs pa thams cad kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to/ /phyogs
137a4(dkon brtsegs): bcu'i me'i khams kyi 'od 'phro ba skyes pa dang / 'gags pa thams cad kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to/ /phyogs bcu'i rlung gi khams thams cad kyang gzugs kyi khams
137a5(dkon brtsegs): sgrub pa bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to/ /phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyang skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyis bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar gyi sems
137a6(dkon brtsegs): can gyi khams rnam pa gsum yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar gyi sems can dmyal ba'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /de'i skye ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /ldang ba'i rgyu
137a7(dkon brtsegs): yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar gyi dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /de'i skye ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /ldang ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen
137b1(dkon brtsegs): to| |da ltar gyi gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /de'i skye ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /ldang ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar gyi mi'i sems can gyi
137b2(dkon brtsegs): khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /de'i skye ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar gyi lha'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /de'i skye ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar gyi sems
137b3(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /de dag gi nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'ang rab tu mkhyen to/ /nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'ang rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar gyi sems can thams cad
137b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'dul ba'i dbang po yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /'dul ba ma yin pa'i dbang po yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la gnyis kyi rjes su
137b5(dkon brtsegs): 'brang ba'i rnam par shes pa med do/ /gnyis su med pa la zhugs pa'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
137b6(dkon brtsegs): bco brgyad pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad pa de dag dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams ma lus pa thams cad du
137b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gyi nang du gzi brjid dang / grags pa dang / dpal dang / ngo mtshar dang / rmad du byung ba'i chos nyid kyis 'khor rnams zil gyis mnan nas lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu/
138a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mtha' yas mu med do/ /'di lta ste/ shA ri'i bu/ nam mkha' mtha' yas mu med
138a2(dkon brtsegs): pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yang mtha' yas mu med do/ /gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtha' 'dod
138a3(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni| nam mkha'i mtha' 'dod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag thos nas mngon par dad/ yid
138a4(dkon brtsegs): ches/ rab tu rtog /som nyi mi byed/ the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed cing nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang / rmad du 'du shes
138a5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pas don 'di bka' stsal nas ston pas yang 'di skad gsung ngo / /'dren pa la ni 'khrul pa yod med de/ /lus dang ngag
138a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang ni sems mi g.yo/ de bzhin srog chags rnams la chos ston te/ /de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /khengs par mi 'gyur 'dud par mi 'gyur te/ khong khro rjes su
138a7(dkon brtsegs): chags las mngon par 'das/ /nyon mongs med la gnas shing nyon mongs grol/ /de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /'dren pa la ni dran pa bsnyel ba med/ /rnam thar spyod yul
138b1(dkon brtsegs): chos ni mngon par mkhyen/ /so so yang dag rig pa bsnyel med de/ /de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bzhugs shing bshos kyang gsol/ /'chag dang
138b2(dkon brtsegs): mnal ba na yang mnyam par bzhag / g.yeng ba med cing sems can 'du shes med/ /de ni rgyal pa rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /rgyal ba dang ni zhing dang sems can la/ /tha dad 'du shes bde
138b3(dkon brtsegs): bar gshegs la med/ /bsam pa chen po mnyam pa nyid la gnas/ /de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /de dag la ni ma brtags btang snyoms med/ /shin tu nges pa'i lam ni rab
138b4(dkon brtsegs): bsgoms pas/ /de la rtog dang rnam par rtog med de/ /de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /dge ba la ni 'dun pa nyams pa med/ /ston pa rtag tu snying rje rab sbyor zhing / /sems can rgya chen
138b5(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med pa 'dul/ /de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /rnam yang brtson 'grus la ni nyams pa med/ /'dul ba mtha' dang pha rol med mthong nas/ /lus dang ngag rnams dang ni
138b6(dkon brtsegs): yid kyis 'dul/ /de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /byang chub sems por sangs rgyas byang chub par/ /de yi dran pa rnams par chud mi za/ /gang chos rtogs pa de ni rtogs bya min/ /de
138b7(dkon brtsegs): ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog med par/ /rang byung ting nge 'dzin la mnyam gnas kyang / /chos rnams kun la mi gnas bsam gtan byed/ /de
139a1(dkon brtsegs): ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /'dren pa'i shes rab kyis ni rab ston cing / /sems can kun gyi spyod pa rab mkhyen cing / /de dag la ni bsam bzhin chos
139a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'chad/ /'di ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /nyan thos rnams kyi rnam grol sgra phyir 'gro/ /rang rgyal gyi ni rkyen gyi 'du shes te/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi btang snyoms bsam mi khyab/ /
139a3(dkon brtsegs): chags las rab 'das dri med nam mkha' bzhin/ /sems kyi rgyud 'di rang bzhin rnam grol te/ /sems ni sngon nas bcing bar 'gyur ba med/ /ji ltar rnam grol de ltar chos ston
139a4(dkon brtsegs): te| |de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /gshegs dang bzhugs dang grong khyer 'jug pa dang / /spyod la ma dag ni mthong na mig kyang 'phrog /sangs rgyas rnams kyi dpe byad
139a5(dkon brtsegs): bzang po dang / /mtshan dang 'od rnams thams cad 'dul bar zhugs/ /sems can snying po nam zhig 'od gtong tshe/ /srog chags byed ba mang po bde 'gyur te/ /'od kyis
139a6(dkon brtsegs): reg pa dag ni 'dul bar 'gyur/ /de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /rang byung ba ni gsung gcig brjod pas na/ /sems can bsam pa bzhin du gsung thos te/ /brag
139a7(dkon brtsegs): ca lta bur de yi gsung yang thos/ /de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /ye shes kyis ni 'dren pa'i las byas te/ /bde bar gshegs la sems las cung zad med/ /
139b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can bsam la ye shes rjes su bzhugs/ /de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /ting 'dzin bsam gtan dang ni rab ldan te/ /spros pa thams cad kyi yang rgyu ba med/ /nam
139b2(dkon brtsegs): mkha' lta bur mnyam pa nyid du gnas/ /de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /'das pa'i dus na de yi ye shes zhugs/ /'gro ba sna tshogs rnam 'byed shes pa yi/ /chos rnams kun
139b3(dkon brtsegs): la sgrib pa med par 'jug / de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /ma 'ongs dus na gang dag 'jig rten du/ /'byung bar 'gyur dang 'byung bar mi 'gyur dang / /sems can zhing dang
139b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba bshad pa dang / /de dag thams cad sangs rgyas ma lus mkhyen/ /ma 'ongs de la rjes su rab lta zhing / /de bzhin sems can rnams kyi chos kyang mkhyen/ /de yi sems ni
139b5(dkon brtsegs): g.yeng bar mi 'gyur te/ /de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /da ltar lam gang 'jug par 'gyur ba dag /thams cad rgyal bas chags med rab tu mkhyen/ /'dren pa'i spyod
139b6(dkon brtsegs): yul nam mkha' lta bu ste/ de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ni ma 'dres pa/ bcom brgyad gsungs pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /de bzhin gshegs
139b7(dkon brtsegs): pa nam mkha' dra bar ni/ /dad mkhas byang chub sems dpa' dad par byed/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de
140a1(dkon brtsegs): d ag dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor gyi nang du gshegs na seng+ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing
140a2(dkon brtsegs): khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che ste/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab
140a3(dkon brtsegs): tu bskor ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ltar dad pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di bcus de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab
140a4(dkon brtsegs): tu rtog / som nyi mi byed/ the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed cing ngo mtshar dang / rmad du 'du shes bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab
140a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i le'u ste/ bzhi pa'o// //bam po brgyad pa/ gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ de ltar dad pa la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
140a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das rnams kyi snod du rig / byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi snod du rig /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du rig nas de'i drung du gshegs te byang chub
140a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i lam yang dag par ston to/ /de lta bas na/ shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs 'dis kyang de ltar dad pa la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
140b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das rnams kyi snod du rig / byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi snod du rig /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du rig nas de'i drung du gshegs te byang chub kyi lam yang
140b2(dkon brtsegs): dag par rab tu ston pa de lta rig par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal ba grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa/ yangs pa/ tshad med pa/ bsam gyis
140b3(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen po zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/
140b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ gang 'di lhar bcas pa'i 'jig
140b5(dkon brtsegs): rten dang / bdud du bcas pa dang / tshangs par bcas pa dan/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye rgu dang / lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin tu bcas pa'i 'jig rten rang gis mngon par
140b6(dkon brtsegs): shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas gnas so/ /de chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ /tshig 'bru bzang po/ /ma
140b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
141a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas phung po chen po'i nyan thos khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi nyan thos kyi tshogs chen po byung ste/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon
141a2(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa med pa/ sems thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag go /shA ri'i bu/ de'i dus na rgyal po tshe rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba chos can chos kyi rgyal po zhig
141a3(dkon brtsegs): byung ngo / /yang shA ri'i bu/ rgyal po tshe rnam par rgyal ba'i grong khyer rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba rgyal po'i gnas 'byor pa mod pa/ bde ba/ lo legs pa/ dga'
141a4(dkon brtsegs): ba| 'gro ba mang po dang mis gang ba zhig yod do/ /yang shA ri'i bu/ rgyal po tshe rnam par rgyal ba'i khye'u gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod pa zhes bya ba sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun pa/ sngon gyi
141a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mdog bzang zhing rgyas pa'i mchog
141a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ yang shA ri'i bu/ de'i dus na gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig tu skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung bar gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs
141a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen pos e ma'o gzhon nu 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi snod do/ /e ma'o
141b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod do/ /zhes de de ltar rig nas skyed mos tshal gyis ga la ba dang / gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod ga la ba der song ste phyin nas
141b2(dkon brtsegs): steng gi bar snang la bzhugs te/ gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod la byang chub kyi lam yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /de la byang chub kyi lam gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la
141b3(dkon brtsegs): byams pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams kyi rjes su 'jug pa ste/ de ni/ byang chub kyi lam zhes bya'o/ /de la sems can thams cad la byams
141b4(dkon brtsegs): pa gang zhe na/ 'di la gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sems can gyi khams ji tsam pa de tsam du byams pas khyab par byed do/ /sems can gyi khams ji tsam zhe na/ nam mkha'i
141b5(dkon brtsegs): khams ji tsam pa sems can gyi khams kyang de tsam mo/ /gzhon nu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i khams 'dis khyab par ma gyur pa gang yang med do/ /gzhon nu/ de bzhin du byang chub
141b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i byams pa 'dis sems can gyi ris na gang khyab par ma gyur pa'i sems can de gang yang med do/ /'di lta ste/ gzhon nu/ sems can gyi khams dpag tu med pa de
141b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa sgom pa yang dpag tu med do/ /gzhon nu/ de ltar na/ nam mkha' mtha' yas pas sems can mtha' yas pa/ sems can
142a1(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas pas byams pa mtha' yas so/ /gzhon nu/ yang sems can gyi khams ni/ ches mang gi/ sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams
142a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / rlung gi khams ni/ de lta ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang gzhon nu/ sems can gyi khams tshad med pa ji tsam pa de'i don shes par bya ba'i phyir dpe bstan to/ /gzhon nu/ 'di lta ste/
142a3(dkon brtsegs): dper na/ shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / de bzhin du phyogs mtshams dang / phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig
142a4(dkon brtsegs): r ten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa de dag thams cad chus yongs su gang ba'i rgya mtshor gyur pa'i rgya mtsho chen po gcig tu gyur pa la yongs su brtag pa bzung
142a5(dkon brtsegs): ste de la sems can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dus nas brgyar btsal ba'i skra'i rtse mos chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs/ gzhan yang sems can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dus
142a6(dkon brtsegs): nas brgyar btsal ba'i skra'i rtse mos chu'i thigs pa gnyis blangs/ gzhan yang sems can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dus nas brgyar btsal ba'i skra'i rtse mos chu'i thigs pa
142a7(dkon brtsegs): gsum blangs nas gzhon nu/ yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ de lta bu'i thabs kyis chu'i phung po chen po zad par gyur kyang sems can gyi khams ni/ tshad dang mtha' med de/
142b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu/ sems can gyi khams de ltar dpag tu med cing de ltar mtha' yas pa de thams cad la byang chub sems dpa'i byams pas khyab par byed do/ /gzhon nu/ de ji snyam du sems/
142b2(dkon brtsegs): gang de ltar dpag tu med par byams pa sgom pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i tshad gzung bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ de ni/ ma
142b3(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ /gzhon nu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byams pa chen po sgom pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni/ dpag tu med pa yin te/ gzhon nu/ de'i byams
142b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ni| bdag srung ba yin/ gzhan la phan par gnas pa yin/ mchog tu gnod sems med pa/ khro ba dang gnod sems kyi tha pa dang bral ba/ nye bar 'joms pa/ rjes su chags
142b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba/ dad pa kun tu ston pa/ 'khrul pa thams cad la nyes par lta ba/ yongs su gdung ba med pa/ lus dang ngag dang sems bde ba skyed pa/ gzhan gyi gnod
142b6(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba thams cad du ma lhung ba/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral ba/ 'phags pa'i lam dang mthun pa/ gshe ba dang / khros pa la dang ba skyed pa/ g.yul thams cad las sgrol
142b7(dkon brtsegs): ba| dbyig pa dang mtshon cha mi thogs pa/ sems can rab tu thar par bya ba la dga' ba/ khong khro ba thams cad dang bral ba/ tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag dang / 'drid pa dang / gzhogs
143a1(dkon brtsegs): slong thams cad dang bral ba/ rang gi rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pas nye bar 'tsho ba/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pas phyag byas pa/ rang gi
143a2(dkon brtsegs): gzi brjid kyis brgyan pa/ mkhas pas bstod pa/ byis pa thams cad rjes su srung ba/ tshangs pa'i lam dang mthun pa/ 'dod pa'i khams la ma 'dres pa/ thar pa'i
143a3(dkon brtsegs): lam gyi gtso bor gyur pa/ theg pa thams cad kyis yang dag par bzung ba/ zang zing med pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa/ rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya
143a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dngos po thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa/ mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang pos yang dag par brgyan pa/ dbang po nyams shing ma tshang ba thams cad
143a5(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa/ bde 'gro dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lam thams cad du 'gro ba/ ngan song thams cad dang / mi khom pa brgyad las zlog pa/ chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos
143a6(dkon brtsegs): pa| 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad dang / dbang po dang / rgyal srid la mngon par mi dga' ba dang / sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa rab tu sbyor ba/ tha
143a7(dkon brtsegs): dad pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba/ tshul khrims dang bslab pa thams cad kyi sgo dang lam/ tshul khrims 'chal pa thams cad kyi skyabs/ bzod pa'i stobs kun tu ston pa/ nga
143b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa thams cad dang bral ba/ mi 'khrugs pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i bya ba sgrol ba/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa
143b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i rtsa ba/ nyon mongs pa las byung ba/ sems nges par rtog pa/ thos pa 'dzin pa shes rab kyi rgyu skyed pa'i byams pa dang / bdag gi
143b3(dkon brtsegs): phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs 'joms pa/ bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i phyogs sel ba/ 'grogs na bde ba/ ldang ba dang / slong ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba'i spyod lam srung
143b4(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa/ rgod pa'i rang bzhin yid la byed pa thams cad sel ba/ dri zhim pos byugs pa/ khrel yod pa dang / ngo tsha shes pas byugs pa/ mi khom pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang /
143b5(dkon brtsegs): ngan 'gro thams cad sel ba'i byams pa/ 'gro ba thams cad skyob pa'i byams pa chen po/ bdag gi bde ba btang ba dang / sems can thams cad la bde ba rab tu sbyin pa ste/ gzhon nu/
143b6(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos rnams kyi byams pa ni/ bdag skyob pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa ni/ sems can thams cad la skyob pa'o/ /yang gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
143b7(dkon brtsegs): dang po bskyed pa rnams kyi byams pa ni/ sems can la dmigs pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi byams pa ni/ chos la dmigs pa'o/ /byang chub sems
144a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bzod pa rab tu thob pa rnams kyi byams pa ni/ dmigs pa med pa'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byams
144a2(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa de la rab tu gnas pas sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed do/ /de la gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje
144a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po gang zhe na/ gzhon nu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i sngon du 'gro ba ni/ snying rje chen po'o/ /'di lta ste/
144a4(dkon brtsegs): dper na/ gzhon nu/ skyes bu'i srog gi dbang po'i sngon du 'gro ba ni/ dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa'o/ /gzhon nu/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po yang dag par sgrub pa'i byang
144a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i sngon du 'gro ba ni/ snying rje chen po'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ gzhon nu 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che'i thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba ni/ 'khor
144a6(dkon brtsegs): lo rin po che yin no/ /gzhon nu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba ni/ snying rje chen po yin te/ snying
144a7(dkon brtsegs): rje chen po de yang sems can thams cad rjes su mi gtong ba'o/ /gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po sems can thams cad la ji ltar 'jug ce na/ gzhon nu/ 'di
144b1(dkon brtsegs): ltar byang chub sems dpas 'jig tshogs la lta bas bcings shing lta bar gyur ba rnam ba mang po la chags pa'i sems can dag mthong na/ de dag gi 'jig tshogs la lta bas bcings
144b2(dkon brtsegs): pa spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ /zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go /gzhan yang gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpas sems can yang
144b3(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ma yin pa phyin ci log gi gnas la gnas te/ mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa dang / bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du
144b4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa mthong na/ de dag gi yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyin ci log spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ /zhes sems can rnams la byung
144b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go / gzhan yang gzhon nu/ byang chub sems dpas phyin ci log gi 'dod pa la sred pa'i sems can de dag ma la yang g.yem pa dang / sring
144b6(dkon brtsegs): mo la yang g.yem pa mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di dag ni/ 'phags pa ma yin pa 'dus pa ste/ mu cor smra bas yongs
144b7(dkon brtsegs): su gang zhing ngo tsha mi shes pas yongs su gang ngo / /'di ltar ma'i rum mngal gyi mal na 'dug 'dug ste/ de nyid kyi mngal gyi sgo nas byung la de nyid dang yang lhan cig tu 'dod pa sten par byed
145a1(dkon brtsegs): pa lta ga la srid/ mngal gcig na lhan cig tu 'dug 'dug pa'i sring mo dang 'du zhing 'khrig pa byed pa lta ga la srid de/ kye ma'o/ /sems can 'di dag ni/
145a2(dkon brtsegs): brlag go /rnam par brlag go /rab tu brlag go/ 'dod chags kyis g.yen spyo'o/ /zhe sdang gis g.yen spyo'o/ /gti mug gis g.yen spyo'o/ /mi shes pas g.yen spyo'o/ /
145a3(dkon brtsegs): chos las nyams shing chos ma yin pa la gnas so/ /mi mthun pa'i chos la rab tu spyod do/ /sems can dmyal ba'i spyod yul pa'o/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi spyod yul
145a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'o| |gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi spyod yul pa'o/ /log pa'i lam la spyod yul pa'o/ /snyam mo/ /gzhon nu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ wa dur khrod kyi mthar g.yang
145a5(dkon brtsegs): sa chen po dang nye ba zhig na mtshan mo khyis gtses nas g.yang sa chen po nas lhung ba de bzhin du gzhon nu/ sems can 'di dag kyang wa dang 'dra'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di lta
145a6(dkon brtsegs): ste| dper na/ dmus long khyis gtses na g.yang sa chen po dang nye bar gyur pa de bzhin du kye ma'o/ /gzhon nu/ sems can 'di dag kyang dmus long dang 'dra'o/ /gzhon
145a7(dkon brtsegs): nu| 'di lta ste/ dper na/ phag ni/ mi gtsang ba za zhing mi gtsang ba la spyod yul ba ste/ gzhon nu/ kye ma'o/ /de bzhin du sems can 'di dag kyang phag dang 'dra ste/ de
145b1(dkon brtsegs): nyid ma yin/ de nyid sring mo yin na/ de chung mar bya ba lta ga la srid snyam ste/ sems can nyon mongs pas g.yen spyo ba dang / bdud kyi phyogs kyi spyod yul ba dang / bdud kyi
145b2(dkon brtsegs): zhags pas bcings pa dang / 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba de dag gi 'dod pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ /zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje
145b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'jug go / gzhon nu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas sgrib pa lngas bsgribs pa'i sems can 'dod pa'i zug rngus zug pa mthong na/ skye mched drug la chags shing
145b4(dkon brtsegs): zhen pa/ mig gis gzugs mthong na/ mtshan mar 'dzin par 'gyur zhing mngon rtags su 'dzin pa dang / rna bas sgra/ snas dri/ lces ro/ lus kyis reg pa la reg na/ mtshan
145b5(dkon brtsegs): mar 'dzin cing mngon rtags su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ kye ma'o/ /sems can 'di dag ni/ khong khro ba mang zhing phan tshun mi mdza' ste/ de dag don rnyed pa'i phyir ni/ mdza' bor yang mi shes
145b6(dkon brtsegs): gnod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ni/ gcig la gcig gsod do/ /kye ma'o/ /sems can 'di dag ni/ gnyid dang / rmugs pa mang ba ste/ zhen cing glen pa mi shes pa'i ling tog gis khebs
145b7(dkon brtsegs): shing mi dge ba'o/ /kye ma'o/ /sems can 'di dag ni/ 'gyod pas kun nas bskor ba ste/ glo bur gyi nyon mongs pas sems kun nas nyon mongs pa'o/ /kye ma'o/ /sems can 'di dag
146a1(dkon brtsegs): ni| the tshom gyis yongs su dkris pa chos zab mo la nges bar ma gyur pa ste/ de dag gi sgrib pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ /zhes sems can
146a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go / gzhon nu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems can nga rgyal gyis non pa/ che ba'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/ nga rgyal las
146a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang nga rgyal gyis non pa/ nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/ cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/ log pa'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/ dma' ba bas
146a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag mtho bar sems pa/ mtshungs pa bas kyang bdag ches lhag par lta ba de dag gzugs la bdag ces khas len pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la bdag ces khas len pa/ khong
146a5(dkon brtsegs): du ma chud par khong du chud snyam du shes pa/ gus par smra bar 'os pa la gus par mi smra ba/ phyag bya bar 'os pa la phyag mi 'tshal ba/ rgan pa dang gzhon pa la mi 'dud pa/ bla ma la rim gro
146a6(dkon brtsegs): mi byed pa/ mkhas pa la dge ba gang / mi dge ba gang / bsten par bya ba gang / bsten par mi bya ba gang / bya ba gang / mi bya ba gang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang / kha na ma tho
146a7(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa gang / lam gang / ting nge 'dzin gang / rnam par grol ba gang zhes mi 'dri ba dang / bdag nyid la bdag ni/ gtso bo'o/ /bdag ni/ mchog go /snyam du rlom sems su byed pa
146b1(dkon brtsegs): mthong na/ 'di ltar nga rgyal gyi rnam pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ /zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go /gzhon nu/ gzhan yang byang chub
146b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas srid pa'i bcing bas bcings pa/ sred pas 'khol ba/ chung ma dang / bu pho dang / bu mos zin pa/ gnod pas zin pa/ don med pas zin pa/ 'khor ba'i gtan pas zin pa/
146b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyis zin pa/ srid pa'i bcing bas zin pa/ rang nyam med pa/ rang dbang med pa'i sems can
146b4(dkon brtsegs): mthong na/ de dag rang nyam dang / rang dbang dang / gang du dga' bar 'gro ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ /zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'
146b5(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po 'jug go / gzhon nu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba/ sdig pa'i grogs pos 'khor ba de dag sdig pa'i grogs pos non pas mi
146b6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i las la chags pa la 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang /
146b7(dkon brtsegs): tshig kyal ba dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba'i sems can mthong na/ 'di ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsdu ba dang / mi dge ba'i lam las bzlog pa
147a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par bzung ste spyod bar bya ba'i chos bstan to/ /zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen
147a2(dkon brtsegs): po 'jug go / gzhon nu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas gti mug gis bsgribs pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag gi ling tog gis kun tu bsgribs pa/ bdag dang /
147a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can dang / srog dang / skye ba po dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed bu dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir
147a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa la mngon par chags pa'i sems can mthong na/ de dag 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig rnam par sbyang zhing lta bar gyur pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ /zhes
147a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go / gzhon nu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can mthong na/ de dag
147a6(dkon brtsegs): phung po lnga'i gshed ma las rab tu thar par bya ba dang / 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las rab tu 'da' ba dang / khams gsum thams cad las gdon pa'i phyir chos bstan to/ /zhes
147a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ gzhon nu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas sems can 'khrugs par gyur pa rtswa mun dza dang / bal ba dza
147b1(dkon brtsegs): lta bur mi drang ba/ drang ba ltar 'chos pa/ 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu/ 'jig rten pha rol nas 'jig rten 'dir kun tu rgyug cing 'khor ba/ 'gro ba lngar 'gro ba la phyogs pa/
147b2(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba la phyir bltas pa mthong na/ de dag gi mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgo dbye ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ /zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po
147b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug go / gzhon nu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi khams mthong na/ rnam pa bcu po 'di dag gis snying rje chen po 'jug go /bsam pa las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen
147b4(dkon brtsegs): po de yang g.yo ba med par 'jug go / lhag pa'i bsam pa las shin tu byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang mnyam par 'jug go /lam las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang drang
147b5(dkon brtsegs): po bcos ma ma yin par 'jug go / sems gya gyu med pa'i sems las shin tu gnas pa las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang gya gyu med par 'jug go/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams
147b6(dkon brtsegs): cad la 'dud pa dang / phyag 'tshal ba las shin tu byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang bdag gi bde ba gtong bar 'jug go /'di lta ste/ bdag gi sems yongs su dag pa las byung ba'i phyir
147b7(dkon brtsegs): de'i snying rje chen po de yang pha rol rjes su srung bar 'jug go / 'di lta ste/ g.yo zhing 'gul ba'i sems dang bral ba rab tu gnas pa'i sems las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang shes
148a1(dkon brtsegs): rab brtan par 'jug go / 'di lta ste/ pha rol la bde ba sbyin pa las rab tu byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang bdag gi bde ba gtong bar 'jug go /brtson
148a2(dkon brtsegs): 'grus brtan pa las rab tu byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang sems can thams cad kyi khur 'khyer bar 'jug ste/ gzhon nu/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje
148a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po ni/ rnam pa 'di dag dang / gzhan yang rnam pa bcus 'jug go /gzhon nu/ 'di ltar gang la la theg pa chen pos nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang
148a4(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen pos 'byung ste/ de'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o/ /sbyin pa byed pa dang / tshul khrims byed pa dang / bzod pa byed pa dang / brtson 'grus byed pa dang / bsam
148a5(dkon brtsegs): gtan byed pa dang / shes rab byed pa ni/ snying rje chen po zhes bya ste/ de'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa byed pa dang / yang dag par spong ba byed pas snying rje
148a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po'o/ /dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / mchog tu dga' bar bya ba'i las dang / mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi
148a7(dkon brtsegs): lam dang / tshig de dag thams cad kyang rgyas par bya'o/ /snying rje chen po ni/ rang byung gi ye shes sgrub par byed pas na/ de'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o/ /rang gi bya ba dang / legs
148b1(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa'i bya ba dang / mi 'gyur ba'i bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la bya ba ci yod snyam pa ste/ de'i snying rje chen po de yang sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs
148b2(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs par byed pas 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje de dang ldan pas sems
148b3(dkon brtsegs): can 'di 'dra ba'i gnas thob pa mthong na/ de dag la snying brtse ba dang / snying rje'i sems bskyed do/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang dge ba'i chos rnams dran pa
148b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / rjes su dran pa dang / dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dge ba'i chos la mi zhum pa dang / mi 'god pa dang / yongs su mi skyo ba dang / mi dga' ba thams cad spong
148b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / chos thams cad la dga' bar gnas pa dang / sems rab tu dga' ba dang / lus rab tu tshim pa dang / blo rab tu dga' ba dang / yid rab tu mgu ba dang / de bzhin gshegs
148b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku la mngon par dga' zhing mos pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan kun tu tshol ba la dga' ba dang / chos nyan pas yongs su mi skyo zhing dga' ba dang / chos kyi phyir 'brang ba'i
148b7(dkon brtsegs): nan tan la rab tu dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba'i chos la mgu ba dang / sems can rnams la khong khro ba med pa dang / byang chub la dga' ba dang / chos rgya chen po la mos pa dang / nyi tshe ba'i
149a1(dkon brtsegs): theg pa sel bar sems bskyed pa dang / ser sna tshar gcod pa dang / slong ba la dga' ba dang / gtong ba la rab tu dga' ba dang / tshul khrims 'chal ba dag
149a2(dkon brtsegs): sdud cing byams pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa la rtag tu dad pa dang / bdag gi tshul khrims yongs su dag pas ngan 'gro dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las rab tu 'da' bar
149a3(dkon brtsegs): dbugs 'byin pa la rab tu dga' ba dang / pha rol ngan du zer ba dang / ngan par brjod pa'i tshig gi lam bzod cing rab tu dga' ba dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang / mgo
149a4(dkon brtsegs): bcad kyang bzod par nus te/ sems mi nyams shing rab tu dga' ba dang / rgan rabs la 'dud cing zhes byed pa la dga' ba dang / rtag tu bzhin 'dzum pa la dga' ba dang / khro
149a5(dkon brtsegs): gnyer med cing gsong por smra ba la dga' ba dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag dang / gzhogs slong med pa la rab tu dga' ba dang / snying po dang ldan pa'i chos 'jug
149a6(dkon brtsegs): par rab tu dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' la ston pa bzhin du phangs pa dang / chos la bdag bzhin du phangs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la srog bzhin du phangs pa dang /
149a7(dkon brtsegs): bla ma la pha ma bzhin du phangs pa dang / sems can thams cad la bu bzhin du phangs pa dang / slob dpon la mig bzhin du phangs pa dang / nan tan la yan lag gi dam pa bgo
149b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du phangs pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa la lag pa dang / rkang pa bzhin du phangs pa dang / chos smra ba la rin po che thams cad bzhin du phangs pa dang / chos yongs su tshol ba la sman bzhin du
149b2(dkon brtsegs): phangs pa dang / bskul zhing dran par byed pa la sman pa bzhin du phangs par sems dpa'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di ni/ dga' ba zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ba
149b3(dkon brtsegs): de la rab tu gnas nas rtag tu chos tshol ba la dga' bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa la mi skyo'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms gang zhe na/
149b4(dkon brtsegs): btang snyoms rnam pa gsum ste/ rnam pa gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa la btang snyoms pa dang / bdag dang gzhan rjes su srung ba'i btang snyoms pa dang / dus dang dus
149b5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin par btang snyoms pa'o/ /de la nyon mongs pa'i btang snyoms pa gang zhe na/ gang bkur sti byas kyang mthor mi sems pa dang / bkur sti ma byas kyang dma' bar mi sems pa dang /
149b6(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pas snyems pa med pa dang / ma rnyed bas yi mi chad pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang tshul khrims 'chal bal glo mnyam pa dang / grags pa la dka' ba med pa dang / ma
149b7(dkon brtsegs): grags pa la zhum pa med pa dang / smad pa la yid mi bzod pa dang / bstod pa la chos nyid du shin tu gnas pa dang / sdug bsngal la so sor rtog pa'i stobs dang / bde ba la mi rtag par
150a1(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa'i stobs dang / rjes su chags pa 'dor ba dang / khong khro ba spong ba dang / mdza' ba dang mi mdza' ba la sems mnyam pa dang / legs par byas pa dang nyes
150a2(dkon brtsegs): par byas pa la gnyis su mi byed pa dang / sdug pa dang mi sdug ba la mi lta ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang bsnyen bkur mi byed pa la dga' ba dang / mi dga' bar bya ba med pa dang / snyan
150a3(dkon brtsegs): par smra ba dang / mi snyan par smra ba la rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba med pa dang / kun myang ba'i nyes pa la mtshungs par yongs su 'jal ba dang / bdag dang sems can gzhan
150a4(dkon brtsegs): la bsam pa mnyam pa dang / lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang / sems can rab 'bring tha ma la 'od zer mnyam pa dang / bsngags pa dang mi bsngags pa la chos nyid mnyam pa dang /
150a5(dkon brtsegs): bden pa dang / mi bden pa la bdag gi bden pa yongs su dag pa ste/ gzhon nu/ 'di ltar gang bdag la gnod par byed pa de la byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms pa yin no/ /de la
150a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang gzhan rjes su srung ba'i btang snyoms gang zhe na/ gang yan lag dang / nyid lag gi sha bcad kyang btang snyoms pa yin no/ /yan lag dang nying lag gi sha bcad kyang 'dod pa med
150a7(dkon brtsegs): cing tshol ba med de/ btang snyoms pa yin no/ /lus kyang mi 'gyur/ ngag kyang mi 'gyur te/ gnyis ka bzod pas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o/ /mig gi rnam pas ma yin/ gzugs
150b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam pas ma yin te/ gnyis kas kyang rma mi phyin pa nas yid kyi rnam pa dang / chos kyi rnam pa'i bar gyis rma mi phyin pas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o/ /rma mi phyin cing snad pa med pas
150b2(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o/ /rma phyung ba la rma mi 'byin pas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o/ /bdag dang pha rol gnyis ka la bzod pas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o/ /phan
150b3(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa dang / phan par mi byed pa la mnyam par spyod pas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o/ /btang snyoms ni/ rtsod pa med pa lhur byed pa'o/ /btang snyoms ni/ rang gi sems nges
150b4(dkon brtsegs): par rtog pa'o/ /btang snyoms ni/ bdag la so sor rtog pa'o/ /btang snyoms ni/ gzhan la gnod pa med pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms ni/ mnyam par
150b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhag pa'i dngos po ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la btang snyoms pa gnang bar mi mdzad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub
150b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas rtag tu 'bad par bya'o/ /rtag par rgyun mi 'chad par dge ba yongs su btsal ba la brtson par bya ste/ dus dus su btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o/ /de la dus dus su btang
150b7(dkon brtsegs): snyoms sgom pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ snod ma yin pa'i sems can la btang snyoms pa dang / bsnyen bkur mi byed pa la btang snyoms pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / smad pa dang / ma grags
151a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la btang snyoms pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg par nges par 'gyur ba la zhugs pa rnams la btang snyoms pa dang / sbyin pa'i dus na
151a2(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims nye bar sgrub pa btang snyoms pa dang / tshul khrims kyi dus na sbyin pa nye bar sgrub pa btang snyoms pa dang / bzod pa'i dus na sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / brtson
151a3(dkon brtsegs): 'grus nye bar sgrub pa btang snyoms pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi dus na tshul khrims kyi rjes su 'jug pa btang snyoms pa dang / bsam gtan gyi dus na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye
151a4(dkon brtsegs): bar sgrub pa btang snyoms pa dang / shes rab kyi dus na pha rol tu phyin pa lnga la dmigs pa nye bar sgrub pa btang snyoms pa ste/ 'di ni/ dus dus su btang snyoms pa zhes bya'o/ /
151a5(dkon brtsegs): de ltar gang mi bya ba'i chos mi byed pa 'di ni/ btang snyoms zhes bya ste/ de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ mi dge ba'i phyogs thams cad la btang snyoms su byed do/ /
151a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms zhes bya'o/ /de ltar shA
151a7(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phung po chen po des gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms mdor bstan pa dang /
151b1(dkon brtsegs): bcas/ rgyas par bstan pa dang bcas te rgya cher yang dag par bstan to/ /gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod pa des de thos nas pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson 'grus brtsams par gyur to/ /byams
151b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi le'u ste/ lnga pa'o// //de la shA ri'i bu/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson pa gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/
151b3(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag nyid yin te/ gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do/ /drug gang
151b4(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
151b5(dkon brtsegs): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de dag ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug rnams so/ /de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di la
151b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ni/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / phongs pa rnams kyi sbyin bdag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ zas kyis phongs pa la zas/ skom gyis phongs pa la skom/ bzhon pa dang /
151b7(dkon brtsegs): gos dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gnas dang / yo byad dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / mar me dang / sil snyan dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / gser dang / nor
152a1(dkon brtsegs): bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / rin po che thams cad dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang / skyed mos
152a2(dkon brtsegs): tshal dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba dang / gling bzhi'i rgyal po'i longs spyod kyi bde ba thams
152a3(dkon brtsegs): cad dang / rtse ba dang / dga' ba thams cad dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / mig dang / mgo dang / sha dang / khrag dang / rkang dang / rus pa dang / 'jig
152a4(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi yo byad gang yang slong ba la yongs su mi gtong ba med do/ /sbyin pa de rnam pa bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
152a5(dkon brtsegs): la mi mthun pa'i longs spyod yongs su tshol zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sems can la gnod pa'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'jigs
152a6(dkon brtsegs): shing skrag nas sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yongs su ma btang ba la mgron du gnyer ba'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdong du blta zhing
152a7(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sems can la tha dad par sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mdza' bas sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
152b1(dkon brtsegs): la sdang bas sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la zhing tshol zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sems can thams cad la sbyin gnas ma yin zhes brnyes shing
152b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa med/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de rnam pa de bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed do/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de gzhan rnam
152b3(dkon brtsegs): pa bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la las kyi rnam par smin pa 'dod cing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
152b4(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa log par sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yongs su skyo ba'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nye bar bstan nas sbyin pa med/ byang chub
152b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams la rjes su mi dga' ba'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'gyod pa'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la tshul khrims dang ldan pa la
152b6(dkon brtsegs): bkur te sbyin pa med/ tshul khrims 'chal pa la brnyas te sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rnam par smin pa la re ba'i sbyin pa med de/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub
152b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sbyin pa de rnam pa bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed do/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de gzhan rnam pa bcus yongs su dag par sbyin
153a1(dkon brtsegs): par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la smad nas sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gzhan du phyogs nas sbyin pa med/ byang
153a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams la nyon mongs shing sbyin pa med/ khro ba dang / phrag dog dang / gnod sems ston cing sbyin pa med/ ri mor mi byed par sbyin pa med/ rang gi lag
153a3(dkon brtsegs): nas ma yin par sbyin pa med/ ci tsam dpags pa las dbri zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams skye ba 'dod cing sbyin pa med de/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin
