153a5(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mi brtan par sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la tshod 'dzin cing sbyin pa med/ yongs su chad par sbyin pa med/ gzhan gyi dring
153a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jog ste sbyin pa med/ nyung zhes cung zad tsam sbyin pa med/ gzugs dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug la mngon par dga' ba'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
153a7(dkon brtsegs): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lhar skye ba thams cad 'dod pa'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar bsngo
153b1(dkon brtsegs): zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mkhas pas smad pa'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la thams cad mkhyen par ma bsngos pa'i sbyin pa med de/ shA
153b2(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa rnam pa de bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed do/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de gzhan rnam pa bcus yongs su dag
153b3(dkon brtsegs): par sbyin par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ ci tsam 'dus byas las nges par 'byung ba dang / 'dus ma byas thob par bya ba'i phyir de ltar sbyin pa byin na/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems
153b4(dkon brtsegs): dpas sbyin pa'i phan yon bcu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ bza' ba byin pas tshe dang / spobs pa dang / bde ba dang / stobs dang / kha dog phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/
153b5(dkon brtsegs): btung ba byin pas nyon mongs pa dang / sred ba thams cad bsal ba phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /bzhon pa byin pas bde ba thams cad kyi dngos po phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /
153b6(dkon brtsegs): bgo ba byin pas khrel yong pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / gser ltar kha dog yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /spos dang / phreng ba byin pas tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang /
153b7(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin gyi dri dang / byug pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /dri rab tu zhim pa'i spos dang / phye ma dang / byug pa byin pas lus kyi nan tan gyi dri zhim po phun sum tshogs pa rab tu
154a1(dkon brtsegs): 'thob bo/ /ro byin pas ro bro ba'i nang na mchog gi ro bro ba'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /gnas byin pas sems can
154a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi gnas dang / rten dang / gling dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /nad pa la sman byin pas mi rga /mi 'chi/ shi ba med pa'i
154a3(dkon brtsegs): bde ba yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /yo byad sna tshogs byin pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi yo byad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu

154b1(dkon brtsegs): po| |rin po che tha dad pa sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs byin pas dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta byin pas
154b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa dang / yangs pa dang / che ba phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /skyed mos tshal dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal byin pas bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar ba dang / ting nge 'dzin

154b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa'i mi byin pas rang nyam dang / rang dbang dang / rang byung gi ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa

155a1(dkon brtsegs): byin na/ phan yon gzhan yang bcu 'thob bo/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga byin pas tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam
155a2(dkon brtsegs): par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /dga' ba'i rtse mo thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pas dam

155a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /mig byin pas sems can thams cad la chos kyi mig mi sgrib pa yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob

155b1(dkon brtsegs): byin pas rdo rje ltar mi shigs pa'i lus thob pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /yan lag gi dam pa mgo byin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi mchog
155b2(dkon brtsegs): bla na med cing ltag na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob ste/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub
155b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pas de ltar sbyin pa byin na/ 'di lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa'i phan yon de dag yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'

155b6(dkon brtsegs): su mi gtong ba gang yang med do/ /'di lta ste/ shA ri'i bu/ khyim bdag chun ba zhing skams la gnas nas ba lang dang / gnam stong ma yin pa'i zhing gi rmo brko rdzogs par byas te sa bon
155b7(dkon brtsegs): btab nas rnam grangs 'dis gshol gyis 'tsho bas gser dang / dngul yang 'grub bo/ /dngos po sna tshogs gzhan yang 'grub bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'bru dang mtshungs
156a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nor med do/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi zang zing la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
156a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i dus dang / tshod yod do/ /'di lta ste/ shA ri'i bu/ bas rtswa skam po dang / gsher ba zos pa dang / chu grang mo dang / dron mo 'thungs
156a3(dkon brtsegs): pa de las 'o ma 'grub ste/ zho dang / mar gsar ba dang / mar gyi snying po yang 'grub bo/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang
156a4(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas te 'jig rten gyi zang zing byin na/ de mi 'dod kyang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po yang yongs su 'grub bo/ /brgya byin dang / tshangs pa yang
156a5(dkon brtsegs): 'grub bo/ /gnas de gsum yongs su grub nas byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yongs su 'grub bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi yang yongs
156a6(dkon brtsegs): su 'grub bo/ /las stong gis grub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams kyang yongs su 'grub bo/ /las stong gis grub pa'i rnam pa drug cu dang ldan pa'i dbyangs
156a7(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pa yang yongs su 'grub bo/ /las brgyas grub pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gcig yongs su 'grub bo/ /las nyis brgyas grub pa'i gtsug tor spyi bor 'grub
156b1(dkon brtsegs): bo| |rnam pa dang yon tan brgyas yongs su rdzogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dung chen po yang 'grub bo/ /rnam pa bye ba dang / yon tan brgya phrag stong dang ldan pa'i tshems
156b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi phreng ba thags bzang ba/ phrag med pa snyoms shing dkar ba yang yongs su 'grub ste/ de ltar shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam
156b3(dkon brtsegs): par smin pas mngon par 'grub bo/ /yang shA ri'i bu/ gang byams pa'i sems bskyed nas slong ba la sbyin pa byin pa de ni/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sems bskyed pas/ sangs rgyas kyi
156b4(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin rgyun mi 'chad pa gcig 'grub ste/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ba spu'i bu ga re re nas ting nge
156b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin brgya gang+gA'i rgyun ltar mngon par sprul pa mdzad de/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba thams cad la dbang thob pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gang+gA 'di lta bu'i
156b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa na 'jig rten gyi zang zing gi sbyin pas yongs su gzung ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang
156b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' mi 'chi ba 'dod pa dang / byang chub 'dod pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi zang zing sbyin par byed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ khyod
157a1(dkon brtsegs): k yis byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi zang zing la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar rig par
157a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis shig / shA ri'i bu/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus kyi bskal pa grangs med pa/ shin tu grangs med pa/ tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang byung ba de'i tshe de'i dus na de
157a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos mos zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes
157a4(dkon brtsegs): bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo / /yang shA ri'i bu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
157a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa chos mos kyi tshe'i tshad ni/ lo stong phrag bcur gyur to/ /yang shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos mos de'i dge slong stong phrag brgya ni/ dgra bcom pa nyon
157a6(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa nas sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i bar du ste/ dgra bcom pa sha stag gi 'dus pa chen po byung ngo / /
157a7(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu/ de'i tshe thag pa zhes bya ba thags 'thag pa/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mdog bzang zhing rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ de
157b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa chos mos gang na bzhugs pa'i sa phyogs de nas ha cang mi ring ba'i sa phyogs zhig na rang gi las byed do/ /de nyin par las byas nas nub kar khyim du 'gro ba'i tshe rtag
157b2(dkon brtsegs): tu dus thams cad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos mos de'i drung du 'ongs nas ras kyi kha tshar gcig 'bul zhing 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bsdu
157b3(dkon brtsegs): b a'i gnas kyis bdag bcom ldan 'das ras kyi kha tshar phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bsdu ba thams cad dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
157b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig / ces des rim gyis ras kyi kha tshar stong lnga brgya phul te/ des bskal pa bye ba phrag bco lngar ngan 'gro log par ltung bar ma song ngo / /dge
157b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bye ba phrag stong myong ngo / /de dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis brgya byin gyi bdag po bye ba phrag stong myong ngo / /dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jam pa yid du 'ong ba
157b6(dkon brtsegs): dang po ba'i las de nyid kyis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong mnyes par byas te/ des thams cad la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos
157b7(dkon brtsegs): gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gos dang / zhal zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad kyis bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor
158a1(dkon brtsegs): byas nas mchod do/ /de phyis bskal pa grangs med pa zhig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rab tu
158a2(dkon brtsegs): b sdus pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar du
158a3(dkon brtsegs): ste| de lo bye ba phrag nyi shu'i bar du gnas so/ /de'i dgra bcom pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag nyi shu zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa nas sems
158a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i bar gyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po byung ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag lnga yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
158a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub la bkod do/ /des chos bstan te sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa'i don byas nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /der bcom ldan 'das de yongs su mya ngan las
158a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das nas lo stong gi bar du dam pa'i chos gnas so/ /de'i sku gdung yang rgyas par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shA ri'i bu/ nga da yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba
158a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ ras kyi kha tshar phul ba dang / sems bskyed pas kyang mthar gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa la ltos/ shA ri'i bu/ sems ni/ rgya che la
158b1(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa ni/ ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ gal te sbyin pa rgya che la sems kyis ma yin na ni/ sbyin bdag rtsub mo zhes bya ba ltar 'gyur te/ des sbyin pa de snyed byin yang sems yongs su
158b2(dkon brtsegs): ma sbyangs so/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'jig rten gyi zang zing la gnas te thams cad yongs su thob par gyur pa la ltos/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa ni/ sbyin pa nyung yang
158b3(dkon brtsegs): mang por byed do/ /ye shes kyi stobs kyis lhag par byed do/ /shes rab kyi stobs kyis rgyas par byed do/ /bsngo ba'i stobs kyis dpag tu med par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
158b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis don de nyid rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /gzugs 'dod phyir ni sbyin pa sbyin mi byed/ /longs spyod mtho ris 'dod phyir ma
158b5(dkon brtsegs): yin gyi| |bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas mchog 'dod phyir/ /de phyir sbyin pa chung yang du mar 'gyur/ /grags dang brjod pa dag dang sgra dag dang / /g.yog dang bde ba nam yang mi 'dod cing / /
158b6(dkon brtsegs): 'chi 'pho skye ba kun kyang mi 'dod de/ /de phyir sbyin nyung 'bras bu chen por 'gyur/ /zas dang skom dang chos gos gang phyin pa/ /srid pa'i 'gro ba 'dod phyir ma yin te/ /sbyin pas 'chi ba
158b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i sgo btsal phyir/ /des ni skra rtse tsam yang sbyin pa byin/ /'char ba med cing khengs pa med par 'gyur/ /g.yo dang ser sna dag ni thams cad spong / /de dag le lo nam yang
159a1(dkon brtsegs): yod min te/ /de ltar de dag 'jig rten phan phyir spro/ /rgyal po'i srid dang nor dang 'bru srog gtong / /de dag sems ni gzhan du mi 'gyur te/ /byin nas
159a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba chen po rnyed par 'gyur/ /sbyin zhing gtong la byang chub rnyed mi dka'/ /pha dang ma dang bu ni sdug pa ltar/ /slong dang 'jig rten kun la de bzhin te/ /gang gis byang
159a3(dkon brtsegs): chub mchog spyod spyad pa rnams/ /sbyin tshe rtag tu phrag dog med par 'gyur/ /de dag mthong na mi khro ste/ /ji ltar sngon gyi bzhin du smra/ /mi mdza' dag dang rtag mdza' zhing //
159a4(dkon brtsegs): skrag pa rnams la 'jigs med sbyin/ /de la dngos po gang yod pa/ /slong ba la ni sri ba med/ /chos 'dod par ni rtag 'gyur te/ /rgyal srid 'dod par mi 'gyur ro/ /'byung
159a5(dkon brtsegs): bar rtag tu smra byed cing / /chos kyi sbyin pa'ang sbyin par byed/ /'dod la brkam pa ma gtogs par/ /su zhig rgyal srid 'dod par 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i rgyal srid mi 'dod cing /
159a6(dkon brtsegs): mtho ris bde ba 'dod ma yin/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yongs tshol zhing / /grags pa chen po sbyin pa sbyin/ /bdag dang nor rdzas gzhan dag kyang / /mang po myur du gtong ba
159a7(dkon brtsegs): ni| |de dag byang chub dam pa'i mchog / nam yang gtong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /mkhas pa gzugs ni mi 'dod de/ /longs spyod dag kyang 'dod ma yin/ /mtho ris dag kyang de
159b1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dod/ /mya ngan 'da' ba'ang 'dod ma yin/ /lam shes lam la mkhas pa gang / /gang dag bshes par gyur pa la/ /brtan pa dag tu mi byed de/ /srid pa med pa 'dod par 'gyur/
159b2(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod
159b3(dkon brtsegs): do| |sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u ste/ drug pa'o// //bam po dgu pa/ de la gang la brtson pas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par
159b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di gsum ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis legs
159b5(dkon brtsegs): par spyod pa ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang / ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang / yid kyis legs par spyod pa'o/ /de la lus kyis legs par
159b6(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ srog gcod pa spangs pa yin/ ma byin par len pa spangs pa yin/ 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs
159b7(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/ 'di ni/ lus kyis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ brdzun du smra ba spangs pa yin/ /phra ma dang / ngag rtsub
160a1(dkon brtsegs): po dang / tshig kyal pa spangs pa yin te/ 'di ni/ ngag gis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ brnab sems

160a5(dkon brtsegs): du sems te/ ngag gi las gang brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / ngag rtsub mo dang / tshig kyal pa ma smras pa de ni/ ngag gis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /de la yid
160a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis legs par spyod pa gang zhe na/ de la 'di snyam du sems te/ yid kyi las gang brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba ma byas pa de ni/ yid kyis legs par

160b1(dkon brtsegs): de 'di ltar tshul bzhin gyis rtog pa na 'di snyam du sems te/ las gang lus kyis ma byas pa dang / las gang dag dang / yid kyis ma byas pa de/ sngon po'am/ ser po'am/ dmar po'am/

160b3(dkon brtsegs): lces shes par bya ba ma yin/ lus kyis shes par bya ba ma yin/ yid kyis shes par bya ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni/ skyes pa ma yin/ bskyed pa ma yin/ byung
160b4(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin/ zin pa ma yin te/ de ni/ las gang gis kyang shes par bya ba ma yin no/ /de 'di snyam du sems te/ tshul khrims de ni/ gang mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /gang mngon
160b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'du mi byed pa de la gdags pa gang yang med do/ /gang gdags pa med pa de la bdag mngon par chags par mi bya'o/ /snyam nas de 'di ltar legs par spyad pa'i tshul khrims kyang yang
160b6(dkon brtsegs): dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gang gi tshul khrims de dang / tshul khrims de gang du bsngo ba de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de de ltar mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba gang gis
160b7(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims sam/ 'chal ba'i tshul khrims la so sor rtog par 'gyur ba'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba mi slong ngo / /de de ltar mthong bas sdom pa dang / cho ga dang / spyod pa dang / spyod yul
161a1(dkon brtsegs): shes bzhin du spyod par 'gyur te/ shes bzhin du spyod pas tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /de bdag tu dmigs shing mi spyod/ pha rol tu dmigs

161a5(dkon brtsegs): med do| |gang bdag med pa de la ci zhig yongs su gzung bar bya/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /lus kyis dag cing ngag gis dag pa
161a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / /yid kyis dag cing rtag tu spyod pa dag /dag pa'i brtul zhugs la ni rtag gnas pa/ /de ni byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims ldan/ /shin tu bzang po'i las lam bcu po 'di//

161b1(dkon brtsegs): kha dog med cing dbyibs kyang med/ /gang la kha dog med cing dbyibs med pa/ /de la gdags pa nam yang ma dmigs so/ /rtag tu tshul khrims ma byas 'dus ma byas/ /de ni mig gis

161b3(dkon brtsegs): ltar tshul khrims yang dag mthong ba de/ /nam yang tshul khrims dmigs par mi gnas so/ /tshul khrims ldan zhes yid kyis mi snyems shing / /bdag tu 'dzin pa tshul khrims mi

161b6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung zhing rab tu srung ba ni/ /tshul khrims ldan de gzhan la rtsod mi byed/ /bdag med 'du shes tshul khrims mi dmigs te/ /bdag med de la tshul khrims dmigs pa'ang med/

162b7(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad don gyi phyir/ /byams pa'i sems ldan phrag dog med/ /chos la brtsams te gang zag la/ /ri mo dag ni rab tu byed/ /ngag ni shin tu sdom gyur te/ /de ni mi snyan tshig
163a1(dkon brtsegs): mi smra| |'di ni 'dun dang ldan pa'i mtshan/ /nam du'ang ngag rtsub mo smra 'o/ /yid ni dge ba'i yid du 'gyur/ /nam du'ang sdig pa mi 'dod de/ byams

163a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub rnam 'tshang rgya/ /chos bcu po de dag la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro

164a1(dkon brtsegs): thob med pa/ /de 'dra'i lus ni thob par bya/ /tsha ba dag kyang gang sgrib dang / /bsil ba dag kyang rab srung ba/ /lus 'di yang ni rga ba dang / /'chi ba dag gis
164a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhom par 'gyur/ /gang dag grang dang tsha bzod pa/ /lus kyis su ni thams cad du/ /skyes bu'i bya ba byed pa yi/ /mchog gis lus ni thob par 'gyur/ /'jig rten grags pa'i bla ma la/ /

164a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos can no/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ji tsam du rdza mkhan gyi bum pa chung tshad dang / cha tshad byas pa thams cad kyang mthar 'jig go /de bzhin du kye ma'o lus 'di
164a7(dkon brtsegs): yang snying po med pa/ som btang ba'i snod bzhin te/ mthar 'jig pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shing gi yal ga'i 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu ji snyed pa de
164b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang mthar ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du kye ma'o lus 'di ni/ snying po med de/ 'bras bu smin pa bzhin du ltung ba'i chos can no/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper
164b2(dkon brtsegs): na| rtswa'i rtse mo'i zil ba'i thigs pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang nyi mas phog na ring por mi gnas so/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du kye ma'o lus 'di ni/ snying po med pa ste/ zil ba'i
164b3(dkon brtsegs): thigs pa bzhin du ring por mi gnas pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po dang / 'bab chu dang / 'bab chu'i rgyun la lbu ba rdos pa yod pa ji snyed pa de dag thams
164b4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang snying po med de/ rang bzhin gyis nyam chung pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du kye ma'o lus 'di ni/ snying po med pa ste/ lbu ba rdos pa ltar rang bzhin gyis nyam chung ba'o/ /shA
164b5(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu| 'di lta ste/ dper na/ char 'bab pa'i chu'i chu bur gzhan skye zhing gzhan 'gag go /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du kye ma'o lus 'di ni/ snying po med pa ste/ chu'i chu bur ltar rang
164b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gyis nyam chung ba'o/ /'di ltar snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang ngo / /snyam du sems bskyed pa gnyis pa de bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod
164b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad
165a1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /ji ltar rdza ma'i mkhan po yis/ /sa las snod rnams byas pa dag /de dag thams cad mthar 'jig ste/ /sems can srog kyang
165a2(dkon brtsegs): de dang 'dra/ /ji ltar shing gi yal ga yi/ /lo ma me tog 'bras bu rnams/ /thams cad ltung ba'i chos can te/ /mi yi srog kyang de bzhin no/ /rtswa mchog dag gi zil ba'i thigs/ /nyi
165a3(dkon brtsegs): ma yongs su bab pa na/ /yud tsam gyis ni med 'gyur te/ /mi yi srog kyang de bzhin no/ /ji ltar 'bab chu'i rgyun rnams kyi/ /lbu ba rdos pa nyam chung ba/ /de ltar lus ni nyam chung ste/ /
165a4(dkon brtsegs): snying po med pa lbu ba 'dra/ /ji ltar char ba bab pa yis/ /chu yi chu bur skyes pa yang / /skad cig gis ni de 'jig 'gyur/ /de bzhin lus kyang snying po med/ /snying po ma yin snying por
165a5(dkon brtsegs): shes| |snying po snying po ma yin 'dzin/ /de dag log rtog spyod yul te/ /snying po khong du chud ma yin/ /snying po med la snying med pa/ /snying po snying por shes pa ni/ /de dag yang dag rtog
165a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yul/ /snying po khong du chud pa yin/ /snying por 'du shes byas gyur te/ /rdza gang tsam gyi chu 'bul ba/ /snying po med pa'i lus las ni/ /snying po dag ni len par 'gyur/ /shA ri'i
165a7(dkon brtsegs): bu| sems bskyed pa gnyis pa 'di bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang / bsnyen
165b1(dkon brtsegs): bkur byed de/ tha na chu phor gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ bdag yun ring por dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing
165b2(dkon brtsegs): mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang du song ste/ le lo can/ brtson 'grus nyams pa/ snyoms las can/ blun pa/ log par lta ba ste/ mchod sbyin yang med/ sbyin sreg kyang med/
165b3(dkon brtsegs): legs byas dang nyes byas kyi las rnams byas pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa bsags pa yang med par lta ba dang / 'dod pa'i zil gyis non te/ bdag gis mi dge ba'i las mang po
165b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'dus byas te/ mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des 'di lta ste/ yi dwags kyi yul du sbyin gnas thams cad gso ba ma yin pa 'jigs su rung ba'i lus thob ste/ 'di
165b5(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i sbyin gnas mnyes par ma byas pas des na bdag yi dwags su gyur te lo mang po/ /lo stong phrag mang po/ /lo brgya stong phrag mang por me mar mur za zhing chu'i sgra yang mi thos na/
165b6(dkon brtsegs): lus kyis lta ga la zhig reg ste/ bdag gis ni/ da ltar mnyes par byas pas bdag dge ba'i lus thob kyi/ /sbyin gnas thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar bya zhing / lus dang / srog
165b7(dkon brtsegs): la mi lta bar byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su btsal ba'i phyir slob dpon la rim gro bya'o/ /snyam du sems bskyed pa gsum pa 'di bskyed nas byang chub
166a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' slob dpon la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed do/ /tha na chu rdza gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
166a2(dkon brtsegs): gsungs so/ /ji ltar grogs po bsten pa dang / ji ltar nye bar bsten pa ltar/ /de dag yang dang yang bsnyen pas/ /de yang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang song nas//
166a3(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnam par spangs/ /le lo che zhing brtson 'grus nyams/ /g.yo dang phrag dog ser sna can/ /byin pa yod par gang lta ba/ /thams cad du ni rnam spangs pas//
166a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni yi dwags skye gnas su/ /'jigs su rung ba'i lus thob bo/ /yun ring dus su 'khor ba yi/ /mun nag phung po 'jigs pa na/ /bkres pa dang ni skom pas gzir/ /sdug bsngal
166a5(dkon brtsegs): mang po rjes su myong / /sbyin gnas rnams ni ma mthong zhing / /bdag gis 'di 'dra'i dal ma thob/ /lo ni mang po stong rnams su/ /chu yi sgra yang yong ma thos/ /da ltar bdag gis 'jig rten na/
166a6(dkon brtsegs): shin tu dkon pa rab rnyed de/ /bdag gis slob dpon mnyes byas pas/ /dal ba 'byor ba bdag gis thob/ /sdig pa'i grogs po rnam spangs pas/ /bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed/ /
166a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir/ /lus dang srog la mi lta'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir/ /slob dpon bla ma mchod gnas la/ /rnam par dad pa'i sems kyis su/ /bsti stang gus par
166b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bya/ shA ri'i bu/ sems bskyed pa gsum pa 'di bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro
166b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu phor gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ /bdag yun ring por dge ba'i bshes gnyen
166b3(dkon brtsegs): dang bral zhing sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pas le lo can/ brtson 'grus nyams pa/ snyoms las can/ blun pas sems can la khu tshur dang thal mos brdegs shing gtsos nas bsdus
166b4(dkon brtsegs): shing tshe nge bton te/ de'i gzhi las sdig pa yang med/ de'i gzhi las sdig pa 'byung ba yang med do/ /zhes de ltar lta ba dang / de ltar bzod pa dang / de ltar mos shing zhe sdang gi zil
166b5(dkon brtsegs): gyis non pas mi dge ba'i las rnams mngon par 'dus byas te/ mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des 'di lta ste/ dud 'gro'i gnas su sbyin gnas thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba ma yin pa
166b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs su rung ba'i lus thob ste/ 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas mgu bar ma byas pas des na bdag rnga mo dang / ba lang dang / bong bur gyur te rtswa za zhing du dbyug pas bsdigs/ 'jigs pas
166b7(dkon brtsegs): bsdigs nas mi 'dod bzhin du khal bkal to/ /bdag gis ni/ da ltar mnyes par byas te dag pa'i lus thob kyi/ lus dang / srog la mi lta bar slob dpon la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur
167a1(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ /zhes shA ri'i bu/ sems bskyed pa bzhi pa de bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' slob dpon la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu bum pa gang tsam
167a2(dkon brtsegs): yang 'bul lo/ /'di'i chos nyid ni/ 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /yun ring por ni 'phags pa'i lam/ /ma rig par ni gnas pas na/ /rnga mo dag dang bong bur gyur/ /sdug
167a3(dkon brtsegs): bsngal mang po rjes su myong / /mir gyur ba yang bdag gis rnyed/ /gang gis byang chub reg 'gyur ba'i/ /bzang po yi ni las bya ste/ /de ni mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /sangs rgyas chos la
167a4(dkon brtsegs): rab gnas shing / /gus pa dang ni ldan par bya/ /byang chub phyir ni slob dpon la/ /rim gro dang ni bsti stang bya/ /'das pa'i dus kyi bskal ba bsam med nas/ /'khor ba'i 'khor lor yongs su
167a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khyams pa na/ /skye mched dag ni don med 'das gyur te/ /sbyin gnas dag ni nye bar 'tsho ba yin/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su spangs gyur nas/ /rtag tu sdig pa'i grogs po rab
167a6(dkon brtsegs): bsten te/ /de dag gis ni bstan pa'i rjes 'jug cing / /rgyun mi 'chad par ngan songs la gnas/ /gtses pa dang ni bcings shing brdegs pa rnams/ /byed du 'jug cing gzhan la spyod
167a7(dkon brtsegs): byas nas/ /de yi 'bras bu ngan song skye gnas 'gro/ /sdig pa'i las kyis sdug bsngal rjes su myong / /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni ma bsten pas/ rnga mo ba lang de bzhin bong bu yi/ /
167b1(dkon brtsegs): ngan pa'i mtshams kyi skye mched bzung gyur nas/ /dbyug pa dag gis brdegs shing khal kyang bkal/ /mir gyur ba ni shin tu rnyed dka' dang / /mthun pa'i yul dang dge ba'i bshes
167b2(dkon brtsegs): gnyen rnyed/ /shin tu yun ring dal ba rnyed gyur te/ /dka' ba'i las kyis bu gar chud pa bzhin/ /lus dang dag ni shin tu bsdams gyur nas/ /zhen pa med pa'i sems kyis brtson 'grus
167b3(dkon brtsegs): brtsams/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la g.yo med pas/ /bdag gi lus ni nye bar 'tsho bar bya/ /bdag gi slob dpon bla ma gang dag dang / /gang dag bdag gi byang chub sems bskyed pa//
167b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub dam pa mchog gi lam ston la/ /ston pa bzhin du dga' bas bsnyen bkur bya/ /rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis byug pa dang / /dri dang phye ma rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /gos dang me tog dag
167b5(dkon brtsegs): gi chun po yis/ /rkang gnyis dam pa la ni mchod par bya/ /phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa/ /sems can don la brtson zhing don dam gzigs/ /gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od
167b6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa/ /kha dog mtha' yas pa la mchod par bya/ /sangs rgyas mi yi kha lo sgyur rnams la/ /'jig rten spyod dang mchod pa cher byas pas/ /gang gis byang chub snying por bdag 'gro ba'i/ /
167b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub lam ni shin tu sbyangs bar 'gyur/ /shA ri'i bu/ sems bskyed pa bzhi pa 'di bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol
168a1(dkon brtsegs): bas slob dpon la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar
168a2(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed de/ bdag yun ring por dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pa/ le lo can/ brtson 'grus nyams pa/ snyoms las can/ blun pas 'di
168a3(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i lta ba dang / 'di lta bu'i 'dod pas sems can thams cad dang / srog chags thams cad kyi sha gcig tu spungs shing sha gcig tu bcer te/ bsod nams ma yin pa'i las
168a4(dkon brtsegs): byed kyang de'i gzhi las sdig pa med/ de'i gzhi las sdig pa'i rnam pa med do/ /rgya mtsho'i tshu rol gyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad sbyin pas tshim par byas kyang de'i gzhi las
168a5(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams med/ de'i gzhi las bsod nams kyi rnam pa med do/ /rgya mtsho'i pha rol gyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bsad cing gtubs kyang de'i gzhi las sdig pa med/ de'i
168a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhi las sdig pa'i rnam pa med do/ /snyam pas de ltar byas kyang bsod nams dang / sdig pa yongs su shes par ma nus te/ sdig pa'i lta ba bsnyen pa dang / gti mug gis zil gyis
168a7(dkon brtsegs): non pas/ bdag gis sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mang po mngon par 'dus byas te/ mi dge ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/ 'di lta ste/ sems can dmyal bar dman pa 'jigs su rung
168b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lus thob ste/ de la 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas mnyes par ma byas pas/ des ni bdag ni/ sems can dmyal ba bar gyur bas lcags kyi thu lum bsregs pa za zhing gcig tu sdug bsngal ba/ rtsub pa/
168b2(dkon brtsegs): mi bzad pa/ 'tshog pa/ 'chi ba'i mthar khrid pa myong zhing lo stong phrag mang po'i bar du bde ba'i sgra yang mi thos na/ lus kyis lta ga la zhig reg ste/ bdag gis ni/ de ltar mnyes par byas pas/
168b3(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i lus thob kyi/ sbyin gnas rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba bya zhing lus dang / srog la mi lta bar slob dpon la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /zhes shA ri'i bu/ sems bskyed pa lnga pa de
168b4(dkon brtsegs): bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu bum ba gang tsam yang 'bul
168b5(dkon brtsegs): lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /sdig pa'i grogs po bsnyen pa dang / /sdig pa'i sems kyis bslus pas na/ /sdig par lta la brtan gyur te/ /
168b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis sdig pa'i las byas so/ /rgya mtsho yi ni tshu rol na/ /sems can gnas pa ji snyed pa/ /zas dang skom gyis tshim byas kyang / /bsod nams dag gi 'byung gnas med/ /rgya mtsho yi ni pha
168b7(dkon brtsegs): rol na/ /sems can gnas pa ji snyed pa/ /thams cad bsad cing bcom gyur kyang / /sdig pa'i 'byung gnas med do zhes/ /sdig pa'i lta ba 'di lta bu/ yang dang yang du bsten pas na/ gcig
169a1(dkon brtsegs): tu mi bzad ma rungs pa'i/ /sems can dmyal bar ring du dengs/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi/ /yongs su 'dren pas ma mthong bas/ /bdag gi lus ni stong
169a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang / /ngan 'gro dag ni gsum du dengs/ /'di ni 'jig rten dge ba ste/ /de yi sgra ni thos gyur nas/ /bdag gis mi yi dngos thob kyi/ /bzang po yi ni las bya'o/ /mir gyur pa ni dka'
169a3(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/ /mi srog thob pa'ang dka' ba yin/ /dam pa'i chos thos dka' ba ste/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ang dka' ba yin/ /bdag gis mir skye dka' ba yi/ /tshe thob pa ni g.yo zhing 'gyur/ /
169a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / /rgyal ba kun mkhyen bstan pa rnyed/ /lus kyi las dang ngag gi las/ /yid kyi las kyang sdig pa can/ /mi 'dod mi bzad 'bras bur 'gyur/ /phyin
169a5(dkon brtsegs): chad spyad par mi bya'o/ /bsam pa rnam par dag pa yi/ /lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyi/ /'jig rten rab tu dka' spyod pa/ /bzang po dag gi las bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir/ /bdag
169a6(dkon brtsegs): gi bla mar gang grags pa'i/ /bka' las 'da' bar mi bya ste/ /bsnyen bkur dag ni rab tu bya/ /lam ni drang ba zhes bya ba/ g.yo ba med pas ni rab bsten te/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir/ /
169a7(dkon brtsegs): sgyu mar 'gyur bar mi bya'o/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa/ /de lta bur ni sems bskyed nas/ /snod gang tsam gyi chu yang 'bul/ /shA ri'i bu
169b1(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed pa lnga 'di bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yangs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed de/ /tha na chu
169b2(dkon brtsegs): bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ /bdag yun ring por dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing sdig pa'i grogs
169b3(dkon brtsegs): pos zin pas/ /'dud pa dang / rab tu 'dud pa dang / gus par smra ba dag phyag bya ba dang / ldang ba dang / thal mo sbyar ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa med do/ /zhes de ltar mos pa'i bar gyis
169b4(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal gyis zil gyis non pas sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mang po mngon par 'dus byas te/ mi dge ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/ 'di lta ste/ mi'i nang du sbyin gnas thams cad nye bar
169b5(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho ba ma yin pa smad pa'i lus thob ste/ 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas mnyes par ma byas pas na/ der bdag mir gyur pa na mi bkren pa dang / mi dbul po dang / bran du 'gyur ba dang / gzhan
169b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi dbang du song ba dang / 'dod pa la zhen pa'i sems can rnams dang / 'dod pa la chags pa rnams dang / mi rigs pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa rnams dang / log par lta ba rnams dang /
169b7(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims log par zhugs pa rnams dang / lta ba log par zhugs pa rnams dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum pa la rab tu gnas pa rnams dang / 'gro bar bya ba ma yin pa'i 'gro ba bzhi la 'gro
170a1(dkon brtsegs): bar zhugs pa rnams dang / /sgrib pa lngas bsgribs pa rnams dang / bla ma drug la gus par mi gnas pa rnams dang / dam pa'i chos ma yin pa bdun la 'jug pa
170a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / log par brgyad la log par nges pa rnams dang / gnod pa dgu'i dngos pos gnod par gyur pa rnams dang / mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams
170a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems can dmyal ba'i lam la mngon par phyogs pa rnams dang / mtho ris kyi lam la ma phyogs pa rnams dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba rnams dang / sdig pa'i grogs
170a4(dkon brtsegs): po'i lag tu song ba rnams dang / bdud kyi dbang du song ba rnams dang / dge ba'i chos yongs su spangs pa rnams dang / mi dge ba'i chos la spyod pa rnams kyis dbyug pas bsdigs/ 'jigs
170a5(dkon brtsegs): pas bsdigs nas mi 'dod bzhin du byed cing rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed par gyur te/ bdag gis ni/ de ltar de dag mnyes par byas pas dge ba'i lus thob kyi/ sbyin gnas
170a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad nye bar na tsho bar bya'o/ /lus dang / srog la mi lta bar slob dpon la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /zhes shA ri'i bu/ sems bskyed pa drug pa de bskyed nas byang chub
170a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' slob dpon la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed de/ /tha ma chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher rab tu rtogs su gzhug pa'i
170b1(dkon brtsegs): phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /sdig pa'i grogs ni nga rgyal rgyags 'phel ba/ /bskal ba mang po rgya mtshor bsten pas na/ /mi yi nang du skyes kyang bran du 'gyur/ /'khor ba'i
170b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyun du yun ring dus su 'khor/ /mi lus rab tu rnyed par dka' ba yang / /de ni bdag gis dka' bas thob gyur te/ /gnas pa'i yul ni mthun pa bzang po dang / /sangs rgyas 'byung dang /
170b3(dkon brtsegs): dal 'byor de bzhin no/ /grogs po gang dag mchog tu rab bzang ba/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod dang lam stong cing / /byang chub sems ni rin chen 'phel byed pa/ /de dag bskal ba bye ba
170b4(dkon brtsegs): mang pos rnyed/ /lus ni nyam chung mi rtag mi brtan te/ /lbu ba rdos dang chu yi chu bur 'dra/ /sgyu ma lta bur gar la lta dang mtshungs/ /rmi lam mthong dang 'drid par smra ba bzhin/ /srog ni yun
170b5(dkon brtsegs): thung tshe yang zad par 'gyur/ /ji ltar sprin dang glog ni mi gnas ltar/ /skad cig tu ni de bzhin srog kyang 'gyur/ /snying po med pas snying po len par byed/ /gang gis 'das pa'i dus
170b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bskal ba yang / /rgya mtsho brgya phrag bsam yas bslus gyur pa/ /nga rgyal ri bo man+d+ha ra gzhom pa yi/ /dus dang tshod dang man ni nye gnas kyi/ /lus la sdug pa thams cad rab spangs
170b7(dkon brtsegs): nas/ /srog la chags pa med pa'i yid kyis ni/ /nga dang rgyags dang dregs pa spangs gyur nas/ /yon tan ldan la gus bcas rim gro bya/ /nga dang rgyags pa dregs pa spangs gyur nas/ /
171a1(dkon brtsegs): pha dang ma dang bu pho rnams dang ni/ /'jig rten bla ma mchog tu gang grags la/ /gus dang bcas shing mchog gi rim gro bya/ /byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mchog
171a2(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa/ /gang dag bdag dang byang chub mthun spyod la/ /dga' dang gus pa brtan pa bskyed bya ste/ /rim gro bya ba'i phyir ni brtson par bya/ /skye rgu nga rgyal ldan pa nga rgyal spangs/ /mi
171a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhas nga rgyal bcad cing 'dul ba'i phyir/ /ye shes rdo rje dag gis bcom byas nas/ /rgyags dang nga rgyal ri ni bsnyil bar bya/ /byang chub spyod pa yongs su rdzogs byas te/ /byang chub snying
171a4(dkon brtsegs): po mchog la gnas gyur nas/ /bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rtsod pa rnams brtul te/ /chu bo bzhi las srog chags bsgral bar bya/ /phyogs bcu dag na mi gang na ba rnams/ /rang gi mi
171a5(dkon brtsegs): gtsang bar lhung smad pa la/ /byams pa dang ni snying rje'i yid kyis su/ /mgon dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen 'gyur bar bya/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i dus la bab/ /sangs rgyas yon
171a6(dkon brtsegs): tan bslab pa bslab nus zhes/ /bzod pa bsgom par bya ba phun sum tshogs/ /mdud pa med pa'i brtson 'grus brtsam par bya/ /bsam gtan pha rol phyin thob phun sum tshogs/ /
171a7(dkon brtsegs): sems 'dul ba yi dus ni nye bar gnas/ /thabs dang shes rab mkhas la gnas gyur te/ /bla ma thams cad la ni bskor ba bya/ /de ltar bsod nams stobs dang gzi brjid spel/ /
171b1(dkon brtsegs): shes rab ye shes mkhas pa bsam mi khyab/ /rang dbang dam pa dag gis mngon 'phags te/ /byur bur yongs su bkang ba'i snod byin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed
171b2(dkon brtsegs): pa drug pa 'di bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul
171b3(dkon brtsegs): lo| |gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ bdag yun ring por dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing sdig pa'i grogs po dang phrad pas le lo can/
171b4(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus nyams pa/ snyoms las can/ blun pa/ lkugs par gyur te las nag po dang / nag po'i rnam par smin pa yang med/ las dkar po dang / dkar po'i rnam par smin pa
171b5(dkon brtsegs): yang med/ las dkar nag dang / dkar nag gi rnam par smin pa yang med/ mi nag cing dkar ba'i las dang / mi nag cing dkar ba'i rnam par smin pa'ang med do/ /zhes de ltar lta/ de
171b6(dkon brtsegs): ltar bzod/ de ltar mos pas dge sbyong dang / bram ze la btsun pa dag /dge ba gang / mi dge ba gang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang / kha na ma tho ba med pa gang / bsten par bya ba
171b7(dkon brtsegs): gang / bsten par mi bya ba gang / bya ba'i rigs pa gang / bya ba'i mi rigs pa gang / ci byas na/ yun ring por gnod pa dang / mi phan pa dang / sdug bsngal bar 'gyur/ ci byas na/
172a1(dkon brtsegs): don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur zhes mi 'dri ba dang / nga rgyal gyis zil gyis non pas sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas te mi dge
172a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di lta ste/ sbyin gnas thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba ma yin pa/ dbang po ma tshang ba'i mir gyur nas 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas mnyes par ma byas
172a3(dkon brtsegs): pas bdag mir gyur pa na yang long ba/ lkug pa/ blun pa/ sgur pa/ dig pa/ rmongs pa/ 'on par gyur te legs par bshad pa dang / nyes par bshad pa'i don shes
172a4(dkon brtsegs): par mi nus so/ /bdag gis ni/ da ltar mnyes par byas pas 'di lta ste/ dbang po tshang ba/ dge ba'i lus thob kyi/ sbyin gnas thams cad kyis nye bar 'tsho bar bya/ lus
172a5(dkon brtsegs): dang srog la mi blta bar bya/ legs par bshad pa dang / nyes par bshad pa'i don kun shes pa'i mthu yod par bya/ slob dpon la btsun pa/ dge ba gang / mi dge ba gang /
172a6(dkon brtsegs): kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang / kha na ma tho ba med pa gang / bsten pa gang / mi bsten pa gang / bya ba gang / mi bya ba gang / ci byas na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos
172a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon du 'gyur/ ci byas na/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos mngon du 'gyur zhes 'dri zhing / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi don gyi phyir slob dpon
172b1(dkon brtsegs): la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed de/ 'di ltar snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang ngo / /snyam nas tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs te/ bde
172b2(dkon brtsegs): bar gshegs pas de skad bka' stsal nas ston pas mang 'di skad gsung ngo / /phan pa 'dod phyir bskal pa brgya mang por/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su spangs gyur nas/ /dge dang mi dge
172b3(dkon brtsegs): kha na ma tho dang / /kha na ma tho med byas 'bras mi 'dri/ /lhag pa'i nga rgyal dbang du song ba ni/ /sems dmyal dud 'gro gshin rje'i dbang du song / /sdig sems grogs po bsten par byas pas
172b4(dkon brtsegs): na| |bskal pa brgya mang gis ni ngan 'gror 'phos/ /mi yi 'jig rten dbang po ma tshang gyur/ /bskal pa stong phrag mang por 'khyams pa'i lus/ /dge dang mi dge kha na ma tho dang / kha na ma
172b5(dkon brtsegs): tho med byas 'bras mi shes/ /rus sbal mgrin pa shing mig chud 'dra bar/ /mi yi lus ni shin tu dka' bar 'thob/ /dbang po dag ni tshang zhing skye mched dge/ /mi dal yongs su spangs
172b6(dkon brtsegs): nas dal ba rnyed/ /'jig rten sgron ma mdzad pa mnyes byas nas/ /rgyal bas bstan bcos 'dod chags bral ba thob/ /dge dang mi dge bya ba'i 'bras bu dag /'jig rten gtso la bdag
172b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dri dus la bab/ /'gro bar ser sna'i mir 'gyur ji lta bu/ /ji ltar sbyin bdag ser sna med par 'gyur/ /ji ltar g.yo ngan brkam pa tshul khrims 'chal/ /tshul khrims nor kun srung ba ji
173a1(dkon brtsegs): lta bu| |mi ni khro dang 'khrug par ji ltar 'gyur/ /khro med bzod pa'i stobs su ji ltar 'gyur/ /ji ltar le lo can dang g.yeng yid 'gyur/ /brtson 'phags bsam
173a2(dkon brtsegs): gtan dga' ba ji lta bu/ /ji ltar 'chal ba'i shes rab blun lkugs 'gyur/ /ji ltar shes rab ldan zhing bden gtam dga'/ /ji ltar byang chub spyod pa gcig sems pas/ /spyod pa
173a3(dkon brtsegs): bzang po thams cad tshol bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'gro ba kun la byams pa bgyid/ /ji ltar ngan song song ba'i sems can 'dren/ /ji ltar chos kyi dga' bas mi ngoms yid/ /byang chub
173a4(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa sde snod yongs su tshol/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rab 'byams zhing rnams na/ /'jig rten bla ma bzhugs par ji ltar 'gro/ phyag 'tshal bsod nams byed pa ji lta bu//
173a5(dkon brtsegs): kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa ci 'dra 'dri/ /slob dpon bla ma dag la bdag 'dri ba/ /de yi dus ni de ring nyer gnas te/ /bla ma'i gnas su gnas las nyan dga' ste/ /slob dpon yid
173a6(dkon brtsegs): mgu byed pa ji lta bu/ /sangs rgyas sras kyis sems 'di bskyed gyur nas/ /stobs dang bsod nams yangs pa'i blo gros can/ /nges par mchog gi ye shes stobs ldan pas/ dga'
173a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i yid kyis snod gang chu yang 'bul/ /shA ri'i bu/ sems bskyed pa bdun pa 'di bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi don gyi phyir slob dpon la rim
173b1(dkon brtsegs): gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ bdag yun ring por dge ba'i bshes gnyen
173b2(dkon brtsegs): dang bral zhing sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pas le lo can/ brtson 'grus nyams pa/ snyoms las can/ lkugs pas/ gsang tshig dang / yi ge dang / don dang tshig tu ldan pa dang / chos dang
173b3(dkon brtsegs): tshig tu ldan pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa dang / 'gog pa dang / zhi ba dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / dge slong dang / bram ze dang /
173b4(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa dang thams cad la bya ste/ de dag spangs nas don dang tshig tu mi ldan pa dang / chos kyi tshig dang mi ldan pa nas mya ngan las 'das pa dang mi ldan pa'i bar gyi tshig
173b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / yi ge de dag 'dzin pa dang / len pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ stobs med/ brtson 'grus med/ skyes bu'i stobs med/ skyes bu'i mthu med/ skyes
173b6(dkon brtsegs): bu'i rtul ba med/ spyod pa med/ rtul ba med/ spyod pa la mthu med/ rgyu med/ rkyen med de/ sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa yang rgyu med rkyen med par sems can kun
173b7(dkon brtsegs): nas nyon mongs par gyur te/ rgyu med do/ /rkyen med do/ /sems can rnams rnam par dag pa yang rgyu med rkyen med par sems can rnam par dag go/ zhes 'di ltar rgyu med par lta ba la gnas
174a1(dkon brtsegs): nas bdag gis mi dge ba'i las mang po mngon par 'du byas te/ las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di lta ste/ mi'i nang du sbyin gnas thams cad nye bar 'tsho
174a2(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin pa dbang po ma tshang ba'i mi'i lus thob ste/ de na bdag glen pa/ g.yeng ba/ dig pa/ lkugs pa/ rmongs pa/ blun pa/ long ba/ 'on par gyur pas/ gang tshig dang / yi
174a3(dkon brtsegs): ge dang / don du ldan pa nas mya ngan 'das pa dang ldan pa'i bar du de dag 'dzin pa dang / len pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa'i mthu med pas 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas mnyes par ma byas
174a4(dkon brtsegs): so| |bdag gis ni/ da ltar sbyin gnas mnyes par byas kyi/ lus dang / srog la mi lta ba'i bar du byas te gang tshig dang / yi ge dang / don du ldan pa nas mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i
174a5(dkon brtsegs): bar du 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid gzung ba nas kun chub par bya ba'i bar du nus kyi/ 'o na bdag gis brtson 'grus brtsams te/ 'di lta ste/
174a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid blang ba'i phyir lus kyis slob dpon la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton dang / bsnyen
174a7(dkon brtsegs): bkur byas te snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blangs par 'gyur/ bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi stobs kyis nye bar brtan pa byas par 'gyur te/ bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi
174b1(dkon brtsegs): stobs des nye bar brtan pas byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod 'di dang nye bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas ched du bsam ste slob dpon la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byad de/ tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul
174b2(dkon brtsegs): lo| |'di la de'i chos nyid ni/ 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /chos gang don dang ldan pa dang / /lam gyi yan lag lam sgom dang / /'gog pa mngon du byed pa dang / /mya ngan 'das lam snying
174b3(dkon brtsegs): po can| |chos de dag ni yongs spangs nas/ /gang chos phan pa med pa dang / /don dang tshig tu mi ldan pa/ /chos de dag ni bdag gis bsnyen/ /brtson 'grus dang ni snyoms med de/ /skyes bu yi ni mthu
174b4(dkon brtsegs): yang med/ /shin tu rtul ba mchog rnams dang / /de dag thams cad mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas dang ni chos kyang med/ /pha ma med de de bzhin du/ /dkar po dang ni nag po'i las/ /rnam par smin pa
174b5(dkon brtsegs): kun med ces/ /de 'dra'i sdig par lta ba dag /yang dang yang du bsnyen pas na/ /gcig tu mi bzad ma rungs pa/ /sems can nad dmyal bar yun ring gnas/ /de bzhin du 'gro'i skye gnas dang / /
174b6(dkon brtsegs): gshin rje'i 'jig rten sdig can te/ /nam tshe'ang mir ni skyes gyur kyang / /blun zhing lce ni med par gyur/ /g.yeng ba dang ni 'on par 'gyur/ /dig pa lkugs pa rmongs par 'gyur/ /yun ring
174b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dmyal ma rungs par/ /mi shes pas ni rab tu ltung / /dbang po thams cad phun tshogs shing / /bdag gi lus 'di rab mdzes pa/ /yun ring dus na bdag gis thob/ /'di ni bdag brtson
175a1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i dus/ /chos gang don dang ldan pa dang / /mya ngan 'da' ba'i grogs byed pa/ /byang chub lam dang byang chub la/ /bdag ni 'bad par bya ba'i dus/ /byang
175a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i sde snod ni/ /zab mo'i don dang ldan pa ste/ /bskal pa stong phrag bye bar yang / /de ni shin tu thob par dka'/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir/ /sangs rgyas chos mang 'di
175a3(dkon brtsegs): dang ni/ /gzhan yang bsam gyis mi khyab la/ /rab tu 'jug cing gzung bar bya/ /slob dpon la ni gus bcas shing / /bsnyen bkur dag ni byas pas na/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems
175a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams/ /thos pa de ni rnyed par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis/ /'di lta bur ni sems bskyed nas/ /rdza gang tsam gyi chu
175a5(dkon brtsegs): yang 'bul/ /shA ri'i bu/ sems bskyed pa brgyad pa 'di bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi phyir slob dpon la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na
175a6(dkon brtsegs): chu rdza gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ kye ma'o sems can de dag ni/ don med pas yongs su bskor ba lus dang / srog
175a7(dkon brtsegs): la lta ba'o/ /don gyis yongs su bskor ba ni/ lus dang / srog la mi lta ba'o/ /don med pas yongs su bskor ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus dang / srog la lta'o/ /byang chub kyi phyogs
175b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos rnams la mi lta zhing / nga yir 'dzin pa sngon du 'gro bas bdag sba ba dang / dril ba dang / mnye ba dang / bkru ba dang / brdzi bas yongs su bskor ba de ni/ don med pas yongs su bskor
175b2(dkon brtsegs): ba zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang don med pas yongs su bskor ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ lus dang srog la lta zhing nga yir 'dzin pa sngon du 'gro bas chung ma dang / bu pho dang / bu mo dang / mdza' bo dang /
175b3(dkon brtsegs): nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams sbed pa dang / dril ba nas yo byad dang / longs spyod thams cad kyi bar gyis yongs su bskor ba de ni/ don med pas yongs su bskor ba zhes bya'o/ /
175b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang nga yir 'dzin pa sngon du 'gro ba nas bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa'i mi sbed pa dang / mngag pa dang / kun tu srung ba de ni/ don med pas yongs su bskor ba zhes bya'o//
175b5(dkon brtsegs): de la don gyis yongs su bskor ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus dang srog la mi lta'i/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la lta zhing byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba'i lus kyi las dang / ngag
175b6(dkon brtsegs): gi las dang / yid kyi las kyis yongs su bskor ba de ni/ don gyis yongs su bskor bar zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang don gyis yongs su bskor ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ lus dang srog la mi lta'i/
175b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la lta zhing byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa'i bar gyis yongs su bskor ba de ni/
176a1(dkon brtsegs): don gyis yongs su bskor ba zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang don gyis yongs su bskor ba ni/ lus dang / srog la mi lta yi/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la lta zhing
176a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba'i sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don bya ba dang / don mthun pas sems can thams cad sdud pas yongs su bskor ba de ni/ don gyis yongs su bskor ba
176a3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang don gyis yongs su bskor ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ lus dang / srog la mi lta'i/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la lta zhing byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba'i dran pa nye bar
176a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam sgom pas yongs su bskor ba de ni/ don gyis yongs
176a5(dkon brtsegs): su bskor ba zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang don gyis yongs su bskor ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ lus dang / srog la mi lta'i/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la lta zhing byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro
176a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i pha ma dang / slob dpon la rim gro byed cing / bla ma'i gnas la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / 'dud pa dang / rab tu 'dud pa dang / gus par smra ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / ldang ba
176a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / thal mo sbyor ba'i las kyis yongs su bskor ba de ni/ don gyis yongs su bskor ba zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang don gyis yongs su bskor ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ lus dang / srog la mi lta'i
176b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la lta zhing byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba'i dkon mchog gsum gyi zhal ta byed pas yongs su bskor ba'o/ /de ltar kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni/ don med pas yongs
176b2(dkon brtsegs): su bskor ba/ lus dang / srog la lta'o/ /kye ma'o bdag ni/ don gyis yongs su bskor bas yongs su bskor gyi/ bdag da brtson 'grus brtsams la slob dpon la lus kyis rim gro dang /
176b3(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur bya ste/ de ltar na snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blangs pa dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi stobs kyis nye bar brtan pa byas par 'gyur te/ bsod nams dang / ye
176b4(dkon brtsegs): shes kyi stobs des nye bar brtan pas byang chub kyi snying po dang nye bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam pa de ni/ shA ri'i bu/ sems bskyed pa dgu pa 'di bskyed nas slob dpon la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed
176b5(dkon brtsegs): de| tha na chu rdza gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /byis pa so so'i skye bo kun/ /lus dang srog
176b6(dkon brtsegs): la lta ldan zhing / /byang chub phyogs la mi lta ste/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las kyang byed/ /so so'i skye bo de dag ni/ /bdag gi don dang chung ma'i don/ /bu pho dang ni bu mo'i phyir/ /don med pa la chags
176b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /dran dang las byed mngag pa dag /mi mkhas pas ni kun du mngags/ /rkang bzhi pa dag gso byed de/ /de dag don med chags par 'gyur/ /nor dang 'bru rnams rab gsog cing /
177a1(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa mi byed mi spyod de/ /don med chags pa de dag ni/ /gter gyi srung mar brjod pa yin/ /'di ni don med chags pa ste/ /so so'i skye bo de la chags/ /byang
177a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' blo ldan ni/ /don la chags shing brtson par byed/ /lus dang srog la mi lta yi/ /byang chub phyogs la lta byed cing / /rnam pa sna tshogs las byed pa/ /don la yongs su
177a3(dkon brtsegs): chags zhes bya/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims brtson 'grus bzod/ /bsam gtan shes rab de bzhin du/ /thabs dang rab tu ldan pa ni/ /don la yongs su chags zhes bya/ /pha dang ma la
177a4(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur byed/ /bla ma rgan rabs rjes su bskyangs/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi zhal ta byed/ /don la yongs su chags zhes bya/ /chos kun yang dag bsdus pa yi/ /byang chub sems
177a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sde snod 'di/ /glog cing rab tu ston pa ni/ /don la yongs su chags zhes bya/ /don la chags pa de dag ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa ste/ /de la brtson dang ldan pa ni/ /
177a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal sras 'jigs pa med pa'o/ /de lta bu yi sems bskyed nas/ /rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis ni/ /bla ma rnams la bsnyen bkur byed/ /snod gang tsam gyi chu yang 'bul/ /shA ri'i
177a7(dkon brtsegs): bu| sems bskyed pa dgu pa 'di bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi phyir slob dpon la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang
177b1(dkon brtsegs): 'bul lo/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni/ bka' blo mi bde ba ste/ slob dpon gyi rjes su bstan pa dang mi mthun par
177b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pas de dag khong du mi chud do/ /ci khong du mi chud ce na/ 'di lta ste/ slob dpon gyi nor khong du mi chud do/ /slob dpon gyi nor gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dad pa'i nor dang / tshul khrims kyi nor dang /
177b3(dkon brtsegs): thos pa'i nor dang / khrel yod pa'i nor dang / ngo tsha shes pa'i nor dang / gtong ba'i nor dang / shes rab kyi nor te/ de dag ni/ slob dpon gyi nor zhes bya ste/ de dag khong du ma chud pas na/
177b4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dbul ba zhes bya'o/ /bdag ni/ bka' blo bde zhing slob dpon gyi rjes su bstan pa dang mthun par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ shin tu bka' blo bde ba ste/ slob
177b5(dkon brtsegs): dpon gyi rjes su bstan pa dang mthun par 'dzin cing khong du chud par byed do/ /ci khong du chud ce na/ 'di lta ste/ slob dpon gyi nor ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i slob dpon gyi nor gang zhe na/ 'di lta
177b6(dkon brtsegs): ste| byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs so/ /slob dpon gyis byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa thams cad du bka' blo bde bar rig nas byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam
177b7(dkon brtsegs): grangs rgya cher ston to/ /rab tu ston to/ /rab tu 'chad do/ /rab tu gzhog go /rnam par 'grel to/ /rnam par 'byed do/ /gsal por go bar byed do/ /yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /byang chub sems
178a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sde snod la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ dbul ba yongs su chad pa khong du chud par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par
178a2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo/ /de de ltar sems bskyed de bka' blo bde zhing slob dpon gyi bstan pa dang mthun par 'dzin pa ni/ snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blangs par 'gyur ro/ /snyam
178a3(dkon brtsegs): pa nas slob dpon gyi rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed do/ tha na chu rdza gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ /shA ri'i bu/ sems bskyed pa bcu pa 'di bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub
178a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i sde snod yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la bsnyen bkur dang / rim gro byed de/ tha na chu rdza gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs te bde bar
178a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas de skad bka' stsal nas ston pas yang 'di skad gsung ngo / /bka' blo mi bde sems can gang / /mi drang sgyu dang g.yo ngan cing / /bla ma rnams dang mi mthun pa/ /tshig bzhin du ni
178a6(dkon brtsegs): byed mi 'gyur/ /bstan pa dang ni mi mthun zhing / /bka' blo mi bde shes gyur nas/ /drang srong nor ni gang yin pa/ /de ni de la mi ston to/ /dad pa'i nor dang tshul khrims nor/ /khrel yod ngo
178a7(dkon brtsegs): tsha shes pa'i nor/ /thos pa'i nor dang gtong nor dang / /shes rab nyid ni nor bdun pa/ /nor gyi rnam pa 'di dag ni/ /mi zad pa yi gter bdun te/ /snod ma yin par rig nas ni/ /de ni
178b1(dkon brtsegs): de la mi ston to/ /sems can gang dag rnam pa kun/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi snod gyur cing / /g.yo med tshig 'jam sgyu med la/ /bka' blo bde zhing rab mthun pa/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir/ /
178b2(dkon brtsegs): lus dang srog la mi lta bar/ /gus dang bcas pas chos 'dod cing / /brtson 'grus rtsom par rab tu sems/ /tshul 'di 'dzin par 'gyur pa yi/ /snod du rung bar rig gyur nas/ /chos kyi
178b3(dkon brtsegs): dbyings ni dbyer med pa/ /'dren pas yang dag rab tu ston/ /gang la byang chub gnas pa yi/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi snying po'i nor/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ni/ /rgyas par rab tu
178b4(dkon brtsegs): ston par byed/ /chos rnams thams cad bdag med de/ /mtshan med stong pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /srog kyang med cing 'gyur ba med/ /spros pa med de kun gzhi med/ /chos rnams thams
178b5(dkon brtsegs): cad rang bzhin gyis/ /ma skyes shing ni mtshan nyid med/ /byung ba med cing grub pa med/ /mtshan ma med pas phye ba ste/ /mi gang bka' blo bde zhing mi 'gal ba/ /bstan pa la ni rjes su
178b6(dkon brtsegs): mthun 'dzin pa/ /de dag la yang rgyal ba rang byung rnams/ /thar sgo slob shes rang gi spyod yul ston/ /dad nor tshul khrims nor dang khrel yod dang / /ngo tsha shes dang thos gtong shes rab
178b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / /de la nor 'di rnams ni kun 'gyed cing / /bdun po mi zad chos kyi mdzod kyang byed/ /mi 'ga' bka' blo bde zhing rjes su mthun/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen snyam du rtag bsam
179a1(dkon brtsegs): nas| |bla na med pa'i byang chub tshol ba'i phyir/ /bla ma dag la bdag gis rim gro bya/ /de lta bu yi sems ni bskyed byas la/ /snying rje dga' ba rgya cher rab
179a2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed de/ /kham snod dang ba'i chu yis bkang ba yang / /skom pa dag la nye bar sbyin par bya/ /shA ri'i bu/ sems bskyed pa bcu pa 'di bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems
179a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sde snod yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la lus kyis rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba des chos bzhi thob par 'gyur
179a4(dkon brtsegs): te| bzhi gang zhe na/ myur du dge ba'i chos la 'jug pa dang / slob dpon gyi bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur ba dang / nan tan gyis bsgrub kyi/ log pa'i nan gyis ma yin pa dang /
179a5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi phyir sdug bsngal gyi/ gzhan du phyogs par mi 'gyur ba ste/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' mir gyur pa na chos bzhi po de dag thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan
179a6(dkon brtsegs): yang chos bzhi thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ skye bo mang po'i rjes su bslab nas dkar po'i chos la gnas pa dang / sbas shing bzhag pa'i gnas skye bo mang po
179a7(dkon brtsegs): mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' bar byed pa myur du thob pa dang / sems dga' bzhin du nyin mtshan zad par 'gyur ba dang / kun nas ldang ba med par 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bde
179b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar gyur pa na chos bzhi thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lha'i
179b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gyi stan mchog rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / lha'i 'khor thams cad de'i gdong du blta zhing ci bshad pa de dag thos nas shes par bya'o/ /snyam du sems par 'gyur ba dang / lha'i
179b3(dkon brtsegs): dbang po brgya byin dang / de bzhin du lha'i bu gzhan yang de'i drung du 'ong gi /de lha'i bu gzhan gyi drung du the tshom yongs su 'dri zhing bcad pa'i phyir 'gro ba ma yin pa dang / de'i longs spyod
179b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi phyir gzhal med khang chen po 'byung ba ste/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos bzhi po de dag thob par 'gyur te/ lhar gyur pa dang / mir gyur pa na chos kyi sgo brgyad stong phrag dpag tu
179b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /de yi stan ni mthon por 'gyur/ /lha yis mngon par phyag byas nas/ /gang
179b6(dkon brtsegs): dag chos 'di 'chad pa la/ /lha rnams de la lta bar 'gyur/ /mkhas pa ser sna bral ba la/ /kun gyis bsti stang byas par 'gyur/ /brgya byin de ga na 'drir 'ong zhing / /gzhal med khang
179b7(dkon brtsegs): yang yid 'ong bzang / /lha yi 'jig rten gnas 'phos te/ /mi yi srid par 'ongs gyur nas/ /'khor los bsgyur ba ser sna med/ /rgyal po rdzu 'phrul chen por 'gyur/ /mi yi 'jig
180a1(dkon brtsegs): rten 'phos nas kyang / /lha yi nang du yang 'gro ste/ /bla ma dag la gus byas nas/ /nam yang sdug bsngal mi 'gyur ro/ /zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis su/ /bla ma dag
180a2(dkon brtsegs): la gus byas pas/ /gnas bzhi po ni de dag rnams/ /rgya cher rtag tu rnyed par 'gyur/ /dga' ba dang ni gus pa yis/ /snod gang tsam gyi chu byin na/ /lha dang mi dang klu rnams
180a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis| |mchod pa dag tu 'os pa yin/ / //bam po bcu pa/ de ltar gyur na/ gzhan yang chos bzhi thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sngon gyi las
180a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis skyes pa rab tu shes pa dang / de na dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su 'bri ba yang rab tu shes pa dang / de nas shi 'phos nas
180a5(dkon brtsegs): gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de yang rab tu shes pa dang / lha'i 'khor la chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang
180a6(dkon brtsegs): dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas lha'i 'jig rten nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ba ste/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i
180a7(dkon brtsegs): bu| byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ de lha'i gnas nas shi 'phos nas mi rnams skal pa mnyam par skye ba dang / de mir gyur na btsun par
180b1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa lnga thob par 'gyur ro/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de rigs btsun par skye bar 'gyur ba dang / gzugs btsun par 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims btsun par 'gyur ba dang /
180b2(dkon brtsegs): de'i 'khor btsun par 'gyur ba dang / de'i sems can btsun pa rnams la byams pa sgom par 'gyur ba ste/ shA ri'i bu/ btsun par byed pa'i chos lnga po de dag thob par 'gyur
180b3(dkon brtsegs): ro/ /gzhan yang mi byed par byed pa'i chos lnga thob par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de'i mdza' bo mi byed pa dang / lus myur du 'jig par mi 'gyur ba dang /
180b4(dkon brtsegs): de'i longs spyod yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub kyi sems dang bral bar mi nus pa dang / chos kyi mu ge 'byung ba na de la chos kyi lo legs par 'gyur te/ shA
180b5(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu/ mi phyed par byed pa'i chos lnga po de dag thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang ngo mtshar yongs su rdzogs pa'i chos lnga thob par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang
180b6(dkon brtsegs): snod stong pa/ gsog bzhag par gyur pa rnams su de'i lag pa gang du bcug pa de dag thams cad rin po ches yongs su gang bar 'gyur te/ ngo mtshar yongs su rdzogs pa dang po 'di thob par
180b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /de skom par gyur na yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu'i rdzing bu 'byung ste/ ngo mtshar yongs su rdzogs pa gnyis pa 'di thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang de'i lus la gzhan
181a1(dkon brtsegs): gyis gnod pa bya bar mi 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dug dang / mtshon dang / me dang / chu dang / mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin gyis gtse ba
181a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa ste/ ngo mtshar yongs su rdzogs pa gsum pa 'di thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang mtshon gyi bskal pa bar ma byung ba'am/ nad kyi bskal pa bar ma byung ba'am/
181a3(dkon brtsegs): mu ge'i bskal pa bar ma byung ba'am/ me'i bskal pa bar ma byung ba'am/ chu'i bskal pa bar ma byung ba'am/ rlung gi bskal pa bar ma byung ba'am/ skom pa'i bskal
181a4(dkon brtsegs): pa bar ma byung ba'am/ kun tu gdung ba'i bskal pa bar ma byung ba'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bskal pa bar ma byung ba na/ 'dzam bu'i gling du skye bar mi 'gyur gyi/ de ltar
181a5(dkon brtsegs): skye ste/ de bde ba dang / mthu dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / bde ba dang mthu mang bar 'gyur te/ ngo mtshar yongs su rdzogs pa bzhi pa 'di thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan
181a6(dkon brtsegs): yang shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis mi dal bar mi skye/ ngan 'gror mi skye/ sems la 'gyod pas kun nas dkri bar mi nus shing /
181a7(dkon brtsegs): nges par 'byung ba myur du mthong bar 'gyur te/ ngo mtshar yongs su rdzogs pa lnga pa 'di thob par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' ngo mtshar yongs su rdzogs
181b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos lnga po 'di dag thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis chos bzhi dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang
181b2(dkon brtsegs): zhen/ byang chub sems dpas sdug bsngal ba'i sems can mthong ma thag tu snying rje chen po thob pa dang / de la de'i bu dang bu mo gus pa dang bcas shing zhes byed par 'gyur
181b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / rga bas bcom yang brnyas par mi 'gyur ba dang / de las kyi mtha' gang byed pa de dag kyang nyis 'gyur sum 'gyur du thob par 'gyur ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag
181b4(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pas chos gsum gyi mi 'phrog ste/
181b5(dkon brtsegs): gsum gang zhe na/ chags pas mi 'phrog pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis mi 'phrog pa ste/ chos gsum po de dag gis mi 'phrog pa'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i
181b6(dkon brtsegs): bu/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pas nad med par byed pa'i chos bzhi thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ nad rgyun ring po med pa dang / yan
181b7(dkon brtsegs): lag skam par mi 'gyur ba dang / longs spyod nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / rgyal po'am/ rkun mo'am/ de ma yin pa'i sems can 'tsho bar byed pa gzhan gyis sdug
182a1(dkon brtsegs): bsngal ba dang / gnod par bya bar mi 'gyur ba ste/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' nad med par byed pa'i chos bzhi po de dag thob
182a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pas bla ma'i gnas bzhi thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'khor
182a3(dkon brtsegs): los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal zhing chos can chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni/ 'di rnams yin no/ /
182a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / blon po
182a5(dkon brtsegs): rin po che ste/ bdun po de dag go /de'i bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs can/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong tham par 'gyur ro/ /
182a6(dkon brtsegs): gling bzhi pa yang de'i rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/ de la gus pa byed par 'gyur/ skar mkhan dang / blon po chen po dang / sgo ba dang / 'khor dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang /
182a7(dkon brtsegs): ljongs kyi mi dag dang / khams kyi rgyal po thams cad kyis kyang gus par byed par 'gyur te/ bla ma'i gnas dang po 'di thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ byang
182b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la chags par mi 'gyur te/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mig gis shes par bya ba'i gzugs dang / rna bas shes par bya ba'i sgra dang /
182b2(dkon brtsegs): snas shes par bya ba'i dri dang / lces shes par bya ba'i ro dang / lus kyis shes par bya ba'i reg rnams te/ de ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po la chags par mi 'gyur gyi/
182b3(dkon brtsegs): dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste myur du mngon par shes pa lnga thob par 'gyur zhing / de la mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams gus par byed par 'gyur te/ bla ma'i gnas gnyis
182b4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ gang dang gang du skyes pa thams cad du blos mchog tu 'gyur/ shes rab kyis mchog tu 'gyur/ spobs pas mchog
182b5(dkon brtsegs): tu 'gyur/ de rgyal por grags par 'gyur ro/ /'di lta ste/ 'das pa'i dus na sman chen po zhes bya ba zhig byung ba de bzhin du de rgyal po'i pho brang gi stan mchog thob ste/ de la rgyal po dang /
182b6(dkon brtsegs): gang de ma yin pa gzhan skar mkhan dang / blon po chen po dang / sgo ba dang / 'khor dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang yul gyi mi rnams gus par byed par 'gyur te/ bla ma'i gnas gsum pa 'di rjes su thob
182b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
183a1(dkon brtsegs): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu
183a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ mngon par 'phags par 'gyur/ tshul khrims dang / ting 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas mngon par 'phags par 'gyur/ tshul
183a3(dkon brtsegs): khrims rnam par 'phel bas mngon par 'phags par 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba rnam par 'phel
183a4(dkon brtsegs): bas mngon par 'phags par 'gyur te/ bla ma'i gnas bzhi pa de thob par 'gyur te/ bla ma'i gnas bzhi po de dag thob par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpas 'di lta
183a5(dkon brtsegs): ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir mkhan po dang / slob dpon la chu bum pa gang tsam phul na/ de lta bu'i yon tan gyi chos tshad med pa len par 'gyur ro/ /tshur shog ces byas na'ang 'ong zhing /
183a6(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar smras pa las 'gal bar mi byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis yo byad bzhi thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ skye bo ma rabs kyi yo byad ma yin gyi/ rgyal po'i yo byad
183a7(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur/ drang srong gi yo byad thob par 'gyur te/ 'dod pa spang pa la 'dzud pa 'di lta ste/ dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ba de ni/ chos kyi yo byad ces
183b1(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gang dang gang du skyes pa na skye ba thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur te/ de skye ba dran pas skye ba de dang de dag tu byang chub kyi sems
183b2(dkon brtsegs): brjed par mi 'gyur ba de ni/ dran pa'i yo byad ces bya'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
183b3(dkon brtsegs): nas 'khor bzhis bskor cing mdun du bdar bar 'gyur/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye
183b4(dkon brtsegs): chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pas kun nas bskor cing mdun du bdar bar 'gyur te/ yo byad bzhi po de dag thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ byang
183b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' slob dpon gang dang gang las tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnyed cing 'dzin par 'gyur te/ de tshur shog ces bsgo na yang de 'ong / song zhig ces
183b6(dkon brtsegs): bsgo na yang de 'gro ba dang / 'di ni/ dge ba/ 'di ni/ mi dge ba/ 'di ni/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa/ 'di ni/ kha na ma tho ba med pa/ 'di ni/ bsten par
183b7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba/ 'di ni/ bsten par bya ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba nas gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ bya ba 'di ni/ gnod pa/ phan pa med pa/ sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba'o/ /'di byas na/ yun ring po'i don dang /
184a1(dkon brtsegs): phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes ji ltar bsgo ba bzhin du mi dge ba mi byed cing dge ba la brtan te slar mi ldog cing mi mthun par mi byed pa de
184a2(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang ldan pas mthon por byed pa'i chos bzhi thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims mthon por byed pa'i chos thob par 'gyur/ lus mthon por byed
184a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos thob par 'gyur te/ de'i lus ring zhing lus thams cad rgyas par 'gyur/ shes rab che bar 'gyur te/ shes rab mtho ba/ shes rab rgya che ba/ shes rab yangs pa/
184a4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab mgyogs pa/ shes rab rno ba/ shes rab myur ba/ shes rab zab pa/ shes rab nges par rtogs par 'gyur/ lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar
184a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ mthon por byed pa'i chos bzhi po de dag thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pas bltar mi snang bar byed pa'i
184a6(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa 'thob ste/ 'di ni/ bltar mi snang bar byed pa'i chos thob par 'gyur ba dang po'o/ /gzhan yang shA
184a7(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' skyes nas pha dang / ma dang / gzhan nye du rnams dang / lha dang / klu dang / dri za dang / gnod
184b1(dkon brtsegs): sbyin dang / srin po dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams dang / dad pa'i sems kyis kyang rung / ma dad pa'i sems kyis kyang
184b2(dkon brtsegs): rung ste/ sems can gang gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyi gtsug mthong bar mi nus te/ 'di ni/ bltar mi snang bar byed pa'i chos thob par 'gyur ba gnyis pa'o/ /gzhan yang
184b3(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pas skyes pa nas rgyas par bya ste/ pha ma nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis dad pa'i sems kyis kyang rung / ma
184b4(dkon brtsegs): dad pa'i sems kyis kyang rung ste/ gang gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i kha'i byi dor byed mi nus te/ de kha'i byi dor bya'o/ /snyam pa dang / rkang pa gnyis la kha'i sgo 'byung ngo / /de ci'i phyir
184b5(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ skyes bu dam pa de dag 'di lta bu'i ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi chos dang ldan zhing skyes bu dam pa'i ngag mchog dang ldan par 'gyur te/ 'di ni/ bltar mi snang bar byed pa'i
184b6(dkon brtsegs): chos gsum pa'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' skyes ma thag tu gzhan gyis ma bzung bar sa la 'dug nas
184b7(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bzhir rnam par blta ste/ de ye shes 'bar ba rnyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' des sngon g.yo med par thos pa btsal bas g.yo med pa'i mig thob ste/
185a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' g.yo med pa'i mig de dang ldan pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad
185a2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas mthong ngo / /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' myur ba'i tshe dang ldan pa'i ye shes chen po thob ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes chen po de dang ldan
185a3(dkon brtsegs): pas sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum gyi sems kyi tshul rab tu shes so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' des sngon don du gnyer bar byas/ yid la byas/ sems
185a4(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyis bsam zhing ri mor byas nas chos la sman du 'du shes pa dang / rin po cher 'du shes pa dang / dkon par 'du shes pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin du 'du shes bskyed de
185a5(dkon brtsegs): thos pa yongs su bzung ngo / /de bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' myur du rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i ye shes rnyed do/ /rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems
185a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems can thams cad kyi tshul khrims la yongs su 'jal ba nas thos pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong
185a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bar la yongs su 'jal lo/ /tshul khrims kyi spyir yongs su 'jal ba nas thos pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes
185b1(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba'i bar gyi spyir yongs su 'jal lo/ /sems can thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyu mthun pa la yongs su 'jal ba nas thos pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol
185b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i bar la yongs su 'jal lo/ /sems can thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyu mthun pa las shin tu lhag par yongs su 'jal ba
185b3(dkon brtsegs): nas thos pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i rgyu mthun pa las shin tu lhag pa'i bar la yongs su 'jal lo/ /sems
