215b6(dkon brtsegs): bas ni/ byang chub tu bya ba la g.yeng bar 'gyur ro/ /sems g.yeng ba la ni/ bdud sdig can bdud kyi las kyis bskul bar byed do/ /de la bdud kyi las gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lhung bzed
215b7(dkon brtsegs): la zhugs pa'i sems ni/ bdud kyi las so/ /chos gos la zhugs pa'i sems ni/ bdud kyi las so/ /grong du slong ba la zhugs pa'i sems ni/ bdud kyi las so/ /rnyed pa dang / bkur

216a2(dkon brtsegs): las 'dun pa zlog pa ni/ bdud kyi las so/ /dgon par gnas pa las mos pa zlog pa ni/ bdud kyi las so/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las 'dun pa zlog pa

216a5(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ khro ba dang / gnod sems tshol mod kyi/ shA ri'i bu/ ngas mngon par shes pa 'das pa'i dus na nga spyod pa'i spyod yul zhes bya ba'i drang srong du gyur te/ de na nga la bdud sdig
216a6(dkon brtsegs): c an gyis skyes bu lnga brgya gshe ba la dpa' ba mngon par sprul nas de dag lo lnga brgya'i bar du rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par nga'i phyi bzhin nyin thog thag tu 'greng zhing de dag mtshan mo yang
216a7(dkon brtsegs): gshe / nyin mo yang gshe /'gro yang gshe /'ong yang gshe /'greng yang gshe /'dug kyang gshe /nyal ba dang / 'chag pa dang / 'dug pa dang / grong du 'gro ba dang / srang na 'greng
216b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / khyim na 'greng ba dang / srang na 'dug pa dang / khyim na 'dug pa dang / dgon par song ba dang / dgon pa na 'greng ba dang / dgon pa na 'dug kyang gshe zhing mi snyan par zer te
216b2(dkon brtsegs): ngan du smra/ tshig rtsub po smra zhing thabs de lta bur gnas te/ de dag lo lnga brgya'i bar du phyi bzhin thog thag tu 'brangs par gyur te/ 'on kyang shA ri'i bu/ lo lnga brgyar gshe ba la dpa'
216b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i skyes bu de dag la byams pa nye bar sbyor bas lta ba las gzhan tha ba'i nyes pa bskyed pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig tsam yang mi shes so/ /de'i tshe nga 'di snyam du sems te/ gang
216b4(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de dag ni/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i chos can/ rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags chung ba/ zhe sdang chung ba/ gti mug chung ba ste/ bdag ni/ de dag nyi tshe'i don du dka'
216b5(dkon brtsegs): ba spyod pa ma yin/ de dag nyi tshe'i don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub pa ma yin gyi/ sems can gang dmu rgod gdul dka' ba/ tshul khrims 'chal ba/ sdig pa'i
216b6(dkon brtsegs): chos can/ rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags mang ba/ zhe sdang mang ba/ gti mug mang ba/ de dag gi don du bdag dka' ba spyad pa spyod/ de dag gi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
216b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sgrub ste/ de dag nyid bdag gis thog mar mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ sems sdang ba med pa la dran pa 'di skyes so/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs ba ni/
217a1(dkon brtsegs): phan pa'i dngos po phun sum tshogs pa ste/ sngon gyi mtha' nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing 'ongs pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
217a2(dkon brtsegs): gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'dod pa de dag gis bzod pa dang ldan zhing dang du len pa'i rang bzhin can du bya'o/ /grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / bkres
217a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / skom pa dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dang / sdig sbrul gyis reg pa dang / pha rol gyis ngan du smras pa dang / ngan du brjod pa'i tshig gi lam rnams
217a4(dkon brtsegs): la bzod pa dang ldan zhing dang du len pa'i rang bzhin can du bya'o/ /lus las skyes shing byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal ba mi bzod pa/ rtsub pa/ srog 'phrog pa/ 'chi ba la thug pa'i
217a5(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba rnams la bzod pa dang ldan zhing dang du len pa'i rang bzhin can du bya'o/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu/ bzod pa de lta bu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i
217a6(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa gang zhe na/ gnod sems med pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzod par blta'o/ /mi khro ba ni/ byang chub sems
217a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i bzod par blta'o/ /mi 'tshe ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzod par blta'o/ /rtsod pa med pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzod par blta'o/ /gnod par byed pa med ni/ byang
217b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i bzod par blta'o/ /gnod par bya ba med pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzod par blta'o/ /bdag rjes su srung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzod par blta'o/ /gzhan
217b2(dkon brtsegs): rjes su srung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzod par blta'o/ /lus rjes su srung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzod par blta'o/ /ngag rjes su srung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzod par blta'o//

217b4(dkon brtsegs): bral ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzod par blta'o/ /las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzod par blta'o/ /lus yongs su dag pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i

217b7(dkon brtsegs): par blta'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs sgrog pa thob pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzod par blta'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba
218a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad chud mi gson pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzod par blta'o/ /phas kyi gnod par byed pa thams cad las 'das pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzod
218a2(dkon brtsegs): par blta'o/ /phyir rgol ba thams cad bcom pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzod par blta'o/ /mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang /

218a4(dkon brtsegs): par blta'o/ /yang shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'di ltar brag ca'i sgra dang mtshungs par rab tu shes pas spyos kyang slar mi gshe'o/ /lus gzugs
218a5(dkon brtsegs): brnyan du shes pas brdegs kyang slar mi brdeg / sems sgyu ma lta bur rab tu rtogs pas khros kyang slar mi khro/ rang gi yon tan yongs su rdzogs pas de ma bsngags pa la khong khro ba
218a6(dkon brtsegs): med/ bsngags pa la rjes su chags par mi byed do/ /dul zhing zhi ba'i phyir rnyed pas dga' par mi 'gyur/ mi rnyed pas zhum par mi 'gyur/ rab tu brtags pa'i blo rgya che ba'i phyir grags
218a7(dkon brtsegs): pas ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin/ ma grags bas 'khrul bar mi 'gyur/ mi g.yo bar rab tu gnas pa'i phyir smad pas 'dud par mi 'gyur/ bstod pas khengs par mi 'gyur/ sems
218b1(dkon brtsegs): can la lta ba'i phyir sdug bsngal gyis yongs su mi skyo/ /'dus byas kyi bde ba mi rtag pa'i phyir bde ba la dga' ba med/ srid pa'i 'gro bar skye ba thams cad la mi gnas pas 'jig rten gyi
218b2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyis mi gos/ pha rol la mi gnod pas bdag la gnod pa bzod/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pas yan lag dang / nying lag dang / mgo bcad kyang bzod/
218b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dod pas lus gtubs kyang bzod/ legs par byas pa'i las kyi stobs bskyed pas ngan du byas pa thams cad bzod de/ shA ri'i bu/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i

218b5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bzod na/ de gnyi ga dmigs pa'i bzod pa ste/ de rab tu bzod pa ma yin no/ /yang 'di la gshe ba gang zhes bzod na/ de chos bgrang ba'i bzod pa ste/ de rab tu bzod pa ma yin no/ /
218b6(dkon brtsegs): ci mig gis mig la gshe'am zhes bzod na/ de skye mched la so sor rtog pa'i bzod pa ste/ de rab tu bzod pa ma yin no/ /'di ni/ yi ge yin no/ /zhes bzod na/ de brag ca'i sgra'i bzod pa
218b7(dkon brtsegs): ste/ de rab tu bzod pa ma yin no/ /'di yang mi rtag /bdag kyang mi rtag ces bzod na/ de mi rtag pa la 'jug pa'i bzod pa ste/ de rab tu bzod pa ma yin no/ /'di ni/ phyin ci log /bdag ni/
219a1(dkon brtsegs): phyin ci log ma yin zhes bzod na/ de mtho dman gyi bzod pa ste/ de rab tu bzod pa ma yin no/ /bdag ni/ rigs/ 'di ni/ mi rigs so/ /zhes bzod na/ de
219a2(dkon brtsegs): rigs pa ma yin pa'i bzod pa ste/ de rab tu bzod pa ma yin no/ /bdag ni/ lam la gnas/ 'di ni/ lam ngan pa la gnas zhes bzod na/ de gnyis kyi bzod pa ste/ de rab tu bzod
219a3(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin no/ /bdag stong pa nyid bzod kyi/ bdag lta bar song ba mi bzod/ bdag mtshan ma med pa bzod kyi/ bdag rnam par rtog pa mi bzod/ bdag smon pa med pa bzod kyi/ bdag
219a4(dkon brtsegs): smon pa yod pa mi bzod/ bdag mngon par 'du mi byed pa bzod kyi/ bdag mngon par 'du byed pa mi bzod/ bdag nyon mongs pa zad pa bzod kyi/ bdag nyon mongs pa mi bzod/
219a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag dge ba bzod kyi/ bdag mi dge ba mi bzod/ bdag kha na ma tho ba med pa bzod kyi/ bdag kha na ma tho ba mi bzod/ bdag zag ba zad pa bzod kyi/ bdag zag pa dang bcas pa

219b1(dkon brtsegs): la lta ba bsal ba'ang med/ stong pa nyid du sgro 'dogs pa'ang med/ gang stong pa nyid khong du chud pa de la rnam par rtog pa bsal ba'ang med/ mtshan ma med par sgro 'dogs pa dang med/ gang

219b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang med/ gong ma bzhin du thams cad la rgyas par bya ste/ gang stong pa nyid khong du chud pa de la 'khor ba bsal ba'ang med/ mya ngan las 'das par sgro 'dogs pa yang med de/ gang 'di la
219b6(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa de ni/ rab tu bzod pa zhes bya'o/ /gang ma skyes/ ma bskyed/ ma byung / byung bar ma gyur pa de la 'byung ba gang yang med do/ /'byung ba med pas mi zad de/ gang mi zad pa de rab tu bzod
219b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ /gang 'dus byas kyang ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyang ma yin/ sgro 'dogs pa'ang ma yin/ ma gzhag /ma spel/ yang dag par ma spel ba/ mi 'phrog pa/ mi gsog pa/ mi 'bri ba de la
220a1(dkon brtsegs): skye ba gang yang med do/ /gang mi skya ba de ni/ mi zad pa ste/ gang de ltar bzod na/ de ni/ mi skye ba la bzod pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ bzod pa 'di lta bu dang

220a3(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa ste/ 'di la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod de/ bdud dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / de ma yin pa
220a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi thub pa yin no/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u ste/ brgyad pa'o// //bam po bcu gnyis pa/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
220a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po gang la zhugs pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing / bdud dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / de ma yin pa gzhan phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi thul
220a6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ 'di ltar shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i brtson
220a7(dkon brtsegs): 'grus dang ldan pa yin te/ rang gi lus dang / srog la mi lta bar brtson 'grus drag po bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su tshol bar
220b1(dkon brtsegs): byed/ shin tu nyan par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ 'dzin par byed/ klog par byed/ kun chub par byed/ gzhan la yang 'chad par byed/ rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed/ bris
220b2(dkon brtsegs): nas 'dzin par byed do/ /de ji ltar na/ lus dang / srog mi lta ba yin zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'chang ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang

221a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can ji snyed pa sgo nga las skyes ba'am/ mngal nas skyes ba'am/ drod gsher las skyes pa'am/ rdzus te skyes pa'am/ gzugs can nam/ gzugs

221a3(dkon brtsegs): bsdu bar bsdus pa de dag thams cad yongs su brtag pa bzung ste skad cig thang gcig yud tsam la snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ de dag mir gyur nas thams cad kyi lag tu
221a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshon rnon po thogs te dgrar gyur nas tshig 'di skad ces 'di lta bu'i tshig dang / yi ge 'chang ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la 'chad pa dang / rgya cher yang dag par
221a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu ston pa dang / de bzhin du nan tan byed pa de dag nged kyis bzung ste srog gcad do/ /zhes zer na yang de la shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' dngang ba dang skrag pa skye ba'i sems
221a6(dkon brtsegs): gcig kyang mi bskyed kyi/ de bas lhag par dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol ba'i phyir ro/ /shA

221b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ba dang / tshul khrims dpa' ba dang / bzod pa dpa' ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dpa' ba dang / shes rab dpa' ba dang / spyod pa'i khyad par gyi ye shes dpa' ba zhes bya'o/ /de la shA ri'i bu/
221b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gang mtshon rnon po thogs pa'i dgra rnams la gnod pa'i sems gcig kyang mi bskyed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa dang mtshungs/ dbang po dang mtshungs/
221b3(dkon brtsegs): lhun po dang mtshungs te/ mi bsgul ba/ snying rje can/ byams pa la gnas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa gso ba la mos pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i spyod yul ba/ sems sa dang mtshungs

221b6(dkon brtsegs): b yas te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la sbyin pa byin pa bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis byang chub sems
221b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'di lta bu'i chos bdag gis bslab par bya'o/ /zhes sems la rab tu bzhag na/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' slob par 'dod
222a1(dkon brtsegs): pas ma bslab kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba ches mang du yongs su gzung bar 'gyur te/ sbyin pa chen po byin pas ni/ de tsam ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ bla na
222a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ 'di'i khar lus so/ /de bas na/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi rnam grangs

222a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa ni/ 'gro ba med pa'i 'gro bar 'gro ba'o/ /'gro ba med par 'gro ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ der bdud sdig can 'gro

222a6(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir zhe na/ brtson 'grus spyod pa'i lam du zhugs pa de ni/ de lta bu'i skyes bu dam pa dag dang / sangs rgyas rnams so/ /gang la la kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos can sems can thams
222a7(dkon brtsegs): cad ni| gnas gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ ngan song du gzhol ba dang / ngan song du 'bab pa dang / ngan song du bab pa ste/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / mang du thos pa ma gtogs
222b1(dkon brtsegs): par mngon par byung ba'i chos gzhan gang yang med do/ /kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni/ nga zhes zer ba'i tshig gi lam la gnas pa ste/ lam ma yin pa la gnas so/ /kye ma'o sems can 'di
222b2(dkon brtsegs): dag ni/ nga zhes zer ba'i brtson 'grus brtsams pa ste/ le lo can no/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa ni/ lam ma yin pa la gnas pa'i sems can le lo can dang mdza' bar mi
222b3(dkon brtsegs): byed| sten par mi byed de/ gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' mthun par spyod pa brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang sten par byad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan
222b4(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa las gzhan mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchog gang yang med do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par byang ba la mos shing brtson 'grus brtsams pa ni/ bdag gis lus
222b5(dkon brtsegs): 'ba' zhig nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs nas khong du chud par byed/ ston par byed/ skul bar byed/
222b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin du 'jug /'phags pa'i lam srang du 'dzud de/ de bas na/ skyes bu dam pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs
222b7(dkon brtsegs): so| |mdud pa med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis/ /rtag tu yang dag 'phags par 'gyur/ /mkhas pa byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /sde snod dag ni rtag tu 'dzin/ /chos rnams kyi ni don sems te/ /de
223a1(dkon brtsegs): dag blo ni bsam mi khyab/ /rnam par byang ba kun tshol ba/ /byang chub sems dpar brjod pa yin/ /shes rab chen po de dag 'bad/ /shing mchog drung du 'dug nas ni/ /
223a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs shes rab brtson 'grus kyis/ /sdig can bdud rnams skrag par byed/ /'jig rten kun gyi brda dag las/ /tshul khrims dag ni thams cad ston/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i
223a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir| |de la brtson 'grus nyams mi 'gyur/ /shA ri'i bu/ dus 'di lta bu dang / tshod 'di lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ gang nga dang khyod yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu lnga brgya tha
223a4(dkon brtsegs): ma la 'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'gro ba mang po dga' ba dang / mgu bar byed pa/ shes rab sgrub par byed pa/ bsod nams sgrub par byed pa/ longs spyod 'phel ba sgrub par byed pa/ mtho ris

229b5(dkon brtsegs): bar du gcod pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'di mchog yang dag 'di yin zhes/ /yang dag min la yang dag 'dzin/ /dam pa'i chos rnams smod pa la/ /bar du gcod pa mi 'byung ngo / /sangs rgyas la

229b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag de la bar chad rnams/ /rab tu 'jig pa byed par 'gyur/ /dge slong cha byad bsgyur byas nas/ /'di ni byang chub lam min na/ /ci phyir 'di la yongs rgyug ces/ /de ni rab tu 'gyod par byed/ /
230a1(dkon brtsegs): mdo sde 'di la rgyu yod de/ /snying po brtan par rab gnas la/ /'khrug par 'gyur ba bskyed byas nas/ /phyis ni rab tu spong bar 'gyur/ /bdud kyis kun nas
230a2(dkon brtsegs): bslangs gyur nas/ /ji ltar bde ba bzhin du bzung / /'di ni chos min zhes smras nas/ /des ni mya ngan 'das pa spangs/ /de dag ston pa btang nas ni/ /chos la don du gnyer ba med/ /bdag la
230a3(dkon brtsegs): sred pa bskyed byas nas/ /sems can dmyal bar myur du 'gro /gang dag chung du byung ba ni/ /stong pa'i chos rnams mi gnyer te/ /yul ni so sor gnas gyur nas/ /mi 'dum pa dang ldan
230a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /chos rnams kyi ni mchog 'di yang / /mnyan nas 'gal ba smra bar byed/ /dngangs shing skrag nas rab 'bros pa/ /phyi ma'i dus na byed par 'gyur/ /mi chung ba dag gzhan rnams
230a5(dkon brtsegs): ni| |ston par byed pa mi 'byung ste/ /yang dag chung ngur gyur pa rnams/ /de dag rnams kyang btang snyoms 'gyur/ /'jig rten mgon gyi bstan pa la/ /'di lta bu yi chos 'di yi/ /bar du
230a6(dkon brtsegs): gcod pa mang 'byung ste/ /me lce ci 'dra bzhin du 'gyur/ /de na rab tu nges pa rnams/ /srog bor dgon par gnas par 'gyur/ /chos 'di dag ni bsgoms byas na/ /myur du bde 'gror
230a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de la shA ri'i bu/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pas/ 'di lta bu'i mi bzod pa dang / mi bsngags pa dang / dam pa'i chos rab tu 'jig pa mthong nas
230b1(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus chen po'i stobs kyi shugs rab tu bskyed de/ 'di lta ste/ 'di lta bu'i mdo sde byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ yi
230b2(dkon brtsegs): ger bris nas bcad bar bya/ gzhan la yang go bar bya/ rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o/ /des kyang 'du shes bzhi bskyed par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gi pha'i nor gyi phung
230b3(dkon brtsegs): po 'di rab tu 'jig par 'gyur te/ gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa des bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
230b4(dkon brtsegs): stong phrag grangs med pa nas bzung ste dka' ba spyad pa yin na/ de'i phyir rab tu 'jig par 'gyur ba gzung bar bya/ kun nas rab tu gzung bar bya ste/ chud za bar mi bya'o/ /brtson 'grus brtsam
230b5(dkon brtsegs): mo| |'di lta ste/ dper na/ shA ri'i bu/ skyes bu zhig la bu gcig cig yod la byams sdug yid du 'ong zhing mi mthun pa med par snang ba de g.yangs chen por lhung bar gyur pa dang / des
230b6(dkon brtsegs): de lag gis bzung ste sems can dmyal ba'i g.yangs 'dir lhung bar ma gyur cig / ces 'dzin/ rab tu 'dzin pa de bzhin du shA ri'i bu/ gang skyes bu dam pa de dag nga la dad cing chos
230b7(dkon brtsegs): dkon mchog bla na med pa 'di yang yongs su mi gtong zhing / mya ngan las 'das pa la yang re bar 'gyur ba de dag de'i dus na dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur bas ngas de dag
231a1(dkon brtsegs): la byang chub mchog 'di gtad par bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ shA ri'i bu/ g.yul chen po'i nang na gang skye bo mang po bsrung ba'i phyir dmag gi mdun na
231a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dug par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni/ nyung bar 'gyur ro/ /yang shA ri'i bu/ gang dpa' ba/ 'os su gyur par byas pa/ g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba de dag de na g.yul mi bzad
231a3(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po'i dus na skye bo mang po'i phyir dmag gi mdun na 'dug pa de bzhin du shA ri'i bu/ de'i tshe dam pa'i chos rab tu 'jig par nye bar gnas pa na/ gang lhag pa'i bsam pas
231a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pa/ dpa' ba/ brtson 'grus brtan pa/ go cha sra ba bgos pa de dag brtson 'grus chen po'i stobs bskyed de/ bdud kyi dmag las rgyal zhing 'di
231a5(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i chos dkon mchog 'di las snying po cung zad tsam len par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yongs su spong ba la yang
231a6(dkon brtsegs): rjes su yi rang bar mi byed cing rtsod par mi byed la/ 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa yang dag pa'o/ /zhes skye bo mang po la sgrog cing shes par byed pa de ni/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs
231a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis legs par bshad pa la rjes su yi rang ba ste/ shA ri'i bu/ de lta bu'i gang zag rnams la bsod nams kyi rnam par
231b1(dkon brtsegs): smin pa chung ngo / /zhes nga mi 'chad de/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ skyes bu dam pa de lta bu ni/ shin tu dkon
231b2(dkon brtsegs): te| skyes bu mchog ces brjod do/ /skyes bu rab ces brjod do/ /skyes bu dpa' bo zhes brjod do/ /skyes bu chen po zhes brjod do/ /de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi phyogs so/ /de dag sder
231b3(dkon brtsegs): mi smra mi 'khrug go / de dag nan tan snying por byed pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ 'chi ba'i mtha'i bar du nan tan snying por bya'o/ /'chi ba'i mtha'i bar du dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bya'o/ /'chi
231b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mtha'i bar du stong pa nyid la mos par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ chos de bzhi dang ldan na/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig pa'i dus/ dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus/
231b5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims 'chal ba'i phyogs mang ba'i dus/ 'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i gsang tshig kun tu tshol ba mang ba'i dus/ bskal pa snyigs ma'i dus/ sems can snyigs ma'i dus/ tshe snyigs
231b6(dkon brtsegs): ma'i dus/ nyon mongs pa snyigs ma'i dus/ lta ba snyigs ma'i dus/ dus gsum la gnas par bya/ 'thab mo nye bar zhi ba la gnas par bya/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang 'bral bar mi

232a1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur te/ /rga shi zad par byed dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de la phyir zhing nyams par mi 'gyur te/ /bdag don skye mang don phan ldan par 'gyur/ /gang dag ngas
232a2(dkon brtsegs): bstan chos thos nas/ /tshul bzhin gnas par 'gyur ba dag /de yi ston pa nga yin te/ /de dag nga yi nyan thos yin/ /gang dag chos rnams thos gyur nas/ /tshul bzhin gnas pa ma yin pa/ /

232a4(dkon brtsegs): dbang song / / //bam po bcu gsum pa/ shA ri'i bu/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig tu gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
232a5(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha

232a7(dkon brtsegs): byed dang / dge byed dang / grags pa dang / mes byin zhes bya ba rnams byung ste/ bdag tu smra ba/ gang zag tu smra ba/ chad par smra ba/ rtags par smra ba rnams 'grogs bsdongs shing phan
232b1(dkon brtsegs): tshun du yid rton cing gnas pa de dag gis khrims 'di lta bu zhig byas te/ bdag cag re res kyang khyim brgya brgya gzung bar bya'o/ /khyim brgya yongs su rdzogs pa la der 'ongs te gcig la
232b2(dkon brtsegs): gcig bsnyad par bya'o/ /khyim nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu dang / brgyar ma grub pa la bsnyad par bya'o/ /zhes de lta bu'i khrims byas nas grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong

232b4(dkon brtsegs): la mi snyan pa ji skad zer zhe na/ khyim der phyin nas 'di skad ces smras te/ bdag yod do/ /sems can yod do/ /srog yod do/ /gang zag yod do/ /gal te bdag med du zin na/ 'ong ba su/ 'gro ba
232b5(dkon brtsegs): su/ 'grang ba su/ 'dug pa su/ nyal ba su/ smra ba su/ mi smra bar 'gyur ba su/ sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa su/ len pa su/ za ba su/ bde ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba so sor yang dag
232b6(dkon brtsegs): par myong ba su/ gang khyod la 'di skad du bdag med/ sems can med/ srog med/ gang zag med ces smra ba de ni/ khyed kyi mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ma yin
232b7(dkon brtsegs): no| |zhes zer ba dang / de la shA ri'i bu/ bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dag na re/ gang dge ba'i bshes gnyen ma yin pa de ni/ sdig pa'i grogs po'o/ /de'i phyir sdig
233a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i grogs por gyur pa de dge ba'i bshes gnyen ma yin no/ /zhes de skad smras pa dang / de dag gis de dag la khyed de ltar shes pa ni/ mkhas pa yin te/ sdig
233a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i grogs po gang yin pa de ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir gang khyed la 'di skad du bdag med/ sems can med/ srog med/ gang zag med ces zer ba la/

233a4(dkon brtsegs): b u| de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi nyan thos dge slong dgra bcom pa dri ma dang nyon mongs pa
233a5(dkon brtsegs): bsal ba dag grong du dong ste phyin pa dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dag gshe shing mi snyan pa zer/ tshig ngan pa rtsub pos spyos te tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad zer
233a6(dkon brtsegs): ro| |khyed ni lam la rmongs pa ste/ /chos shes pa ni byed ma yin/ /khyed ni chos las nyams pas na/ /thams cad sems can dmyal bar 'gro/ /de ltar dge slong de dag la tshigs su bcad
233a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dbyangs kyis gshe zhing mi snyan pa smras pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod cing slar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag cing / /chos kun la ni bdag med
233b1(dkon brtsegs): de| |rtag med ther zug med do zhes/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni chos bshad do/ /gso ba dang gsog dang stong pa dang / /'dus byas thams cad snying po med/ /brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can te/ /byis pa rtag tu 'drid

233b3(dkon brtsegs): myong gyur la/ /de dag ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bdag med par ni gang smra ba/ /de la shA ri'i bu/ gang skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'i tshig bzhin du

233b5(dkon brtsegs): par grub bo/ /mgo ni/ 'di lta bur 'di lta ste/ mi'i lta bur gyur pa'o/ /'di lta bu'i lce mngon par grub pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chang tshong gi re lde chen po lta bu ste/ de dag gi lce
233b6(dkon brtsegs): de la lcags kyi gshol mang pos rab tu rmos so/ /de dag gi lus re re la yang mdung thung brgya brgyas dmyal to/ /steng gi bar snang las kyang lcags kyi thu lum kun tu 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar ba/
233b7(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba/ 'bar ba dang bcas par gyur pa/ /'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa lus kyi steng du 'bab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
234a1(dkon brtsegs): gsungs so/ /glog lce rab tu 'bar ba'i mda'/ /brgya phrag mang po stong rnams ni/ /rtag tu lus la rab 'bab ste/ /mi dag na tsha myong bar byed/ /thams cad lus
234a2(dkon brtsegs): ni kun tu 'bar/ /me lce 'bar bar bsnyen pa dka'/ /dpag tshad brgya snyed gang ba yi/ /lus las me lce rab tu 'byung / /re re dag gi lce la yang / /de snyed gshol gyis rmo bar byed/ /

234a7(dkon brtsegs): rmos nas de dag gi lce bshags nas a na zhes 'dzar kyang mi nus so/ /de dag re re'i mgo la yang sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma bye ba phrag stong gnas shing mgul ba gcod par byed
234b1(dkon brtsegs): do| |de na de dag gcig gi tshe tshad kyang lo bye ba phrag stong du gyur to/ /de bzhin du sems can dmyal ba chen po gzhan dang gzhan dag tu tshor ba rnam pa mang po yang myong bar gyur to/ /de ci'i

234b5(dkon brtsegs): chad par lta ba mu stegs can gcer bu pa'i smra ba la bzhag par gyur to/ /de'i chung ma 'od 'phro can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po
234b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo / /de las bu zhig btsas pa yang gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa sangs rgyas bye ba khrag
234b7(dkon brtsegs): khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa zhig byung ste/ de btsas ma thag tu lan gsum du 'dzum mul zhes rgod nas bdag ni/ chad par smra ba'i rigs su skyes so/ /zhes de skad
235a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshig gi las smras pa dang / khye'u de'i mas sgra de thos nas dngangs skrag cing mi dga' ste/ spu zing zhes byed nas khye'u de bor te bros pa dang / bud med gzhan
235a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dus par gyur pa dag kyang byer ro/ /de nas shA ri'i bu/ bud med de dag ring zhig tu phyin pa dang slar log ste blta zhing lha'am/ klu'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'am/ lha ma yin nam /
235a3(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am ci'am/ lto 'phye chen po'am/ grul bum mam/ 'byung po'am/ sha za'am/ mi dang / mi ma yin pa'am/ 'di su zhig shes par bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /shA

235a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung gi ma 'jigs shig / khyed ni lam ngan zhugs pa las/ /ngas ni rab tu thar par bya/ /khyed rnams de las 'jigs par byed/ /dgra rnams kyis ni mdun du bdar/ /log par lta bar
235a6(dkon brtsegs): lhung ba las/ /ngas ni khyed rnams dgrol bar bya/ /shA ri'i bu/ de nas khye'u de'i ma dang / pha dang / skye bo phal po ches tshigs su bcad pa de dag thos nas khye'u de ga la ba der dong ngo / /de
235a7(dkon brtsegs): nas khye'u des rang gi ma dang / pha la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /nor dag dang ni 'bru dag rnams/ /khyim na rgya chen yod pa dag /myur du bdag la sbyin par gyis/ /bdag ni
235b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas nyan thos so/ /'jig rten gsum kun dkyil 'khor na/ /rnam gzigs 'jig rten snang mdzad pa/ /de 'dra ba ni gang yang med/ /bdag ni de yi nyan thos so/ /srog chags kun la phan
235b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir/ /chos rnams yang dag rab ston gang / /rnam gzigs 'jig rten snang mdzad pa/ /bdag ni de yi nyan thos so/ /gang gi sku la skyes chen gyi/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba/ /rnam gzigs
235b3(dkon brtsegs): gzigs 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad/ /bdag ni de yi nyan thos so/ /bskal pa bye ba phrag stong du/ /u dum wa ra'i me tog ltar/ /yang dag shin tu thos dka' ba/ /bdag ni de yi nyan thos so/ /
235b4(dkon brtsegs): de ltar shA ri'i bu/ khye'u de'i pha dang mas gser bye ba phrag nyi shu byin nas khye'u/ 'di ni/ khyod kyi pha ma'i nor yin gyi/ gang la sems dad par gyur pa de la sbyin pa byin cig /ces de skad
235b5(dkon brtsegs): smras nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/ /'di ni khyod kyi pha yi nor/ /'di ni khyod kyi ma yi nor/ /gang du sems ni dad par gyur/ /khye'u yis sbyin pa byin par gyis/ /dbyig
235b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang ni gser gyi rnams/ /khyim 'di na ni yod pa dag /de dag myur du khyer gyis te/ /gang du sems dad der phul cig /mal cha dang ni gding ba dang / /byug pa phreng ba spos kyi rnams/ /dga'
235b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du ni khyer gyis la/ /gang du sems dang dbul byos shig /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun ni/ /bla na med pa'i bsod nams zhing / /srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /de dag la ni
236a1(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa byin/ /shA ri'i bu/ de nas khye'u des rang gi pha dang / ma la slar tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rnam par gzigs pa 'jig rten mgon/ /de
236a2(dkon brtsegs): yi drung du bdag mchi ste/ /srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /shin tu rgyas pa'i mchod pa bgyi/ /lha rnams dang ni mi dag las/ /gang dag bde ba 'dod pa rnams/ /bdag ni gang du 'gro
236a3(dkon brtsegs): ba yi| |rjes bzhin du ni kun shog cig / shA ri'i bu/ de nas khye'u des shes bzhin du phyogs bzhir bltas nas rang gi pha ma la kye yab yum/ bdag ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
236a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs de ga la ba der mchi'o/ /zhes skad smras pa dang / de na skye bo mang pos thos nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/
236a5(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar na skyes nas nyin zhag gcig kho na lon pa'i khye'u pha ma la smra zhing rkang gis 'gro ba zhig go /snyam nas de na srog chags bye ba brgyad khri bzhi stong 'dus par gyur te/ khye'u
236a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di lha'am/ klu'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi'am ci'am/ mi'am/ mi ma yin pa'am/ gang yin shes par bya'o/ /snyam mo//
236a7(dkon brtsegs): de nas khye'u de srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par
236b1(dkon brtsegs): gzigs ga la ba der dong ngo / /yang shA ri'i bu/ khye'u de 'gro ba na steng gi bar snang las gdugs stong phrag bcu byung nas de dag gis de'i lus bskyabs te/ de'i lus la rlung dang / nyi mas gnod
236b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'am gyur par byed do/ /yang khye'u de 'gro ba na steng gi bar snang las gser gyi dra ba bres par gyur to/ /yang khye'u de 'gro ba na lha'i las kyang 'das pa'i me tog gi char dang / phye ma'i char
236b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bab bo/ /yang khye'u de 'gro ba na bsil ba'i rlung lha'i dri dang ldan pa langs so/ /yang khye'u de 'gro ba na lam spos chus btab par gyur to/ /yang khye'u de 'gro ba na lam gser gyi glegs
236b4(dkon brtsegs): mas g.yogs par gyur to/ /yang khye'u de 'gro ba na lam pus mo nub tsam du lha'i me tog chal bar bkram par gyur to/ /yang khye'u de 'gro ba na rdzing bu stong phrag du ma byung ste/ rdzing bu de dag kyang
236b5(dkon brtsegs): yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba la me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar pos khebs shing ngur pa sgra 'byin par gyur to/ /yang khye'u de 'gro ba na lam
236b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi mu rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu dkrigs par gyur to/ /yang khye'u de 'gro ba na lha'i sil snyan mang po 'khrol bar gyur to/ /yang khye'u de 'gro ba na lam gyi g.yas g.yon rin po ches kun tu
236b7(dkon brtsegs): brgyan par gyur to/ /yang khye'u de 'gro ba na mdun du me tog gi srang zhig byung bar gyur te/ de la rkang pa 'dor zhing / bteg pa dang mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas khye'u de yud tsam zhig lam du 'phags
237a1(dkon brtsegs): te slar bltas nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ rigs pa mi rigs nam yang mi 'grogs te/ nga lam rgya chen tshul ni gud na yod/ khyod ni mi rigs nga ni rigs
237a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ste| |rigs pas rgyal ba'i drung du 'gro bar bya/ /bskal pa khrag khrig mang po 'das kyang ni/ /brgya lam dag na mi yi lus thob cing / /brgya lam dag na sangs rgyas 'byung 'gyur te/ /dad
237a3(dkon brtsegs): dang shes rab dag kyang brgya lam thob/ /shA ri'i bu/ khye'u des tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras ma thag tu de nas steng gi bar snang las lha bye ba brgyad khri bzhi stong gis legs so/ /zhes
237a4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba byin te/ legs so legs so shes rab che/ /khyod kyis smras pa mchog yin gyi/ /mi rigs rnams ni phyi nas 'ong / /grogs po rigs pa khyod bzhud cig /shA ri'i bu/ de nas khye'u
237a5(dkon brtsegs): des lha rnams la slar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyod kyis rigs zhes smras pa dang / /khyod kyis mi rigs zhes smras pa/ rigs pa'i don ni ji lta bu/ /mi rigs don kyang ji lta bu/ /
237a6(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu/ de nas lha de dag gis khye'u de la slar tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod gang gnas pa/ /de dag mngon byung spyod yul min/ /de dag mi rigs
237a7(dkon brtsegs): rmongs pa ste/ /de dag sems can dmyal la gnas/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod spangs byas nas/ /khyim med par ni rab byung ba/ /'jig rten 'di na de dag rigs/ /de dag rigs zhes rab
237b1(dkon brtsegs): tu bshad/ /shA ri'i bu/ de nas khye'u des lha de dag la slar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ji ltar rigs zhes bya ba de/ /khyed kyis de ni mi shes so/ /ji ltar mi rigs zhes bya ba/ /ngas ni de
237b2(dkon brtsegs): dag rab tu shes/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu/ khye'u de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
237b3(dkon brtsegs): te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /'jig
237b4(dkon brtsegs): rten dag gi don phyir spyod/ /rigs gsum bdud rtsi rab sbyin pa/ /glang po chen po seng+ge che/ /rtag tu khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten snang mdzad shin tu dkon/ /'jig rten mgon po 'od
237b5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa/ /u dum wa ra'i me tog bzhin/ /kha dog ldan zhing dbyibs mdzes pa/ /'jig rten 'di ni nye bar gces/ /'phags pa'i lam la mi mkhas te/ /sa yi steng na dmus long bzhin/ /lam
237b6(dkon brtsegs): ngan par ni rab tu rgyug / mi mchog khyod ni ci 'dra bar/ /bdag ni 'jig rten sangs rgyas gyur/ /me gsum dag gis tshig pa yi/ /sdug bsngal pa las sems can dgrol/ /srog chags brgya
237b7(dkon brtsegs): po 'di kun yang / /bdag gi slad du mchis pa lags/ /'di dag la ni chos bstan cing / /byang chub mchog la dgod du gsol/ /de nas shA ri'i bu/ khye'u des tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol
238a1(dkon brtsegs): n as bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs chos ston pa de la de skad ces gsol pa
238a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la 'di
238a3(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cing / 'di lta ste/
238a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs chos ston pa bzhin du chos ston par gyur cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag

238a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de na bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas kha dog du ma/ kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od zer 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang /
238a7(dkon brtsegs): dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu byung ste/ de dag gis mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas khyab par byas nas
238b1(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par song ste/ nyi ma dang / zla ba'i gzi brjid spa bkong nas slar log ste bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
238b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la lan brgya stong phrag du mar bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das de'i gtsug tu mi snang bar gyur to/ /shA ri'i bu/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

238b4(dkon brtsegs): phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan

238b6(dkon brtsegs): mdzes shing shin tu dkon byung ba/ /rnam gzigs sangs rgyas mchog la bdag zhu'o/ /rgyu ma mchis shing rkyen ma mchis par ni/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ /'jig rten phan pa

239a1(dkon brtsegs): nyan 'tshal na/ /de dag thugs brtse'i slad du mgon pos gsungs/ /khyod ni srog chags kun gyi mig lags te/ /khyod ni gnas skyabs mgon dang dpung
239a2(dkon brtsegs): gnyen lags/ /khyod ni srog chags kun gyi the tshom gcod/ /'jig rten phan par mdzad cing thugs brtse ba/ /khyod kyis 'das la rtag tu ye shes 'jug /khyod kyis ma 'ongs thams cad rab tu
239a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen| |sangs rgyas zhing na cung zad ci mchis pa/ /byung ba dag la'ang the tshom mi mnga' 'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dus gsum ye shes ldan/ /chos kyi rje ni thams cad 'dzin pa'i gsung //
239a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mgon po 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di/ /rgyu rkyen gang lags bdag ni khyod la zhu/ /khyod kyis 'dir ni the tshom thams cad chod/ /khyod ni chos kun la yang the tshom med/ /yan lag
239a5(dkon brtsegs): brgyad dang ldan pa'i gsung 'byin cing / /srog chags mya ngan zug rngu bsal du gsol/ /rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba'i sems rgyas nas/ /sor mo bcu rnams thal mo rab sbyar te/ /'dzum pa
239a6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad 'di rgyu rkyen gang lags pa/ /chos rje khyod la bdag ni de zhu 'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

239b1(dkon brtsegs): bar gshegs pa/ mthong lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ dge slong / khye'u 'dis rdzogs pa'i byang chub btsal ba'i phyir sngon 'das pa'i dus na sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug
239b2(dkon brtsegs): cu rtsa bzhi la chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad kyis bsti stang byas/ bla mar byas/ rim gro byas/ mchod pa byas so/ /de nas khye'u 'dis rdzogs

241a6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ni/ dpag tshad brgyar 'gyur ro/ /de'i nyan thos bye ba phrag brgya dang / bye ba khrag khrig dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi 'dus pa 'byung ste/ de'i nyan thos bye ba ni/ dgra bcom pa 'ba'
241a7(dkon brtsegs): zhig ste| zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/ mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ shA ri'i bu/
241b1(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa de dag dkon mchog gsum 'dus pa thob pa yongs su brjod pa 'byung ba de snyed kyi de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun 'byung ste/ thams cad kyang sngon mar gyur pa sha stag go /

241b5(dkon brtsegs): d pa' chen pos rjes su dran pa'i sems bskyed de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la brtson 'grus rab tu brtsam par bya bar grangs kyis bgrang ba de snyed du btsal zhing bskal pa
241b6(dkon brtsegs): de snyed du ni 'khor bar bya'o/ /bskal pa de snyed du ni 'khor bar mi bya'o/ /zhes de ltar mi bya'i/ shA ri'i bu/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgo bar bya ste/ 'khor ba'i mtha' ma'i mtha'
241b7(dkon brtsegs): ji tsam par bdag 'khor bar bya'i/ yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ byang chub kyi phyir brtson 'grus lhod par mi bya ste/ brtson 'grus mi ldog pa/ rtul ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub
242a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i brtson 'grus rtul ba gang zhe na/ brtson 'grus rtul ba ma nyams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
242a2(dkon brtsegs): khams mes yongs su gang ba la brgal zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la blta ba'i phyir 'gro bar spro ba de ni/ byang chub sems
242a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i brtson 'grus rtul ba ma nyams pa'o/ /dam pa'i chos nyan pa'i phyir stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mes yongs su gang ba la brgal zhing yongs su brtag
242a4(dkon brtsegs): pa bzung ste brgal zhing 'gro bar spro ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus rtul ba ma nyams pa'o/ /gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mes yongs su gang

242a6(dkon brtsegs): 'grus rtul ba ma nyams pa ni/ gang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir rtul ba bskyed pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus rtul ba ma nyams pa ni/ gang gzhan yongs
242a7(dkon brtsegs): su mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir rtul ba bskyed pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus rtul ba ma nyams pa ni/ mi lhod pa dang / brtan pa dang / mi ldog pa
242b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / bsam pa dge ba dang / snying rje chen pos rab tu non pas rtag tu sems can gyi don la brtson cing rtul ba bskyed pa'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus rtul
242b2(dkon brtsegs): ba ma nyams pa ni/ gang gom pa 'deg cing 'dor ba na yang byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ste/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun mngon sum du byed cing sems can la lta yang nyon mongs
242b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dbang gis mi 'gro ba'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus rtul ba ma nyams pa ni/ gang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems skyes shing byung ba rnams byang chub tu bsngo ba ste/
242b4(dkon brtsegs): de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de mi zad par 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen por song ba'i chu ni/ bar ma dor chud za bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub tu bsngos
242b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang bar ma dor zad par mi 'gyur te/ de'i phyir brtson 'grus rtul ba ma nyams pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus rtul ba ma nyams
242b6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par zhugs pa ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sdud cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i rnam pa mngon par sgrub pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sdud pas de'i phyir brtson 'grus rtul ba ma nyams pa zhes bya'o/ /
242b7(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni/ 'di ltar slob ste/ sems can rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed pa dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed pa
243a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed pa dang / bsod nams de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i ba spu'i khung bu
243a2(dkon brtsegs): gcig yongs su 'grub bo/ /ba spu'i khung bu thams cad du gtogs pa ji snyed pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po de dag thams cad kyis ni/ gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byas na 'grub par
243a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /de lta bu'i mchod sbyin brgyas ni/ sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gcig mngon par 'grub bo/ /de ltar 'jug pas mtshan thams cad kyang mngon par 'grub bo/ /mtshan thams
243a4(dkon brtsegs): cad du gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de dag gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu yongs su 'grub bo/ /mdzod spur
243a5(dkon brtsegs): gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed pa de las/ brgya phrag stong du bsgres pa'i bsod nams kyi phung pos ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu'i gtsug tor bltar mi mthong
243a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i skyes bu chen po de'i mtshan mngon par 'grub bo/ /gtsug tor du gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed pa de las bye ba brgya stong du bsgres pa'i bsod nams kyi phung pos ni/ de
243a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dung yongs su 'grub ste/ mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dung des mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar mdzad de/
243b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi dbang po ji lta bur mos shing 'dul ba bzhin du tshim par mdzad do/ /de ltar dka' bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'grub kyang bdag gdon mi za
243b2(dkon brtsegs): bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byas te/ mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs kyis go bar bya'o/ /zhes spro
243b3(dkon brtsegs): zhing go cha mi 'dor ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus rtul ba ma nyams pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus rtul ba ma nyams pa ni/ gang stong gsum
243b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes dang ldan par gyur pas ni/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes dang ldan pa de'i brgya'i
243b5(dkon brtsegs): char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi cha'am/ brgya phrag stong gi cha'am/ char ram/ bgrang bar ram/ rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /gong ma bzhin du sbyar te de ltar gang stong gsum gyi stong chen
243b6(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad rgyun du zhugs pa'i ye shes dang ldan par gyur pa dang / de dag lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i ye shes dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin du phyir mi
243b7(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba'i ye shes dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin du dgra bcom pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin du bskal pa brgyas 'byung ba'i byang
244a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin du phyir mi ldog pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin du skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ste/ rgyas par mtha' yas
244a2(dkon brtsegs): mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes dang ldan par gyur pa de dag gis ni/ de bzhin
244a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi char ram/ brgya phrag stong gi char ram/ grangs su'am/ char ram/ bgrang
244a4(dkon brtsegs): bar ram/ rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /ye shes la 'jug pa 'di thos nas mi dngang / mi skrag /skrag par mi 'gyur zhing ye shes de la 'jug par mos pa bskyed de/ brtson 'grus rtsom
244a5(dkon brtsegs): zhing bri dang / rgyus pa dang / rus pa dang / pags pa dang / sha dang / khrag dang / lus yongs su bskams par gyur kyang bla'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ma thob kyi bar du brtson 'grus
244a6(dkon brtsegs): nyams par mi 'gyur ba de ni/ brtson 'grus rtul ba ma nyams pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar slob ste/ sems can thams cad kyi 'das pa'i sems
244a7(dkon brtsegs): ji snyed pa de dag sems can gcig gi sems gcig tu zhugs par gyur la/ de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sems de tsam du tshad med cing mang bar gyur te/ gang sems can thams
244b1(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis gang ba'i sems de dag sems can gcig gi sems gcig la 'jug par gyur la/ rnam grangs
244b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dis sems can thams cad de snyed kyi nyon mongs pa mang po tshad med par gyur kyang de la bdag gis de 'dra ba'i shes rab dang / ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su btsal bar bya/ 'bad par bya/
244b3(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus brtsam par bya ste/ ji ltar brtson 'grus brtsams pas sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags kyi kun tu gdung ba dang / zhe sdang gi kun tu gdung ba dang / gti mug gi kun tu
244b4(dkon brtsegs): gdung ba de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya/ dug med par bya/ gzhol bar bya/ dgrol bar bya/ thal bar bya/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la rab tu dgod par bya'o/ /snyam du gang de la
244b5(dkon brtsegs): rtul ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus rtul ba ma nyams par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus rtul ba ma nyams pa ni/ gang lus kyi las dge
244b6(dkon brtsegs): ba la gnas pa dang / ngag gi las dge ba la gnas pa dang / yid kyi las dge ba la gnas pa dang / brtson 'grus gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad lus dang / ngag dang / sems
244b7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'o/ /lus dang ngag gi brtson 'grus bas sems kyi brtson 'grus nyid mchog ces bya'o/ /de la sems kyi brtson 'grus gang zhe na/ gang sems kyi 'jug pa dang / gnas pa'o/ /
245a1(dkon brtsegs): de la sems kyi 'jug pa gang zhe na/ gang byang chub la rtsol ba'o/ de la sems kyi gnas pa gang zhe na/ gang byang chub kyi sems nye bar ma zhi ba'o/ /de la 'jug
245a2(dkon brtsegs): pa gang zhe na/ gang sems can thams cad la snying rje che ba'o/ /de la gnas pa gang zhe na/ gang bdag med pa la bzod pa'o/ /de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/ gang sems can thams cad sdud
245a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'o| |de la gnas pa gang zhe na/ gang sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa'o/ /'jug pa ni/ 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba'o/ /gnas pa ni/ khams gsum mi dmigs pa'o/ /

247a1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta bu'i chos 'di ni/ mtho ris las nyams par 'gyur ba'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta bu'i chos 'di ni/

248a5(dkon brtsegs): bo mang po la gshe shing brgyad de tshig ngan pa rtsub pos spyod de/ 'phyas 'dogs shing 'thing slad byed de/ ngag gi nyes par spyod pa de dang ldan pas ngan song du 'jigs su rung ba'i lus
248a6(dkon brtsegs): 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ chos lnga po 'di dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa ni/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par mi byed/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la yang mi brten/

248b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag gsungs so/ /las ni rnam pa 'di lta ste/ /des ni shes rab mi 'phel 'gyur/ /blo yang myur du ma rung 'gyur/ /mi mchog rnams ni mnyes mi byed/ /de ni sems can slu ba ste/ /pho brang
248b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gyi bkrabs pa ltar/ /mi dge rtsa ba de dag gis/ /'jig rten mgon po mi mthong ngo / /bdag gis phrogs shig longs shig ces/ /sems can rnams la 'jigs bskyed de/ /nyes pa'i las
248b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams byas gyur nas/ /mi mchog rnams ni mnyes mi byed/ /dge slong dang ni dge slong ma/ /tshul khrims nyams byas sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas mang po mnyes mi byed/ /de la dal ba rnyed
248b5(dkon brtsegs): par dka'/ /pha dang ma dang chung ma rnams/ /chos spyod pa yi gegs byed de/ /myur du chos kyang mi thos shing / /gti mug gis ni bsgribs par 'gyur/ /rab tu 'byung bar 'gro ba la/ /bar du gcod
248b6(dkon brtsegs): par byas gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas mang po mnyes mi byed/ /de la dal pa mi 'byung ngo / /gang du stong pa nyid bsngags pa/ /'di lta bu yi chos thos nas/ /khro ba dag ni nyer len cing / /'di ni chos min
248b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes kyang smra/ /bar chad 'di dag thams cad kyis/ /bcu drug char yang mi 'gro'o/ /dam pa'i chos la smad byas nas/ /dmus long rab tu sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des mi
249a1(dkon brtsegs): mthong / /mthong du zin kyang dad mi 'gyur/ /bud med ma ning dmus long dang / /khyi dang bong bu rnams su 'gyur/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas byang chub dang / /byang chub
249a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' dga' ba dag / bar du gcod pa rnams spangs nas/ /bzang po dag gi lam rnams sgom/ /pha dang ma ni chos 'di la/ /yang dang yang du sbyor ba dang / /sems can thams cad
249a3(dkon brtsegs): rab 'byung bar/ /myur ba nyid du len du bcug /ma ni chos la sbyar byas na/ /myur du bzang po'i 'gro bar 'gro /rab tu 'byung bar bsngags pas na/ /myur du byang chub rnam 'tshang rgya/ /shA
249a4(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu/ rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chos lnga dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par mi byed/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mi brten/ dal ba phun sum tshogs pa
249a5(dkon brtsegs): yang mi 'thob/ ji ltar bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang chud za bar byed/ sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang rjes su slob par mi 'gyur
249a6(dkon brtsegs): te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'chal ba'i tshul khrims la spyod pa dang / dam pa'i chos la
249a7(dkon brtsegs): smod pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa la chags pa dang / bdag tu lta ba'i thibs po dang / gzhan gyi khyim la phrag dog dang / ser sna bskyed pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/
249b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par mi byed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mi brten pa dang / gong ma bzhin du bla na
249b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du yang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ khyi ltogs pa keng rus sha med pa khrag gis 'bags pa
249b3(dkon brtsegs): blangs nas de srang gi sgo na gnas te kha chus gos pa de 'cha' ba las/ de nas rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dang / bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dang / khyim bdag gi rigs
249b4(dkon brtsegs): shing sA la chen po lta bu khyi ltogs pa de logs su 'ong ba khyi des rgyang ma nas 'ong ba mthong nas de 'di snyam du bsam ste/ 'di ni/ bdag gi kha zas ro zhim po 'di 'phrog pa zhig go /snyam
249b5(dkon brtsegs): nas de shin tu zugs shing mig tshugs su blta la brang bsnyer te skad cher zugs na/ shA ri'i bu/ de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de keng rus sha med pa khrag gis 'bags pa de 'dod pa
249b6(dkon brtsegs): yin nam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyi de ci'i phyir shin tu zugs shing
249b7(dkon brtsegs): mig tshugs su blta la brang bsnyer te skad cher zhugs/ gsol pa/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi kha zas ro zhim po 'di 'phrog pa zhig go /snyam ste/ shin tu zugs shing mig
250a1(dkon brtsegs): tshugs su blta la brang bsnyer te skad cher zugs so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du gang khyim gyi ser sna la brtson pa/ bshang ba dang / gci bas kun
250a2(dkon brtsegs): tu bskor ba la chags pa'i dge slong dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta bu'i dal ba phun sum tshogs pa rnyed nas des chud zos par byed pa de dag ni/ ngas khyi dang 'dra'o/ /zhes brjod de/
250a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag 'ba' zhig gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa 'di lta bu'i brjod pa'i gnas byed pa ma yin gyi/ yang shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag skye bo mang po
250a4(dkon brtsegs): la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi ye shes tshol ba de dag ni/ bdag gi sha yang yongs su gtong na/ gzhan gyi khyim la rtog cing bsnyen pa'i phyir phrag dog dang /
250a5(dkon brtsegs): ser sna byed par mi 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ yang shA ri'i bu/ skyes bu gti mug de dag 'tsho ba'i phyir zang zing dang / bran dang / 'jig rten gyi zang zing lhur byed cing zas dang / srog la lhur
250a6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa/ rtog cing bsnyen pa'i phyir gzhan gyi khyim la phrag dog dang / ser sna bskyed par 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu/ de ltar brtson pa'i dge slong mthong na/ phrag dog dang / ser sna bskyed de/
250a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni/ sngon chad 'dir shes na/ phyi ma 'di ga las 'ongs pa zhig /'di ni/ bdag dang sngon 'thams pa zhig yin na/ phyi ma 'di ga las 'ongs pa zhig ces zer zhing / gal te de'i khyim
250b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag de dag gis lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dam bcas par gyur pa dang / mal stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad khas blangs par gyur pa rnams sngon ni/
250b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang dam bcas par gyur mod kyi/ phyis 'ongs nas sbyin par mi 'gyur grang snyam nas de de la nyes pa gsum bskyed de/ gsum gang zhe na/ gnas la nyes pa bskyed de/ gnas de nas
250b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro'o/ /snyam sems pa dang / shes par bya ba ma yin pa shes shing shes par bya ba mi shes la/ gang cung zad bsten pa yang mi sten pa dang / de khyim pa la nyes pa bskyed pa ste/ de dge slong
250b4(dkon brtsegs): de gnas gsum brjod par byed do/ /gsum gang zhe na/ gnas kyi nyes pa brjod pa dang / nyams mi dga' ba brjod cing khyim gtong bar byed pa dang / mi bden pa'i gtam zer zhing skyes bu
250b5(dkon brtsegs): dam pa ma yin pa 'di dag g.yo byed do/ /zhes yid rton pa'i sbyor bas dam bca' bar bya ba'i chos yang dag pa rab tu ston pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na khyim la ser sna byed pa chos dkar po
250b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'o/ /yang shA ri'i bu/ khyim la ser sna byed pa la gnas pa skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag gis sdom pa dang / sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
250b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su btang bar 'gyur te/ sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su slob par mi 'gyur ro/ /bam po bcu bzhi pa/ shA ri'i bu/ de bas
251a1(dkon brtsegs): na/ rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar shes par bya ste/ shA ri'i bu/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus/ bskal ba grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa/ yangs
251a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags zhes bya ba 'jig
251a3(dkon brtsegs): rten du byung ste/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas
251a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de lo bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i bar du bzhugs so/ /de'i nyan thos kyang bye ba khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu'i nyan thos rnams kyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po byung ste/ thams
251a5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa nas sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag gi bar du'o/ /yang de'i
251a6(dkon brtsegs): tshe khyim bdag rab tu rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba phyug cing nor che ba/ longs spyod che zhing longs spyod mang ba/ bdag dbang ba mang ba/ nor dang yo byad mang po dang ldan zhing / 'gron bu
251a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram mang po dang ldan pa/ bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las byed
251b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba mang zhing / glang po che dang / rta dang / ra lug mang ba/ nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba mang po dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ de'i khye'u de gzugs bzang ba/
251b2(dkon brtsegs): mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa sdom pa zhes bya ba dang / sdom pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba gnyis byung ste/ de gnyis dus gzhan zhig na khang thog tu
251b3(dkon brtsegs): dong bar gyur to/ /shA ri'i bu/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pa de snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos
251b4(dkon brtsegs): dang sham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed bsnams te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar nas bsod snyoms kyi phyir grong khyer der gshegs pa
251b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / mdzes pa/ dga' bar gyur pa/ dbang po zhi ba/ yid zhi ba/ mchog tu dul ba dang / zhi gnas kyi mchog thob pa/ shin tu dul zhing zhi gnas kyi mchog thob pa/ dbang po dul zhing
251b6(dkon brtsegs): sbas pa/ glang po ltar rab tu dul ba/ mtsho ltar dwangs shing thog pa med la gsal ba/ gser gyi mchod sdong lta bu/ sa le sbram gyi ri lta bu/ rin po ches yongs su gang ba'i mtsho lta bu/
251b7(dkon brtsegs): lhas kun nas bskor ba'i brgya byin lta bu/ yid rab tu zhi ba'i tshangs pa lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par
252a1(dkon brtsegs): 'phags mdzes shing dga' bar 'gyur ba de rgyang ma nas byon pa khye'u de gnyis kyis mthong ngo / /shA ri'i bu/ de nas gang sdom pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i
252a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu des dang po nyid du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags sngar mthong nas des nu bo de la smras pa/ sems can gyi rgyal po 'di lta bur mdzes pa nu bo khyod kyis sngon nam yang res 'ga' mthong ngam/
252a3(dkon brtsegs): des phu bo la phu bo/ /sems can gyi rgyal po mdzes pa 'di lta bu bdag gis sngon lan
252a4(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' yang ma mthong ngo / /zhes de skad smras pa dang / des nu bo/ /nga ni/ 'di dang 'dra ba nyid du 'gyur bar bya'o/ /zhes de skad smras so/ /shA ri'i bu/ de nas khye'u sdom pa la gnas pas khye'u
252a5(dkon brtsegs): sdom pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sdom pa ji ltar mthong ba bzhin/ /de 'dra bar ni bdag bsgyur te/ /bdag ni de bas mang ba yi/ /dge slong dge 'dun bsdu bar bya/ /byang chub kyi
252a6(dkon brtsegs): ni lam gyi phyir/ /zas dang skom ni mi bza' 'o/ /sdom pa 'di ni rgyal ba ste/ /bdag ni khyim 'dir dga' ba med/ /sems can kun gyi mchog 'di ni/ /skar mang dbus na zla ba bzhin/ /mthong
252a7(dkon brtsegs): na dad par su mi 'gyur/ /khyim nas mi 'byung su zhig yod/ /shA ri'i bu/ de nas khye'u sdom pas khye'u sdom pa la gnas pa la slar tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /tshig tu byas pas
252b1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur gyi/ /sgra bo che ni ma 'byin cig /da ni tshig tu mi smra ste/ /'tshang rgya gang myur shes par bya/ /shA ri'i bu/ de nas khye'u sdom pa la gnas pas khye'u sdom pa la slar tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
252b2(dkon brtsegs): smras so/ /bdag nyid ser sna sems pa dang / /zhum pa dag gi lam min te/ /mi mchog sangs rgyas 'gyur ro zhes/ /bzang po'i sgra ni bdag gis bsgrags/ /bdag nor shes par mi 'gyur ba/ /

252b6(dkon brtsegs): bye ba stong du yang / /de ni thos par shin tu dkon/ /nam mkha' dag pa'i zla ba ni/ /sa la lam mer 'dug pa ltar/ /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhugs nas/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun du byas so/ /'od

253a6(dkon brtsegs): tu| |bdag gi lus 'di mchong bar bya/ /bdag tu 'du shes bsal gyur nas/ /srog la blta bar mi bya ste/ /ye shes mchog ni yongs btsal zhing / /sangs rgyas drung du 'gro bar bya/ /pha la
253a7(dkon brtsegs): chags dang ma la chags/ /khyim la chags pa mi bzad pa/ /de dag thams cad rnam spangs nas/ /sangs rgyas drung du 'gro bar bya/ /'di 'drar 'gyur bar gang 'dod pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas dga'
253b1(dkon brtsegs): ba yin| |rin po che ni kun spangs nas/ /khyim med par ni rab tu 'byung / /de ltar shA ri'i bu/ khye'u sdom pa la gnas pa ni/ khyim gyi skas las babs te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

253b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub dam par sangs rgyas nas/ /bdag ni chos de ston par shog /bdag ni gzugs rnams mngon par tshol ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas na bza' mchog 'bul ma lags kyi/ /lhar bcas
254a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /byang chub mchog gi zhi ba mngon par tshol/ /gnyis su med pa'i chos mchog der gnas shing / /pha rol rgol ba kun gyis mi

254a4(dkon brtsegs): dngos bdud rtsi 'dus ma bgyis pa de/ /bdag ni byang chub sangs rgyas ston par shog /gang la khyod zhugs sems can lha klu dang / /de bzhin mi dang sems med dngos po dang / /de ltar sems
254a5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa rab 'dud pa/ /bdag ni zhi ba'i chos de ston par shog /gar gnas sangs rgyas zhing du snang ba dang / /phyogs bzhi dag na kun tu snang ba dang / /mun pa chen por 'od zer phung lta
254a6(dkon brtsegs): bu'i/ /bsil dngos bdud rtsi de la reg par shog /'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams dag dang / /de bzhin gzugs med khams la rtag mi gnas/ /dga' dang mi dga' thams
254a7(dkon brtsegs): cad rab dben pa'i/ /chos kyi dam pa der ni bdag son shog /shA ri'i bu/ de nas khye'u sdom pa la gnas pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
254b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags de la shing lham gsar pa bzung gcig phul lo/ /phul nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /sems can rnams kyi gnas rten nas/ /dpung gnyen
254b2(dkon brtsegs): mgon du 'gyur bar shog / ngan pa'i lam du mi mchi zhing / /rtag tu lam rnams ston par shog /byis pa rnams kyi spyod yul 'di/ /'dod pa nam yang bsten ma gyur/ /'dus byas dag kyang
