254b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis mchod par bgyi/ /srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /mchod pa rgya chen bgyis gyur nas/ /de nyid du ni rab byung ste/ /tshangs par spyod pa bdag gis spyad/ /srog chags kun gyi
255a1(dkon brtsegs): mgon du bdag gyur cig / bdag ni lam gol nam yang 'gro ma gyur/ /yan lag brgyad ldan lam mchog rab gnas pas/ /bdag gis srog chags bye ba de
255a2(dkon brtsegs): nyid dgrol/ /dman la 'phags min mchog tu smad pa yi/ /'dod pa dag ni nam yang bsten ma gyur/ /bag med thams cad yongs su spangs gyur nas/ /bdag ni rtag tu bag yod 'gyur bar
255a3(dkon brtsegs): shog / mi khom brgyad lam nam yang skyes ma gyur/ /rtag tu dad pa'i rigs su skyes gyur cing / /skyes par gyur nas mi mchog rnams mthong la/ /mthong nas de la bdag ni dad par shog /de
255a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dra'i ye shes de ni btsal ba'i phyir/ /dang pa'i sems kyis me tog phreng ba dang / /byug pa dag dang rdza nga rnga chen dang / /rnga dang gling bu dag gis ri mor bgyi/ /bskal pa bye mang rnam pa sna tshogs
255a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi/ /mchod pa chen po dag ni bgyis gyur nas/ /myur du 'dod pa spangs te rab byung la/ /tshangs par spyad pa bdag ni spyod par shog /de dag sa phyogs gang du 'dug ste bcom ldan 'das de
255a6(dkon brtsegs): b zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po de la tshigs su bcad pa'i glu'i dbyangs kyis bstod pa'i sa phyogs der tsan+dan
255a7(dkon brtsegs): dmar po las byas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug lag khang rgyar dpag tshad bzhi/ 'phang du dpag tshad phyed pa byas te/ de dag gis gtsug lag khang de byas nas de bzhin gshegs
255b1(dkon brtsegs): pa la phul lo/ /phul nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /gnas pa gang la khyod ni bzhugs gyur bas/ /
255b2(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi rgyal bas bzhi po gang bsngags pa/ /gnas pa de ni btsal bar bgyi ba'i phyir/ /gtsug lag khang 'di bde bar gshegs la dbul/ /gnas pa dag ni gang la rtag bzhugs na/ /'das dang
255b3(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs da ltar byung ba yi/ /sems ni srog chags bye bas mi 'tshal ba'i/ /spyod pa de ni bdag gis btsal bar bgyi/ /spyod pa gang dag pha rol son pa ni/ /yang dag spong dang de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul
255b4(dkon brtsegs): rkang / /mchog bzhi rnams kyi so so yang dag rig /spyod pa de dag bdag gis btsal bar bgyi/ /de dag gis gtsug lag khang de nyid du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par
255b5(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i rgyal po de dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun du bcas pa la zla ba phyed kyi bar du bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed de/ de dag gis gtsug lag khang der
255b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun du bcas pa la bsti stang du byas/ /bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi drung du skra dang / kha spu bregs
255b7(dkon brtsegs): nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas dge ba'i chos tshol ba la brtson par gyur te/ dge ba'i chos tshol ba la yid brtson par gyur to/ /de nas gcig
256a1(dkon brtsegs): gis smras pa/ 'jig rten mgon po 'od byed par/ /bdag ni dang po sngar gyur cig /gcig shos kyis smras pa/ ded dpon mi yi gtso bor yang / /bdag ni dang
256a2(dkon brtsegs): po sngar gyur cig / de nas shA ri'i bu/ gang sdom pa zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal
256a3(dkon brtsegs): po de'i spyan sngar 'dug nas yi dam bcas pa/ stan dag la yang mi 'dug cing / /bdag ni mal du mi nyal lo/ /srog chags rnams kyi don 'tshal phyir/ /bdag gis byang chub lam
256a4(dkon brtsegs): btsal lo/ /bdag nyid kyi yang lus dang ni/ /srog kyang yongs su spangs bgyis te/ /le lo dag ni kun spangs nas/ /byang chub dam pa btsal bar bgyi/ /sha rnams dang ni de bzhin khrag
256a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / /pags pa dang ni rgyus bskams srog bor te/ /le lo thams cad yongs su spangs bgyis nas/ /byang chub mchog phyir brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi/ /shA ri'i bu/ de nas
256a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdom pa la gnas pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdom pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /bdag cag
256a7(dkon brtsegs): gnyis ni 'dus gyur nas/ /srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /byang chub spyod pa rnams spyad cing / /brtson 'grus dam pa brtsam par bya/ /lus rnams dang ni de bzhin srog por te/ /
256b1(dkon brtsegs): sha dang khrag ni de bzhin bskams gyur kyang / /srid pa stong du khyod kyi rjes slob cing / /byang chub mchog phyir brtson 'grus brtsam par bya/ /gang du chos kyi bdag po bzhugs mdzes pa'i/ /ye
256b2(dkon brtsegs): shes dam pa yongs su btsal bya zhing / /dgon pa'i gnas kyi ri dang chu drung du/ /the tshom med par brtson 'grus brtsam par bya/ /shA ri'i bu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa dang / sdom
256b3(dkon brtsegs): pa la gnas pa lo stong du lan 'ga' yang tha na se gol gtogs pa srid du yang rmugs pa dang / gnyid kyis non par ma gyur to/ /lo stong du lan 'ga' yang nyal lo/ /snyam du nyal ba'i
256b4(dkon brtsegs): sems ma bskyed do/ /lo stong du lan 'ga' yang 'dug go /snyam du stan 'dod par ma gyur to/ /de gnyis bshang ba dang / gci ba'i tshe ma gtogs par lo stong du tha na lan 'ga' yang
256b5(dkon brtsegs): tsog tsog por ma 'dug go / nam kha zas za ba na yang 'greng bzhin du khams gsum gsum tsam za zhing chu phor gang tsam 'thung ngo / /de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang kha zas
256b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'am/ bkres na myur du kha zas rnyed par dga' ba ma bskyed do/ /de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang kha zas de las lhag par ma zos so/ /de gnyis kyis lo stong du kha zas
256b7(dkon brtsegs): za ba na lan 'ga' yang kha zas la mngar ba dang / skyur ba dang / bro ba dang / tsha ba dang / kha ba dang / bska bar tha na sems bskyed pa gcig tsam yang 'du shes ma bskyed do/ /de gnyis kyis
257a1(dkon brtsegs): lo stong du bsod snyoms sgrub pa la nged la bsod snyoms sbyin pa 'di bud med dam/ skyes pa'am/ khye'u'am/ bu mo'am/ su zhig ces lan 'ga' yang
257a2(dkon brtsegs): gdong du ma bltas so/ /de gnyis kyis lo stong du shing gang gi drung na gnas pa'i shing de la gyen du lan 'ga' yang ma bltas so/ /de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang chos gos gnyis
257a3(dkon brtsegs): su ma brjes so/ /de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang than sems bskyed pa gcig kyang 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma brtags/ gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa ma brtags/ 'tshe
257a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rnam par rtog pa ma brtags so/ /de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang tha na sems bskyed pa gcig kyang zla ba la song ba'am/ nyi ma la song ba'am/ pha la song ba'am/ ma la song
257a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'am/ spun la song ba'am/ sring mo la song ba'am/ nye du la song ba'i rnam par rtog pa ma bskyed do/ /de gnyis kyis lo stong 'das pa'i bar du lan 'ga' yang tha na sems bskyed pa
257a6(dkon brtsegs): gcig kyang khyim la gnas pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma brtags so/ /de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang zla ba'am/ nyi ma'am/ skar ma'i gzugs sam/ bar snang la gyen du ma
257a7(dkon brtsegs): bltas so/ /de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang rtsig pa'am/ shing la ma bsnyes so/ /de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang mar ram/ 'bru mar gyis lus ma bskus so/ /
257b1(dkon brtsegs): de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang tha na sems bskyed pa gcig kyang mar dang ldan pa'i sems ma bskyed do/ /de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang tha na sems bskyed pa gcig kyang
257b2(dkon brtsegs): lus la skyo ba ma bskyed do/ /de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang tha na sems bskyed pa gcig kyang bdag cag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
257b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus zhes lus la ngal ba ma bskyed do/ /de gnyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang lus na ba'am/ sems na bar ma gyur to/ /de dag gis lo stong 'das kyi bar du nam
257b4(dkon brtsegs): yang skra 'breg par sems ma bskyed do/ /gzhan du na rgyal po chen po bzhi 'ongs nas mgo la byugs te skra khyer nas phyir 'dong ngo / /de dag skra khyer nas mchod rten btsugs so/ /de dag gis
257b5(dkon brtsegs): lo stong gi bar du rgyal po chen po de dag 'ongs pa dang / song ba la nam yang 'ong ba dang 'gro ba'i sems ma bskyed do/ /de gnyis kyis lo stong du grib ma bab pa na nyi ma dang / nyi mas phog
257b6(dkon brtsegs): na grib ma'i sems ma bskyed do/ /de gnyis kyis lo stong du grang ba'i dus na yang lan 'ga' yang lus la g.yogs pa'i 'du shes ma bskyed do/ /de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang 'jig
257b7(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi tshig ma smras so/ /yang shA ri'i bu/ de'i dus na dran pa rmongs byed ces bya ba'i bdud cig byung ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ da ltar gyi nga'i bdud sdig can bzhin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ bdud dran pa
258a1(dkon brtsegs): rmongs byed kyis byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa'i 'chag sar ral gri so gtams pa byas par gyur pa dang / des ral gri'i so de la ral gri'i sor 'du shes bskyed
258a2(dkon brtsegs): nas des bdag ni/ bag med pa la gnas so/ /bdag ni/ bag med pa la gnas so/ /zhes sgra phyung ba dang / sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go
258a3(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur to/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar byas pa dang / steng gi bar snang las bdud kyi ris kyi lha bye ba brgya phrag stong
258a4(dkon brtsegs): gis kye ma'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' shi 'phos su ma gyur to/ /shi 'phos su ma gyur to/ /zhes sgra byung ngo / /shA ri'i bu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa de ltar 'chag pas sems
258a5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa de'i rjes su zhugs te yang shA ri'i bu/ lha dang bcas pas sgra gnyis pa phyung ba de byang chub sems dpa' sdom pas ma thos so/ /gang lha'i sgra dang / gang sdom pa'i sgra de gnyis
258a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa la gnas pas ma thos te/ shA ri'i bu/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis spyod lam de lta bu dang / spyod pa de lta bu dang / nan tan de lta bu dang / snying rje
258a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po de lta bu dang / rtul ba de lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/ de gnyis kyis lo stong du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgoms so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
258b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / de nas lha zhig 'ongs nas rigs kyi bu dag /de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /zhes
258b2(dkon brtsegs): sbran te/ de gnyis kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /zhes thos nas bcom ldan 'das de'i khri gang na yod pa der song ste 'greng bzhin du thal mo sbyar nas nyi ma bdun gyi bar du mig
258b3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dzum par blta ste/ byams pa dang ldan zhing 'gran zla med pa'i gus pas rjes su dran par byas te/ de dag gis brtson 'grus ma btang bas 'greng bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byas so/ /
258b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag de nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes so/ /de gnyis tshangs par gyur nas slar log ste de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i
258b5(dkon brtsegs): mchod rten byas nas lo bzhi khri'i bar du mchod rten gyi yo byad kyi las byas so/ /de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi gdugs btsugs zin par shes nas lo bdun khri'i
258b6(dkon brtsegs): bar du 'greng bzhin du thal mo sbyar te gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de la phyag byed do/ /de dag tshe'i mthar phyin te shi 'phos nas yang dzam+bu'i gling nyid du skyes te/ 'khor
258b7(dkon brtsegs): los bsgyur ba'i rigs su ma'i mngal du ma tshe mar skyes so/ /de gnyis skyes ma thag tu gcig gis gcig dran nas bdag cag bag yod pa la gnas par bya'o/ /bdag cag bag yod
259a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mchog bsgom par bya'o/ /zhes smras nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /'byor dang rgyas shing rtag tu lo legs pa'i/ /yid 'ong rgyal po'i
259a2(dkon brtsegs): rigs su bdag cag skyes/ /bag med rgyags pa rab tu spang bya ste/ /byang chub dam pa rab tu bsgrub par bya/ /'dod dang longs spyod de bzhin rgyal po'i srid/ /yid brtan mi rung ring por
259a3(dkon brtsegs): mi thogs te/ /byang chub dam pa yongs su tshol ba na/ /mkhas pa de la 'dod pa mi bskyed do/ /srog chags phan phyir byang chub gang zhugs pa/ /'dod dang longs spyod la ni 'dod mi bskyed//
259a4(dkon brtsegs): myur du 'dod pa spangs shing rab byung nas/ /tshangs par spyod pa dam pa mchog spyad do/ /sngon 'das dus ni shin tu rgyas pa nas/ /lha rdzas dag dang mi yi bzang po dang / /'dod pa'i yon tan
259a5(dkon brtsegs): lnga dag bsten gyur kyang / /de la nam yang ngoms pa ma rnyed do/ /de phyir rgyal srid rgyas dang gnyen tshogs dang / /'dod pa'i yon tan 'di dag spang bya ste/ /lus skyes nas ni myur du rab byung la/ /
259a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub phyir ni brtson 'grus brtsam par bya/ /de gnyis skyes nas lo bcu drug lon pa dang 'dra bar gyur nas skra dang / kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pas khyim nas khyim
259a7(dkon brtsegs): med par rab tu byung ste lo nyi khri'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/ /de nas shi 'phos nas slar yang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes so/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos nas slar
259b1(dkon brtsegs): yang dzam+bu'i gling du skyes so/ /yang shA ri'i bu/ de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri mchog ces bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde
259b2(dkon brtsegs): bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs
259b3(dkon brtsegs): pa de de gnyis kyis mnyes par byas te/ de gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i drung du skra dang / kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo / /de
259b4(dkon brtsegs): gnyis rab tu byung nas lo bye bar tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/ /shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des sangs rgyas khri mnyes par byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sdom pas thams cad du tshangs par spyod
259b5(dkon brtsegs): pa spyad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa la gnas pas ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/ /de la shA ri'i bu/ gang byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa
259b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba de sngar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtson
259b7(dkon brtsegs): 'grus 'bar ba zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs
260a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ de lo bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i bar du gnas so/ /de'i nyan thos kyang bye ba khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu'i nyan thos
260a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'dus pa chen po byung ngo / /shA ri'i bu/ de byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa la gnas zhes bya ba de ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus 'bar ba byang chub
260a3(dkon brtsegs): thob pa de'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur te/ des de bzhin gshegs pa de dang dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la zla ba gsum gyi bar du na bza' dang / bsod snyoms
260a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / mal stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas so/ /de nas shA ri'i bu/ bcom ldan 'das de
260a5(dkon brtsegs): b zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtson 'grus 'bar ba des rgyal po de 'ongs par mkhyen nas rgyal po de la bskul ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su
260a6(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams 'thob pa la/ /brtson 'grus dam pa mchog yin te/ /'dod la brkam pa'i sems can rnams/ /sems can don byed shin tu
260a7(dkon brtsegs): dkon| |'dod la brkam pa'i don rnams gang / /de ni mkhas pa'i don ma yin/ /khyod ni don med gnas pa ste/ /mchog gi don ni tshol ma yin/ /nga nyid dang ni khyod nyid du/ /sngon ni spun
260b1(dkon brtsegs): du gyur pa ste/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas myur bsgrub cing / /de na bdag cag dam bcas so/ /ngas ni byang chub thob gyur te/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor la ltos/ /khyod ni khyim dang chung ma
260b2(dkon brtsegs): dag / rtag tu srung zhing gnas pa yin/ /mkhas pa rnams ni 'di la yid mi rton/ /'dod pa 'di dag ngan zhes rgyal bas gsungs/ /skye bo dag ni bag med don spyod de/ /de phyir don min rtag tu
260b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par spangs/ /blo gros ngan pa don med khur khyer te/ /khyod ni don med pa la rab tu gnas/ /'phags pa dag gis 'byung bar rab tu bsngags/ /'dod yon sdug bsngal thob byed mi shes
260b4(dkon brtsegs): so| |bcom ldan 'das des tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis de bskul ba dang / de bu la ma bltas/ chung ma la yang ma bltas/ tshong dpon dang / blon po dang / pha dang / ma dang / mkhar gyi
260b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / rgyal srid thams cad la yang ma bltas/ nor bu'i phung po thams cad la yang ma chags par stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan
260b6(dkon brtsegs): sngar 'dug nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir/ /bdag gi sha yang bskam par bgyi/ /khyim kun kyang ni spang bar bgyi/ /dgon par mchis
260b7(dkon brtsegs): nas 'gum par bgyi/ /srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /khyim med par ni rab byung nas/ /dgon pa rab dgon sten bgyid cing / /phyir yang brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi/ /byis pa
261a1(dkon brtsegs): smra ba sdig pa yi/ /'dod pa'i phyir yang mi sten te/ /de la gnas par gyur bas na/ /bdag ni rgyab kyis phyogs bar gyur/ /'dod dang longs spyod rgyal srid dang //
261a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rnam par spangs gyur te/ /'jig rten mgon gyi bstan pa la/ /deng nyid bdag ni rab tu 'byung / /byang chub phyir ni spyad pa spyod byed na/ /mkhas pa su zhig 'dus byas yid
261a3(dkon brtsegs): rton byed/ /gang du bdag ni 'dod la zhugs gyur pas/ /brtson 'grus brtsams kyang byang chub reg ma gyur/ /de bas 'dod pa'i yon tan bdag spangs te/ /longs spyod bde dang rgyal
261a4(dkon brtsegs): srid bde spangs nas/ /rgyal ba'i bstan la ched du rab byung la/ /byang chub mchog phyir brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi/ /des tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas bcom ldan 'das
261a5(dkon brtsegs): de nyid kyi drung du skra dang / kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo / /rgyal po mngon par byung zhing rab tu byung bar shes nas
261a6(dkon brtsegs): srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel la
261a7(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa byas nas de nas shi 'phos ma thag tu dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i rgyal por skyes so/ /de dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas bskal pa de nyid la bla na med pa yang
261b1(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas legs spyod ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/
261b2(dkon brtsegs): rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ de lo bye ba tshang bar gnas so/ /de'i nyan thos kyang bye ba khrag khrig tshang ba'i nyan thos chen po 'dus
261b3(dkon brtsegs): par gyur te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa nas sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag gi bar du'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
261b4(dkon brtsegs): po brgya phrag stong yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i bar du bkod do/ /chos bstan nas sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i don byas te yongs
261b5(dkon brtsegs): su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos ni/ bskal pa las lhag par gnas par gyur to/ /de'i ring bsrel yang rgyas par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper
261b6(dkon brtsegs): na| nga da yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas ring bsrel rgyas par 'gyur ba bzhin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa la gnas pa'i
261b7(dkon brtsegs): rjes su byang chub sems dpa' bslab cing brtson 'grus ma nyams par brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyad par bya'i/ sems can keng rus la gnas pa dang / ser sna la gnas pa dag gi
262a1(dkon brtsegs): rjes su bslab par mi bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang la la byang chub 'dod la gzhan gyi khyim la ser sna bskyed na/ de'i tshe de la 'jigs pa
262a2(dkon brtsegs): gsum 'byung bar shes par bya'o/ /gsum gang zhe na/ gzhan gyi khyim dag tu kha zas kyi phyir smra/ kun tu smra ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i dge slong gzhan mthong na phrag dog dang / ser sna
262a3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed cing khong khro ba'i sems gcig tsam gyis kyang mi mthun par byed na/ des sems can dmyal ba'i lam yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/ /dmus long gi sa bon btab bar 'gyur/
262a4(dkon brtsegs): mtha' 'khob tu skye ba'i gnas yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gang la las 'phags pa'i dge slong mthong na khro ba'i zil gyis non te khro ba'i sems kyis mi smra zhing ser sna
262a5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed de/ khong khro ba'i sems gcig tsam gyis kyang mi mthun par byed na/ des sems can dmyal ba'i lam yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/ dmus long gi sa bon btab par 'gyur/ mir
262a6(dkon brtsegs): skyes na yang mtha' 'khob kyi mi'i yul phyogs su skye ba'i gnas yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/ khong khro ba mang bar 'gyur/ /dmus long du 'gyur/ gzhan gyi dring 'jog cing skur pa
262a7(dkon brtsegs): mang bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi khyim la phrag dog dang / ser sna skyes pa de'i tshe de dag 'jigs pa 'di gsum yid la bya'o/ /de skad
262b1(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag la de ltar rnyed pa legs par
262b2(dkon brtsegs): rnyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa khyim gyi ser sna las byung ba 'di lta bu bshad pa ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag nyan thos rnams la yang khyim gyi ser sna las 'byung ba legs
262b3(dkon brtsegs): par bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang sems can dmyal ba las thar par 'tshal ba lags kyi/ bdag cag dmus long 'tshal ba ma lags so/ /bdag cag gcugs
262b4(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa'i 'khon mi 'tshal te/ bdag cag kyang skur pa 'debs pa 'tshal ba ma lags so/ /bdag cag mtha' 'khob kyi gnas 'tshal ba ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
262b5(dkon brtsegs): cag ni| yul gyi dbus kyi phyogs 'tshal te/ bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dang / chos nyan pa yongs su ma btang ngo / /de skad ces gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
262b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu/ khyod 'di ltar gnam zhing drang bar gyur te/ gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni/ legs
262b7(dkon brtsegs): so| |legs so/ /ngo mtshar to/ /de bas na/ shA ri'i bu/ gang 'jig rten na sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la slob par 'dod pa de dag gi phyir bshad par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/
263a1(dkon brtsegs): ma bslab na/ 'thab pa'i rtsa ba rtsod par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ dad pa dang / dad ba mang zhing sems can rnams kyi skyabs kyi phyir
263a2(dkon brtsegs): yun ring por blta ba dang / dus ring por blta bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du song nas yongs su 'dri bar byed de/ de 'di lta bu'i chos 'di thos nas dga' ba dang / dad
263a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po thob par gyur te/ nan tan gyis kyang sgrub mod kyi/ shA ri'i bu/ gang lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pa'i sems can
263a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni/ nyung bar 'gyur te/ phal cher dngos po gsum la gnas so/ /gsum gang zhe na/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa tshol ba dang / mdza' bo'i khyim dang slong
263a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i khyim tshol ba dang / gnas yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyug pa tshol te/ dngos po gsum po 'di dag la gnas so/ /de bas na/ gang dngos po 'di gsum la gnas pa de dag ni/ ngan song
263a6(dkon brtsegs): gsum las yongs su mi thar ro/ /de dag sems can dmyal ba las thar pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten las thar par bya ba la spro ba chung zhing de dag
263a7(dkon brtsegs): mtho ris zad par 'gyur ba dang / gleng ba dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'breg pa dang / 'gyed pa la brtson zhing lta bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag ma dad par gyur pas mdza' ba mang pos
263b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su zin nas dgon par gnas pa spong ba rjes su 'thob par 'gyur te/ de dag la khyim pa dag /tshe dang ldan pa khyod nged kyi gnas dang nye bar gnas par gyis shig dang / nged kyis chos
263b2(dkon brtsegs): gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad kyis bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa dgon pa la gnas na/ nged kyis kyang khyod mi mthong ngo / /khyod kyis
263b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang nged mi mthong ngo / /zhes de skad zer zhing / de dag phan tshun smra ba mang bas gnas la chags nas mngon par dga' ba bskyed de/ de dag gnas la sred pa bskyed par 'gyur/ ring du
263b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas par 'gyur/ mdza' bo'i khyim dang / slong ba sbyin pa'i khyim mang bar 'gyur te/ de dag phyi phyir zhing mthong na/ gcig la gcig sred par 'gyur te/ de la gang dge slong thor bur 'ongs
263b5(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag la bsngags pa ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur te/ mang du thos pa ma yin no/ /rgyun du zhugs pa ma yin no/ /zhes smra bar byed/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba ma yin no/ /zhes smra bar byed/ dgra
263b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa ma yin no/ /zhes smra bar byed de/ gzhan la bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod par bya ba la spro bar byed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ de la khyim pa de dag gang dge slong thor bur 'ongs pa de
263b7(dkon brtsegs): dag ni| bdag cag gi drung na yun ring du gnas pa ma yin gyi/ gang dge slong 'khod pa dag ni/ bdag cag gcig gi gcig don gyi pho nya yin no/ /zhes pa 'di snyam du sems te/ de
264a1(dkon brtsegs): dag gcig la gcig ser sna byed par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ de la kha cig ni/ chos 'di lta bu khong du chud par ma gyur/ khong du ma chud/ khong du chud par
264a2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur te/ de dag thams cad mdo sde 'di lta bu dag spangs par gyur/ spong bar byed/ spong bar 'gyur ro/ /yang shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde 'di lta
264a3(dkon brtsegs): bu'i tshig dang 'bru'i rnam grangs thos nas thos ma thag tu mos par mi byed kyi/ sems can ngan song du 'gro ba'i sems can de lta bu dag ni/ smod par byed par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/
264a4(dkon brtsegs): de la byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus ma nyams pa ni/ ser sna dang / phrag dog gi gzhi 'di lta bu ngan song du 'gro ba'i las thos nas khyim gyi ser sna ma byed pa yang mi byed/ khyim gyi
264a5(dkon brtsegs): ser sna byas pa yang 'chags par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus ma nyams pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gzhan yang shA
264a6(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu/ brtson 'grus ma nyams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na sems can thams cad la nad par 'du shes bskyed de/ sems can de dag
264a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni/ gdung ba'i nad 'di gsum gyis rtag tu gdungs so/ /gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang / zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang / gti mug gi gdung ba'o//
264b1(dkon brtsegs): sman dang / rtsi bsku ba'i sbyor ba gang gis sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / zhe sdang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / gti mug rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i
264b2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi sman dang / rtsis bsku ba'i sbyor ba dag gis bsdu bar bya'o/ /zhes de ltar sems shing de chos kyi sman dang / rtsis bskus pa'i sbyor ba gang gis sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags
264b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / zhe sdang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / gti mug rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i chos kyi sman dang / rtsis bskus pa'i sbyin pa sdud par byed do/ /de ni/ byang
264b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus ma nyams pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ sems can thams cad ni/ gdung ba'i nad gsum gyis rtag tu
264b5(dkon brtsegs): gdungs nas na ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang / zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang / gti mug gi gdung ba'o/ /sems can gang sems can dmyal bar skye ba de dag kyang gdung
264b6(dkon brtsegs): ba 'di gsum gyi rtag tu gdungs te/ 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang / zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang / gti mug gi gdung ba'o/ /gang dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / gang gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa
264b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / gang mi'i 'jig rten pa dang / gang lhar skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang / zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang / gti mug gi gdung ba 'di gsum gyis rtag
265a1(dkon brtsegs): tu gdungs te/ gang sems can de dag gi sman pa gso bar byed pa de dag kyang gang 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang / zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang / gti mug gi gdung ba
265a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di gsum gyis rtag tu gdungs te/ de la sman pa gzhan dang / sman gzhan bsku ba'i sbyor bas sems can de dag gi 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang / zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang / gti
265a3(dkon brtsegs): mug gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar bya mi nus kyi/ gzhan du na de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i sman pa'i rgyal po chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi
265a4(dkon brtsegs): sku thob pas bdag nyid sman du gyur par byin gyis brlabs nas sems can de dag gi 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang / zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang / gti mug gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar
265a5(dkon brtsegs): byed nus so/ /de bas na/ shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ gang sman pa phal dang / sman gyis bsku ba'i sbyor ba phal gyis sems can de dag gi 'dod chags

265b1(dkon brtsegs): par rig par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ji snyam du sems/ sems can gyi khams rab tu mang ngam/ gsol pa/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal te/ sems
265b2(dkon brtsegs): can gyi khams ni/ rab tu mang gi /sa'i khams ni/ de lta ma lags so/ /chu'i khams ni/ de lta ma lags/ me'i khams ni/ de lta ma lags/ rlung gi khams ni/ de lta ma lags so/ /bka'

265b6(dkon brtsegs): mang ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha dang / mir bcas pa'i skye rgu ni/ de lta ma yin te/ de ltar sems can gyi khams dpag tu med do/ /shA ri'i bu/ ji
265b7(dkon brtsegs): tsam du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can sgo nga las skye ba'am/ mngal nas skye ba'am/ drod gsher las skye ba'am/ rdzus te skye ba'am/ gzugs can nam
266a1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs med pa'am/ 'du shes can nam/ 'du shes med pa'am/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min nam/ snang ba'am/ mi snang ba'am/ ji tsam sems

266a3(dkon brtsegs): mir gyur nas kyang sman par gyur te/ tshe'i tshad kyang bskal par gnas par gyur nas yongs su brtag pa bzung ste slob dpon khams gso ba la mkhas pa 'di lta ste/ shA ri'i bu/ da
266a4(dkon brtsegs): ltar gyi sman pa'i rgyal po'i 'tsho byed lta bu de dag thams cad 'dus nas sems can gcig gi 'dod chags kyi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / zhe sdang gi gdung pa dang / gti mug gi

266a6(dkon brtsegs): chags kyi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bsil ba'i yan lag gi sman gyi phung po btags te bskus par gyur kyang shA ri'i bu/ sman pa tshe'i tshad bskal bar gnas pa thams
266a7(dkon brtsegs): cad skyo bar gyur la/ bsil ba'i yan lag gi sman gyi phung po de dag thams cad yongs su 'bring cing zad par gyur kyang sems can gcig gi 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang /

266b6(dkon brtsegs): du med pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams kyi gti mug gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi sku thob pas kyang bdag nyid kyi chos kyi sman du gyur

267a4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ ngas mngon par shes pa bskal pa grangs med pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/
267a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad des nga la
267a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung
267a7(dkon brtsegs): bstan to/ /yang shA ri'i bu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan ma thag tu ngas chos kyi sku
267b1(dkon brtsegs): thob par gyur te/ nga chos kyi sku dang ldan par gyur nas mar me mdzad kyi 'og tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin mig mdzes zhes bya ba sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi bdag po rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che
267b2(dkon brtsegs): ba| dbang che bar grags par gyur to/ /yang de'i tshe dzam+bu'i gling 'dir grong khyer chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong phrag bzhi byung ngo / /grong dang / tshong 'dus dang / ri khrod stong phrag mang po byung ste/ grong

267b4(dkon brtsegs): bar ma byung ste/ sems can phal cher lus rma can du gyur te/ lus rul pa dang / lba ba dang / 'bras dang / me dbal dang / g.yan pa dang / rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan gyis rgyas
267b5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to/ /de na sman pa brgya stong phrag mang po sems can de dag gi nad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la brtson par byed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ de nas sems can de dag gso ba ma rnyed de/ mgon med/
267b6(dkon brtsegs): skyabs med nas sgra cher phyung ba/ lha dag dang ni klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin dri za srin po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / bdag cag nas las thar byed gang / bdag cag sdug bsngal thar
267b7(dkon brtsegs): byed la| |nor rnams thams cad sbyin par bya/ /de yi bka' yi rjes su 'jug /byas pa bdag kyang gzo bar bya// //bam po bco lnga pa/ yang shA ri'i bu/ ngas mi'i las 'das pa'i
268a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i mig rnam par dag pas sems can de dag nad kyis gzir te de dag phal cher lus rma can du gyur te/ lus rul ba dang / lba ba dang / 'bras dang / me
268a2(dkon brtsegs): dpal dang / g.yan pa dang / rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan gyis brgyal bar mthong / /mi'i las 'das pa lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pas sems can de dag gi sgra cher phyung
268a3(dkon brtsegs): ba thos te/ mthong zhing thos nas sems can de dag la snying rje chen po skyes te/ de dag la ngas 'di snyam du bsam mo/ /nga sems can 'di dag gi gnas su gyur cig /sems
268a4(dkon brtsegs): can skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs su gyur cig / sems can rten med pa rnams kyi rten du gyur cig /sems can gso ba med pa rnams kyi gso ba sbyar bar bya'o/ /snyam ste/ shA
268a5(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu/ ngas brgya byin gyi lus chen po mi snang bar byas nas grong khyer chen po ku ru nas shin tu mi ring ba zhig tu des pa zhes bya ba'i srog chags shig tu rdzus te skyes nas steng
268a6(dkon brtsegs): gi bar snang la 'dug ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bskul to/ /grong khyer ku ru nas ni mi ring na/ des pa zhes bya'i srog chags
268a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa yod/ /gang dag de yi sha la yongs za ba/ /de kun nad las yongs su thar par 'gyur/ /'jigs shing skrag pa dag par tu ma byed par/ /de yi sha ni ji ltar 'dod dag longs/ /
268b1(dkon brtsegs): de ni gnod par mi sems khro gshe med/ /de ni dzam+bu'i gling gi rtsi yin no/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu/ grong khyer chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong phrag bzhi po de dag dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang /
268b2(dkon brtsegs): tshong 'dus dang / ri khrod stong pa de dag na sems can na ba ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyis sgra de thos nas grong khyer chen po ku ru zhes bya ba ga la ba dang / srog chags kyi rnam pa
268b3(dkon brtsegs): des pa gang na yod pa der song ste phyin nas srog chags des pa zhes bya ba'i lus las sha bcad cing bcad cing khyer yang de'i lus las sha yongs su zad par ma gyur te/ de'i tshe tshigs su
268b4(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa 'di byung ngo / /gang phyir bden pas byang chub reg 'gyur zhing / /ye shes phung po de zad mi 'gyur te/ /nga yi tshig de bden par 'gyur zhe na/ /lus la sha ni nam yang zad ma gyur/ /
268b5(dkon brtsegs): de ltar shA ri'i bu/ dzam bu'i gling kun gyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis des pa zhes bya ba'i srog chags kyis sha bcad cing bcad cing khyer yang de'i lus la bri ba'am gang bar yang mi mngon te/
268b6(dkon brtsegs): de yang bcad yang bcad kyang slar de bzhin du skye'o/ /yang shA ri'i bu/ gang sems can na ba rnams kyis des pa zhes bya ba'i srog chags kyi sha zos na/ de dag gi nad thams cad byang ste nad
268b7(dkon brtsegs): med cing bde ba las mi 'gyur bar gyur to/ /de bzhin du mthar gyis dzam+bu'i gling na na ba thams cad kyi nad sna tshogs byang ste nad med par byas nas bde zhing 'gyur ba med do/ /de nas dzam+bu'i
269a1(dkon brtsegs): gling gi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / mi thams cad 'di snyam du sems te/ des pa zhes bya ba'i srog chags des bdag cag nad las
269a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su thar te/ bde zhing 'gyur ba med par byas na/ bdag cag gis de la mchod pa dang / bkur sti ci zhig bya snyam ste/ de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus so/ /'dus nas des pa
269a3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba'i srog chags ga la ba der song ste phyin nas srog chags des pa la 'khor yug tu bskor te slar tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/ /khyod ni gnas dang skyabs lags te/ khyod
269a4(dkon brtsegs): ni sman pa khyod nyid sman/ /khyod la mchod pa ci bgyi ba/ /bdag cag la ni bka' stsol cig /shA ri'i bu/ e ma'o skye bo'i tshogs rnams 'dun par gyur to/ /snyam du ngas shes nas lus
269a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po de mi snang bar byas te/ rang gi brgya byin gyi cha byad du 'dug nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag la smras pa/ kye grogs po dag /nga la grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul
269a6(dkon brtsegs): dang | rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor mi dgos so/ /grogs po dag /nga la zhing gi dngos po dang / khyim gyi dngos po dang / tshong 'dus kyi dngos po dang / 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu
269a7(dkon brtsegs): dang | mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru rnams mi dgos so/ /grogs po dag /nga la glang po che dang / rta dang / rnga mo dang / ba lang dang / bong bu dang / ra lug
269b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / khyim bya dang / phag rnams mi dgos so/ /skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyang mi dgos
269b2(dkon brtsegs): so| |bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gso sman dang / yo byad dang / skyed mos tshal dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal gyi longs spyod rnams kyang mi dgos so/ /kye grogs
269b3(dkon brtsegs): po dag / khyed kyis srog gcod pa srongs la srog gcod pa las slar ldog par gyis shig /ma byin par len pa spongs la ma byin par len pa las slar ldog par gyis shig /'dod pas log
269b4(dkon brtsegs): par g.yem pa spongs la 'dod pas log par g.yem pa las slar ldog par gyis shig/ /brdzun du smra ba spongs la brdzun du smra ba las slar ldog par gyis shig /phra ma spongs la phra ma las
269b5(dkon brtsegs): slar ldog par gyis shig / de bzhin du sbyar te ngag rtsub po dang / tshig kyal pa dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba'i bar du spongs la log par lta ba las slar
269b6(dkon brtsegs): ldog par gyis shig / de'i tshe skye bo'i tshogs chen po la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /nga la 'gron bu bye ba mi dgos te/ /gser phung ri rab tsam yang dgos pa med/ /bud med lha mo
269b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba mi dgos te/ /bza' dang btung dang kha zas mi dgos so/ /des pa'i srog chags la ni mchod 'dod na/ /las kyi lam ni rab dag bcu po 'di/ /thams cad 'dus nas de dag srung bar
270a1(dkon brtsegs): gyis| |phan tshun du yang byams pa'i yid kyis ltos/ /las lam bcu po rdzogs pa 'di dag rnams/ /thams cad gcig tu 'dus te srungs shig dang /
270a2(dkon brtsegs): de tshe nga la mchod pa byas par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' nor dang 'bru mi tshol/ /nga la nor rnams dgos pa ma yin te/ /bza' btung dag dang dbyig nor 'bru mi dgos/ /rta
270a3(dkon brtsegs): dang glang chen shing rta mi dgos te/ /bud med mchog dang rin chen gos mi dgos/ /phan tshun du ni byams sems dag pa dang / /phan pa'i dngos po dag gi sems bskyed la/ /thams
270a4(dkon brtsegs): cad kun kyang gcig tu 'dus gyur la/ /dge bcu'i las lam dag rdzogs srung bar gyis/ /dbang pos mi rnams de dag rab bskul ba/ /tshig de dag ni thos par gyur pa dang //
270a5(dkon brtsegs): dge ba bcu yi las lam rnam dag pa/ /dge ba rnams ni yang dag rab tu len/ shA ri'i bu/ ngas skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag la chos kyi gtam kun tu bstan/ /yang dag
270a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'dzin du btsud/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur ba de ni/ nga yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ ngas mngon par
270a7(dkon brtsegs): shes te 'dzam bu'i gling gi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / mi de snyed thams cad kyis srog chags nges pa zhes bya ba'i sha zos pa las tha na sems
270b1(dkon brtsegs): can gcig kyang de na 'chi ba'i dus byas te de nas shi 'phos nas log par ltung bar song bar ma gyur te/ /de dag thams cad de nas shi 'phos te 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sum cu rtsa
270b2(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba ma mnyam par skyes so/ /shA ri'i bu/ ngas de dag la chos kyi gtam kun tu bstan/ /yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang
270b3(dkon brtsegs): dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas de dag thams cad nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / bla na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang theg pa gsum
270b4(dkon brtsegs): la nges par gyur te/ de la la la ni/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das/ la la ni/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ ngas de ltar lus gcig yongs su btang
270b5(dkon brtsegs): bas sems can de snyed theg pa gsum dag la yongs su smin par byas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi sku la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po ci 'dra ba dang / mthu
270b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po ci 'dra ba dang / dbang che bar grags pa ci 'dra ba la ltos/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
270b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sku de ci 'dra/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sku ni/ brtan pa/ sra ba/ mi shigs pa/
271a1(dkon brtsegs): rdo rje'i sku/ 'chi 'pho med pa/ mi skye ba ste/ de ni/ sku tha dad pas 'dul ba sems can rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gis tha dad du 'gyur yang mes mi tshig /mtshon
271a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi tshugs te/ rdo rje lta bur brtan pa/ mi shigs pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sku la gnas pa brtson 'grus ma nyams pa brtson 'grus kyi pha
271a3(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa la lhun gyis grub par spyod cing / lus kyi sems can yongs su smin par byed kyang sems pa med/ yongs su rtog pa med/ lus dben pa'i mtshan nyid du rab tu
271a4(dkon brtsegs): shes so| |lus dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyis kyang chos thams cad dben pa'i mtshan nyid rjes su shes la/ lus dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyis chos thams cad dben pa'i mtshan nyid la
271a5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis su yang mi byed de/ mtshan nyid gang lus dben pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i mtshan nyid de ni/ chos thams cad dben pa'i mtshan nyid des dben pa'i mtshan nyid gcig gis rjes
271a6(dkon brtsegs): su 'jug go / nang gi chos mi dmigs pa'i phyir rang gi lus dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyis kyang sems can thams cad kyi lus dben pa'i mtshan nyid du mnyam par byed do/ /de sems
271a7(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi lus dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rjes su shes/ chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang chos thams cad dben pa'i
271b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid kyis rjes su slob ste/ de rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sems can gyi lus kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so/ /de sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis
271b2(dkon brtsegs): rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so/ /rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so/ /chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyis rang gi lus kyi

271b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so/ /rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so/ /'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang /

272a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byed/ da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byed/ ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis

272a3(dkon brtsegs): ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byad de/ yang 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid phung po dang / khams
272a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i de bzhin nyid do/ /
272a5(dkon brtsegs): kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid mya ngan las 'das pa dang / 'khor ba'i de bzhin nyid do/ /'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i

272a7(dkon brtsegs): te| yang shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin nyid ces bya ba ni/ de kho na'o/ /de bzhin nyid do/ /gzhan ma yin pa nyid do/ /bral ba med pa'o/ /lus med pa'o/ /de bzhin nyid la ni/ lus gang yang
272b1(dkon brtsegs): med de| lus med pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus zhes bya'o/ /de'i phyir 'di ni/ de bzhin nyid kyi lus te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus zhes
272b2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o| |lus de lta bu ni/ lus thams cad de/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' lus thams cad kyang ston pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus kyang mi byed de/ lus med pa rtsod pa
272b3(dkon brtsegs): med pas/ gzugs kyi lus thams cad kyang ston pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus kyang 'khrugs par mi byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs ba'i ye shes kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la so
272b4(dkon brtsegs): sor rtog ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mnyam pa nyid kyis kyang rang gi lus mnyam pa nyid so sor rtog go /rang gi lus mnyam pa nyid kyis lus dang lus med pa thams cad kyi mnyam
272b5(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid so sor rtog go / lus dang lus med pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis shin tu lus med pa'i lus su mthong ngo / /lus thams cad rten cing 'brel te 'byung bar yang shes so/ /shes
272b6(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang chos kyi sku mngon par sgrub bo/ /chos kyi sku mngon par bsgrubs nas chos kyi sku nyid yin gyi/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi lus ni/ ma yin no/ /de chos kyi sku rab tu
272b7(dkon brtsegs): phye bas mthong bas kyang sems can rnams 'dul lo/ /thos pas kyang sems can rnams 'dul lo/ /reg pas kyang sems can rnams 'dul lo/ /sems can rnams kyi don byed do/ /shA
273a1(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sman pa'i rgyal po gso byed kyis rtsi thams can bsdus nas rtsi shing mang po sbyar ba las bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/
273a2(dkon brtsegs): blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa shin tu rdzogs par zin pa byi dor byas pa zhig byas nas der 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang /

273a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur| mi na bar 'gyur te/ 'gyur ba med cing bde bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ltar sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed 'jig rten gyi nad gso ba shes pa de ltar sman pa gzhan dag la
273a6(dkon brtsegs): med do| |shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi skus che ba yang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus la skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo sems
273a7(dkon brtsegs): can ji snyed 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis gdungs pa rnams kyis reg na/ de dag reg ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' de'i sngon gyi smon lam shin tu yongs su
273b1(dkon brtsegs): dag pas nad thams cad byang zhing gdung ba yang med par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ yang byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi lus can gyi lus ni/ zas dang / skom gyis gso ba ma yin na/ zas
273b2(dkon brtsegs): kham gyi za bas lus gso ba ma yin gyi/ de kha zas thams cad yongs su shes pas sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir zas za'o/ /de zas za yang gtong bar mi byed do/ /zas
273b3(dkon brtsegs): za yang lus kyi nang du gtong bar mi byed do/ /chos kyi sku'i stobs las kyang mi nyams/ yongs su mi nyams so/ /shA ri'i bu/ yang byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi lus can la tshe dang / 'chi
273b4(dkon brtsegs): 'pho ba dang / skye ba yang med la/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba yang ston to/ /de 'chi 'pho yang chos thams cad 'chi 'pho med pa dang / mngon par 'du
273b5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /skye yang chos thams cad 'pho ba med par rab tu shes so/ /'byung yang chos thams cad skye ba med par rab tu shes so/ /de chos kyi lus dang /
273b6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi zas dang / chos kyi stobs dang / chos la rton pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sngon gyi smon lam lhun gyis grub pas brtson 'grus ma nyams par brtson
273b7(dkon brtsegs): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /de dag lus ni rdo rje
274a1(dkon brtsegs): lta bur mi shigs pa/ /'dul ba'i dus shes nas ni tha dad ston par 'gyur/ /mtshon gyis mi tshugs mes ni tshig pa ma yin yang / /'dul ba'i
274a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can mthong na tshugs shing mes tshig 'gyur/ /sems can na ba mthong na sman rnams su yang 'gyur/ /de bzhin bkres pa rnams la zas dang skom du 'gyur/ /'on kyang chos
274a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbyings la rnam rtog ci yang med/ /chos kyi sku dang lus med tshul gcig rab tu 'jug /shed las skyes dang gso dang shed can yod min te/ /chos so cog ni rten cing
274a4(dkon brtsegs): 'brel te byung bar shes/ /gang de'i skyon yod pa na sdug bsngal lam 'byung ste/ /rkyen med pa na sdug bsngal lam ni chad par 'gyur/ /gzugs ni lbu ba rdos pa 'dra
274a5(dkon brtsegs): ste snying po med/ /tshor ba chu yi chu bur mtshungs shing 'dra bar sems/ /'du shes dpyid kyi dus kyi smig rgyu rgyu ba 'dra/ /'du byed rnams ni chu skyes shing dang 'dra bar blta/ /ji
274a6(dkon brtsegs): ltar gar la blta bar sgyu ma bslab pa rnams/ /skad cig gis ni gzugs rnams sna tshogs ston byed pa/ /mi bden byed pa de ltar rnam shes shes gyur nas/ /mkhas
274a7(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag thams cad du yang smon pa med/ /longs spyod rnams ni ri gzar chu dang mtshungs shing 'dra/ /glog dang mkha' sprin phung po lta bur byung nas med/ /longs spyod
274b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba gzhu drag 'phangs pa'i mda' ltar shes/ /mkhas pa rnams ni kun tu longs spyod smon pa med/ /lha yi 'jig rten lha rdzas bde ba ma myong ba/ /'jig rten gsum po dag
274b2(dkon brtsegs): na sems can gang yang med/ /slar yang sems dmyal sdug bsngal myong ba mthong gyur nas/ /bde gshegs sras pos de mthong mtho ris 'gro mi byed/ /yid ni nam mkha' 'dra
274b3(dkon brtsegs): ba de dag gnas med de/ /gnas dang bral ba rnams la 'byung ba srid ma yin/ /'byung ba med rnams skye dang 'chi 'pho med par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' che ba mi rga mi
274b4(dkon brtsegs): 'chi 'thob/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus ma nyams pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na 'di ltar slob ste/ skye ma'o/ /'jig
274b5(dkon brtsegs): rten gnas pa 'di ni/ gang 'dod chags nad chen por rab tu mi shes/ zhe sdang nad chen por rab tu mi shes/ gti mug nad chen por rab tu mi shes te/ gsum po 'di dag
274b6(dkon brtsegs): nad chen por mi shes pa'i sman pa mi mkhas pa sha stag gis yongs su gang / sman pa mi mkhas pa sha stag gis yongs su gang nas nad chen po gsum po de dag gi sman gsum
274b7(dkon brtsegs): mi shes te/ 'dod chags kyi nad chen po'i sman chen po mi gtsang ba yin par rab tu mi shes/ zhe sdang gi nad chen po'i sman chen po byams pa yin par rab tu mi shes/ gti
275a1(dkon brtsegs): mug gi nad chen po'i sman chen po rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba yin par rab tu mi shes te/ kye ma'o sman pa de dag ni/ nad gzhan dang / gzhan dag
275a2(dkon brtsegs): gso nus kyi/ nad thams cad ni/ gso bar mi nus so/ /kye ma'o sman pa de dag gi sman de ni/ re zhig gso nus pa yin gyi/ gtan du gso bar byed pa ma yin no/ /de
275a3(dkon brtsegs): bas na| bdag cag gis ni/ sman pa de dag gi rjes su bslab par mi bya'i/ bdag cag gis ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la mkhas pa bla na med pa sman
275a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyal po chen po nad thams cad gso bar byed pa de'i rjes su bslab par bya'o/ /bdag cag gis ni/ nad thams cad gso bar bya'i/ nad gzhan dang / gzhan dag gso
275a5(dkon brtsegs): bar mi bya/ bdag cag gis re zhig gso bar mi bya ste/ bdag cag gis gtan du gso bar byed pa bya'o/ /gang gi sgra thos pas 'dod chags kyi nad chen po rab tu zhi
275a6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba dang / zhe sdang gi nad chen po rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / gti mug gi nad chen po rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyi sman dang / rtsi byug pa'i sbyor
275a7(dkon brtsegs): ba bsdu bar bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus ma nyams pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na de bzhin
275b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa sman pa'i rgyal po bla na med pa chos thams cad la mkhas pa ma gtogs par gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la med pa de 'dra ba'i chos kyi sman dang / rtsis bsku ba'i sbyor ba sdud bar byed de/
275b2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi sman dang / rtsis bsku ba'i sbyor ba des chos kyi dung chen po la bskus nas yongs su sgrog ste/ de'i sgras stong gsum gyi stong
275b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di mngon par go bar byed do/ /de na sems can du ma/ sems can brgya phrag du ma/ sems can stong phrag du ma/ sems can brgya stong phrag du ma/
275b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can bye ba phrag du ma/ sems can bye ba brgya phrag du ma/ sems can bye ba stong phrag du ma/ sems can bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya
275b5(dkon brtsegs): stong phrag du ma/ sems can dkrigs phrag du ma nas de bzhin du sbyar te brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang /
275b6(dkon brtsegs): gti mug gi nad chen po rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gangs kyi ri'i rgyal po la sman gyi rgyal po chen po 'bral bar byed pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/
275b7(dkon brtsegs): de'i dris dug gi drag shul thams cad las rab tu thar par 'gyur te/ dpag tshad brgya tsam na 'khod pa dag kyang dug med par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gal te dung ngam rnga la sman
276a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi rgyal po chen po 'bral bar byed pas bskus te bus sam/ brdungs na/ sems can dug 'thungs pa'am/ zos pa'am/ bskus pas zug par gyur
276a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de'i sgra thos na dug med par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gang sman gyi rgyal po 'bral bar byed pa de lta bu ni/ sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed ma gtogs
276a3(dkon brtsegs): par sman pa thams cad kyis mi shes so/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad la mkhas pa sman
276a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad kyi nad thams cad sel ba ma gtogs par gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la med pa de 'dra ba'i chos kyi sman dang /
276a5(dkon brtsegs): rtsis bsku ba'i sbyor ba sdud par byed de/ chos kyi sman dang / rtsis bsku ba'i sbyor ba des chos kyi dung chen po la bskus nas yongs su sgrog ste/ de'i sgras stong gsum gyi stong chen
276a6(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di mngon par go bar byed do/ /de na sems can du mas de thos nas 'dod chags kyi nad chen po rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi
276a7(dkon brtsegs): nad chen po rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ sems can du ma/ sems can brgya phrag du ma/ sems can stong phrag du ma/ sems can brgya stong phrag du ma/ sems can bye ba phrag du ma/ sems
276b1(dkon brtsegs): can bye ba brgya phrag du ma/ sems can bye ba stong phrag du ma/ sems can bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma/ sems can dkrigs phrag du ma nas
276b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du sbyar te brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams kyi sgra de thos nas 'dod chags kyi nad chen po rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nad
276b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /de gang nas sdud par byed ce na/ gang du byang chub sems dpa' de'i nor bzhag pa nas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' de'i nor gang du bzhag ce na/ byang chub sems
276b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs las gud na ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i brtson 'grus ma nyams pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
276b5(dkon brtsegs): pa la spyod pa na byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs rab tu nyan to/ /'dzin to/ /'chang ngo / /klog go /kun chub par byed do/ /gzhan la yang 'chad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab

276b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu nyan par byed/ 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed/ kun chub byed/ gzhan dag la yang 'chad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston te/ shA
277a1(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu/ de bas na/ rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang brtson 'grus ma nyams pa
277a2(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs nyan par byed/ 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed/ kun

277a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang ches grangs med pa/ yangs pa/ dpag tu med pa'i pha rol gyi yang shin tu pha rol tu gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs

277b2(dkon brtsegs): so| |lo lnga brgya'i bar du yang dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan gnas so/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i bla ma yongs
277b3(dkon brtsegs): su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel yang rgyas par gyur te/ de 'di lta ste/ dper na/ da nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel rgyas par 'gyur ba bzhin no/ /shA ri'i bu/

277b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan zhig nas shi 'phos te de'i gsung rab la rgyal rigs su skyes par gyur te/ de btsas ma thag tu bdag ni/ chos spyod pa'i rigs su skyes kyi/ bdag gis chos spyod par bya'o//
277b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes tshig de skad smras te/ de'i ming chos spyod ces btags so/ /shA ri'i bu/ de nas rgyal bu chos spyod dbang po yongs su smin pa'i rgyus skyes nas lo nyi shu lon pa 'dra ba de dad pas khyim
277b7(dkon brtsegs): nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ dgon pa nags tshal na gnas pas mtha'i gnas mal du gnas so/ /de gcig pu dben par song ste nang du yang dag 'jog pa na lha zhig 'ongs nas
278a1(dkon brtsegs): dge slong / khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur gyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i

278a3(dkon brtsegs): mgu yid rangs rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang / ljongs nas ljongs
278a4(dkon brtsegs): su byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kun tu tshol zhing rjes su spyod de/ de gang dang gang du dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra bar dge slong pha dang dge slong ma mthong ba dang
278a5(dkon brtsegs): d e dag gi gan du song nas 'phags pa byang chub sems dpas gang la bslab na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos
278a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs gang lags zhes dris pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ dge slong / bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de ci 'dra ba mi
278a7(dkon brtsegs): shes te| dge slong / bdag cag gis ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi ming yang ded gdod rna bas thos su zad do/ /zhes smras pa dang / de 'di
278b1(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems te/ lha ni/ rdzun mi zer gyi/ ji srid du byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs ma thos pa de srid du brtson 'grus ma nyams par bya'o/ /snyam nas des tshe dang ldan pa
278b2(dkon brtsegs): dag| bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i bla ma de gang du zhugs la bzhen ces dris pa dang / de dag gis dge slong / sa phyogs 'dir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
278b3(dkon brtsegs): pa pad+ma'i bla ma de zhugs la bzhen to/ /zhes phyogs de bstan nas des phyogs de ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / sa phyogs der bskor ba byas nas sa phyogs de nyid du phyogs gcig
278b4(dkon brtsegs): tu 'dug ste bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i bla ma de mngon du byas nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ ji srid du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i bla ma de
278b5(dkon brtsegs): las byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs mngon du ma thos pa de srid du bdag sa phyogs 'di nas mi ldang zhing skyil mo krung mi gzhig go / snyam mo/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ltar
278b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bu drang srong brtson 'grus ma nyams pas de lta bur dam bcas pa brtan par byas nas sa phyogs de nyid du 'dug ste zhag bdun gyi bar du gnas so/ /zhag bdun 'das pa dang
278b7(dkon brtsegs): s har phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bcu pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba byon nas chos kyi sgo'i
279a1(dkon brtsegs): tshig brgyad po 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs khong du chud par bya'o/ /zhes chos kyi sgo'i tshig brgyad rnams yang dag
279a2(dkon brtsegs): par rab tu bstan pa dang / de chos kyi sgo'i tshig brgyad po de dag gis mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bla na med pa dang ldan par gyur nas sa phyogs de nyid nas langs te song
279a3(dkon brtsegs): ngo| |brtson 'grus ma nyams pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang
279a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor rnams su lo drug cu'i bar du rgyu zhing byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid rab tu bstan to/ /des lo drug cu'i bar du lha dang mi'i srog chags bye bar
279a5(dkon brtsegs): tshang ba snyed theg pa gsum dag la bkod nas 'chi khar sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nyid du mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skye bar gyur cig / ces smon lam btab nas de 'chi ba'i
279a6(dkon brtsegs): dus byas pa dang / de dzam+bu'i gling de nyid du tshong dpon gyi rigs shig tu slar skyes te/ de btsas ma thag tu chos spyod par bya'o/ /chos spyad par bya'o/ /zhes tshig de skad ces smras
279a7(dkon brtsegs): nas de snga ma bzhin du ming chos spyod ces btags so/ /de btsas nas lo drug lon pa 'dra ba de dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo / /de ltar rab tu byung nas ring po
279b1(dkon brtsegs): ma lon par yang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs mngon du gyur to/ /de byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs la gnas nas lo drug cu'i bar du
279b2(dkon brtsegs): grong nas grong du/ grong khyer nas grong khyer du/ ljongs nas ljongs su byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu ston cing rgyu'o/ /des lo drug cu'i
279b3(dkon brtsegs): bar du lha dang mi'i skye rgu'i srog chags gzhan bye ba 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po bla na med pa dang theg pa gsum dag la
279b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par byas so/ /de yang 'chi khar mir skyes par gyur cig /ces smon lam btab pa dang / de'i smon lam gyi stobs kyis dzam+bu'i gling de nyid du rgyal rigs shig tu slar
279b5(dkon brtsegs): skyes te| de btsas ma thag tu lhas kye ma'o 'jig rten du sems can chos kyi bla ma 'di skyes so/ /kye ma'o 'jig rten du sems can chos kyi bla ma 'di skyes so/ /zhes sgra byung nas de'i ming
279b6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi bla ma chos kyi bla ma zhes btags so/ /de yang dbang po rnams yongs su smin pa'i rgyus skyes nas lo nyi shu lon pa 'dra ba de dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo / /
279b7(dkon brtsegs): de ltar rab tu byung nas dge slong chos kyi bla ma de dran pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang / shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pas slar byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs mngon
280a1(dkon brtsegs): du gyur to/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ltar dge slong chos kyi bla mas the tshom gcod pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid lo stong drug khri
280a2(dkon brtsegs): tshang bar grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor sna tshogs su yang dag par rab tu bstan to/ /de lo stong drug khri'i
280a3(dkon brtsegs): b ar du lha dang mi'i skye rgu'i srog chags gzhan bye ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yongs su smin par byas nas de yang 'chi khar mir skye bar smon lam btab
280a4(dkon brtsegs): ste| de 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang dzam+bu'i gling de nyid du khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bur slar skyes te/ de btsas ma thag tu lha zhig gis kye ma'o 'jig rten du sems
280a5(dkon brtsegs): can dran pa thob pa 'di skyes so/ /kye ma'o 'jig rten du sems can dran pa thob pa 'di skyes so/ /zhes sgra byung nas de'i ming dran pa thob pa dran pa thob pa zhes btags so/ /de dbang

280b1(dkon brtsegs): tshom thams cad gcod pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor
280b2(dkon brtsegs): du lo drug khri'i bar du chos ston te/ nges lo drug khri'i bar du lha dang mi'i skye rgu'i srog chags bye ba phrag bzhi 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /

280b4(dkon brtsegs): phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes so/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin

280b6(dkon brtsegs): pa rin po che'i snying po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes ma thag tu mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bla na med pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /de de na tshe ji tsam thub par 'dug nas de nas shi
280b7(dkon brtsegs): 'phos te shi ba'i dus byas pa dang / de sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nyid du skyes te gang du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i bla ma byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der rgyal rigs
281a1(dkon brtsegs): su skyes so/ /sngon yongs su smin par byas pa'i srog chags bye ba phrag drug cu po de dag kyang de nyid du skyes nas de'i g.yog tu gyur to/ /de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi
281a2(dkon brtsegs): zhing der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shin tu mthor gshegs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa
281a3(dkon brtsegs): shin tu mthor gshegs de tshe'i tshad lo bye ba phrag brgyad cu thub par gyur to/ /de'i tshe na mi de dag gi tshe'i tshad kyang lo bye ba phrag brgyad cu thub par gyur to/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin
281a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shin tu mthor gshegs kyi nyan thos bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i nyan thos dgra bcom pa sha stag 'dus pa byung ste/ lo bye ba re re zhing nyan thos 'dus pa re re byung ngo /

281a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rgyal bu gzhon nu dpa' bas byin zhes bya ba mang du thos pa yid gzhungs pa de'i rgyus dpyod pa dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo / /shA ri'i bu/ gzhon nu de g.yog dang bcas pa
281a7(dkon brtsegs): s rog chags bye ba phrag brgyad cus bskor te mdun du bdar nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shin tu mthor
281b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mthor gshegs de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ gzhon nu dpa' bas byin g.yog
281b2(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / de nas shA ri'i bu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mthor gshegs des gzhon nu dpa'
281b3(dkon brtsegs): bas byin de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas sngon byung ba dang ldan pa'i gtam yang dag par rab tu bstan to/ /de nas shA ri'i bu/ rgyal bu gzhon nu dpa' bas byin de sngon byung ba dang
281b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i gtam de thos nas dad pa rab tu thob bo/ /de sems dad par gyur nas srog chags bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag dang lhan cig tu dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung
281b5(dkon brtsegs): ngo / /de de na tshe ji tsam thub par byang chub tshol zhing tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mthor gshegs des dge slong dag /byang chub sems
281b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpa' bas byin 'di nga'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
281b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtson 'grus chen po zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan
282a1(dkon brtsegs): t o| |bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mthor gshegs de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel la des mchod pa byas te dam pa'i chos
282a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang yang dag par bzung nas de'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus chen po zhes
282a3(dkon brtsegs): bya bar gyur to/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus chen po'i tshe'i tshad ni/ bskal pa phyed thub par gyur to/ /de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang dpag tu med pa zhig byung ste/
282a4(dkon brtsegs): de'i nyan thos 'dus pa re re la yang khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis yod de/ dgra bcom pa 'ba' zhig go/ shA ri'i bu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus ma nyams pa/ brtson
282a5(dkon brtsegs): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa byang chub sems dpa' sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs mang du thos te bzungs/ bcangs/ bklags/ kun chub par byas pas mthar gyis de
282a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus chen po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ba'i bar du'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bas na/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs
282a7(dkon brtsegs): k yi bu mo myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa'i brtson 'grus ma nyams pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod
282b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya ba nas rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pa'i bar du bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i
282b2(dkon brtsegs): sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol ba la brtson 'grus ma nyams pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni/ byang
282b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de la brtson pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
282b4(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa'i le'u ste/ dgu pa'o// //bam po bcu drug pa/ de la gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson na byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod par 'gyur
282b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa rnams las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i
282b6(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /shA
282b7(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu| gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rtog pa dang dpyod pa nye bar zhi zhing nang yongs su dang ste sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin
283a1(dkon brtsegs): las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba'i
283a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba
283a3(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o/ /zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
283a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bde ba yang spangs te/ snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang mi bde ba yang nub pas bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa btang snyoms
283a5(dkon brtsegs): dang dran pa yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de de ltar sems mnyam par bzhag pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ nyon mongs
283a6(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral bar gyur nas ting nge 'dzin kyang mi gtong la bsam gtan gyi las kyang byed do/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi
283a7(dkon brtsegs): las gang zhe na/ gang mngon par shes pa dang ye shes kyi las yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /de la mngon par shes pa gang / ye shes gang zhe na/ mngon par shes pa zhes
283b1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ni| 'di lta ste/ lha'i mig dang / lha'i rna ba dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba mngon sum du bya bar mngon par shes pa ste/ 'di dag
283b2(dkon brtsegs): ni| mngon par shes pa lnga zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig gis mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ni/ gang / mngon par shes
283b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ye shes kyi las yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni/ gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de ltar sems mnyam par bzhag pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su
283b4(dkon brtsegs): byang ba| nyon mongs pa med pa/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral bas sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir sems 'jug par byed de/ de lha'i mig
283b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag pa/ mi las shin tu 'das pas sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba dang / kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa dang / bde 'gro dang / ngan 'gro dang / bzang
283b6(dkon brtsegs): po dang / ngan pa rnams mthong ste/ kye sems can 'di dag ni/ lus kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis nyes par spyod pa dang
283b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa| 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa/ log par lta ba ste/ de dag log par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu ngan 'gro log
284a1(dkon brtsegs): par ltung ba'i sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can 'di dag ni/ lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gis legs
284a2(dkon brtsegs): par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa rnams la skur pa mi 'debs pa/ yang dag par lta ba ste/ de dag yang dag par lta ba'i las
284a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye'o/ /zhes sems can rnams kyi las ji ltar bsags pa bzhin du shes so/ /de ltar lha'i
284a4(dkon brtsegs): mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas sems can rnams kyi las ji ltar bsags pa shin tu rab tu shes so/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig sems can
284a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa/ gzugs su snang ba thams cad la sgrib pa med pa ste/ gang klu thams cad kyi lha'i mig dang / gnod sbyin thams cad dang / dri za thams
284a6(dkon brtsegs): cad dang / lha ma yin thams cad dang / slob pa thams cad dang / dgra bcom pa thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lha'i mig de bas lha'i mig gang shin tu khyad
284a7(dkon brtsegs): par du 'phags pa/ shin tu dam pa/ shin tu rab/ shin tu bzang ba/ shin tu gsal ba/ 'od gsal ba/ nges par 'byung ba'i las thams cad kyis nges par byung ba'i lha'i
284b1(dkon brtsegs): mig la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa na rags pa'am/ phra ba'am/ ngan pa'am/ bzang po'am/ gang ring ba'am/ gang nye ba thams cad snang ste/ de'i
284b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i mig gis shes so/ /shin tu rtogs so/ /rab tu mthong ngo / /de'i lha'i mig des gzugs med pa na spyod pa ma gtogs par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu
284b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa dag na sems can gang dag 'gro ba thams cad du skyes pa de dag thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /de dag gi las kyi rgyu
284b4(dkon brtsegs): yang rab tu shes so/ /de dag gi las kyi 'bras bu yang rab tu shes so/ /de dag gi dbang po rnams kyang rab tu shes so/ /dbang po'i rgyu yang rab tu shes so/ /dbang po'i rim pa yang rab

284b6(dkon brtsegs): mthong bas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo ste/ tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas pa de'i bsngo ba 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /

285a1(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang gang skyes bu dam pa de dag gi cho ga dang / spyod yul dang / spyod pa dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / spyod lam gyi gnas dang / chos kyi rnam par
285a2(dkon brtsegs): thar pa'i ye shes la gnas pa dang / gzungs thob pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa dang / shes rab dang / ye shes dang / thabs mkhas pa la 'jug pa de thams cad yongs su rdzogs
285a3(dkon brtsegs): par byed do/ /de'i mig de ni/ gzugs thams cad mthong bas sgrib pa med pa'o/ /de'i mig de ni/ gzugs thams cad la mi chags pas chags pa med pa'o/ /de'i mig de ni/ bag

285a6(dkon brtsegs): nas ldang ba med pa'o/ /de'i mig de ni/ chos snang ba rnams la chos snang ba thob pa'o/ /de'i mig de ni/ rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul ma yin te/ ye shes la rten pa'o/ /de'i mig

285b1(dkon brtsegs): dang mthun pa'o/ /de'i mig de ni/ sems can thams cad la 'od zer mnyam par gtong bas khong khro ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /de'i mig de ni/ sems kyi 'khrug pa dang bral

286b2(dkon brtsegs): ma leb dang / sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang gi sgra'am/ sems can de dag gi sems kyi dmigs pa dge ba'am/ mi dge ba de dag gis ngag gi las 'byin pa de thams cad kyang rab
286b3(dkon brtsegs): tu shes so/ /ngag gi las gang dge ba'i rgyu 'dzin pa dang / ngag gi las gang mi dge ba'i rgyu 'dzin pa de yang rab tu shes so/ /gang 'dod chags bag la nyal las khong khro ba'i
286b4(dkon brtsegs): ngag gi las 'byung ba dang / gang zhe sdang bag la nyal las chags pa'i ngag gi las 'byung ba dang / gang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang bag la nyal las rmongs pa'i ngag gi las
286b5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba de yang rab tu shes so/ /gang gti mug bag la nyal las chags pa'i ngag gi las 'byung ba dang / gang 'dod chags bag la nyal las chags pa'i ngag gi las 'byung

287a2(dkon brtsegs): rjes su chags pa yang med/ 'phags pa ma yin pa rnams kyi sgra la khong khro ba yang med de/ de 'phags pa rnams kyi sgra las ni/ byams pa chen po rab tu rnyed do/ /'phags pa

287a6(dkon brtsegs): cad ngang gi ngang gi 'jig pa yang rab tu shes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gis chos bstan pa nyan kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis pas chos bstan pa la sgrib pa'am
287a7(dkon brtsegs): kun nas bkris te 'dug par yang mi byed de/ yang shA ri'i bu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs pa snga phyi med par kun tu 'dzin to/ /gang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgra
287b1(dkon brtsegs): thos pa de yang dus dang dus ma yin par sbyor zhing ston to/ /de 'khor gyi dus la ma bab pa'am/ skal pa mi mnyam par bstan pa'i dus chos bstan pa'i dus la bab kyang 'jog ste thos kyang
287b2(dkon brtsegs): mi ston to/ /de chos kyi dus la bab pa'am/ 'khor gyi dus la bab na/ gcig slob pa yan chad la yang chos ston te/ lung bstan pa yang dag pa'ang gzhan la gnod na mi byed do/ /lung
287b3(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa yang dag pa ma yin yang don dang ldan na/ gzhan la phan gdags pa dang mthun par thabs la mkhas pas rang gi sems yongs su dag pa'i phyir lung ston no/ /sgra'i rnam
287b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ji lta bu thos par dga' ba de lta bu'i sgra thos so/ /sgra'i rnam pa ji lta bu la mi dga' ba de lta bu'i sgra'i rnam pa mi thos so/ /'khor gang la chos ston pa na byin gyi rlabs kyis sems
287b5(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyi rna ba'i rnam par shes pas sgra rab tu shes so/ /de la sems can gang dag chos cang shes pa de dag gis ni/ de'i chos thos so/ /sems can gang dag cang shes pa ma yin
287b6(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag gis ni/ chos de mi thos so/ /de'i rna ba'i khams de chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam par dag pa yin/ de'i rna ba'i khams de bdag gi khams kyis rnam par dag pa yin/ sems
287b7(dkon brtsegs): can gyi khams kyis rnam par dag pa yin no/ /de rna ba'i khams de sgra ji lta ba bzhin gyi yi ge'i nges pa'i tshig thos pas shin tu rtogs pa yin no/ /gang 'gro ba lngar skyes pa'i sems
288a1(dkon brtsegs): can de dag gi skad dang / smra ba sna tshogs la 'jug pa'i phyir chos ston to/ /de'i rna ba'i khams de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i snyan du yongs su bsngos
288a2(dkon brtsegs): ba yin gyi/ theg pa gzhan du ni/ ma yin te/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi las yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ de
