288a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'di'i sems kyi rgyu ni/ rgyu 'bring ngo / /sems can 'di'i sems kyi rgyu ni/ rgyu chung ngo / /sems can 'di'i dbang po rnams ni/ sbyin pa dang ldan pa'o/ /sems can 'di'i
288a7(dkon brtsegs): dbang po rnams ni/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o/ /sems can 'di'i dbang po rnams ni/ bzod pa dang ldan pa'o/ /sems can 'di'i dbang po rnams ni/ brtson 'grus kyi bsam pa

288b3(dkon brtsegs): can 'di'i dbang po rnams ni/ btang snyoms kyi rnam pa'o/ /sems can 'di'i dbang po rnams ni/ theg pa chen po'i rnam pa'o/ /sems can 'di'i dbang po rnams ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
288b4(dkon brtsegs): theg pa'i rnam pa'o/ /sems can 'di'i dbang po rnams ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i rnam pa'o/ /sems can 'di ni/ rgyu'i stobs can te/ rgyu'i gtso bo'i dge ba dang ldan pa'o/ /sems
288b5(dkon brtsegs): can 'di ni/ rkyen gyi stobs can te/ rkyen gyi gtso bo'i rgyu dang ldan pa'o/ /sems can 'di ni/ rgyu'i stobs can yin yang rgyu'i gtso bo'i dge ba dang ldan pa ma yin te/ sems can 'di
288b6(dkon brtsegs): ni| sbyor ba'i rgyus rigs dma' bar skyes pa'o/ /sems can 'di ni/ sbyor ba'i stobs can yin yang dge ba rgya chen po'i rgyu dang mi ldan te/ sems can 'di ni/ rgyu'i stobs bskyed
288b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyus rigs chen por skyes pa'o/ /sems can 'di ni/ bsam pa dag la sbyor ba ma dag pa'o/ /sems can 'di ni/ sbyor ba dag la bsam pa ma dag pa'o/ /sems can
289a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni/ sbyor ba yang dag la bsam pa yang dag pa'o/ /sems can 'di ni/ bsam pa yang ma dag la sbyor ba yang ma dag pa'o/ /zhes sems can thams
289a2(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi sems kyi rgyu dang / nye ba'i rgyu'i rnam grangs kyi sems kyi shes pa la 'jug go /shA ri'i bu/ de ltar gang sems can thams cad kyi 'das pa'i rgyu'i dbang po la sems
289a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pa shes pa dang / de dag la ci rigs par chos ston par shes pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol gyi sems shes pa zhes bya'o/ /yang sems can 'di de ltar
289a4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa'i rgyu ste/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na tshul khrims kyi rgyur 'gyur ro/ /sems can 'di da ltar tshul khrims kyi rgyu ste/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sbyin pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ /sems
289a5(dkon brtsegs): can 'di da ltar bzod pa'i rgyu ste/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na brtson 'grus kyi rgyur 'gyur ro/ /sems can 'di da ltar brtson 'grus kyi rgyu ste/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bzod pa'i
289a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyur 'gyur ro/ /sems can 'di da ltar 'jig rten pa'i spyod pa yin la/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ /sems can 'di'i dbang po rnams
289a7(dkon brtsegs): ni| da ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa'i rgyu las skyes pa ste/ ma 'ongs pa na theg pa chen po'i rgyu las skyes pa'i dbang po rnams su 'gyur ro/ /sems can 'di'i dbang po rnams ni/
289b1(dkon brtsegs): da ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa'i rgyu las skyes pa ste/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i rgyu las skyes pa'i dbang po rnams su 'gyur ro/ /sems can 'di'i dbang po rnams
289b2(dkon brtsegs): ni| da ltar theg pa chen po'i rgyu las skyes pa ste/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nyan thos kyi theg pa'i rgyu las skyes par 'gyur ro/ /zhes phyi ma'i mtha'i sems la 'jug pa shes so/ /shA
289b3(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu/ de ltar ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rnams kyi rgyu las skyes pa gang dang / rnam pa gang dang / rkyen du 'gyur ba gang yin pa de'i rgyu las skyes pa dang /
289b4(dkon brtsegs): de'i rnam pa dang / de'i rkyen rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /de sems can yongs su ma smin pa thams cad la de'i sems la 'jug pa'i shes pa'i bar du skyo bar
289b5(dkon brtsegs): mi byed de/ de'i chos kyi snod ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar chos ston to/ /de 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston kyang chos nyid las byas so/ /zhes byed pa ma yin no/ /gang da ltar byung ba'i sems
289b6(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams 'jug pa de dag thams cad kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i
289b7(dkon brtsegs): sems kyang 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems su yang
290a1(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems kyang zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes
290a2(dkon brtsegs): so| |zhe sdang med pa'i sems kyang zhe sdang med pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems kyang gti mug dang bcas pa'i
290a3(dkon brtsegs): sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /gti mug med pa'i sems kyang gti mug dang bral ba'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /shA
290a4(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu| de ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa gang dang gang gis sems can gang dang gang gis sems pa sgribs pa de thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ shes
290a5(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang nyon mongs pa las gdon pa'i phyir de lta de lta bur chos ston te/ 'khor gang gi nang du 'gro yang thog ma nyid du 'khor de dag thams cad la rnam par lta'o/ /rnam par
290a6(dkon brtsegs): bltas nas sems can rnams la ji lta ji lta bur rig pa de lta de lta bu'i chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu/ de ltar gang sems can de dag gi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa
290a7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa de thams cad rab tu shes kyang byang chub sems dpa' rang gi sems lhur byed pa'ang ma yin la/ gzhan gyi sems lhur byed pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar
290b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de'i sems kyi rgyun ni/ ye shes kyis rig pa'o/ /sems kyi rgyun ni/ dran pas rig pa'o/ /blo gros kyis rig pa'o/ /sems kyi rgyun ni/ rtogs pas rig pa'o/ /
290b2(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi rgyun ni/ shes rab kyis rig pa'o/ /sems kyi rgyun ni/ blos rig pa'o/ /sems kyi rgyun ni/ nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par bcad pa/
290b3(dkon brtsegs): dag pa| dri ma med pa/ 'od gsal ba/ kha na ma tho ba med pa/ mi rtsub pa/ rnyog pa med pa/ chos thams cad snang bar rig pa'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa'i rjes su
290b4(dkon brtsegs): zhugs par rig pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ltar gang de lta bu'i chos la sems shes pa 'jug pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol gyi sems mngon par shes pa dang / ye shes kyi
290b5(dkon brtsegs): las yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa ni/ gang / mngon par shes pa'i
290b6(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyi las yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni/ gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams ma lus pa thams
290b7(dkon brtsegs): cad na sems can thams cad kyi skye ba gcig dang / gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu dang / skye ba brgya dang / skye ba stong
291a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / skye ba brgya phrag stong dang / skye ba brgya phrag du ma dang / skye ba stong phrag du ma dang / skye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang / 'jig pa'i bskal pa dang / chags
291a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bskal pa dang / 'jig pa dang chags pa'i bskal pa dang / 'jig pa'i bskal pa du ma dang / chags pa'i bskal pa du ma dang / 'jig pa dang chags pa'i bskal pa du ma dang /
291a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'di sngon che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig tu byung ste/ ming ni/ 'di zhes bya/ rus ni/ 'di zhes bya/ rigs ni/ 'di zhes bya/ kha dog ni/ 'di lta bu/ cha byad ni/ 'di lta bu/
291a4(dkon brtsegs): dbyibs ni/ 'di lta bu/ zas ni/ 'di lta bu zhig za za/ yun ni/ 'di srid gcig tu gnas gnas/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni/ 'di lta bu zhig myong ste/ de nas shi 'phos nas che
291a5(dkon brtsegs): ge mo zhig tu skyes te/ de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes so/ /zhes sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran no/ /de ltar na/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa dang bcas
291a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / yul phyogs dang bcas pa rnam pa du ma rjes su dran no/ /de bdag gi sngon gyi mtha' nas bzung ste sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran no/ /sems can gzhan rnams
291a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / gang zag gzhan dag gi sngon gyi mtha' nas bzung ste sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran no/ /de rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon gyi rgyu las byung ba yang rjes su dran no/
291b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu yang rjes su dran no/ /de rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang byang chub tu bsngo bar byed do/ /sems can gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang sems can rnams
291b2(dkon brtsegs): rjes su dran par byas nas byang chub tu sems skyed par byed do/ /gang sngon gyi bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu de yang mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal pa dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par
291b3(dkon brtsegs): ston to/ /de mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa la rton pas gzugs kyis dregs pa ma yin/ longs spyod kyis dregs pa ma yin/ g.yog gis dregs
291b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin/ dbang phyug gis dregs pa ma yin/ 'khor los bsgyur ba 'dod pas dregs pa ma yin/ brgya byin 'dod pas dregs pa ma yin/ tshangs pa 'dod pas dregs pa ma yin
291b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten skyong ba 'dod pas dregs pa ma yin/ skye ba thams cad 'dod pas dregs pa ma yin/ 'dod pa dang / rgyal po'i srid dang / dbang phyug gi bde ba thams cad 'dod pa'i blo
291b6(dkon brtsegs): gros can ma yin te/ gzhan du na sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsam bzhin du srid pa 'dzin pa ni/ ma gtogs so/ /de mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa
291b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / bdag med pa la rton pas sngon gyi nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa la khrel zhing ngo tsha bar byed/ smod par byed de/ da ltar byung ba'i dngos pos srog gi phyir yang mi dge ba'i rtsa bar
292a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i las mi byed do/ /de sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing rgyas par byed
292a2(dkon brtsegs): do| |da ltar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang thams cad bsdus pa'i phyir mi mthun pa'i yongs su bsngo ba spangs te/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang / chos kyi rigs dang / dge 'dun gyi
292a3(dkon brtsegs): rigs rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir dran pa yang dag par bskyed pa'i stobs kyis thams cad mkhyen par yongs su bsngo ste/ de'i dran pa de yang chos kyi dbyings kyi byin gyi
292a4(dkon brtsegs): rlabs kyis shin tu byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /shin tu rigs pas mi g.yo'o/ /bsam gtan yongs su sbyang ba byas pas ma brtags pa'o/ /zhi gnas kyis shin tu byin gyis
292a5(dkon brtsegs): brlabs pas gnod pa med pa'o/ /lhag mthong gis shin tu yang dag par zin pas 'khrul pa med pa'o/ /mngon sum gyi phyir phal pa ma yin pa'o/ /dran pa ma nyams pa'i
292a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir brjed pa med pa'o/ /bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po bsags pa dang / gzhan la rag ma lus pa'i ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa'i phyir myong ba chen po'o/ /pha rol tu phyin
292a7(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad kyi tshogs bsags pa'i phyir pha rol tu song ba ste/ de ltar dran pa yang dag par bskyed pa'i stobs kyis 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams brjed pa med
292b1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi gnas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi las yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba mngon
292b2(dkon brtsegs): sum du bya ba shes pas mngon par shes pa ni/ gang / mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi las yongs su rdzogs pa ni/ gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i 'dun
292b3(dkon brtsegs): pa ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / sems dang / spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul
292b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi rkang pa sgom pa ste/ de 'dun pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / sems dang / dpyod pas rab tu zin pa'i chos rnams 'dod pa dang / stug par byed pa dang / dbang sgyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul
292b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi rkang pa bzhi po 'di dag shin tu yongs su bsgom pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul rnams mngon du thob pa yin te/ de rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyi spang ba rnam pa du ma myong ngo / /de rdzu 'phrul gyi cho
292b6(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul de dag kyang sems can la blta ba'i phyir yongs su goms pa yin no/ /de gzugs sam/ stobs sam/ byin gyis brlabs sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gang dang gang gis
292b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de dang de nyid nye bar ston te/ /de gzugs dang / kha dog tu snang ba gang dang gang gis sems can rnams 'dul bar
293a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i gzugs dang kha dog tu snang ba de dang de nyid ston te/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / kha dog tu snang ba'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang kha dog
293a2(dkon brtsegs): tu snang ba'am/ nyan thos kyi gzugs dang kha dog tu snang ba'am/ brgya byin gyi gzugs dang kha dog tu snang ba'am/ tshangs pa'i gzugs dang kha dog tu snang ba'am/ 'jig rten skyong
293a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gzugs dang kha dog tu snang ba'am/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i gzugs dang kha dog tu snang ba'am/ gzhan yang gzugs dang kha dog tu snang ba/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi
293a4(dkon brtsegs): g zugs dang kha dog tu snang ba gang dang gang gis sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs dang kha dog tu snang ba de dang de nyid sems can rnams la nye bar bstan nas chos
293a5(dkon brtsegs): ston to/ /de'i stobs snyems pa dang / khro ba dang / rgyags pa lhur byed pa'i sems can rnams stobs gang gis 'dul bar bya ba'i stobs de nye bar ston to/ /ji tsam sred med kyi
293a6(dkon brtsegs): bu chen po'i stobs tsam mam/ ji tsam sred med kyi bu chen po'i stobs kyi bzhi cha tsam mam/ ji tsam sred med kyi bu chen po'i stobs kyi phyed tsam mam/ ji tsam sred med kyi bu
293a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i stobs rangs pa tsam mam/ ji tsam stobs gang gis ri'i rgyal po ri rab 'phang du dpag tshad stong phrag brgya drug cu/ zheng du dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pa sor
293b1(dkon brtsegs): mo gnyis kyis blangs nas 'phen te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyu ru ra 'bru gcig blangs pa bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du 'phangs kyang byang chub sems dpa' de'i stobs yongs
293b2(dkon brtsegs): su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ltar rgya che ba/ 'di ltar yangs pa/ 'di'i chu'i phung po nas bzung ste srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar
293b3(dkon brtsegs): du lag mthil du bzhag la bskal par 'dug cing spyod lam thams cad kyang ston pa de lta bu'i stobs dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i stobs snyems pa dang / khro ba dang / rgyags
293b4(dkon brtsegs): pa lhur byed pa'i sems can rnams la stobs snyems pa dang / khro ba dang / rgyags pa gzhil ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag gis byin gyi rlabs kyis ye shes
293b5(dkon brtsegs): 'thob ste/ byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes des gang byin gyis brlabs pa de de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te rgya mtsho chen po phyugs rjes kyi chu tsam du byin gyis brlabs na de phyugs rjes
293b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi chu tsam du gnas so/ /gal te phyugs rjes rgya mtsho chen po tsam du gyur cig/ ce na yang de rgya mtsho chen por 'gyur ro/ /gal te sreg pa'i bskal ba chu'i phung por gyur cig /ces byin
293b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis brlabs na yang de bzhin du chu'i phung por 'gyur ro/ /chus 'jig pa yang mes 'jig par gyur cig /ces byin gyis brlabs pa de de bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du sbyar te tha ma
294a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / rab dang / 'bring gi chos rnams kyis gang dang / gang byin gyis brlabs pa'i byin gyi rlabs de dang de thams cad de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gzhan du
294a2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no/ /de'i byin gyi rlabs de ni/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ brgya byin nam/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ 'jig rten 'di na gang gis kyang chos dang mthun pas
294a3(dkon brtsegs): bsgul ba'am/ bskyod pa'am/ mi snang bar byed mi nus te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ ma gtogs so/ /de byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs bskyed pa des dga' ba
294a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po sna tshogs lhur byed pa'i sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag kyang nyams pa med pa'o/ /bdag nyid dbang
294a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'o/ /bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i yul las shin tu 'das pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi yul la 'jug pa'o/ /sems can rnams la mi 'tshe bar sbyor ba'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs
294a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bsags pa'o/ /bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mi phyed pa ste/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba mngon sum du bya ba mngon par
294a7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i ye shes kyi las yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa ni/ gang / ye shes ni/ gang zhe na/ gang lha'i
294b1(dkon brtsegs): mig gis gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni/ mngon par shes pa zhes bya'o/ /gzugs su snang ba rnams la zad pa'i chos nyid du shes kyang mngon sum du mi byed pa 'di ni/ ye shes zhes
294b2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ gang sgrar grags pa thams cad thos pa 'di ni/ mngon par shes pa zhes bya'o/ /gang thos pa'i sngon gyi mtha' brjod du med pa 'di ni/ ye shes zhes
294b3(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang gang sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa rab tu shes pa 'di ni/ mngon par shes pa zhes bya'o/ /gang sems 'gog par yang shes la
294b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gog pa mngon sum du yang mi byed pa 'di ni/ ye shes zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang gang sngon gyi mtha' la chags pa med par dran pa 'di ni/ mngon par shes pa zhes
294b5(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ /gang dus gsum la chags pa med pa'i ye shes 'di ni/ ye shes zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang gang zhing thams cad du 'gro ba dang 'ong ba 'di ni/ mngon par shes pa
294b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o/ /gang zhig nam mkha' lta bur shes pa la 'jug pa 'di ni/ ye shes zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang gang btsun pa'i chos la 'jug pa 'di ni/ mngon par shes pa zhes bya'o/ /
294b7(dkon brtsegs): gang chos mnyam par mthong ba 'di ni/ ye shes zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang gang 'jig rten thams cad la chags par 'gyur ba 'di ni/ mngon par shes pa zhes bya'o/ /gang
295a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'dre ba 'di ni/ ye shes zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang gang brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad zil
295a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis gnon pa 'di ni/ mngon par shes pa zhes bya'o/ /gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul shes pa 'di ni/ ye shes zhes bya ste/ shA ri'i bu/ de ltar mngon
295a3(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa de dag dang / ye shes 'di ni/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi las yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ltar nyon mongs pa'i sems g.yeng
295a4(dkon brtsegs): ba ji snyed par byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi tshogs dang / sems kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes kyang de tsam mo/ /sems can thams cad kyi sems g.yeng ba ji snyed pa
295a5(dkon brtsegs): de tsam du byang chub sems dpas bsam gtan gyi yan lag gi tshogs yang dag par bsdu bar bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' nam yang dag par blangs te/
295a6(dkon brtsegs): de la gnas pa de na mnyam par gzhag pa zhes bya ste/ sems can mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par gzhag pa'o/ /sems mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par gzhag pa'o/ /bsam
295a7(dkon brtsegs): pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par gzhag pa'o/ /sbyor ba mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par gzhag pa'o/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par gzhag pa'o/ /sbyin
295b1(dkon brtsegs): pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par gzhag pa'o/ /tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par gzhag pa'o/ /
295b2(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par gzhag pa'o/ /byang chub gang dang mnyam pa sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnyam pa'o/ /sems can thams cad gang dang mnyam pa
295b3(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam pa ste/ gang mnyam pa de la snyoms par zhugs pa de ni/ snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /stong pa nyid gang dang mnyam pa chos thams cad kyang de
295b4(dkon brtsegs): dang mnyam pa ste/ mnyam pa de la snyoms par zhugs pas de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /mtshan ma med pa gang dang mnyam pa dang / smon pa med pa gang dang mnyam pa
295b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa gang dang mnyam pa'i mnyam pa de la snyoms par zhugs pas de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /rang gi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis chos thams
295b6(dkon brtsegs): cad mnyam pa nyid la snyoms par zhugs pas de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa shes bya'o/ /phan 'dogs pa dang / gnod par byed pa thams cad la sems sa dang mnyam pa/ sems
295b7(dkon brtsegs): chu dang mnyam pa/ sems med dang mnyam pa/ sems rlung dang mnyam pa/ sems nam mkha' dang mnyam pa/ mi mtho ba/ mi dma' ba/ gnas pa/ shin tu gnas pa/ mi g.yo ba
296a1(dkon brtsegs): thob pa/ spyod lam thams cad dang mnyam par gzhag pa/ spyod lam ma bcos pa rang bzhin gyis snyoms par zhugs pa/ mi rgod pa/ mi g.yeng ba/ mi
296a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phyar ba/ mu cor mi smra ba/ tshig ma 'tshal ba/ don shes pa/ chos shes pa/ dus shes pa/ tshod shes pa/ drod shes pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang mthun pa/ 'jig rten
296a3(dkon brtsegs): dang ma 'dres pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad las yang dag par 'das pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad dang ma 'dres pa/ 'du 'dzi dang bral ba/ spyod yul dben pa ste/ de lta bu'i
296a4(dkon brtsegs): chos la gnas pa/ mnyam pa/ gzhag pa'i gnas kyang mi 'dor ba 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad du yang kun tu snang ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab dang thabs
296a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ gang la snyoms par 'jug pa na sems can la lta bas snying rje chen pos dmigs pa'i sems nye bar
296a6(dkon brtsegs): 'brel bar byed pa 'di ni/ de'i thabs so/ /zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba la snyoms par 'jug pa 'di ni/ de'i shes rab bo/ /gang snyoms par 'jug pa na sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
296a7(dkon brtsegs): sgrub pa 'di ni/ de'i thabs so/ /gang chos gang la yang nye bar 'brel par mi byed pa 'di ni/ de'i shes rab po/ /gang snyoms par 'jug pa na chos thams cad 'dzin pa la
296b1(dkon brtsegs): ltos pa de ni/ de'i thabs so/ /gang chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pas bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni/ de'i shes rab po/ /gang snyoms par 'jug pa na sangs rgyas kyi sku rgyan mngon du byed pa
296b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni/ de'i thabs so/ /gang chos kyi sku la gnas nas bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni/ de'i shes rab bo/ /gang snyoms par 'jug pa na sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang / dbyangs dang / sgra
296b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs la sems pa de ni/ de'i thabs so/ /gang brjod du med pa'i chos nyid kyis bsam gtan byed pa de ni/ de'i shes rab bo/ /gang snyoms par 'jug pa na sems
296b4(dkon brtsegs): rdo rje lta bur byin gyis rlob pa 'di ni/ de'i thabs so/ /gang dran pa mi g.yeng bas bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni/ de'i shes rab bo/ /gang snyoms par 'jug pa na sngon gyi smon lam gyis
296b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs su smin par byed pa byin gyis rlob pa 'di ni/ de'i thabs so/ /gang sems can thams cad bdag med par bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni/ de'i shes rab bo/ /gang
296b6(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan byed pa na dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams lhag par dmigs pa 'di ni/ de'i thabs so/ /gang rtsa ba med pa dang / gnas med par bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni/ de'i shes rab bo/ /
296b7(dkon brtsegs): gang snyoms par 'jug pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa mngon du byed pa 'di ni/ de'i thabs so/ /gang zhing nam mkha' dang mnyam par bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni/ de'i shes rab bo/ /
297a1(dkon brtsegs): gang snyoms par 'jug pa na byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan bkod pa mngon du byed pa 'di ni/ de'i thabs so/ /gang nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi bar bsam gtan byed
297a2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di ni/ de'i shes rab bo/ /gang snyoms par 'jug pa na chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba la dmigs par byed pa 'di ni/ de'i thabs so/ /gang bskor ba yang med ldog pa yang
297a3(dkon brtsegs): med par bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni/ de'i shes rab bo/ /byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs ji snyed pa de la snyoms par 'jug pa na btang snyoms su byed pa dang / mngon du byed pa 'di
297a4(dkon brtsegs): ni| de'i thabs so/ /nye ba'i nyon mongs pa ji snyed pa yongs su gdung ba med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang / bsam gtan gyi bde ba chos thams cad dang mi ldan pa dang /
297a5(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes chags pa med pa 'du shes yongs su shes pa dang / 'du shes thams cad sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi nges par gyur pa de la bsam gtan dang / bsam
297a6(dkon brtsegs): gtan med par bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni/ de'i shes rab ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bur zhugs pa rnams kyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
297a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni/ zad mi shes pa'o/ /bdud thams cad kyis kyang glags mi rnyed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi snod du nye bar gnas pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na/ 'di ni/
297b1(dkon brtsegs): thabs| 'di ni/ shes rab ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs dang / shes rab kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan
297b2(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ mngon par shes pa las nyams pa med par 'du shes su gyur pa'i las rnams kyang byed do/ /mngon par shes pas kyang rnam par rol
297b3(dkon brtsegs): la bya ba thams cad kyang yongs su ston to/ /mngon par shes pa la yang rab tu gnas la/ 'jug pa chen po la yang 'dzud par byed do/ /de'i mngon par shes pa de ni/ ye shes byed pa'o/ /
297b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten las 'das pa'o/ /nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'o/ /bya ba thams cad la rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'o/ /de'i mngon par shes pa de ni/ shes rab byed
297b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'o| |'jig rten gyi dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams mngon sum du gyur pa'o/ /de'i mngon par shes pa de ni/ zad pa'i rnam pa'o/ /thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'o/ /nam
297b6(dkon brtsegs): mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o/ /de'i mngon par shes pa de ni/ gzugs dang / gzugs med pa rnams su gzugs thams cad kun tu ston pa'o/ /de'i mngon par shes pa de ni/ sngon gyi mtha'i
297b7(dkon brtsegs): sgra dang mnyam pa nyid kyis sgra thams cad kyi rjes su song ngo / /de'i mngon par shes pa de ni/ rang bzhin dag mngon sum du mthong bas sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la rnam
298a1(dkon brtsegs): par lta ba'o/ /de'i mngon par shes pa de ni/ sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su gcod pas bskal pa thams cad rjes su dran pa'o/ /de'i mngon par
298a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa de ni/ rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa kun tu ston cing gzhan la mngon du phyogs pa mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /de'i mngon par shes pa de ni/ dus las
298a3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'da' bas dus la sdod pa'i phyir zag pa zad pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su song ba'o/ /de'i mngon par shes pa de ni/ 'phags pa'o/ /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la nges
298a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'o/ /de'i mngon par shes pa de ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba'o/ /de'i mngon par shes pa de ni/ zab mo'i
298a5(dkon brtsegs): don to| |bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa'o/ /de'i mngon par shes pa de ni/ byang chub kyi snying po 'dzin pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la
298a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhol ba'o/ /de'i mngon par shes pa de ni/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang mthun pa'o/ /de'i mngon par shes pa de ni/ sems can thams cad 'dul bar byed pa'o/ /de'i mngon
298a7(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa de ni/ chos thams cad la dbang bas dbang bskur ba thob pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa ma nyams pa ni/ shes pas byas pa'i
298b1(dkon brtsegs): las rnams byed kyi/ nga rgyal gyis byas pa ni/ ma yin no/ /mngon par shes pa ma nyams pa de sems yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su byang ba dang / 'od gsal ba dang / nyon mongs pa
298b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba dang / shin tu dul ba dang / shin tu zhi ba dang / shin tu sbyang ba byas pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
298b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / snyoms par 'jug pas kyang bsam bzhin du skyes te/ bcings bzhin du skye ba ma yin/ bcings bzhin du 'chi 'pho ba ma yin/ bcings bzhin du 'byung ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i
298b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ de ni/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa las grol ba'o/ /de ni/ nyon mongs pa'i bcings pa thams cad las grol ba'o/ /de ni/ phyin ci log gi rtse mo'i gnas las
298b5(dkon brtsegs): grol ba'o/ /de bas na/ de grol bzhin du skye/ grol bzhin du 'chi 'pho/ /grol bzhin du 'byung ngo / /de skye yang theg pa chen pos phongs par yang mi 'gyur la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
298b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis phun sum tshogs par yang 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag kyang phyogs bcu kun tu btsal kyang mi rnyed mi dmigs la/ chos thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rjes
298b7(dkon brtsegs): su 'jug go / de ltar na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / chos thams cad dang ni/ chos kyang ma yin la/ chos yin pa yang ma yin pa zhes bya'o/ /chos gang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du kun tu
299a1(dkon brtsegs): btsal kyang mi rnyed pa de la bgrang ba gang yang med de/ chos thams cad ni/ bgrang ba'i lam las shin tu 'das pa'o/ /gang chos thams cad mnyam pa
299a2(dkon brtsegs): nyid du shes pa de ni/ chos dang / chos ma yin pa la mngon par chags par mi byed do/ /mngon par chags pa med pa de ni/ chos thams cad kyi don to/ /gang don la rlom sems su
299a3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa de ni/ de'i gnod pa chen po'o/ /gang don la rlom sems su mi byed pa de'i mdun na ni/ don nam don ma yin pa mi gnas so/ /don mthong ba las gang du'ang blo thogs par mi
299a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ de'i blo thogs pa med do/ /gang blo thogs pa med pa de yongs su mi 'dzin to/ /gang yongs su mi 'dzin pa de mi chags so/ /gang mi chags pa de gnas med do/ /gang
299a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas med pa de nyams pa med do/ /gang nyams pa med pa de'i rtsol ba 'bras bu yod pa'o/ /gang rtsol ba'i 'bras bu yod pa de la gti mug med do/ /gang gti mug med pa de la
299a6(dkon brtsegs): nga yi ba med do/ /gang la nga yi ba med pa de la rtsod pa med do/ /gang la rtsod pa med pa de dge sbyong gi chos rtsod pa med pa'o/ /gang dge sbyong gi chos rtsod pa med pa de lag pa'i nam
299a7(dkon brtsegs): mkha' dang mtshungs so/ /gang lag pa'i nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa de 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i
299b1(dkon brtsegs): khams su gtogs pa ma yin no/ /gang thams cad du gtogs pa ma yin pa de la kha dog med/ mtshan ma med/ dbyibs med do/ /gang kha dog med/ mtshan ma med/ dbyibs
299b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa de'i rjes su gtogs pa ni/ de 'dra'o/ /de'i rjes su gtogs pa ci 'dra bar gtogs pa'ang de 'dra'o/ /ci'i phyir rjes su gtogs pa dang / gtogs pa zhes bya zhe na/ gang gi
299b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir gang rjes su gtogs par bya ba dang / gtogs par bya ba'i chos rdul tsam yang mi dmigs pas de'i phyir rjes su gtogs pa dang / gtogs pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar rjes su gtogs
299b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gtogs pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ngo
299b5(dkon brtsegs): mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gang zhe na/ gang byams pa dang / bdag med pa nyid dang / snying rje dang / sems can med pa nyid dang / dga' ba dang / srog med pa nyid dang / btang
299b6(dkon brtsegs): snyoms dang / gang zag med pa nyid dang / sbyin pa dang sbyin pa'i sems nyid dang / tshul khrims dang zhi ba'i sems nyid dang / bzod pa dang mi zad pa'i sems nyid dang / brtson 'grus
299b7(dkon brtsegs): dang dben pa'i sems nyid dang / bsam gtan dang nges par rtogs pa'i sems nyid dang / shes rab dang spros pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang dran pa med cing
300a1(dkon brtsegs): yid la byed pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / yang dag par spong ba dang skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang spros pa med pa'i
300a2(dkon brtsegs): sems nyid dang / dad pa dang chags pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / dran pa dang rang byung gi sems nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par zhugs pa'i sems nyid dang / shes rab dang
300a3(dkon brtsegs): dbang po med pa'i sems nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang kha na ma tho ba med pa'i sems nyid dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang byang chub rab tu dbye ba dang / lam sgom pa dang sgom pa'i sems
300a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang / zhi gnas dang nye bar zhi ba'i sems nyid dang / lhag mthong dang mthong ba bri ba med pa dang 'phags pa'i bden pa sgom pa dang shin tu yongs su shes pa'i sems nyid dang /
300a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang thog ma nas dag pa nyid dang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i sems nyid dang / mi skye ba la bzod pa
300a6(dkon brtsegs): dang mi dmigs pa'i sems nyid dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa dang phyir mi ldog pa'i sems nyid dang / mtshan rnyed pa dang mtshan med pa'i sems nyid dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i
300a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyan dang khams gsum gyi snying po'i sems nyid dang / bdud tshar gcod pa dang sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa'i sems nyid dang / byang chub dang chos thams cad kyi rang
300b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin rjes su rtog pa'i sems nyid dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang ldog pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po kun tu ston pa'i sems nyid dang /
300b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i rang bzhin mnyam pa'i sems nyid de/ shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na/ rjes su gtogs pa dang / gtogs pa'i don la snyoms par zhugs pa'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos ni/
300b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag dang / gzhan dag ste/ de'i phyir ngo mtshar dang / rmad du byung ba'i chos dang ldan pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag de 'dra zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ de la bsam gtan zhes bya ba ci zhe na/
300b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir de la ma chags pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam
300b5(dkon brtsegs): gtan ni/ bdag bde ba la ma chags pa'i phyir myong ba med pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba'i phyir snying rje chen po la dmigs pa'o//
300b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/ 'dod pa'i khams la mi dmigs pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin las mi ldog pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/ sems
300b7(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa rab tu shes pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa sbyong ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/ sems kyi dbang phyug shes pa'i phyir de kho na
301a1(dkon brtsegs): la 'gro ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/ gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams thams cad kyi phyir snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad
301a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi snyoms par 'jug pa zil gyis non pa'i phyir zhi ba/ rab tu zhi ba/ nye bar zhi ba'o/ /
301a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/ shin tu mthar phyin pa'i phyir mi bskyod pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor
301a4(dkon brtsegs): ba yang dag par 'joms pa'i phyir gnyen po'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/ 'jig rten thams cad las 'das pa'i phyir shes rab kyi mchog go /byang chub
301a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/ sems can thams cad sgrol bar byed pa'i phyir sems can la bsam pa sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan
301a6(dkon brtsegs): ni| de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul zad mi shes pas dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/ rtag tu mnyam par gzhag
301a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir mngon par 'phags pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/ las thams cad yongs su rdzogs par dbang byed pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
301b1(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan ni/ ye shes che ba nyid kyi phyir phyin pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bsam gtan no/ /shA ri'i bu/ de la bsam gtan
301b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang gi sngon du 'gro zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems nges par rtog pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /sems rtse gcig pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /sems gnas pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /
301b3(dkon brtsegs): sems zhi gnas kyi sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'i sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyi sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /
301b4(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /'gog pa dgu'i sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /dge ba'i
301b5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i dgra 'dul ba'i sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yongs su rdzogs pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
301b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin gyi sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /de ltar na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ de dag dang / zhi bar byed pa'i chos gzhan rnams
301b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi yang sngon du 'gro ba ste/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de la brtson pa'i byang chub sems
302a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i don de nyid rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad
302a2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /bsam gtan dang ni rnam thar pha rol phyin/ /pad+ma chu yis gos pa med pa ltar/ /yid ni chags med dag pa'i 'jig rten na/ /bskal mang rgya mtshor rtag tu
302a3(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa spyod/ /gang du ting 'dzin pha rol son pa yis/ /rnam par snang mdzad zhi ba'i ting 'dzin dang / /zla 'od ces bya ting 'dzin rnam bkod pa/ /de nyid glog gis rab
302a4(dkon brtsegs): tu brgyan pa dang / /mngon par 'phags dang de bzhin sems pa dang / /dri ma med dang snang ldan ting 'dzin dang / /yon tan 'od dang grub 'od mya ngan med/ /chos rnams
302a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la ni dbang bsgyur dang / /chos sgron dang ni de bzhin chos pa dang / /ting 'dzin chos kyi dbang phyug ri rab dpa'/ /dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes dbang byed dang / /dam chos kun
302a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin shin tu rnam dag dang / /gzhan gyi sems la rnam spyod ting 'dzin dang / /dam chos dkon mchog 'od zer ting 'dzin dang / /rgyal mtshan rtse mo dpung rgyan nyon mongs sel/ /bdud kyi
302a7(dkon brtsegs): stobs rnams 'joms pa'i ting 'dzin dang / /stobs bcu dang ni stobs las mngon 'phags dang / /kun bcad chags med ces bya'i ting 'dzin dang / /lag na sgron ma 'dug sbyin
302b1(dkon brtsegs): bskrags pa dang / /sa 'dzin legs par gnas pa'i ting 'dzin dang / /ri rab sgron dang rgyal ba mi pham dang / /ye shes sgron dang de bzhin mi gtsang dang / /rgyal ba thams cad dran pa'i ting 'dzin dang //
302b2(dkon brtsegs): chos dran dang ni yon tan ye shes 'jug /stong par 'jug dang de bzhin mtshan med dang / /smon med ting 'dzin de bzhin zhi ba'i sa/ /'du shes sna tshogs bral zhes bya ba dang / /rab dul klu
302b3(dkon brtsegs): dbang stag ces bya ba dang / /'khyil ba dang ni rnam par ldog pa dang / 'dzum pa med dang stobs dang mig dag dang / /ting 'dzin rdo rje 'dra dang rdo rjes/ /mngon 'phags mi 'dzum lhun po lta
302b4(dkon brtsegs): bu dang / /kun nas klong 'khyil rnam par dag sgra dang / /nges rtog nyon mongs bral ba'i ting 'dzin dang / /nam mkha' 'dra dang nam mkha'i bar skabs dang / /yon tan thams cad gus par
302b5(dkon brtsegs): len pa dang / /blo gros dran rtogs blo 'phel spobs mi zad/ /nges tshig bstan pa mtha' yas mi zad dang / /legs byas byas pa chud mi za ba dang / /lta ba dang ni 'gro ba tshim byed dang / /
302b6(dkon brtsegs): byams pa mngon 'phags snying rje yangs pa'i rtsa/ /dga' dang mchog tu dga' ba 'jug pa dang / /btang snyoms dang ni gnyis la chags grol dang / /chos don chos kyi 'od zer ting 'dzin
302b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / /'khrug med ye shes sgron dang ye shes mtsho/ /rnam grol snying po 'gro ba tshim byed dang / /rdo rje rgyal mtshan pad+ma'i dam pa dang / /chos kyi rgyal dang mi g.yo ting 'dzin dang / /shes rab
303a1(dkon brtsegs): rtsibs dang zhi ba sangs rgyas mtsho/ /'od zer mtha' yas rnam grol sbyin pa dang / /ye shes ting 'dzin de bzhin gshegs kyi rgyan/ /bkod pa chen po zhing
303a2(dkon brtsegs): bkod snang ba dang / /sems can bsam pa yongs rangs dga' ba dang / /rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam la rtag mthun dang / /pha rol phyin pa rgyan dang dkon mchog gtsug /ting 'dzin
303a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub yan lag me tog sbyin/ /rnam grol snying po bdud rtsi sbyin pa dang / /rlung dang rlung bzhin 'gro ba mi dmigs dang / /rgya mtsho shugs 'dzin rin chen mdzod ldan dang / /brag
303a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ri 'thab rgyal po zhes bya dang / /rdzu 'phrul yangs dang shin tu don 'dzin dang / /sangs rgyas yul ston ting nge 'dzin dag dang / /de dang gzhan yang rgya chen mtha' yas pa'i/ /zhi

303a6(dkon brtsegs): yul 'greng / /mnyam par gzhag nas rgod pa med par 'chag /mnyam par gzhag nas 'dug cing nyal bar byed/ /de yi spyod lam mnyam par ma gzhag med/ /mnyam par

308b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /gang zhig byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la/ /shin tu nges par nan tan gnas byed pa/ /mkhas pa de ni chos
308b3(dkon brtsegs): la 'dzin mi byed/ /mi 'dzin pas na nan tan de 'dra'o/ /mis ni chos rnyed stong par mi byed do/ /chos la'ang de ni stong par rlom sems med/ /ston pa'i chos la rlom sems gang yang med/ /
308b4(dkon brtsegs): rlom sems med phyir nan tan de 'dra'o/ /chos la len pa med cing 'dor ba med/ /chos ni chos la len par byed pa med/ /len pa med phyir 'di ni chos kyi mtshan/ /de 'dra ba ni nan tan
308b5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o| |gang phyir chos la nam yang de mi chags/ /de la de yi ye shes blangs mi 'gyur/ /ye shes ma blangs de la'ang rlom sems med/ /de 'dra ba la'ang nan tan zhes bya'o/ /mkhas
308b6(dkon brtsegs): pas sbyangs pa'i yon tan gnas par gyis/ /chos 'di dag la shin tu brtson par gyis/ /cho ga spyod pa dag la gnas gyur na/ /de tshe de yi sgo ni dag par 'gyur/ /sgo dag na ni chos 'di
308b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba shes/ /de na sems la bsam pa'ang shes par 'gyur/ /mkhas pa de tshe bsam pa shes nas ni/ /'di 'dra ba yi chos kyang 'chad par 'gyur/ /zab mo'i chos la don dam mkha'
309a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas/ /rtag tu don la rnam par gdon mi za/ /spyod pa mtha' yas yon tan rnams kyis 'phags/ /mkhas pa mang du thos pa rgya mtsho 'dra/ /de yi don dang
309a2(dkon brtsegs): tshig 'bru dag la yang / /mtha' ma rtogs par rung ba ma yin zhing / /don kyang mtha' yas tshig 'bru mtha' yas te/ /nan tan snying por byed pa mi 'khrugs 'gyur/ /shA ri'i bu/
309a3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa byang chub
309a4(dkon brtsegs): s ems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu nyan pa nas gzhan la rgya cher bstan pa'i bar du byas nas ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag mun pa rab rib stug po bsal ba'i
309a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir chos thams cad la snang ba thob ste/ shes rab kyi snang ba'o/ /de snang ba de thob pas dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu shes te/ de srog gi phyir yang mi dge
309a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos la mi gnas te/ de mi dge ba'i chos rnams spang ba'i phyir ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams rtogs pas na/ dge ba/ thub pa/ zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
309a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /ji ltar mun pas khyab bsgribs pa/ /khyim du zhugs par gyur na ni/ /yod par gyur pa'i gzugs rnams kyang / /mig gis
309b1(dkon brtsegs): mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du ni 'di la yang / /la la'i mi dag skyes gyur kyang / /dge ba dang ni sdig pa'i chos/ /ma thos par ni shes mi 'gyur/ /thos nas chos rnams rnam par
309b2(dkon brtsegs): shes| |thos nas sdig pa sten mi byed/ /thos nas gnod pa spong bar byed/ /thos nas mya ngan 'das pa 'thob/ /thos par 'dod pas thos pa 'phel/ /thos pas shes rab 'phel bar
309b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur| |shes rab kyis ni don rnams sbyong / /don thob nas ni bde thob 'gyur/ /don thob de ni yid rno ste/ /tshe 'di la ni mya ngan 'das/ /chos la sbyor zhing gtsang la mkhas/ /shin tu bde
309b4(dkon brtsegs): ba 'thob par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ni/ /thos nas chos nyid gnas par 'gyur/ /'jig rten la ni snang gyur nas/ /byang chub kyi ni spyad pa spyod/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na/
309b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod
309b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa'i gang zag la dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid la shin tu byang bar byed/ rnam par dag par byed de/
309b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod 'di'i don gyi phyir 'dun pa bskyed/ 'bad par byed/ brtson 'grus brtson par byed/ sems la rab tu 'dzin par byed/ yang dag par rab tu 'jog par
310a1(dkon brtsegs): byed de| de yang dag par spong ba bzhi la rab tu zhugs pas chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa 'thob bo/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad
310a2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /chos smra ba ni gang yin pa/ /de la dge ba'i bshes su sems/ /rtag par nan tan gnas gyur nas/ /chos la nan tan byas te nyan/ /rtag par 'dun pa 'bri
310a3(dkon brtsegs): mi byed| |rtag par brtson 'grus shin tu 'phags/ /rnam rtag shes rab rnam par sbyong / /ye shes la ni rtag tu gnas/ /de ni bdag nyid chos shes te/ /dad pa'i phyir ni 'gro mi
310a4(dkon brtsegs): byed| |sangs rgyas kyis ni gang bshad pa/ /mi g.yo ba yi chos shes so/ /mkhas pa de dag tshig rnams 'byed la mkhas/ /bslab pa'i don la khong du chud par byed/ /de dag dkar
310a5(dkon brtsegs): po'i phyogs ni rtag par sbyong / /nag po'i phyogs ni rtag tu spong bar byed/ /de yi sems la nam yang nyams pa med/ /de ni chos rnams gang la'ang zhum pa med/ /lus kyang de bzhin
310a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dang brtson 'grus dang / /'dun pa yang ba'ang myur du 'thob par 'gyur/ /chos thos nas ni shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur/ /ye shes rnam par rtogs nas dran mi nyams/ /dran
310a7(dkon brtsegs): dang ye shes la ni rtag gnas nas/ /dge dang mi dge'i chos ni rab tu shes/ /bla na med pa'i chos rnams bslab nas ni/ /rtogs dang dran pa shes rab stobs mchog thob/ /ji ltar
310b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid yun ring bslab pa bzhin/ /des ni sems can rnams kyi bsam pa shes/ /chos bslab nas ni khyad par 'thob 'gyur te/ /khyad par 'thob cing ye shes dag gyur nas/ /de ni sems
310b2(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyi bsam pa shes/ /de phyir bsam pa bzhin du chos ston to/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan
310b3(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ltar blo sbyangs pa dang / de ltar chos snang ba'i sgo shin tu yongs su dag pas 'di ltar slob ste/ 'phags pa'i yang
310b4(dkon brtsegs): dag par lta ba 'byung ba ni/ rgyu gnyis dang / rkyen gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ gzhan gyi sgra dang / bdag nyid tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'o/ /de 'di snyam du sems te/ /gzhan gyi sgra de
310b5(dkon brtsegs): gang / bdag nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de gang zhe na/ de de ltar tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur te/ rnal 'byor spyod pa gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i
310b6(dkon brtsegs): sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma thos/ 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba ma thos par ting nge 'dzin tsam gyis dga' ba rnyed nas nga rgyal gyi dbang gis che ba'i nga rgyal du lhung ba de dag ni/ skye ba
310b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / /rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi thar/ sdug bsngal gyi phung po
311a1(dkon brtsegs): las yongs su mi thar te/ de dag la de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs nas 'di skad gsungs so/ /pha rol la rjes su mthun pa thos pa ni/ rga ba dang / 'chi ba las
311a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba'o/ /yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ chos rnams thos nas rnam par shes/ /thos nas sdig pa mi byed de/ /thos nas gnod pa spong bar 'gyur/ /thos nas
311a3(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan 'das pa 'thob/ /thos 'dod thos pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ /thos pas shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur/ /shes rab kyis ni don rnams sbyong / /don rnyed nas ni bde thob 'gyur/ /don
311a4(dkon brtsegs): rnyed de ni yid rno ste/ /tshe 'di la ni mya ngan 'das/ /chos gtsang mkhas pa gtsang ba dang / /mchog tu bde ba 'thob par 'gyur/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub
311a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba shin tu mnyan par bya/ blang bar bya/ /gzung bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ /gzhan la yang
311a6(dkon brtsegs): rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi nyan pa dang / tshul bzhin du sbyor bar mi byed pa de
311a7(dkon brtsegs): dag ni/ 'phags pa'i lam las yongs su nyams par 'gyur te/ de la dgongs nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'di skad du bdag nyid tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ni/ rga ba dang /
311b1(dkon brtsegs): na ba dang / 'chi ba las grol ba'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de 'di ltar slob ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin sbyor ba ni/ gang / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin
311b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba yin snyam nas de 'di ltar slob ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ chos gang la'ang sbyor bar mi byed/ rab tu sbyor bar mi byed do/ /tshul bzhin du sbyor ba
311b3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba de ni/ mi sbyor ba'i tshig bla dwags so/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni/ sgra 'byin par mi byed/ zlos pa 'byin par mi byed/ gang nas sgra 'byung
311b4(dkon brtsegs): ba de yang mi dmigs/ sgra de nyid gang nas 'byung / gang du 'gag ces sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' la rtog par byed de/ gang smras pa dang / gang smra ba dang / gang smra bar 'gyur
311b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / gang gis smras pa dang / gang gis smra ba dang / gang gis smra bar 'gyur ba dang / gang spong ba'i phyir smras pa dang / gang spong ba'i phyir smra ba dang / gang spong ba'i phyir smra bar
311b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / gang khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir smras pa dang / gang khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir smra ba dang / gang khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir smra bar 'gyur ba de thams cad yongs
311b7(dkon brtsegs): su btsal na/ 'das pa'i rnam pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i rnam par mi dmigs pa de ni/ de'i tshul bzhin du sbyor ba'o/ /zhes de de ltar slob bo/ /byang chub
312a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de ltar tshul bzhin du sbyor bas ji ltar tshul bzhin du mthong zhe na/ de 'di ltar slob ste/ gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rang
312a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gyis 'gag par mthong ba de'i tshe tshul bzhin mthong ngo / /gang gi tshe chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi bar mthong ba de'i tshe tshul bzhin mthong ngo / /gang gi tshe chos
312a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rnam par zhi bar mthong ba de'i tshe tshul bzhin mthong ngo / /gang gi tshe chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis snyoms par ma zhugs par mthong ba de'i tshe tshul bzhin mthong
312a4(dkon brtsegs): ngo / /gang gi tshe chos thams cad ma skyes par mthong ba de'i tshe tshul bzhin mthong ngo / /gang gi tshe chos thams cad ma byung bar mthong ba de'i tshe tshul bzhin mthong ngo / /gang gi tshe
312a5(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad shin tu yang dag par ma byung bar mthong ba de'i tshe tshul bzhin mthong ngo / /gang gi tshe chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das par mthong ba de'i tshe tshul bzhin mthong
312a6(dkon brtsegs): ngo / /de gang gis mthong ba de la yang rtog ste/ ci nas kyang mi mthong ba dang / mi rtog pa de ltar mthong ste/ de ltar mthong na/ tshul bzhin mthong ba zhes bya'o/ /yang 'di ltar slob
312a7(dkon brtsegs): ste/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni/ chos gang la yang the tshom dang / rmongs pa med do/ /tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni/ chos gang la yang sgrib pa med do/ /tshul bzhin
312b1(dkon brtsegs): du sbyor ba ni/ chos gang la yang gang thar pa'i sgor mi 'gyur ba med do/ /tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni/ chos gang yang spang bar bya ba'i phyir 'bad pa med do/ /gang tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni/
312b2(dkon brtsegs): chos gang la yang rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'bad pa med de/ chos gang chos thams cad yang dag par mthong ba dang / ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba de ni/ yang dag par lta ba'o/ /chos
312b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ma mthong ba'o/ /ma mthong ba zhes bya ba de ni/ ma skyes pa'i tshig bla dwags so/ /ma skyes pa zhes bya ba de ni/ yang dag par
312b4(dkon brtsegs): ma byung ba'i tshig bla dwags so/ /yang dag par ma byung ba zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ de ni/ mi snang ba'i tshig bla dwags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la dgongs nas 'du byed thams cad mi
312b5(dkon brtsegs): skye bar mthong na/ yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la 'jug ste/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la 'jug pa de ni/ yang dag par lta ba'o/ /zhes de skad gsung ngo / /de 'di snyam du
312b6(dkon brtsegs): sems te/ ci'i phyir na yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la 'jug pa zhes bya zhes de 'di ltar slob ste/ chos thams cad gang dang mnyam pa sangs rgyas kyi chos de dang mnyam ste/ de bas na
312b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la 'jug pa'o/ /de lta bas na/ yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la 'jug par 'dod pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid
313a1(dkon brtsegs): shin tu mnyan par bya/ blang bar bya/ gzung bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid
313a2(dkon brtsegs): la'ang tshul bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste/ shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
313a3(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ltar blo shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa dang / de ltar chos snang ba'i sgo shin tu yongs su dag pas tshul bzhin du 'jug pa la brtson na/ tshul
313a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gyi tshig mthong ngo / /de la tshul bzhin du 'jug pa gang / tshul bzhin gyi tshig gang zhe na/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin du 'jug pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ zhi gnas
313a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi gnas la 'jug pa dang / lhag mthong rnam par rtog pa la 'jug pa ni/ tshul bzhin du 'jug pa'o/ /lus dben par 'jug pa dang / sems yid du 'ong bar 'jug pa dang /
313a6(dkon brtsegs): chad pa ma yin par 'jug pa dang / rtag pa ma yin par 'jug pa dang / rgyu dang rkyen la 'jug pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog
313a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / gang zag med pa la 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs ma phyin mi gnas pa la 'jug pa dang / mi 'pho ba dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu chud mi za ba dang / rgyu stong pa nyid du rnam par
313b1(dkon brtsegs): 'byed pa la 'jug pa dang / mtshan ma med pa 'dris par bya ba la 'jug pa dang / smon pa med pa rab tu shes pa la 'jug kyang stong pa nyid dang / smon pa med pa len par 'jug pa ma yin pa
313b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa len pa la 'jug kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis skye ba la mi 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa'i ye shes len pa la 'jug kyang zag pa
313b3(dkon brtsegs): zad pa la mi 'jug pa dang / mi skye bar rtog pa la 'jug kyang nges par gyur par 'gro ba la mi 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad bdag med par rtog par 'jug kyang snying rje chen po
313b4(dkon brtsegs): gtong ba la mi 'jug pa dang / skye ba thams cad 'jigs par mthong ba la 'jug kyang srid pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa len pa la 'jug pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pa la
313b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jug kyang chos mngon du bya ba la mi 'jug pa dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi dga' ba dang / btang snyoms pa la 'jug kyang chos kyi dga' ba 'dor ba la mi 'jug pa dang / rtog pa spros
313b6(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad gtong ba la 'jug kyang thabs mkhas pa gtong ba la mi 'jug pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ de ni/ tshul bzhin du 'jug pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ tshul bzhin gyi tshig ces bya
313b7(dkon brtsegs): pa gang zhe na/ rigs pa'i tshig de ni/ tshul bzhin gyi tshig go /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang tshul bzhin gyi tshig de ni/ tshul gyi tshig go /de ni/ sgo'i tshig go /de ni/ kha'i tshig go /de ni/
314a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu'i tshig go /de ni/ rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i tshig go /de ni/ mi 'gal ba'i tshig go /de ni/ mi rtsod pa'i tshig go /de ni/ btang snyoms kyi tshig go /mi len pa'i
314a2(dkon brtsegs): tshig dang / mi 'dor ba'i tshig dang / ma spros pa'i tshig dang / mi bsnan pa'i tshig dang / ma bri ba'i tshig dang / mi skye ba'i tshig dang / rtsod pa'i gzhi med pa'i tshig dang / mi ldog pa'i
314a3(dkon brtsegs): tshig dang / gnyen po med pa'i tshig dang / de kho na'i tshig dang / de bzhin kho na'i tshig dang / ma log pa de bzhin nyid kyi tshig dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi chig dang / de
314a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nyid kyi tshig dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi tshig dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi tshig dang / yongs su chad pa'i tshig dang / gzugs rnam par shes pa'i gnas med pa'i tshig dang /
314a5(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gnas med pa'i tshig go/ de ni/ mig dang / gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams gnas med pa'i
314a6(dkon brtsegs): tshig go / de ni/ rna ba dang / sgra dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gnas med pa'i tshig go /de ni/ sna dang / dri dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gnas med pa'i tshig go/
314a7(dkon brtsegs): de ni/ lce dang / ro dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gnas med pa'i tshig go /de ni/ lus dang / reg dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gnas med pa'i tshig go /de ni/
314b1(dkon brtsegs): yid dang / chos dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gnas med pa'i tshig go /de ni/ don la rton pa'i tshig go /de ni/ chos la rton pa'i tshig go /de ni/ ye shes la rton pa'i tshig go/
314b2(dkon brtsegs): de ni/ nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa'i tshig ste/ shA ri'i bu/ de ni/ tshul bzhin gyi tshig go /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du 'jug pa la brtson pa tshul bzhin gyi tshig
314b3(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba de ni/ gang gis mthong ba de nyid mi mthong ste/ ji ltar mi mthong rnam par mi mthong ba de ltar mthong ngo / /de ltar mthong na/ tshul bzhin mthong ba zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ yang byang
314b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni/ chos gang la yang rmongs par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni/ chos gang yang gang thar pa'i sgor mi 'gyur ba
314b5(dkon brtsegs): med do/ /tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni/ chos gang yang spang ba'i phyir 'bad pa med do/ /tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni/ chos gang yang rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'bad pa med do/ /gang chos thams cad
314b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par mthong ba dang / ji lta ba bzhin mthong ba de ni/ yang dag par lta ba'o/ /chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi mthong ba'o/ /mi mthong ba gang zhe
314b7(dkon brtsegs): na/ de ni/ mi skyes pa'i tshig bla dwags so/ /ma skyes pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ de ni/ mi snang ba'i bar gyi tshig bla dwags te/ rgya cher sngar ji ltar bzlas pa de ltar de bzhin du bzlas par
315a1(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
315a2(dkon brtsegs): la spyod pa 'di ltar slob ste/ chos thams cad ni/ bdag bzhin du tshul bzhin te/ ji ltar bdag la bdag med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad bdag med par mthong ngo / /ji ltar
315a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can bdag med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad ni/ bdag med par mthong ste/ de ltar mthong na/ tshul bzhin du mthong ngo / /gang tshul bzhin 'khor ba'i khams mthong ba
315a4(dkon brtsegs): de tshul bzhin mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams dang ldan par mthong ste/ de ni/ tshul bzhin du sbyor ba zhes bya'o/ /de ni/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la nyon mongs pa'i rang
315a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du bye brag med pa dang ldan par mthong ngo / /rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma yin par yang mi snyems so/ /tshul bzhin sbyor bas tshul bzhin mthong ste/ tshul bzhin gyi sbyor
315a6(dkon brtsegs): ba ji snyed pa sems can gyi gnas thams cad kyang de snyed de/ sems can gyi gnas kyang mi mthong / /chos kyi gnas kyang 'khrug par mi byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul
315a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin sbyor ba ste/ shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na/ rnam pa 'di dang / thos pa 'di dang / tshul bzhin du 'jug pa 'di dang / tshul bzhin mthong ba 'di dang / ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba'i rgyu
315b1(dkon brtsegs): mthun pa 'di dang / 'di dag ni/ shes rab ces bya ste/ shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub
315b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'dus byas la spyod pa'i chos thams cad la shes rab kyis mi gnas pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/
315b3(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed rnams dang lhan cig tu mi gnas pa nas rgyas par bya ste/ rga shi'i bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ bdag tu lta ba dang lhan cig tu mi gnas pa nas bdag tu lta ba'i rtsa ba
315b4(dkon brtsegs): las byung ba'i lta bar gyur ba drug cu rtsa gnyis dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ mtho bar sems pa dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ dma' bar sems pa dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ 'jig
315b5(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi chos brgyad rnams dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ nga rgyal dang / che ba'i nga rgyal dang / log pa'i nga rgyal nas nye ba'i nyon mongs pa nyi shu'i bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ chen
315b6(dkon brtsegs): po dang / 'bring po dang / phra mo nas nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ gti mug gi mun pa rab rib kyi ling tog gis bsgribs pa dang / chod par byed pa kun
315b7(dkon brtsegs): tu dkris te 'dug pa nas dma' ba'i chos thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ rtsod pa'i rnyog pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / phung po dang / lha'i bu dang / 'chi bdag gi bdud
316a1(dkon brtsegs): nas bdud thams cad kyi las kyi bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag dang / shed bu dang / shed
316a2(dkon brtsegs): las skyes pa nas bdag tu lta ba thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ las kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / lta ba'i sgrib pa dang / rnam par
316a3(dkon brtsegs): smin pa'i sgrib pa dang / mi shes pa'i sgrib pa nas bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ kun tu rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / mtshan
316a4(dkon brtsegs): ma dang / dmigs pa dang / mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / dran pa dang / rnam par rig pa dang / 'dud pa'i sgro 'dogs pa thams cad dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ ser sna dang /
316a5(dkon brtsegs): gtong ba dang / tshul khrims dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / gnod sems dang / brtson 'grus dang / le lo dang / bsam gtan dang / g.yeng ba dang /
316a6(dkon brtsegs): shes rab dang / 'chal ba'i shes rab nas pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang / shes pa dang / mi shes pa'i bar thams cad dang lhan cig tu mi
316a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas| nges pa dang / ma nges pa dang / log par nges pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / kha na ma tho ba dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das
316b1(dkon brtsegs): pa nas chos thams cad kyi gnyen po'i bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ zhing sna tshogs dang / sangs rgyas sna tshogs dang / sems can sna tshogs dang / chos sna tshogs nas sna tshogs
316b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ mi shes pa dang / shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang / kun rdzob dang / don dam pa nas sems can thams cad kyi mtshan ma yid la
316b3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dag dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ shes rab mi rgyu ba dang / lus med pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / 'dus ma byas nas yid la byed pa thams cad dang /
316b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dang / rnam par shes pa'i gnas dag gi bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas te/ de dag dang / gzhan yang 'dus byas la spyod pa'i chos dpag tu med pa dag dang lhan cig tu mi
316b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas so/ /de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab de ni/ gang 'dus byas kyi spyod pa thams cad dang lhan cig tu mi gnas te/ shA ri'i
316b6(dkon brtsegs): bu| de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la gnas pa shes rab
316b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'byed mkhas pa yin te/ chos thams cad la mkhas pa rjes su 'thob bo/ /de la shes rab rnam par 'byed pa gang
317a1(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po la mkhas pa dang / khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / bden pa la mkhas pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
317a2(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa dang / rton pa la mkhas pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang ye shes la mkhas pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa dang / las la mkhas pa dang / rten cing 'brel
317a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang bcu ste/ mkhas pa rnam pa bcu po 'di dag gis rnam par 'byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya'o/ /de la phung po la
317a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa gang zhe na/ gang 'di phung po rnams kyi dper bya ba bstan pa 'di lta ste/ lbu ba rdos pa lta bur bstan pa dang / smig rgyu lta bur bstan pa dang / chu bur lta bur bstan pa
317a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / chu shing lta bur bstan pa dang / sgyu ma lta bur bstan pa dang / rmi lam lta bur bstan pa dang / brag ca lta bur bstan pa dang / mig yor lta bur bstan pa dang / gzugs
317a6(dkon brtsegs): brnyan lta bur bstan pa'o/ /gzugs ni/ chu'i lbu ba lta bu ste/ lbu ba la yang bdag med/ sems can med/ srog med/ gang zag med/ skyes bu med/ shed bu med/ shed las
317a7(dkon brtsegs): skyes med de/ lbu ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa gzugs kyang de'i rang bzhin te/ gang de la mkhas pa de ni/ phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/ /tshor ba ni/ chu'i chu bur lta bu ste/ chu
317b1(dkon brtsegs): bur la yang bdag med/ sems can med/ srog med/ gang zag med/ shed bu med/ shed las skyes med/ skye ba po med de/ chu bur gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa tshor ba yang de'i rang
317b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin te/ gang de la mkhas pa 'di ni/ phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/ /'du shes ni/ smig rgyu lta bu ste/ smig rgyu la yang bdag med/ sems can med pa nas skyes bu'i bar du med de/
317b3(dkon brtsegs): smig rgyu'i rang bzhin gang yin pa 'du shes kyang de'i rang bzhin te/ gang de la mkhas pa de ni/ phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/ /'du byed rnams ni/ chu shing lta bu ste/ chu shing la yang
317b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag med/ sems can med/ srog med pa nas skyes bu'i bar du med pa ste/ chu shing gi rang bzhin gang yin pa 'du byed kyang de'i rang bzhin yin te/ gang de la mkhas pa de ni/ phung
317b5(dkon brtsegs): po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa ni/ sgyu ma lta bu ste/ sgyu ma la yang bdag med/ sems can med/ srog med/ gang zag med/ shed bu med/ shed las skyes med/ skyes
317b6(dkon brtsegs): bu med| byed pa po med/ tshor ba po med pa ste/ sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gang yin pa rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yang de yin te/ gang de la mkhas pa de ni/ phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan
317b7(dkon brtsegs): yang phung po rnams zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten yin te/ 'jig rten yang 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /'jig rten rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa phung po rnams kyi rang bzhin yang de yin no/ /
318a1(dkon brtsegs): yang 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin gang yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin dang / sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin te/ phung po yang de'i rang bzhin yin no/ /
318a2(dkon brtsegs): gang de la mkhas pa de ni/ phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' phung po la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de la khams la mkhas
318a3(dkon brtsegs): pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi khams ni/ sa'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams sra ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no/ /chos kyi khams ni/ chu'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams rlan pa'i
318a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid ma yin no/ /chos kyi khams ni/ me'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams tsha ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no/ /chos kyi khams ni/ rlung gi khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams g.yo
318a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no/ /chos kyi khams ni/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams mthong ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no/ /chos kyi khams ni/ rna ba'i rnam
318a6(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams sgra rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no/ /chos kyi khams ni/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams dri snom pa'i
318a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid ma yin no/ /chos kyi khams ni/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams ro myong ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no/ /chos kyi khams ni/ lus kyi rnam par
318b1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams reg pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no/ /chos kyi khams ni/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams rnam par sgom pa'i mtshan
318b2(dkon brtsegs): nyid ma yin no/ /chos kyi khams dang / bdag gi khams de ni/ mtshungs so/ /'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams ni/ mtshungs so/ /'khor ba'i
318b3(dkon brtsegs): khams dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams de mtshungs so/ /de ltar chos thams cad kyi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams de mtshungs te/ stong pa nyid dang mtshungs pas mtshungs/ mi
318b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang mtshungs pas mtshungs te/ 'dus byas kyi khams su 'jug pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams su 'jug pa'i phyir de la bshad pa dpag tu med de/ gang khams la 'jug pa
318b5(dkon brtsegs): des rab tu rnam par 'byed pa de ni/ mkhas pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar na/ khams la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de la
318b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' skye mched la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ 'di la mig bdag dang / bdag gis stong pa de byang chub sems dpa' mig gi rang bzhin ni/ 'di lta bu'o/ /zhes yang dag pa
318b7(dkon brtsegs): ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes te/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa'o/ /gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid bdag dang /
319a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis stong pa de byang chub sems dpa' yid kyi rang bzhin ni/ 'di lta bu'o/ /zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes te/ dge ba gsog pa'i phyir
319a2(dkon brtsegs): gang skye mched la kun gsog pa dang / sna tshogs gsog pa de dag gsog par mi byed cing dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos rnams la 'du shes gnyis su mi 'jug ste/ de ni/ byang
319a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa'o/ /'di ni/ mig gi skye mched do/ /'di ni/ gzugs kyi skye mched do/ /zhes de ltar mig dang gzugs rnams la 'dod chags med
319a4(dkon brtsegs): par mthong yang 'dod chags med pa mngon du mi byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa'o/ /rna ba dang sgra/ sna dang dri/ lce dang ro/ lus dang reg /yid dang
319a5(dkon brtsegs): chos gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' yid dang chos kyi bar du 'dod chags med par mthong mod kyi/ 'dod chags med pa mngon du mi byed pa de ni/ byang
319a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa'o/ /skye mched ces bya ba yang 'phags pa'i skye mched dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye mched de/ de la 'phags pa'i skye mched
319a7(dkon brtsegs): ni| gang lam sdud par byed pa'o/ /'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye mched ni/ gang lam gtong bar byed pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa ni/ sems can
319b1(dkon brtsegs): lam la brtson pa bor zhing gnas pa la snying rje chen po 'thob cing / lam gyi skye mched kyang mi gtong ste/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa'o/ /de ltar na/ byang chub
319b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i skye mched kyang mi gtong ba ste/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa'o/ /de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol
319b3(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la 'jug pa mkhas pa ni/ rnam pa bzhi ste/ 'di lta ste/ sdug
319b4(dkon brtsegs): bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa'o/ /de la sdug bsngal shes pa gang zhe na/ phung po rnams la mi skye bar shes pa de ni/
319b5(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la kun 'byung ba shes pa gang zhe na/ gang sred pa 'joms pa de ni/ kun 'byung bshes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la 'gog pa shes pa gang zhe na/ gang mi
319b6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung mi 'jig par shes pa de ni/ 'gog pa shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la lam shes pa gang zhe na/ gang mnyam pa nyid thob pa'i chos rnams la sgro mi 'dogs pa de ni/ lam shes
319b7(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya'o/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas bden pa 'di bzhi de ltar shes rab kyis shes kyang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir mngon du mi byed pa de ni/ bden pa la
320a1(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang bden pa la mkhas pa rnam pa gsum ste/ 'di lta ste/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa dang / mtshan
320a2(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi bden pa'o/ /de la kun rdzob kyi bden pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi tha snyad ji snyed pa dang / yi ge dang / sgra dang / brdar bstan pa ste/ de ni/ kun rdzob kyi bden
320a3(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya'o/ /de la don dam pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/ gang la sems kyi rgyu ba yang med na/ yi ge lta ci smos te/ de ni/ don dam pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o/ /de la mtshan nyid
320a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bden pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan nyid thams cad mtshan nyid gcig la/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ni/ mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' kun rdzob kyi
320a5(dkon brtsegs): bden pa 'chad pas mi skyo/ /don dam pa'i bden pa mngon du byed par mi ltung / mtshan nyid kyi bden pa mtshan nyid med pas rtogs par byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bden
320a6(dkon brtsegs): pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang bden pa ni/ gcig pu/ gnyis ma yin pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'gog pa'i bden pa'o/ /de la bden pa gcig pu la gang sgro mi 'dogs pa dang /
320a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can sgro 'dogs par lhung ba rnams la bden pa sbyor bar byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang phung po lnga rnams ni/ sdug
320b1(dkon brtsegs): bsngal ba ste/ gang phung po lnga rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid de ni/ sdug bsngal zhes bya'o/ /sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid rtogs pa de ni/ sdug
320b2(dkon brtsegs): bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o/ /gang phung po rnams kyi bag la nyal rgyu sred pa las byung ba'i lta ba de ni/ kun 'byung ba'i bden pa'o/ /gang sred pa'i rgyu lta ba de la yang sgro
320b3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dogs/ mi len/ mi snyems pa de ni/ kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o/ /gang phung po lnga rnam shin tu zad pa'i phyir 'gog pa sngon gyi mthar ma byung ba/ phyi ma'i
320b4(dkon brtsegs): mthar mi 'pho ba/ da ltar byung bar mi gnas pa de ni/ 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o/ /gang lam la brten nas sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang /
320b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gog pa shes pa la yang reg par byed la/ rjes las rtogs pa'i shes pa yang thob par byed pa de ni/ sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o/ /
320b6(dkon brtsegs): gang bden pa shes pa de la rnam par rtog pa dang / sems can yongs su brtag pa la rtog par byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang tshor
320b7(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad sdug bsngal ba ste/ de la tshor bar bya ba rnam par 'byed pa dang / blos rig pa nyid de ni/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o/ /rgyu gang gis kun 'byung bar
321a1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i rgyu de ji lta ba yang dag par rab tu shes ba de ni/ kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o/ /gang tshor ba gtong zhing ma tshor ba tshor bar byed pa
321a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'gog pa la yang so sor rtog la tshor ba 'gog pa yang mngon du mi byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o/ /tshor ba
321a3(dkon brtsegs): gang gis gzings dang 'dra ba'i lam de sdud par byed la tshor bar dgos pa yang ma yin/ lam gyi dgos pa yang ma yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sdug bsngal 'gog
321a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar rtogs nas bden pa de bzhi la mnyam par mthong zhing mthong ba shin tu dag pa'ang ma yin pa de ni/ byang chub
321a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang skye ba sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang mi skye ba la so sor rtog par shes pa de ni/ sdug bsngal shes pa zhes bya'o/ /srid
321a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba ste/ gang srid pa 'jig par shes pa de ni/ kun 'byung ba shes pa zhes bya'o/ /skye ba thams cad gang gis mi skye bar shes pa de la 'gog pa gang yang med cing /
321a7(dkon brtsegs): gang mi 'gog par shes pa de ni/ zad pa 'gog pa shes pa zhes bya'o/ /gang de ltar tshor ba dang / 'jal ba dang / yongs su tshor ba dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / 'jug pa'i shes
321b1(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni/ lam shes pa zhes bya ba ste/ gang bden pa'i shes pa de la gzhog par byed kyang bden pa'i shes pa de la mi gnas pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa ste/
321b2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i so so yang dag par rig pa la mkhas pa gang zhe na/
321b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i so so yang dag par rig pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
321b4(dkon brtsegs): nges pa'i tshigs so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o/ /de la don so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na/ gang chos rnams la don dam pa'i tshig tu
321b5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / gnyis su med pa'i rgyu shes pa dang / rkyen shes pa dang / 'dus pa shes pa dang / mtha' med pa'i rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dang / brten pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / chos
321b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbyings dbyer med par shes pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su 'jug pa shes pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' mi gnas pa shes pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang /
321b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med pa rtogs pa shes pa dang / smon pa med pa la smon pa med par shes pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa la mngon par 'du byed par shes pa dang / tshul gcig tu 'jug
322a1(dkon brtsegs): pa shes pa dang / sems can med bar 'jug pa shes pa dang / bdag med par 'jug pa shes pa dang / srog med pa byed pa gcig pa shes pa dang / gang zag med
322a2(dkon brtsegs): pa don dam par shes pa dang / 'das pa'i dus la ma chags par shes pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la mtha' med par shes pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la thams cad du shes pa
322a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / phung po rnams la sgyu mar shes pa dang / khams rnams la sbrul gdug pa dang mtshungs par shes pa dang / skye mched rnams la stong pa nyid du nges par rtog pa shes pa dang /
322a4(dkon brtsegs): nang zhi ba shes pa dang / phyi rol tu mi rgyu ba shes pa dang / yul la yul med par shes pa dang / dran pa la gnas su shes pa dang / rtogs pa la khong du chud par shes pa dang / blo
322a5(dkon brtsegs): gros la mngon sum du shes pa dang / bden pa la rab tu rtogs par shes pa dang / sdug bsngal la mi 'byung bar shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba la mngon par 'du mi byed par shes pa
322a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'gog pa la mtshan nyid med par shes pa dang / lam la sgrol bar shes pa dang / chos la tshig rab tu tha dad par shes pa dang / dbang po rnams la 'jug par shes pa dang /
322a7(dkon brtsegs): stobs rnams la mi rdzi bar shes pa dang / zhi gnas la gnas su shes pa dang / lhag mthong la snang bar shes pa dang / sgyu ma la sgrub par shes pa dang / smig rgyu la 'khrul par
322b1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / rmi lam la mi bden pa mthong bar shes pa dang / brag cag la rkyen la 'jug par shes pa dang / mig yor la 'pho bar shes pa dang / mtshan nyid sna tshogs la mtshan
