322b2(dkon brtsegs): nyid gcig tu shes pa dang / 'du ba la 'bral bar shes pa dang / rab tu sbyangs pa la phyir mtshams sbyor ba med par shes pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la sgra'i rjes su 'gro bar
322b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa shes pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la brten pa la 'jug pa shes shing dben pa la mchog tu shes pa dang / theg pa chen po la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pa
322b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad shes pa ste/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i don so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang don so so yang dag par rig pa ni/ gang don la rton pa ste/ chos thams
322b5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi chos nyid kun gyi don la rton pa nyid kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ma lus par stong pa ste/ stong pa'i don gang yin pa de ni/ don no/ /chos thams
322b6(dkon brtsegs): cad ma lus par mtshan ma med pa ste/ mtshan ma med pa'i don gang yin pa de ni/ don no/ /chos thams cad ma lus par smon pa med pa ste/ smon pa med pa'i don gang yin pa de ni/
322b7(dkon brtsegs): don no/ /chos thams cad ma lus pa rnam par phye ba ste/ rnam par phye ba'i don gang yin pa de ni/ don no/ /chos thams cad ma lus par sems can med/ srog med/ gang zag med pa ste/
323a1(dkon brtsegs): gang zag med pa'i don gang yin pa de ni/ don no/ /gang de lta bu'i chos rnams rtogs pa de ni/ don so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya ste/ gang don ston pa
323a2(dkon brtsegs): de ni/ gnas med pa ston pa'o/ /de ni/ mi zad pa ston pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa ni/ rtogs pa'i don ston pa yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gnang ba
323a3(dkon brtsegs): rjes su yi rang ba/ yang dag pa/ de kho na/ gzhan ma yin pa/ shes rab kyis shin tu rtogs pa/ thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i don so so yang
323a4(dkon brtsegs): dag par rig pa zhes bya'o/ /de la chos so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na/ gang dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag
323a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par
323a6(dkon brtsegs): byang ba'i cha dang mthun pa dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das par nye bar 'gro ba'i chos rnams la 'jug shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid shes pa dang /
323a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi mnyam pa nyid shes pa dang / khams mnyam pa nyid shes pa ste/ de ni/ chos so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang chos so so yang dag par rig pa
323b1(dkon brtsegs): ni/ gang 'dod chags spyod pa rnams la sems 'jug pa shes pa dang / bcos pa'i 'dod chags spyod pa rnams dang / 'dod chags brtan par spyod pa rnams dang / 'dod chags chung ngu
323b2(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa rnams dang / rnam par mi ldang ba'i 'dod chags spyod pa rnams dang / mtha' ma rtag tu med pa'i 'dod chags spyod pa rnams dang / da ltar byung ba la rkyen gyis 'dod chags spyod
323b3(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la 'jug pa ste/ sems can gang dag nang du 'dod chags la phyi rol tu 'dod chags med pa dang / phyi rol tu 'dod chags la nang du 'dod chags med pa dang / nang du'ang 'dod
323b4(dkon brtsegs): chags med/ phyi rol tu'ang 'dod chags med pa dang / nang dang phyi rol tu 'dod chags pa dang / gzugs la 'dod chags la sgra la 'dod chags med pa dang / sgra la 'dod chags
323b5(dkon brtsegs): la gzugs la 'dod chags med pa dang / gzugs dang sgra la 'dod chags pa dang / gzugs dang sgra la 'dod chags med pa dang / dri la 'dod chags med pa dang / dri la 'dod chags
323b6(dkon brtsegs): la reg la 'dod chags med pa dang / reg la 'dod chags la ro la 'dod chags med pa dang / ro la 'dod chags la gzugs la 'dod chags med pa dang / gzugs la 'dod chags
323b7(dkon brtsegs): la dri la 'dod chags med pa de ni/ 'dod chags spyod pa rnams kyi 'jug pa ste/ 'jug pa de'i sgos 'dod chags spyod pa rnams la nyi khri tshig stong / zhe sdang spyod pa rnams la nyi khri chig
324a1(dkon brtsegs): stong / gti mug spyod pa rnams la nyi khri chig stong / cha mnyam par spyod ba rnams la nyi khri chig stong ste/ gang de dag gi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gi sems
324a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa shes pa dang / ji ltar rig par bstan pa shes pa dang / mi mang mi nyung bar bstan pa shes pa dang / 'dod pa las yang dag par 'da' bar shes pa dang / snod kyi khyad
324a3(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa dang / 'bras bu yod par bstan pa shes pa de ni/ chos so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o/ /de la nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na/ gang skad
324a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la skad med par 'jug pa shes pa dang / lha'i skad dang / klu'i skad dang / gnod sbyin gyi skad dang / dri za'i skad dang / mi'am ci'i skad dang / lto 'phye chen po'i skad dang /
324a5(dkon brtsegs): mi dang mi ma yin pa'i skad dang / 'gro ba lngar skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi skad dang / sgra dang dbyings rnams las skad des de dag la chos 'chad pa ste/ de ni/ nges pa'i tshig
324a6(dkon brtsegs): so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya ste/ de ltar chos de dag brtag par bya'o/ /de ltar chos de dag bsdu bar bya'o/ /de ltar chos de dag rjes su rgyun chags par bya'o/ /de ltar chos
324a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag yi ge rnams kyis sbrel bar bya'o/ /de tshig gcig gi bla dwags shes/ tshig gnyis pa'i bla dwags shes/ tshig mang po'i bla dwags shes/ bud med kyi tshig shes/ skyes pa'i
324b1(dkon brtsegs): tshig shes/ ma ning gi tshig shes/ bsdus pa'i tshig shes/ rgyas pa'i tshig shes/ smad pa'i tshig shes/ bstod pa'i tshig shes/ 'das pa'i tshig shes/ ma 'ong pa'i tshig shes/
324b2(dkon brtsegs): da ltar byung ba'i tshig shes/ yi ge gcig gis sgro btags pa shes/ yi ge mang pos sgro btags pa shes te/ de ni/ nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o/ /yang
324b3(dkon brtsegs): de'i nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ni/ 'khrul pa ma yin/ zlos pa ma yin/ brtags pa ma yin/ don gsal ba'i yi ge yongs su byang ba ste/ ci nas kyang 'khor yang
324b4(dkon brtsegs): dag par dga' ba/ sna tshogs pa/ zab pa/ zab par snang ba/ kun rdzob dang don dam pas brgyan pa/ bdag gi sems mthong ba'i shes pa la rag lus pa/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang
324b5(dkon brtsegs): ba/ sems can thams cad dga' bar byed pa ste/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i nges ba'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa so so
324b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na/ gang tshig bzang ba mi gnas par lung bstan pa/ ston pa rgyun mi 'chad pa/ spobs pa myur ba/ spobs pa mgyogs shing myur ba/ spobs pa mi rmongs
324b7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ spobs pa ji ltar dris pa bzhin pa/ spobs pa yongs su ma nyams pa/ spobs pa mi 'gal ba/ spobs pa rtsod pa med pa/ spobs pa chos la rab tu dga' ba/ spobs pa bzod pa
325a1(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa/ spobs pa zab pa/ spobs pa sna tshogs pa/ kun rdzob dang don dam pa la spobs pa/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson
325a2(dkon brtsegs): 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab thams cad la gnas pa'i spobs pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang
325a3(dkon brtsegs): po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong la spobs pa/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms
325a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'jug pa dang / bden pa la 'jug pa thams cad shes pa'i spobs pa/ theg pa thams cad la spobs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la spobs pa/ tshig mi
325a5(dkon brtsegs): lkug pa'i spobs pa/ tshig mi rtsub pa'i spobs pa/ tshig mi 'chal ba'i spobs pa/ tshig rtsub mo ma yin pa'i spobs pa/ tshig mnyen pa'i spobs pa dang / tshig dag pa/ tshig
325a6(dkon brtsegs): grol ba/ tshig ma chags pa/ tshig btsun pa/ tshig 'brel pa/ tshig ldan pa/ tshig ma nyams pa/ tshig snyan pa/ tshig 'jam pa/ tshig ma smad pa/ tshig 'phags pa thams
325a7(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis bstod pa ste/ zhing mtha' yas pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rjes su song ba'i sgra tshangs pa'i sgra skad kyi dbyangs dang 'dra ba/ rtogs par byed pa'i sgra gcig pa/ sangs rgyas
325b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis gnang ba'i spobs pas sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan dag la chos ston to/ /de'i chos bstan pa de yang 'byung bar byed pa/ de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par
325b2(dkon brtsegs): zad par 'gyur ba ste/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o/ /de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa la mkhas pa ste/ de ltar na/ byang
325b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i spobs pa la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / //bam po bco brgyad pa/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i rton pa la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ byang
325b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rton pa 'di bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don la rton gyi tshig 'bru la ma yin pa dang / ye shes la rton gyi rnam par shes pa la ma yin pa dang /
325b5(dkon brtsegs): nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde rnams la rton gyi drang ba'i don rnams la ma yin pa dang / chos nyid la rton gyi gang zag la ma yin pa'o/ /de la don gang / tshig 'bru ni/ gang zhe na/ tshig 'bru
325b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba ni/ gang 'jig rten gyi chos kyi bya ba la 'jug pa'o/ /don zhes bya ba ni/ gang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rtogs pa'o/ /tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ sbyin pa dang / dul ba
325b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / sdom pa dang / nges pa brtan pa'o/ /don zhes bya ba ni/ dul ba dang / zhi gnas dang / gsar pa ma yin pa dang / rnying pa ma yin par shes pa'o/ /tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor
326a1(dkon brtsegs): ba yongs su bcad pa sgrog pa'o/ /don zhes bya ba ni/ mi dmigs pa la rton pa'o/ /tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan yongs su sgrog
326a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ /don zhes bya ba ni/ chos rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog pa'o/ /tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ theg pa ji ltar rnam par bzhag pa
326a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du 'chad pa'o/ /don zhes bya ba ni/ chos tshul gcig par rtogs par shes pa'o/ /tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad mi gtong bar bstan pa'o/ /don zhes bya
326a4(dkon brtsegs): ba ni/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'o/ /tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid sdom zhing / bslab pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan thams cad yang dag par
326a5(dkon brtsegs): len par bstan pa'o/ /don zhes bya ba ni/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid mi dmigs shing / mngon par 'du mi byed pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sems
326a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi tha ba dang / khro ba dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa 'joms shing bzod pa dang / nges pa brtan pa'o/ /don zhes bya ba ni/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'o/ /tshig
326a7(dkon brtsegs): 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba la brtson 'grus rtsom pa thams cad bstan pa'o/ /don zhes bya ba ni/ mi len mi gtong ba la gnas pa'i brtson 'grus so/ /tshig 'bru zhes bya ba
326b1(dkon brtsegs): ni/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa bstan pa'o/ /don zhes bya ba ni/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa shes pa'o/ /tshig 'bru
326b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba ni/ thos pa thams cad 'dzin pa shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ /don zhes bya ba ni/ brjod du med pa'i don to/ /tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ gang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa
326b3(dkon brtsegs): bdun gyi chos rnams rab tu bstan pa'o/ /don zhes bya ba ni/ gang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos rnams nan tan du byed pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byed pa'o//
326b4(dkon brtsegs): tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / lam rab tu bstan pa'o/ /don zhes bya ba ni/ 'gog pa mngon sum du byed pa'o/ /tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ ma rig
326b5(dkon brtsegs): pa la sogs te rga shi'i bar du bstan pa'o/ /don zhes bya ba ni/ ma rig pa 'gog pa nas rga shi'i bar du 'gog pa'o/ /tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong gi tshogs
326b6(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'o/ /don zhes bya ba ni/ rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba shes pa'o/ /tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ gang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / cha mnyam par spyod pa
326b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams la chos bstan pa'o/ /don zhes bya ba ni/ sems kyi rnam par grol ba mi 'khrugs pa'o/ /tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ sgrib par byed pa'i chos thams cad rab tu bstan pa'o/ /don
327a1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba ni/ sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes rnam par thar pa'o/ /tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ dkon mchog gsum gyi yon tan bsngags pa mtha' med pa yang
327a2(dkon brtsegs): dag par rab tu bstan pa'o/ /don zhes bya ba ni/ gang chos 'dod chags med pa dang / 'dus ma byas pa'i dge 'dun gyi yon tan sgrub pa'o/ /tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ gang byang chub
327a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i thog ma sems bskyed nas byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du bslab pa dang / yon tan rtsom pa bstan pa'o/ /don zhes bya ba ni/ sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pas
327a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'o/ /mdor na chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du bstan pa de ni/ tshig 'bru zhes bya'o/ /sgra dang / yi ge
327a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / tshig 'bru thams cad brjod du med pa'i don to/ /de la drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde gang zhe na/ gang tshig 'bru bshad pa ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du rgya cher khong du chud par bya ste/
327a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag ni/ drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde dag go /nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde gang zhe na/ don gang bshad pa ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du rgya cher khong du chud par bya ste/ de dag ni/ nges pa'i
327a7(dkon brtsegs): don gyi mdo sde dag go / da ji ltar na/ chos la rton gyi gang zag la ma yin zhe na/ gang drang ba'i don de ni/ gang zag gi don yin pas de la mi rton gyi/ gang nges pa'i don de ni/
327b1(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid ji lta ba bzhin pas de la rton pa ste/ 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rton pa bzhi'o/ /de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rton pa la mkhas pa shes
327b2(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshig 'bru la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos gnyis la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha
327b3(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /chos gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par shes pa la mkhas pa dang / ye shes la mkhas pa yin no/ /de la rnam par shes pa gang / ye shes gang zhe na/
327b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par shes pa'i gnas pa bzhi'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ gzugs la zhugs pa'i rnam par shes pa yongs su gnas shing gnas pa dang /
327b5(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba la zhugs pa dang / 'du shes la zhugs pa dang / 'du byed la zhugs pa'i rnam par shes pa yongs su gnas shing gnas pa ste/ de ni/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la ye
327b6(dkon brtsegs): shes gang zhe na/ gang len pa'i phung po lnga rnams la gnas pa rnam par shes pa'i phung po yongs su shes pa de ni/ ye shes zhes bya'o/ /gang sa'i khams rnams par shes pa dang / chu'i
327b7(dkon brtsegs): khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams rnam par shes pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/ /gang yang ye shes khams bzhi la mi gnas pa/ chos kyi dbyings tha mi dad par
328a1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa de ni/ ye shes zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni/ gang mig gi rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams shes
328a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i sgra rnams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i dri rnams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i ro
328a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i reg rnams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i chos rnams shes pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa zhes
328a4(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ /gang yang nang gi skye mched rnams la nye bar zhi zhing / phyi rol gyi skye mched rnams la rgyu ba med pas ye shes la rton pas chos gang yang gzhog par mi byed pa de ni/ ye
328a5(dkon brtsegs): shes zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni/ dmigs pa las rnam par shes pa skye ba dang / yongs su rtogs pa las rnam par shes pa skye ba ste/ de ni/ rnam
328a6(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa zhes bya'o/ /gang yang mi 'dzin pa/ mi snyems pa/ mi dmigs pa/ rnam par mi rig pa/ mi 'khrug pa de ni/ ye shes zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang 'dus byas la spyod pa'i
328a7(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams la rnam par shes pa la gnas kyi/ 'dus ma byas la rnam par shes pa rgyu ba med do/ /gang yang 'dus ma byas shes pa de ni/ ye shes so/ /gzhan yang skye ba dang /
328b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig pa la gnas pa ni/ rnam par shes pa'o/ /gang yang mi skye mi 'gag mi gnas pa de ni/ ye shes zhes bya'o/ /de la nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde gang / drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde gang zhe na/
328b2(dkon brtsegs): mdo sde gang dag lam la 'jug par byed pa de dag ni/ drang ba'i don zhes bya'o/ /mdo sde gang dag 'bras bu la 'jug par byed pa de dag ni/ nges pa'i don zhes bya'o/ /mdo sde gang dag
328b3(dkon brtsegs): kun rdzob sgrub par byed pa de dag ni/ drang ba'i don zhes bya'o/ /mdo sde gang dag don dam pa bstan pa de dag ni/ nges pa'i don zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang mdo sde gang dag las kyi bya ba la
328b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa de dag ni/ drang ba'i don zhes bya'o/ mdo sde gang dag las dang / nyon mongs pa zad par bstan pa de dag ni/ nges pa'i don zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang mdo sde gang dag kun nas
328b5(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa yongs su bshad pa'i phyir bstan pa de dag ni/ drang ba'i don to/ /mdo sde gang dag rnam par byang ba rnam par dag pa'i phyir bstan pa de dag ni/ nges pa'i don to/ /mdo
328b6(dkon brtsegs): sde gang dag 'khor bas skyo bar byed pa de dag ni/ drang ba'i don to/ /mdo sde gang dag 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis su mi 'jug pa de dag ni/ nges pa'i don to/ /mdo
328b7(dkon brtsegs): sde gang dag yi ge dang / tshig sna tshogs su bstan pa de dag ni/ drang ba'i don to/ /mdo sde gang dag zab pa/ blta dka' ba/ rtogs par dka' ba de dag ni/ nges pa'i don to/ mdo sde
329a1(dkon brtsegs): gang dag tshig 'bru mang ba/ sems can rnams kyi sems rangs par byed pa de dag ni/ drang ba'i don to/ /mdo sde gang dag tshig dang / tshig 'bru nyung la nges
329a2(dkon brtsegs): par rtogs par byed pa de dag ni/ nges pa'i don to/ /gzhan yang mdo sde gang dag bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed bu dang / shed las
329a3(dkon brtsegs): skyes dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po'i sgra sna tshogs bdag po med pa bdag po yod bzhin du bstan pa de dag ni/ drang ba'i don to/ /mdo sde gang dag stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
329a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mi 'byung ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / yang dag par mi 'byung ba dang / sems can med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / dus gsum las rnam par thar
329a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgo bstan pa de dag ni/ nges pa'i don zhes bya'o/ /de la chos gang / gang zag gang zhe na/ gang zag tu lta ba la gnas te chos kha cig la rtsom pa de ni/ gang zag ces bya'o/ /
329a6(dkon brtsegs): gang zag tu lta ba rtsom pa de'i gang chos gnas pa chos kyi dbyings de ni/ chos zhas bya'o/ /gzhan yang gang zag ni/ so so'i skye bo'i gang zag dang / so so'i skye bo'i dge ba'i gang
329a7(dkon brtsegs): zag dang / dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i gang zag dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i gang zag dang / brgyad pa'i gang zag dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i gang zag dang / lan gcig phyir
329b1(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba'i gang zag dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i gang zag dang / dgra bcom pa'i gang zag dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi gang zag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gang zag dang / skye bo mang
329b2(dkon brtsegs): po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / lha dang mi'i skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir gang zag gcig 'jig rten
329b3(dkon brtsegs): du skye ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/ gang zag gi sgra de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas kun
329b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzob kyi gnas kyis sems can rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa'o/ /de la gang mngon par chags pa de dag ni/ rton pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o/ /de dag rton pa la dgod pa'i phyir chos
329b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid la rton par bya'i/ gang zag la ma yin no/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te/ de la chos nyid gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi 'gyur ba/ sgro ma btags pa/ mi byed pa/ rnam
329b6(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed pa/ mi gnas pa/ gnas pa med pa/ rtsa ba med pa/ thams cad du mnyam pa/ mnyam pa la mnyam pa/ mi mnyam pa la mnyam pa/ mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa la
329b7(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa/ mi rtsom pa/ nges par gyur pa thob pa/ chos thams cad la shin tu ngo bo nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid de ni/ chos nyid ces bya ste/ gang dag chos nyid de la
330a1(dkon brtsegs): rton par byed pa de dag ni/ khams gang la'ang rton par mi byed de/ de bas na/ chos kyi tshul gyi sgo la 'jug pa 'dis chos thams cad la rton pa'i phyir chos thams
330a2(dkon brtsegs): cad de lta bu'i chos nyid yin no/ /de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rton pa bzhi zhes bya ste/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rton pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar na/ byang
330a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rton pa la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
330a4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs ni/ 'di gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsod nams kyi tshogs dang / ye shes kyi tshogs so/ /de la bsod nams kyi tshogs gang zhe na/ sbyin pa las byung ba'i
330a5(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / byams pa'i
330a6(dkon brtsegs): sems la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / snying rje'i sbyor ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rtsom pa dang / bdag dang pha rol gyi sdig pa 'chags pa dang / dus gsum du gtogs
330a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems can thams cad dang / slob pa thams cad dang / mi slob pa thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sems dang po bskyed pa rnams dang / spyod pa la zhugs pa
330b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / phyir mi ldog pa rnams dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa la rjes su yi rang ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang /
330b2(dkon brtsegs): da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dge ba thams cad kyi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags
330b3(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad la chos ston par gsol ba 'debs pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / dge ba thams cad byang chub tu bsngo ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos
330b4(dkon brtsegs): po dang / sems can byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa rnams byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams la pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam ston pa dang / dbul po
330b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams la longs spyod kyis sdud pa dang / nad pa rnams la sman sbyin pa dang / gus par bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / mthu chung ba rnams la bzod cing dang du len pa dang / ltung ba rnams mi
330b6(dkon brtsegs): 'chab pa dang / sdig pa 'chags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams la bsnyen bkur dang ri mo thams cad byed pa
330b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / slob dpon dang mkhan po rnams la ston pa bzhin du ri mo byed pa dang / chos la rin po che rin thang med pa bzhin du yongs su tshol ba'i brtson 'grus dang / chos smra ba la dga' zhing
331a1(dkon brtsegs): dpag tshad brgyar yang song ste chos nyan pas chog mi shes pa dang / zang zing med par chos 'chad pa dang / pha dang ma la rim gro byed pa dang / byas pa gzo ba
331a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / byas pa shes pa dang / 'gyod pa med pa dang / bsod nams bsags pas chog mi shes pa dang / lus bsdams shing tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / ngag bsdams pa'i ngag la
331a3(dkon brtsegs): tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / yid bsdams pa'i yid la tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten btsugs pa'i phyir tshangs pa'i bsod nams yongs su 'dzin
331a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mchod sbyin gtan pa med pa bsags pas mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs sna tshogs bsags pas dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
331a5(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal med pas lus brgyan pa dang / ngag gi nyes pa thams cad spangs pas dag brgyan pa dang / blo thogs pa med pas sems brgyan pa dang / mngon par shes pa sprul pas
331a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang / ye shes yongs su dag pas chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi rgyan dang / phra ma dang / zhe gcod pa dang / dbye ba'i tshig yongs su spangs pas 'khor mang po'i
331a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyan dang / chos 'dzin pas 'dod chags med pa'i chos kyi rgyan dang / rab tu dga' nas legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin nas chos kyi gtam mi 'jigs par byed pa dang / sgrib pa dang
331b1(dkon brtsegs): chod pa rnam par spangs shing gus par chos nyan pas 'bras bu yod par chos 'chad pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams la dka' thub kyi nags tshal phul bas byang chub kyi zhing gi rgyan dang /
331b2(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sngon du 'gro zhing byang chub kyi sems mi gtong bas byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan dang / las dang nyon mongs pa mi dmigs pas tshe dang shi 'pho yongs su
331b3(dkon brtsegs): dag pa dang / rin po che phangs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong bas lag na rin po che dang / mi zad pa'i smon lam thob pas longs spyod mi zad pa dang / khro gnyer med pas
331b4(dkon brtsegs): mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams dad cing bzhin 'dzum pas gsong por smra ba dang / sems can thams cad la 'od zer snyoms pas mnyam pa nyid kyi rgyan thob pa dang / ma lobs
331b5(dkon brtsegs): pa la mi brnyas pas 'od mang po gtong ba dang / tshul khrims kyi bsod nams bsags pas skye ba yongs su dag pa dang / ltung ba la mi rtsod pas mngal yongs su dag pa dang / dge
331b6(dkon brtsegs): ba bcu'i las yongs su dag pas lha dang mir skye ba dang / rjes su bstan pa thams cad la rab tu rtog pas gdon mi za bar nod pa dang / chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pas
331b7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbang phyug dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas 'jig rten thams cad la mngon sum pa dang / nyi tshe ba'i spyod pa mi 'dod pas rgya chen po'i chos la dad pa dang /
332a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems mi 'dor bas bsod nams thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa dang / dad pa sngon du 'gro bas nor bdun yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
332a2(dkon brtsegs): sngon dam bcas pa nyams su lon par byed pas 'jig rten thams cad mi slu ba dang / dge ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa
332a3(dkon brtsegs): ste| de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi tshogs la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ rgyu gang gis ye shes
332a4(dkon brtsegs): skye ba ste/ de ltar rgyu dang / rkyen gang dang gang gis ye shes rtogs pa'o/ /de la rgyu gang / rkyen gang zhe na/ chos tshol ba la rab tu 'dun pa dang / ye shes kyi rjes su song ba'i bshes
332a5(dkon brtsegs): gnyen bsten pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la rton gyi/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mi rton pa dang / de dag la nga rgyal mi byed pa dang / bla ma la dga' ba dang /
332a6(dkon brtsegs): ston pa la dga' ba dang / de'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag gis 'di ni/ bsam pa dang ldan par shes nas ye shes kyi gtam gang yang mi ston pa med pa dang / snod du shes nas
332a7(dkon brtsegs): bar chad med par sems rtse gcig tu chos ston pa dang / des chos de thos nas chos kyi tshogs la brtson par byed de/ gang chos kyi tshogs la brtson par byed pa de nyid de'i ye shes
332b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshogs la brtson pa yin no/ /de la chos kyi tshogs la brtson pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don nyung ba dang / bya ba nyung ba dang / sgra nyung ba dang / srod dang tho rangs la mi nyal zhing rnal
332b2(dkon brtsegs): 'byor la brtson pa dang / 'brel ba'i don la yongs su rtog pa dang / phyir zhing yongs su tshol ba dang / sems la rnyog pa med pa dang / sgrib pa gnon pa dang / ltung ba las 'byung bar
332b3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / 'gyod pa med pa dang / kun nas ldang ba med pa dang / nan tan snying por byed pa dang / chos la gzhol ba dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / chos la bab pa dang / chos la
332b4(dkon brtsegs): rtul ba dang / rtag par mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba lta bu dang / ye shes tshol ba de nyid la gnas pa dang / mi lhod pa dang / brtson 'grus mi gtong ba dang / khyad par du 'gro ba dang /
332b5(dkon brtsegs): 'du 'dzi las dben pa dang / gcig pur dga' ba dang / dgon pa'i bde ba yid la byed pa dang / 'phags pa'i rigs la dga' ba dang / sbyangs pa las mi 'gyur ba dang / chos
332b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa dang / 'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i gsang tshig la ri mor mi byed pa dang / 'jig rten las 'ongs pa'i chos tshol ba la dran pa mi nyams pa dang /
332b7(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa la don rtogs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang / blo gros la lam gyi rjes su mthun par byed pa dang / mos pa la sdom pa dang / rkyen la ye shes kyi rjes su rig pa dang / khrel yod
333a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa'i rgyan dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'gros kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang / mi shes pa sel ba dang / ma rig pa dang / gti mug gi ling tog sel
333a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / shes rab kyi mig rnam par dag pa dang / rab tu rnam par dag pa dang / blo rgya che ba dang / blo ma zhum pa dang / blo rab tu tha dad pa dang / mngon sum du shes pa dang / gzhan
333a3(dkon brtsegs): la rag ma lus pa'i yon tan dang / rang gi yon tan gyis mi snyems pa dang / pha rol gyi yon tan la rtog pa dang / legs par bya ba'i las byed pa dang / las kyi rnam par
333a4(dkon brtsegs): smin pa la mi 'gal bar byed pa dang / las yongs su dag par byed pa ste/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes kyi tshogs zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang
333a5(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyi tshogs ni/ sbyin pa bzhi ste/ chos smra ba la 'gro ba dang / smyu gu dang / snag tsha dang / glegs bam sbyin pa dang / chos smra ba la chos kyi stan sna tshogs sbyin pa dang /
333a6(dkon brtsegs): chos smra ba la rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa thams cad sbyin pa dang / chos smra ba la chos kun bsdu ba'i phyir g.yo med par legs so/ /zhes bya ba sbyin pa
333a7(dkon brtsegs): ste| sbyin pa bzhi po de dag ni/ ye shes kyi tshogs gsog par 'gyur ro/ /kun srung ba bzhi po rnams ye shes kyi tshogs gsog par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos smra ba rnams
333b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi lus yongs su srung ba dang / dge ba srung ba dang / yul dang ljongs su 'jug pa la yongs su srung ba dang / phan pa'i dngos po yongs su srung ba ste/ kun srung ba ni/ bzhi po de dag go /nye
333b2(dkon brtsegs): bar rton pa bzhi ye shes kyi tshogs su 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos smra ba rnams kyi chos nye bar rton pa dang / ye shes nye bar rton pa dang / zang zing nye bar rton pa dang / byang chub nye
333b3(dkon brtsegs): bar rton pa'o/ /stobs lnga ye shes kyi tshogs su 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mos pa'i phyir dad pa'i stobs dang / thos pa tshol ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang /
333b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i phyir dran pa'i stobs dang / nyam pa nyid kyi chos la nges par rtog pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / thos pa'i stobs kyi phyir shes rab kyi
333b5(dkon brtsegs): stobs te/ stobs lnga po de dag ye shes kyi tshogs su 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims bzhi ye shes kyi tshogs gsog par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos la nges pa'i tshul
333b6(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang / chos tshol ba'i tshul khrims dang / chos la nges par rtog pa'i tshul khrims dang / byang chub tu bsngo ba'i tshul khrims te/ tshul khrims bzhi po de dag ye shes kyi
333b7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs gsog par 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa bzhi ye shes kyi tshogs gsog par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos tshol ba la mngon par brtson pas ngan du smra ba dang /
334a1(dkon brtsegs): ngan du brjod pa'i tshig rnams bzod pa dang / chos tshol ba la mngon par brtson pas rlung dang / tsha ba dang / grang ba dang / dro ba dang / skom pa dang / bkres pa
334a2(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa dang / chos tshol ba la mngon par brtson pas slob dpon dang / mkhan po'i rjes su 'jug pa dang / chos tshol ba la mngon par brtson pas stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
334a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos bzod pa ste/ bzod pa bzhi po de dag ye shes kyi tshogs gsog par 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus bzhi ye shes kyi tshogs gsog par 'gyur te/
334a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thos pa'i brtson 'grus dang / gzungs kyi brtson 'grus dang / brtan pa'i brtson 'grus dang / nan tan gyi brtson 'grus te/ brtson 'grus
334a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po de dag ye shes kyi tshogs gsog par 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan gyi yan lag bzhi ye shes kyi tshogs gsog par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dben pa
334a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / gcig pur dga' ba dang / ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la 'jug pa ste/ bsam gtan gyi yan lag bzhi po de dag ye shes
334a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshogs gsog par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab snang ba'i chos 'di bzhi ye shes kyi tshogs gsog par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chad pa la mi gnas pa dang /
334b1(dkon brtsegs): rtag pa la mi 'jug pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang mi 'gal ba dang / bdag med pa la mos pa ste/ shes rab snang ba'i chos bzhi po de dag ye shes kyi tshogs gsog par
334b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /chos 'di bzhi thabs kyi ye shes kyi tshogs su 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten pa'i rjes su 'jug pa dang / mdo sde'i rjes su 'jug pa dang / chos kyi rjes su
334b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa dang / ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag thabs kyi ye shes kyi tshogs su 'gyur ro/ /chos 'di bzhi lam gyi tshogs kyi ye shes la 'jug par 'gyur te/
334b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi lam dang / yan lag brgyad pa'i lam dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su 'gro ba'i lam ste/
334b5(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi po de dag lam gyi tshogs kyi ye shes la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /mi ngoms pa 'di bzhi ye shes kyi tshogs gsog par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thos pas mi
334b6(dkon brtsegs): ngoms pa dang / bstan pas mi ngoms pa dang / dpyod pas mi ngoms pa dang / ye shes kyis mi ngoms pa ste/ mi ngoms pa bzhi po de dag ye shes kyi tshogs gsog par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan
334b7(dkon brtsegs): yang ye shes kyi tshogs ni/ gang sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang / zhing thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba ste/ sbyin pa las kyang ye shes kyi tshogs su blta'o/ /tshul khrims dang /
335a1(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / byams pa dang snying rje dang / 'ga' ba dang / btang snyoms las kyang ye shes kyi
335a2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs su blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa'i rtsom pa de thams cad ye shes kyi khar las pa ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ye shes la rton pa ste/ de ye shes
335a3(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pas ye shes can thams cad kyi rton par 'gyur te/ bdud thams cad kyis kyang de la glags mi rnyed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyang 'thob/ thams cad mkhyen
335a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ye shes la yang gzhog par byed do/ /de gnyis ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dang / ye shes kyi tshogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
335a5(dkon brtsegs): po tshogs rnam pa de gnyis la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la mkhas pa gang zhe na/
335a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di bzhi ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom
335a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa dang / sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa dang / chos la chos kyi rjes su
335b1(dkon brtsegs): lta ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa'o/ /de la lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i lus la lus kyis
335b2(dkon brtsegs): rjes su lta zhing gnas pa de lus kyi sngon gyi mthar la yang so sor rtog / lus kyi phyi ma'i mtha' la yang so sor rtog /lus kyi da ltar byang ba la yang so sor rtog ste/ kye ma'o lus 'di ni/
335b3(dkon brtsegs): phyi ci log las byang ba ste/ rgyu dang rkyen las skyes pa g.yo ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ bdag po med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ phyi rol gyi rtswa dang /
335b4(dkon brtsegs): shing gel pa dang / sman dang nags tshal dag rgyu dang rkyen las 'byung zhing bdag po med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa de bzhin du lus 'di yang rtswa dang / rtsig pa dang / shing dang / bong
335b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / mig yor lta bu phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched yongs su 'dzin pa dang / bdag dang bdag gi'am/ rtag pa'am/ brtan pa'am/ ther zug gam/ mi 'gyur ba'i chos
335b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis stong ste/ lus de la nga yir mi bya'i/ lus snying po med pa des snying po blang bar bya'o/ /de la snying po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'o/ /de bzhin gshegs
335b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku ni/ chos kyi sku/ rdo rje'i sku/ mi phyed pa'i sku/ sra ba'i sku/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad dang khyad zhugs pa'i sku bdag gis bsgrub par bya'o/ /bdag gi lus 'di nyes pa du
336a1(dkon brtsegs): ma'i skyon chags mod kyi/ 'on kyang nyes pa thams cad dang bral ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thob par bya'o/ /zhes de so sor rtog pa'i mthus logs
336a2(dkon brtsegs): par mthong nas 'byung ba chen po'i gnas kyi lus yongs su srung bar byed de/ nga'i lus ni/ sems can thams cad kyi ci dgos par zad par bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ phyi
336a3(dkon brtsegs): rol gyi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams sgo sna tshogs dang / dmigs pa sna tshogs dang / rnam grangs sna tshogs
336a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / yo byad sna tshogs dang / yongs su spyod pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams nye bar 'tsho ba de bzhin du bdag gi 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gyur pa'i lus 'di sgo sna tshogs
336a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / dmigs pa sna tshogs dang / rnam grangs sna tshogs dang / yongs su spyod pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho bar gyur cig snyam mo/ /de'i lus mi
336a6(dkon brtsegs): rtag pa nyid du yang so sor rtog mod kyi/ skye ba dang / shi 'phos kyang mi skyo'o/ /lus sdug bsngal nyid du so sor rtog mod kyi/ lus kyi sdug bsngal bas kyang yongs su mi gdung
336a7(dkon brtsegs): ngo / /lus bdag med pa nyid du yang so sor rtog mod kyi/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la yang mi skyo'o/ /lus zhi ba nyid du yang so sor rtog mod kyi/ lus zhi bas btang
336b1(dkon brtsegs): snyoms su yang mi ltung ngo / /lus stong pa nyid dang / lus dben pa nyid du yang so sor rtog mod kyi/ dben pa'i mur yang mi ltung ngo / /de lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na lus
336b2(dkon brtsegs): la rdzas dang snying por rjes su mi mthong ngo / /nang gi lus la yang lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na nang gi rjes su song ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi go skabs mi 'byed do/ /de phyi rol
336b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na phyi rol gyi rjes su song ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas so/ /de la lus nyon mongs pa med pas lus kyi las yongs su
336b4(dkon brtsegs): dag pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /de lus yongs su dag nas mtshan gyis yang dag par brgyan pa'i sku 'thob bo/ /de lus brgyan par gyur nas lha dang mi rnams mngon du 'du bar 'gyur te/
336b5(dkon brtsegs): de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa'o/ /yang ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa
336b6(dkon brtsegs): nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang ci tshor yang rung ste/ de thams cad sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes de 'di snyam du sems te/ de ye shes kyis rtogs
336b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / shes rab kyis rtogs pa dang / thabs kyis rtogs pa'i tshor ba shin tu rtogs pas bde bar tshor pa tshor bar yang byed mod kyi/ 'dod chags kyi bag la nyal yang bag la
337a1(dkon brtsegs): nyal bar mi byed do/ /sdug bsngal ba'i tshor bas reg nas kyang ngan song du skyes pa thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed cing khong khro ba'i bag la nyal ba yang
337a2(dkon brtsegs): bag la nyal bar mi byed do/ /bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor bas reg kyang ma rig pa'i bag la nyal yang bag la nyal bar mi byed do/ /de tshor ba'i rjes su
337a3(dkon brtsegs): song ba'i dran pas bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba gang tshor ba yang tshor ba de dag las 'byung bar lta ba yin no/ /
337a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi tshor ba yongs su shes shing zhi ba'i phyir yang 'jug ste/ sems can 'di dag ni/ tshor ba las 'byung ba mi shes pas de dag bde ba'i tshor ba la
337a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar byed/ sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba la zhe sdang bar byed/ bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la rmongs par byed kyi/ bdag ni/ shes rab
337a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / ye shes kyis rjes su rtogs pa'i tshor ba thams cad so sor sbyangs pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung ba'i rtsom pas sems can de dag gi
337a7(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba thams cad rgyun gcad pa'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o/ /ci'i phyir tshor ba zhes bya zhe na/ rtogs pa'i tshor ba ni/ bde bar 'gyur ro/ /ma rtogs pa'i tshor ba ni/ sdug
337b1(dkon brtsegs): bsngal bar 'gyur ro/ /de la rtogs pa'i tshor ba gang zhe na/ 'di la bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ gang zag gang yang tshor bar byed pa med de/ chags pa ni/ tshor
337b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ /yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ tshor ba'o/ /len pa ni/ tshor ba'o/ /phyin ci log ni/ tshor ba'o/ /rnam par rtog pa ni/ tshor ba'o/ /lta ba'i bag la nyal ni/ tshor ba'o/ /mig tu 'du/
337b3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa tshor ba yin pa nas yid kyi bar du 'du shes pa ni/ tshor ba'o/ /gzugs su 'du shes pa tshor ba yin pa nas chos su 'du shes pa'i bar du ni/ tshor ba'o/ /gang mig gi
337b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen las byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i bar du de ni/ tshor ba zhes bya'o/ /gong ma
337b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du nang dang phyi'i chos rnams la sbyar te/ yid kyi bar du 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen las byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal
337b6(dkon brtsegs): ba yang ma yin pa'i bar du de ni/ tshor ba zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang rnam grangs kyis tshor ba gcig ste/ de ni/ sems gcig pus rnam par rig pa'o/ /tshor ba gnyis te/ phyi dang /
337b7(dkon brtsegs): nang gi'o/ /tshor ba gsum ste/ 'das pa rnam par rig pa dang / ma 'ongs pa rnam par rig pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnam par rig pa'o/ /tshor ba bzhi ste/ de ni/ khams bzhi rnam
338a1(dkon brtsegs): par rig pa'o/ /tshor ba lnga ste/ de ni/ phung po lnga yid la byed pa'o/ /tshor ba drug ste/ de ni/ skye mched drug yongs su rtog pa'o/ /tshor ba bdun te/ de ni/
338a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa la gnas pa bdun no/ /tshor ba brgyad de/ de ni/ log par nges pa'i sbyor ba brgyad do/ /tshor ba dgu ste/ de ni/ sems can gyi gnas dgu'o/ /tshor ba bcu ste/
338a3(dkon brtsegs): de ni/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mo/ /gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ thams cad ni/ tshor ba ste/ dmigs pa ji snyed pa dang / yid la byed pa ji snyed pa de thams cad tshor bar bya ba'o/ /de
338a4(dkon brtsegs): bas na/ sems can tshad med pas tshor ba tshad med pa zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas pas sems can thams cad kyi tshor ba skyes
338a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / 'jig pa dang / gnas pa la ye shes bskyed par bya ste/ gang sems can thams cad kyi dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i tshor ba la tshor ba shes pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i
338a6(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang zhe na/ gang
338a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i mi brjed pa dang / sba ba dang / kun srung ba dang / mi g.yeng ba'o/ /de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/ sems ni/ skyes nas 'jig cing zhu ste mi gnas pas nang
338b1(dkon brtsegs): na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol tu yang mi 'pho ste/ gang bdag gis thog mar sems bskyed pa de yang zad med/ rnam par gyur te yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas pas de rnyed par mi
338b2(dkon brtsegs): nus te/ sems gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrubs pa de dag kyang zad med/ rnam par gyur/ yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas so/ /gang yang byang chub tu bsngos pa'i sems de
338b3(dkon brtsegs): yang ngo bo nyid kyis mtshan nyid med pa ste/ sems kyis sems rab tu mi shes/ sems kyis sems mi mthong / sems kyis sems mi tshor na/ gang gis bdag bla na med pa yang
338b4(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i sems de gang yin/ gang byang chub kyi sems de ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems dang mi 'grogs/ gang dge ba'i
338b5(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba'i sems de yang bsngo ba'i sems dang mi 'grogs/ gang bsngo ba'i sems de yang byang chub kyi sems dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems dang mi 'grogs so/ /zhes de de ltar so
338b6(dkon brtsegs): sor rtog pa dang / mi skrag/ mi dngang / dngang bar mi 'gyur gyi/ de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo rgyu dang / 'bras bu chud mi za ba'o/ /gal te
338b7(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi chos nyid de lta bu sems kyi rang bzhin nyid yin yang chos thams cad rgyu dang rkyen la rag las pa/ g.yo ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ bdag po med pa ji ltar 'dod pa de
339a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du 'grub kyi/ bdag gis sgrub pa la brtson par bya'o/ /sems kyi chos nyid de mi 'bri bar bya'o/ /de la sems kyi chos nyid gang / sgrub pa gang
339a2(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ sems ni/ sgyu ma dang 'dra ba ste/ de la sgrib par byed pa su yang med de/ de ni/ sems kyi chos nyid do/ /gang yang bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang nas sangs rgyas kyi
339a3(dkon brtsegs): zhing rnam par sgrub pa'i rgyan du bsngo bar byed pa de ni/ sgrub par byed pa'o/ /sems rmi lam dang 'dra ba rab tu zhi ba'i mtshan nyid de ni/ sems kyi chos nyid de/ gang yang tshul
339a4(dkon brtsegs): khrims sdom pa'i tshogs gsog go cog de thams cad myur ba'i mngon par shes par bsngo ba de ni/ sgrub pa'o/ /sems smig rgyu lta bu shin tu zad par gyur pa de ni/ sems
339a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos nyid de gang yang bzod pa'i stobs dang / des pa byang chub kyi rgyan bsgrub pa'i phyir bsngo ba de ni/ de'i sgrub pa'o/ /sems chu zla lta bu shin tu dben pas dben pa de ni/ sems
339a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos nyid de/ gang yang brtson 'grus rtsom pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir bsngo ba de ni/ de'i sgrub pa'o/ /sems gzung du med
339a7(dkon brtsegs): pa mi mthong ba de ni/ sems kyi chos nyid de/ gang yang bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang mnyam par gzhag pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin du
339b1(dkon brtsegs): bsngo ba de ni/ de'i sgrub pa'o/ /sems gzugs med pa/ mi mthong ba/ mi thogs pa/ rnam par mi rig pa de ni/ sems kyi chos nyid de/ gang yang dris pa'i tshig tha dad pa bstan
339b2(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad shes pas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bsngo ba de ni/ de'i sgrub pa'o/ /dmigs pa sna tshogs la sems skye ba de ni/ sems kyi chos nyid de/ gang yang
339b3(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba la dmigs pa'i sems nye bar sbyor ba de ni/ de'i sgrub pa'o/ /rgyu med pa las sems mi skye ba de ni/ sems kyi chos nyid de/ gang yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
339b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgyu'i sems bskyed pa de ni/ de'i sgrub pa'o/ /gang yul med par sems mi skye ba de ni/ de'i sems kyi chos nyid de/ gang yang sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rgyu'i sems nye bar sbyor ba
339b5(dkon brtsegs): de ni| de'i sgrub pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa'o/ /de sems la sems kyi rjes su
339b6(dkon brtsegs): lta zhing gnas pa na mngon par shes pa thob pa'i phyir sems shin tu 'brel par byed de/ de mngon par shes pa thob nas sems gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi sems rab
339b7(dkon brtsegs): tu shes te/ shes nas kyang de'i rang bzhin gyi chos 'chad do/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na snying rje chen po thob pa'i phyir sems nye bar
340a1(dkon brtsegs): 'brel par byed de/ snying rje chen po thob pas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'o/ /sems la sems kyi rjes su
340a2(dkon brtsegs): lta zhing gnas pa na sems zad pa dang / sems 'gag par bya ba'i phyir sems gnas par mi byed kyi/ 'khor ba'i rgyun gyi kun tu sbyor ba rnams kyi sems mngon par sgrub ste/
340a3(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi dran pa shes pa de ma skyes pa dang / mi skye ba nges par gyur pa la zhugs pa'i chos rnams kyis gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung ngo / /
340a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur gyi bar du sems kyi rgyud de rgyun chags par byed do/ /sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na
340a5(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs 'tshang rgya ste/ shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar
340a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhag pa sgom mo/ /shA ri'i bu/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa yin zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub
340a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig gis chos gang mthong ba de dag byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du bar ma dor rmongs par mi 'gyur te/ de chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing
340b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa na gang stong pa nyid du ma gtogs pa dang / mtshan ma med par ma gtogs pa dang / smon pa med par ma gtogs pa dang / mi skye bar ma gtogs pa dang / ma skyes par ma gtogs
340b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed par ma gtogs pa dang / dngos po med par ma gtogs pa'i chos rdul tsam yang mi mthong ngo / /gang rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar ma gtogs pa'i
340b3(dkon brtsegs): chos rdul tsam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' de chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na chos nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong gi /chos ma
340b4(dkon brtsegs): yin pa mi mthong ngo / /de la chos gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag med pa'i don dang / sems can med pa'i don dang / srog med pa'i don dang / gang zag med pa'i don te/ de ni/
340b5(dkon brtsegs): chos zhes bya'o/ /de la chos ma yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag tu lta ba dang / sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang /
340b6(dkon brtsegs): rtag par lta ba dang / 'byung bar lta ba dang / 'jig par lta ba ste/ de ni/ chos ma yin pa zhes bya'o/ /yang shA ri'i bu/ chos thams cad ni/ chos so/ /chos thams cad ni/ chos
340b7(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa shes pa'i phyir chos thams cad chos so/ /bdag dang bdag gir lta ba'i bag la nyal
341a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir chos thams cad chos ma yin pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na chos de dag la gang yang sangs
341a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos ma yin pa gang las byang chub tu mi 'gyur ba dang / gang las sangs rgyas su mi 'gyur ba dang / gang las lam du mi 'gyur ba dang / gang las thar par mi 'gyur
341a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / gang las 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i chos rdul tsam yang mi mthong ste/ de chos thams cad 'byung bar shes nas sgrib pa med pa zhes bya ba'i snying rje chen po 'thob ste/
341a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa la'ang de dag nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa ma yin gyi/ de dag nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /zhes bcos mar 'du shes bskyed
341a5(dkon brtsegs): do| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar de dag ni/ nges pa'i don la yang dag par 'jug pa ste/ nyon mongs pa rnams la bsags pa'am/ phung po'i dngos po med de/ de dag nyid
341a6(dkon brtsegs): rjes su rtogs pa'i phyir byang chub bo/ /nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa byang chub kyi rang bzhin yang de yin no/ /byang chub kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa nyon mongs pa'i
341a7(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin yang de yin te/ de ltar dran pa nye bar gzhog kyang cung zad kyang nye bar 'jog pa med/ rab tu 'jog ba med/ mi 'jog pa med de/ chos nyid de gnas pa nyid du
341b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu shes so/ /de bas na/ chos kyi dbyings de ni/ gnas pa nyid ces bya'o/ /chos kyi dbyings gnas gang la gnas pa sems can gyi khams kyang gnas de la gnas so/ /sems
341b2(dkon brtsegs): can gyi khams gnas gang la gnas pa nam mkha'i khams kyang gnas de la gnas te/ de bas na/ chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'
341b3(dkon brtsegs): de chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na sangs rgyas kyi chos la rton pa yin/ chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos su mos par byed de/ de zad pa shes pa yang bskyed mod kyi/
341b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas pa'i zad pa yang mngon du mi byed/ mi skye ba shes pa yang mngon par sgrub mod kyi/ sems can la blta ba'i phyir yang skye la/ mi skye ba'i mtha' de yang mi gtong ngo / /
341b5(dkon brtsegs): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya ba ni/ chos thams cad dang dran pa de la gzhog par byed cing / nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ji snyed chos su gdags
341b6(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag thams cad ma lus par dran pa de la 'jog ste/ dran pa de yang brjed par mi byed/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bar du rmongs par mi byed do/ /chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye
341b7(dkon brtsegs): bar gzhag pa'o/ /zhes bya ba de ni/ bstan pa dpag tu med pa ste/ kun tu spyod yul ma yin pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dag par 'dul ba/ sems can thams cad kyi
342a1(dkon brtsegs): sems tshim par byed pa/ bdud thams cad 'dul ba rang byung ba rtogs pa'i phyir te/ shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos la chos kyi rjes su
342a2(dkon brtsegs): lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom mo/ /de dag ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi zhes bya ste/ shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po de
342a3(dkon brtsegs): dag la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
342a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi byang chub kyi yan lag 'di bdun te/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang
342a5(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang
342a6(dkon brtsegs): dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ shA ri'i bu/ de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi yan lag bdun no/ /
342a7(dkon brtsegs): de la dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ dran pa gang gis chos rtogs par byed/ chos la so sor rtog par byed/ chos la dpyod par byed/ 'chos yongs su tshol
342b1(dkon brtsegs): bar byed cing chos rnam par 'byed par byed pa dang / chos la rnam par rtog par byed de/ de dran pa des gang chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de yang rjes su rtogs so/ /yang
342b2(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid shes pa gang zhe na/ chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa ste/ gang de ltar dran zhing khong chud pa de ni/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan
342b3(dkon brtsegs): lag ces bya'o/ /de la chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ gang chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong rab tu rnam par 'byed pa shes pa ste/ nges pa'i don
342b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang nges pa'i don du/ drang ba'i don kyang drang ba'i don du/ kun rdzob kyi don kyang kun rdzob kyi don du/ don dam pa'i don kyang don dam pa'i don du/ brda yang brdar/ rnam par gtan la
342b5(dkon brtsegs): bab pa yang rnam par gtan la bab par chos de dag ji ltar rab tu dbye bar bya ba de bzhin du de dag rnam par 'byed par byed de/ de ni/ chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi
342b6(dkon brtsegs): yan lag ces bya'o/ /de la brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub yan lag gang zhe na/ gang chos rnam par 'byed pa de nyid kyi dga' ba dang / shin tu sbyangs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
342b7(dkon brtsegs): btang snyoms dang / ye shes kyi bar du 'dzin pa dang / spro ba dang / stobs dang / rtul ba dang / mi ldog pa'i mos pa dang / mthu dang / brtson pa mi 'dor ba dang / lam mngon par rtogs
343a1(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba la brtson 'grus rtsom pa ste/ de ni/ brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o/ /de la dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan
343a2(dkon brtsegs): lag gang zhe na/ dga' ba gang dang / chos la dga' ba gang dang / chos la mchog tu dga' ba gang gis sems mi zhum zhing dang ba ste/ ma zhum pa'i dga' ba des gang lus
343a3(dkon brtsegs): sam| sems kyang shin tu byang bar byed la/ kun nas nyon mongs pa yang sel ba de ni/ dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o/ /de la shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag
343a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ gang lus shin tu sbyangs pa dang / sems shin tu sbyangs pa dang / nyon mongs pa shin tu sbyangs pa dang / sgrib pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin du
343a5(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa la sems nye bar gzhog pa ste/ de ni/ shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o/ /de la ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/
343a6(dkon brtsegs): gang sems mnyam par bzhag pas chos shes pa rtogs par 'gyur te/ sems mnyam par ma bzhag pas ni/ ma yin pa dang / sems mnyam par gzhag pas chos de dag
343a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'i/ sems mnyam par ma gzhag bsam yin te/ chos mnyam pa nyid dang / chos la gzhol ba ma gtogs par rjes su chags pa'i kun
343b1(dkon brtsegs): nas dkris pas rtogs par mi byed de/ de ni/ ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o/ /de la btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ gang yid bde ba
343b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / gang yid mi bde ba'i cha dang mthun pa'i chos rnams la sems mi 'dzin pa dang / 'jig rten gyi chos kyis mi 'phrog pa dang / mthon dman du mi gnas pa'i phyir rab tu mi g.yo/

343b4(dkon brtsegs): dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /

343b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag

344a1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/ bdag tu lta ba las langs pa ma yin/ sems can du lta ba las langs pa ma yin/ srog tu lta ba las langs pa ma
344a2(dkon brtsegs): yin| gang zag tu lta ba las langs pa ma yin/ chad pa dang rtag pa dang / 'byung ba dang 'jig par lta ba las langs pa ma yin/ dge ba dang mi dge bar lta ba las langs pa ma
344a3(dkon brtsegs): yin pa nas mya ngan las 'das par lta ba las langs pa ma yin pa ste/ de ni/ yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o/ /de la yang dag pa'i rtog pa gang zhe na/ rtog pa gang gis 'dod chags

344a5(dkon brtsegs): rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba de la rtog pa ste/ de ni/ yang dag pa'i rtog pa zhes bya'o/ /de la yang dag pa'i ngag
344a6(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ yang dag pa'i ngag gang gis bdag dang / gzhan la mi gdung zhing / de phan pa'i rjes su sbyor ba'i ngag dang ldan pa yin te/ ngag des lam mnyam pa la 'jug pa de

344b1(dkon brtsegs): dkar la rnam par smin pa dkar pa de lta bu'i las mngon par 'du byed pa dang / gang las dkar nag la rnam par smin pa dkar nag tu 'gyur ba de lta bu'i las mngon par 'du mi byed

344b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i las la brtson pas yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' zhes bya'o/ /de la yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba gang zhe na/ gang 'phags pa'i rigs dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan mi gtong
344b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / kha gsag med pa dang / tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / thob kyis 'jal ba med pa dang / dgang sla ba dang / gso sla ba dang / cho ga mi lhod pa dang / gzhan gyi rnyed pa la phrag dog
344b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / bdag gi rnyed pas chog shes pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / 'phags pas gnang ba'i 'tsho ba ste/ de ni/ yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba zhes bya'o/ /de la yang dag pa'i
344b6(dkon brtsegs): rtsol ba gang zhe na/ rtsol ba log par spyod par bshad pa 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gang nyon mongs pa bag la nyal ba'i rtsol ba de mi 'dod kyi/ rtsol ba gang 'phags
344b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lam dang / bden pa la 'jug pa/ mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i lam du 'jog par byed pa'i rtsol ba de'i rjes su 'gro ba ste/ de ni/ yang dag pa'i rtsol ba zhes bya'o/ /de la
345a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i dran pa gang zhe na/ dran pa gang shin tu nye bar gzhog pa dang / tha mal pa ma yin pa dang / drang ba dang / gya gyu med pa dang / 'khor ba'i nyes pa dang
345a2(dkon brtsegs): skyon la lta ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam du 'dren pa'i dran pa dang / dran par byed pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam mi brjed pa ste/ de ni/ yang dag pa'i dran pa zhes bya'o/ /de

345a4(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas sems can thams cad rab tu thar bar bya ba'i phyir yang dag pa nyid du 'jug pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces
345a5(dkon brtsegs): bya'o| |'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi lam mi zad pa 'di byang chub sems dpas mngon par rtogs nas 'chad pa dang /

347b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan la la sems g.yeng bar byed pa'i chos ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs de ni/ ting nge 'dzin gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs zhes bya'o/ /de la shes rab kyi mi mthun pa'i

347b3(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs zhes bya ste/ de ni/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams zhes bya'o/ /tshul bzhin yid la byed pa gang gis sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de lta bu de dag spang ba'i
347b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir 'dun pa skyed/ 'bad par byed/ brtson 'grus rtsom/ sems rab tu 'dzin/ yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa ste/ de bas na/ mi dge ba'i chos de dag sems la phung por gyur pa
347b5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas so/ /gang yang mi dge ba'i chos de rnams sems la rgyu ba'i sdug pa'i rnam pas 'dod chags sam/ khong khro ba'i rnam pas zhe sdang
347b6(dkon brtsegs): dam/ ma rig pa'i rnam pas gti mug gam/ rgyu dang sgrib pa gang dag las byung ba shes shing de la tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'i rnam pa mi gtsang bas 'dod chags zhi bar byed/
347b7(dkon brtsegs): byams pas zhe sdang zhi bar byed/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas gti mug zhi bar byed de/ gang kun nas nyon mongs pa de dag zhi ba de ni/ tha snyad du btags pa'i phyir spong ba zhes
348a1(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ /gang spong ba de ni/ gang yang rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi chos thams cad mngon sum pas na/ de'i phyir yang dag par spong ba zhes
348a2(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ de ni/ yang dag par spong ba gnyis pa'o/ /gang yang dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed/ 'bad par byed/ brtson 'grus rtsom/ sems rab
348a3(dkon brtsegs): tu 'dzin/ yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gnas tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang dag par bsgrub par
348a4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i dge ba'i chos tshad med pa'i phyir ro/ /de la 'dun pa ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi rtsa ba'o/ /brtson 'grus yang dag par bsgrubs pa ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
348a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi rtsa ba'o/ /sems rab tu 'dzin pa nyams su lon par byed pa de ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi rtsa ba ste/ de ni/ yang dag par spong ba gsum pa'o/ /gang yang dge ba'i chos
348a6(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang / nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed/ 'bad par byed/ brtson 'grus rtsom/ sems rab tu 'dzin/ yang
348a7(dkon brtsegs): dag par rab tu 'jog ces bya ba de ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub tu bsngos pa'i tshig bla dwags so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub tu bsngos pa ni/ mthar byang chub
348b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi snying po'i bar du slar chud za bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar khams gsum la mi gnas par sems bskyed pa'i phyir ro/ /gang khams gsum la gnas pa'i dge
348b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba de ni/ zad par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar sems bskyed pa de ni/ khams gsum la gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /gang yang dge ba'i rtsa ba khams gsum la mi gnas
348b3(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad mkhyen par bsngos pa de la zad pa gang yang med de/ de ni/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi pa'o/ /de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' lam yan lag bzhi pa la mkhas pa
348b4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gzhan yang lam la mkhas pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' lam yan lag lnga pa ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dad pa'i dbang po dang /
348b5(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ de la dad pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ dad pa gang gis chos bzhi la dad
348b6(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'khor ba na spyod pa'i 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba la mngon par dad de/ de las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pa yin/ de srog gi phyir yang
348b7(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa'i las mi byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yang dad de spyod pa la zhugs pa de/ theg pa gzhan la 'dod par mi byed pa dang / don dam pa nges pa'i don dang / rten
349a1(dkon brtsegs): cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo dang / sems can la rnam par spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos thams cad la dad de
349a2(dkon brtsegs): blta bar bya ba thams cad bag la nyal bar mi byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams la dad cing thos nas the tshom med nem nur med
349a3(dkon brtsegs): par chos de rnams sdud par byed pa de ni/ dad pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o/ /de la brtson 'grus kyi dbang po gang zhe na/ chos gang la dad pa de brtson 'grus kyi dbang pos bskyed par
349a4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa ste/ de ni/ brtson 'grus kyi dbang po zhes bya'o/ /chos gang dag brtson 'grus kyis bsdus pa de dag dran pa'i dbang pos chud mi za bar byed pa de ni/ dran pa'i dbang po
349a5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o/ /chos gang dran pa'i dbang pos chud mi za bar byed pa'i chos de dag ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang pos rtse gcig tu byed pa de ni/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po zhes bya'o/ /chos
349a6(dkon brtsegs): gang dag ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang pos rtse gcig par byed pa de dag shes rab kyi dbang pos so sor rtog par byed de/ gang chos de dag shes pa de ni/ shes rab kyi dbang po zhes
349a7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ /de ltar na/ dbang po lnga po de dag lhan cig tu 'brel ba ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed/ lung bstan pa'i sa yang thob par byed de/ 'di
349b1(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ dper na/ phyi rol gyi mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dag mngal na 'dug pa bud med dang skyes pa'i dbang por ma gyur gyi bar du mngal na 'dug pa la lung mi ston pa
349b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' dbang po lnga po de dag dang mi ldan gyi bar du lung mi ston te/ de ni/ lam yan lag lnga pa'o/ /de
349b3(dkon brtsegs): ltar na| byang chub sems dpa' lam yan lag lnga pa la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' lam yan lag
349b4(dkon brtsegs): lnga la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ yan lag lnga ni/ 'di lta ste/ dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi
349b5(dkon brtsegs): stobs so/ /de la dad pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ gang mos pa dad pa mgo gcig pa mi rdzi ba ste/ gal te de'i drung du bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su bsgyur te 'ongs nas chos
349b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi ye shes la dad pa gang yang rung ba la la zhig gis chos 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma yin no/ /zhes dbral bar byed/ 'dun pa zlog par byed kyang yongs su brtag pa
349b7(dkon brtsegs): bzung na/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams ni/ gzhan du 'gyur gyi/ dad pa'i stobs la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ de lta ma yin no/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' stobs
350a1(dkon brtsegs): las 'bral bar mi nus pa de ni/ dad pa'i stobs so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs gang zhe na/ gang brtson 'grus rtsom zhing dge ba'i
350a2(dkon brtsegs): c hos gang dang gang la mngon par sbyor ba de dang de dag la brtan pa'i stobs kyi mthu thob kyang gnas der ma bsgral gyi bar du stobs kyi mthu de la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten
350a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis rnam par bzlog pa'am/ bstan pa'am/ rnam par bslang bar mi nus te/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub
350a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i dran pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ chos gang dag la dran pa nye bar gzhag pas sems nye bar bzhag pa ste/ de ni/ nyon mongs pa gang yang rung ba dag gis gtong
350a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'am g.yeng bar mi nus te/ dran pa'i stobs bskyed pa des nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms shing dran pa de yang mi chom pa ste/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa'i
350a6(dkon brtsegs): stobs zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs gang zhe na/ gang 'du 'dzi thams cad dben par spyod pa ste/ gang dag gi lam gyi sgra thams cad la
350a7(dkon brtsegs): yang rtog la de'i bsam gtan dang po'i sgra'i tsher ma la sgrib par mi byed pa dang / dge bar rtog pa la yang rnam par rtog mod kyi/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang sgrib par
350b1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'byung ba dang / de dga' ba dang bde ba skyes te gnas mod kyi/ de'i bsam gtan gsum pa la yang sgrib par mi 'gyur ba dang / de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba
350b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir btang snyoms pa yang ma yin mod kyi/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang sgrib par mi 'gyur ba ste/ de bsam gtan de bzhi
350b3(dkon brtsegs): la gnas na/ bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pas gzhom par mi nus te/ de ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas kyang mi gtong la ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis kyang mi skye ste/ de ni/ byang chub
350b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs gang zhe na/ gang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyis mi tshom
350b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ye shes te/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyes ma thag tu bzo'i gnas 'jig rten na ji snyed spyod pa dam pa dang / dga' bar byed pa dang / rnyed dka' ba de dag thams cad slob
350b6(dkon brtsegs): dpon med par mngon du 'gyur te/ gang 'jig rten las 'das pa dag kyang gang gis 'jig rten dag sgrol bar byed de/ de dag byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab dang / ye shes
350b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi stobs kyis byung ba/ lha dang / mi rnams kyis mi chom pa ste/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so/ /'di ni/ yan lag lnga pa'i lam gzhan no/ /de ltar na/
351a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' yan lag lnga la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gzhan yang mdor bsdu na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
351a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi lam ni/ mgo gcig pa ste/ de ni/ lam bgrod pa gcig pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu gnyis su med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
351a3(dkon brtsegs): grogs med par shin tu brtson pa'i stobs kyi mthu yongs su bzung ba'i bsam pas go cha bgos pa ste/ gzhan gyis ma bstan pa/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa/ bdag nyid byed pa/ bdag gi
351a4(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis yang dag par 'phags pa ste/ de ltar go cha sra ba bgos nas gang sems can thams cad kyis ma thob pa de bdag gis thob par bya'o/ /gang 'phags pa thams
351a5(dkon brtsegs): cad dang / gang theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ma thob pa de bdag gis thob par bya'o/ /sbyin pa ni/ nga'i grogs ma yin gyi/ nga ni/

351b1(dkon brtsegs): shes par bya'o/ /nga ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis bslang bar bya ba ma yin gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad ngas bslang bar bya'o/ /zhes de lta bu'i chos rnams la grogs med cing
351b2(dkon brtsegs): nga gcig pu gnyis su med par rdo rje'i gdan la 'dug nas bdud stobs dang bcas pa btul te/ skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
351b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/ /zhes de la nges par rtog pa bsam pa'i sbyor ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam bgrod pa gcig pu zhes bya ste/ de ltar

351b7(dkon brtsegs): las 'byung bar 'gyur snyam pa dang / de 'di ltar sems te/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa byung ba'i phyir ma rig pa 'byung / ma rig pa byung ba'i phyir 'du byed 'byung / 'du byed byung

355a6(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi spyod pa dang / ye shes kyang de snyed do/ /sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i sgo ji snyed pa byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab la 'jug pa'i sgo yang de snyed

355b3(dkon brtsegs): dpyad par bya'o/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i khyad par yongs su rdzogs pa'i don ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/ /gzhan yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs
355b4(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs pa'i don ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/ /'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa'i chos la mngon par ma chags pa'i don ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/ /'khor ba'i nyes pa
355b5(dkon brtsegs): khong du chud pa'i don ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/ /zad mi shes pa'i chos kyi mdzod ston pa'i don ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/ /sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su rdzogs
355b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/ /sbyin pa mnyam pa nyid dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab mnyam pa nyid rtogs pa'i
355b7(dkon brtsegs): don ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/ /rnam par nges pa'i don ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/ /sems can thams cad kyi khams la 'jug pa'i don ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/ /mi
356a1(dkon brtsegs): skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i don ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yongs su rdzogs pa'i don ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i
356a2(dkon brtsegs): don to| |sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su rdzogs pa'i don ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/ /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/ /byang chub kyi snying
356a3(dkon brtsegs): po yang dag par thob pa'i don ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/ /bdud thams cad rab tu 'dul ba'i don ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su
356a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i don ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs gzhog par byed pa'i don ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/ /shA
356a5(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu| byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs bslab na/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bas na/ theg pa chen po la
356a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blang bar bya/ gzung bar bya/ bklag par bya/ gzhan la yang bshad par

356b1(dkon brtsegs): par byas/ gzhan la yang bshad/ rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan na/ yon tan bcu po 'di dag thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshe rabs gzhan du 'phos nas
356b2(dkon brtsegs): bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas thams cad la rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur/ rigs mtho zhing brtson par 'gyur/ dbang che bar grags par 'gyur/ tshig btsun par 'gyur/
356b3(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ lha dang mi rnams la phangs par 'gyur/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po thob par 'gyur/ tshangs pa thob par 'gyur/ thams cad du byang chub kyi sems
356b4(dkon brtsegs): dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur te/ yon tan gyi phan yon 'di bcu thob par 'gyur ro/ /de gzhan yang yon tan gyi phan yon bcu thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gcer
356b5(dkon brtsegs): bu pa'i rtsod pa dang 'dres pa ma yin par 'gyur ba dang / bdag tu mi lta ba dang / sems can du mi lta ba dang / srog tu mi lta ba dang / gang zag tu mi lta ba dang / chad par mi lta ba dang /
356b6(dkon brtsegs): rtag par mi lta bar 'gyur ba dang / dngos po thams cad la mi lta ba dang / rab tu 'byung ba la dga' bar sems bskyed pa 'thob pa dang / thos pa'i tshig 'bru myur du khong du chud par
356b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ste/ yon tan gyi phan yon bcu po de dag thob par 'gyur ro/ /de gzhan yang yon tan gyi phan yon bcu thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba
357a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / mos pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
357a2(dkon brtsegs): dal ba phun sum tshogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba dang / rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags chung ste 'dod chags bdo ba ma yin la/ de shin tu 'dod chags
357a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi gdung bas yongs su mi gdung ba dang / rang bzhin gyis zhe sdang chung ste zhe sdang bdo ba ma yin la/ de shin tu zhe sdang gi gdung bas yongs su mi gdung ba dang / rang bzhin gyis
357a4(dkon brtsegs): gti mug chung ste gti mug bdo ba ma yin la/ de shin tu gti mug gi gdung bas yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur ba ste/ yon tan gyi phan yon bcu po de dag thob par 'gyur ro/ /de
357a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang yon tan gyi phan yon bcu thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab ngo mtshar du 'gyur/ shes rab myur bar 'gyur/ shes rab rno bar 'gyur/ shes
357a6(dkon brtsegs): rab mgyogs par 'gyur/ shes rab rgya che bar 'gyur/ shes rab zab par 'gyur/ shes rab nges par 'byed par 'gyur/ shes rab ma chags par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs
357a7(dkon brtsegs): pa mngon sum du mthong zhing mthong nas tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la tshul bzhin gyi zhu ba yongs su zhu zhing tshul bzhin du zhu ba zhus
357b1(dkon brtsegs): nas lan ldon par 'gyur ba ste/ yon tan gyi phan yon bcu po de dag thob par 'gyur ro/ /de gzhan yang yon tan gyi phan yon bcu thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/

357b6(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu mnyan/ blangs/ bzung / bklags/ kun chub par byas/ gzhan la yang bshad cing rgya
357b7(dkon brtsegs): cher yang dag par rab tu bstan na/ yon tan gyi phan yon 'di snyed thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad
358a1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /gang dag mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa/ /mkhas pa de dag shes rab mtha' yas 'gyur/ /chos dang don rnams la yang mkhas par

358a3(dkon brtsegs): de| |rtag tu chos kyi sbyin pa byed par 'gyur/ /sems can rnams ni mang du chos thos nas/ /kye ma'o yon tan chen po 'chad byed pa/ /nam zhig bdag cag 'di 'dra'i chos ston cing / /
358a4(dkon brtsegs): mdo sde 'di 'dra 'dzin par 'gyur zhes zer/ /gang dag de 'dra shes rab ldan mchog rnams/ /chos rnams gang la'ang zhum par mi 'gyur te/ /dran dang ye shes kyis ni 'phags pa
