358a6(dkon brtsegs): tshol bar byed/ /de ni thos pas rtag tu 'phags par 'gyur/ /thos nas don ni nye bar 'dzin par byed/ /shes rab ldan pa 'bru la mi snyems te/ /don la lta bas rtogs pa 'phel
358a7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur/ /de yi ye shes rtag tu tshad med do/ /ye shes mtha' yas don kyang mtha' yas te/ /sems pa mtha' yas dam pa'i don la mkhas/ /de yi yon tan phyogs dang phyogs
358b1(dkon brtsegs): su 'gro / de yi thos pa'i yon tan 'di dag go /de yi 'dod chags chung la zhe sdang chung / /de yi gti mug shin tu rab tu chung / /sems kyang shin tu dga' ba rnyed par 'gyur/ /de yi thos pa'i
358b2(dkon brtsegs): yon tan 'di dag go / longs spyod rnyed nas rgyags par mi 'gyur te/ /'di la snying po ci zhes don la rtog /longs spyod snying po med par rab shes nas/ /de ni longs spyod mi lta rab tu 'byung / /
358b3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par byung ste dgon par gnas/ /rtag tu g.yel ba med pa dang / /chos rnams thos pas mi ngoms te/ /chos sbyin pa la ser sna med/ /'jig rten mgon po'i drung nyid du/ /song ste
358b4(dkon brtsegs): zhu ba zhu byed pas/ /de phyir de yi shes rab 'phel/ /de la dkar po 'bri ba med/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ byang chub
358b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de la brtson pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyad do/ /de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa zhes bya'o/ /de la bsdu ba'i dngos po'i rjes su 'jug pa gang zhe na
358b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di bzhi ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsdu ba'i dngos po ste/ bsdu ba'i dngos po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' yun ring por sems can rnams yang dag par bsdu bar
358b7(dkon brtsegs): byed do| |bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don byed pa dang / don mtshungs pa ste/ de dag ni/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi zhes bya'o/ /de la sbyin pa gang zhe na/
359a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ zang zhing sbyin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang / chos sbyin pa ste/ de ni/ sbyin pa'o/ /de la snyan par smra ba gang zhe na/ slong ba dang / chos nyan
359a2(dkon brtsegs): pa la snyan par smra ba'o/ /de la don byed pa ni/ bdag dang / gzhan gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /don mthun pa ni/ theg pa gang la yon tan du 'du shes pa'i theg

359a4(dkon brtsegs): smra ba ni/ gang slong ba rnams la rim gro byed pa'o/ /don byed pa ni/ gang gis slong ba rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba'i don de yongs su thob par byed pa'o/ /don mtshungs pa ni/ gang slong ba

359a7(dkon brtsegs): la zhugs pa'i sems mi gtong ba'o/ /don byed pa ni/ snying rje chen po'i ge cha bgos pa'i sems kyis sems can gyi bya ba la brtson pa'o/ /don mtshungs pa ni/ btang snyoms la
359b1(dkon brtsegs): mthon dman med cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la bsngo ba'i sems so/ /gzhan yang sbyin pa ni/ gang chos kyis btsal ba'i longs spyod yongs su gtong ba'o/ /snyan par smra ba ni/

359b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub lag tu 'ong ba la bltas nas gzhan la sbyin pa na yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur ba'o/ /de la chos sbyin pa gang zhe na/ gang ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams ston pa'o/ /de la snyan par smra ba
359b6(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ gang zang zing med par chos ston pa'o/ /don byed pa ni/ gang pha rol la lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / 'chad pa dang / ston pa la mi skyo'o/ /de la don mtshungs pa ni/

360a1(dkon brtsegs): ba ni| gang rgyang ring por yang song ste/ dam pa'i chos ston pa'o/ /de la don byed pa ni/ gang chos 'dod pas chos smra ba rnams gos dang bral bar gyur tam

360a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsam par zhugs pa'i rgyud kyis chos ston pa'o/ /gzhan yang chos kyi sbyin pa ni/ gang sbyin pa thams cad kyi nang na mchog tu shes nas chos sbyin par byed pa'o/ de la snyan

361a1(dkon brtsegs): da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan yang thos nas dga' ba dang / mgu pa rgya chen po rnyed par gyur to/ /de dga' ba dang / mgu ba
361a2(dkon brtsegs): r gya chen po rnyed nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen po de nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lo bye ba
361a3(dkon brtsegs): phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug tu 'di lta ste/ na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ rim gror
361a4(dkon brtsegs): b yas| mchod par byas nas byang chub tu smon lam btab kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phung po chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma

361a6(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i tshe de'i dus na nga gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod ces bya bar gyur te/ ngas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phung po chen po nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
361a7(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa la na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis lo bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug tu bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/
361b1(dkon brtsegs): rim gror byas/ mchod par byas nas byang chub tu smon lam btab kyang nga bcom ldan 'das des gzhon nu khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
361b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung ma bstan to/ /shA ri'i bu/ de lta bas na/ bcom ldan 'das 'od 'phro'i phung po chen po de tshun chad bskal pa grangs med pa na de bzhin
361b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog yan lag ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du'o/ /shA ri'i bu/
361b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog yan lag gi nyan thos bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i nyan thos rnams kyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po byung ste/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa
361b5(dkon brtsegs): zad pa| nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa nas sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag go/ shA ri'i bu/ yang de'i tshe na rgyal po mdzes par
361b6(dkon brtsegs): snang ba zhes bya ba mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/ 'khor los bsgyur ba chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po/ yul gyi mthu dang brtson pa thob pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa
361b7(dkon brtsegs): zhig byung ste/ de'i rin po che sna bdun byung ba ni/ 'di dag go /'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che nas blon po rin po che'i bar du bdun te/ mngon par btul nas gnas pa'i bar du'o/ /
362a1(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu/ rgyal po mdzes par snang ba de'i pho brang ni/ grong khyer 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser zhes bya ste/ shar phyogs nas nub phyogs su chur ni/ dpag
362a2(dkon brtsegs): tshad bcu gnyis/ lho phyogs nas byang phyogs su zheng du ni/ dpag tshad bdun yod de/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / dga' ba dang / skye bo mang po dang
362a3(dkon brtsegs): mis gang bar gyur to/ /yang de'i tshe na tshong dpon shes rab bzang zhes bya ba phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba nas mdzod dang bang bas yongs su gang ba'i bar du rgyas par bya ste/
362a4(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas la bya ba byas pa zhig byung ngo / /shA ri'i bu/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog yan
362a5(dkon brtsegs): lag des tshong dpon shes rab bzang gi bsam pa la brtags nas kye ma'o tshong dpon shes rab bzang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi snod du rung ngo / /kye ma'o
362a6(dkon brtsegs): tshong dpon shes rab bzang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du gyur to/ /snyam du dgongs te/ snod du gyur par mkhyen nas tshong dpon shes rab bzang ga la ba der gshegs te

375b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams la chos bstan par bgyi'o/ /'di lta ste/ da ltar bcom ldan 'das tshogs la
375b7(dkon brtsegs): gdams ngag mdzad pa de bzhin du tshogs la gdams par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ da ltar bcom ldan 'das sems can sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa rnams thar pa
376a1(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa de bzhin du bdag cag kyang sems can sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa rnams thar par bgyi'o/ /de nas rol mo mkhan lnga brgya po de dag gis sil snyan gyi
376a2(dkon brtsegs): sgra chen pos bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed do/ /srog chags khri po de dag dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin chung ma bdun dang / khye'u bdun dang / bu mo bdun dang /

376a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du steng gi bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so/ /de nas rol mo mkhan lnga brgya po de dag gis bcom
376a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das steng gi bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang dad pa skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus rol mo'i cha byad de dag thams cad bor pa
376a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus de dag ma bzung bar steng gi bar snang la gnas shing sgra 'byin te/ sgra 'byin bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa bar snang la bzhugs pa la lan gsum
376a7(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba byed do/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin g.yog dang bcas pa dang / rol mo mkhan lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang / srog chags khri po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi
376b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul 'di mthong nas dga' mgu yid rangs te dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas thams cad thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ /steng gi bar
376b2(dkon brtsegs): snang la dpag tshad gcig khor yug tu yang sil snyan stong phrag du ma yongs su ma bzung ba dag gis khyab par gyur te/ dper na/ sbrang rtsi'i sbrang ma'i tshang bzhin du steng gi bar snang la rnga
376b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / rol mo'i sil snyan gyi sgra 'byung ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin g.yog dang bcas pa dang / rol mo mkhan lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang / srog chags khri po de dag dang / chos
376b4(dkon brtsegs): nyan du sngar lhags pa las srog chags drug stong tsam zhig dang / dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu po de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags pa
376b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus steng gi bar snang la khang pa brtsegs pa lnga lnga byung ngo / /rol mo mkhan gyi khang pa brtsegs pa bzhis mdun gyis bltas pa'i rol mo mkhan gyi khang pa brtsegs
376b6(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad na chos ston to/ /bar snang la gnas pa'i lha stong phrag bye ba du ma dag gis kyang lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba dag gtor to/ /me tog de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus steng gi bar snang
376b7(dkon brtsegs): la khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad cur gyur to/ /de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po steng gi bar snang la gnas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu chen po de mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba dang / dad pa
377a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / gus pa dang rje sa cher byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po de'i dad pa mkhyen/ tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin dang / skye bo'i
377a2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs chen po de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad de dbu'i gtsug tu mi snang bar gyur ces bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun

377a7(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gro ste/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de bskal pa bye ba stong phrag brgya 'das nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
377b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas ded dpon zhes bya ba mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/ /mnyes par byas nas bsti stang du byed par 'gyur/ bla mar byed par 'gyur/ rim gror byed par 'gyur/ mchod par byed par

382a7(dkon brtsegs): du 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang dga' bo/ ji ltar ma'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha ma yang chags pa'i sems skyes par gyur/ dus kyi zla mtshan
382b1(dkon brtsegs): yang rjes su mthun par gyur/ bar ma do'i phung po yang mngon du gyur la/ gong ma lta bu'i skyon mang po yang med cing las kyi rkyen dang yang ldan par gyur na/ mngal du 'jug par
382b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar bar ma do'i phung po de mngal du 'jug par 'dod pa na de yang rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ bsod nams dang mi ldan pa dang / bsod nams
382b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po dang ldan pa gang yin pa'o/ /bsod nams dang mi ldan pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par rtog pa'i sems byung nas yul mthong bar gyur pa na 'di snyam du sems te/ deng bdag
382b4(dkon brtsegs): ni| rlung dang / grang ba dang / gnam rmugs pa dang / char 'bab pa dang / skye bo mang po'i ca co dang / mang po'i mthu stobs kyis gnod par byed pa dang phrad par gyur te/ /zhes 'jigs
382b5(dkon brtsegs): shing skrag pa skyes nas deng bdag rtswa'i khyim dang / lo ma'i khyim dang / rtsig pa'i drung dben par 'jug par bya'o/ /yang na ri dang / nags stug po dang / brag phug dag tu 'jug
382b6(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o/ /snyam du sems te/ gzhan yang 'du shes rnam pa sna tshogs bskyed nas ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du ma'i mngal du 'jug par byed do/ /gang bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa
382b7(dkon brtsegs): de yang 'di snyam du deng bdag ni/ rlung dang / grang ba dang / gnam rmugs pa dang / char 'bab pa dang / skye bo mang po'i ca co dang / mang po'i mthu stobs kyis gnod par byed pa dang
383a1(dkon brtsegs): phrad par gyur to/ /zhes 'jigs shing skrag pa skyes nas khang pa brtsegs ma'i steng du 'dzeg pa'am/ yang thog mthon po'i steng du 'dzeg pa'am/ gzhal med
383a2(dkon brtsegs): khang gi nang du 'jug pa'am/ khri la 'dug par bya'o/ /snyam du sems te/ gzhan yang 'du shes rnam pa sna tshogs bskyed nas ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du ma'i mngal du 'jug par
383a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ 'di ltar bar ma do'i phung po de thog ma kho nar mngal du zhugs pa gang yin pa de ni/ mer mer po zhes bya ste/ pha
383a4(dkon brtsegs): ma'i mi gtsang ba dang / 'das pa'i las la brten nas lus len par byed kyang 'di ltar las de dang / pha ma'i rkyen rnams kyis so so nas rang bskyed par mi byed kyi/ 'dus pa'i
383a5(dkon brtsegs): mthu stobs kyis lus len par byed pas/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ snod kyi nang du zhos bkang nas skyes bu'i rtsol ba dang / thag pa la sogs pa la brten te mar 'byung ba yang rkyen
383a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams las dmigs par mi 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'dus pa'i mthu las mar 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du mer mer po'i lus kyang de bzhin te/ 'di ltar rgyu dang / rkyen gyi
383a7(dkon brtsegs): mthus mngal du lus mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rtswa sngon po dang / ba lang gi lci ba dang / rgya shug dang / zho la brten nas so so nas srin bu
383b1(dkon brtsegs): skye bar 'gyur ba re re'i nang du srin bu mi dmigs kyang rgyu dang / rkyen gyi stobs kyis srin bu skye bar 'gyur te/ srin bu de dag skye ba na so so nas rten ji lta ba bzhin du kha dog sngon po dang /
383b2(dkon brtsegs): ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar por 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du pha ma'i mi gtsang ba las lus 'di skye ba yang rkyen rnams kyi nang du btsal na/ dmigs par mi 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang
383b3(dkon brtsegs): rkyen 'dus pa'i mthu dang ma bral bar yang lus yang dag par len par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /lus 'di skyes pa na pha ma'i 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ngo bo nyid tha mi dad par gyur te/ 'di
383b4(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ sa'i khams kyis ni/ sra ba'i bya ba byed do/ /chu'i khams kyis ni/ gsher ba'i bya ba byed do/ /me'i khams kyis ni/ dro ba'i bya ba byed do/ /rlung gi khams kyis ni/ yang zhing
383b5(dkon brtsegs): g.yo ba'i bya ba byed de/ mer mer po'i lus de dag gal te sa'i khams 'ba' zhig dang ldan la chu'i khams med par gyur na ni/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ phye dang thal ba skam po
383b6(dkon brtsegs): bcangs pa bzhin du 'dur mi btub par 'gyur ro/ /gal te chu'i khams 'ba' zhig dang ldan la sa'i khams med par gyur na ni/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'bru mar ram/ chu'i rang
383b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin snum zhing gsher bas/ sra ba med pa bzhin du bo zhing gyes par 'gyur ro/ /gal te sa dang chu'i khams 'ba' zhig dang ldan la me'i khams med par gyur na ni/ 'di lta ste/ dper
384a1(dkon brtsegs): na| dbyar tsha ba'i dus su sha'i gong bu grib ma la bzhag pa nyi ma'i 'od kyis ma phog pa bzhin du rul zhing myags par 'gyur ro/ /gal te sa dang /
384a2(dkon brtsegs): chu dang / me'i khams dang ldan la rlung gi khams med par gyur na ni/ 'phel bar mi 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'khur ba mkhan nam de'i slob ma mkhas pas 'khur ba
384a3(dkon brtsegs): btsos nas dbugs kyis bus te/ ci dang ci bya ba rnams mngon par 'dus byas nas de dag nang khong stong du byed pa/ gal te rlung gi stobs med par gyur na mngon par 'grub par
384a4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de dag kyang phan tshun gcig la gcig brten cing yongs su bzung nas rnam par bzhag pa yin pas de'i phyir mer mer pa'i lus
384a5(dkon brtsegs): pha ma'i 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang / las kyi rlung gi rgyus skye bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du rkyen mang po rnams kyi nang na dmigs par mi 'gyur yang 'dus pa'i stobs kyis lus
384a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par len par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /gzhan yang dga' bo/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa bon gsar pa yongs su gtsang la legs par sbas pa/ srin bus ma zos pa/ ma
384a7(dkon brtsegs): rul cing ma tshig pa dang / ma gas pa dang / bu ga med pa zhig gang la la zhig gis zhing bzang zhing gshin pa btsal te sa bon de btab na/ ci nyin zhag gcig gis myu gu dang /
384b1(dkon brtsegs): sdong bu dang / yal ga dang / lo ma grib ma dang bcas pa dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rgyas shing phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar mi 'gyur lags
384b2(dkon brtsegs): so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ mer mer po'i lus kyang de bzhin du rgyu dang / rkyen las rim gyis skye bar 'gyur gyi/ dus gcig tu dbang po rnams phun sum
384b3(dkon brtsegs): tshogs par mi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na/ pha ma las byung bar gyur pa'i lus 'di rkyen rnams kyi nang na btsal na yang dmigs par mi 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang tshogs pa'i stobs kyis
384b4(dkon brtsegs): skye ba len par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /gzhan yang dga' bo/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu mig dang ldan pas me shel gyi nor bu blangs nas nyi ma la bzhag ste lci ba skam po nor
384b5(dkon brtsegs): bu dang mi ring bar bsten pa las me 'byung bar 'gyur ba/ lci ba dang / nyi ma'i 'od so so nas me 'byin par mi nus kyang phan tshun mi 'bral bas rgyu dang / rkyen gyi stobs kyis me 'byung
384b6(dkon brtsegs): bar byed do/ /pha ma las byung ba'i lus kyang de bzhin te/ 'di lta ste/ mer mer po'i lus gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs zhes bya'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byas dang / rnam
384b7(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa gang yin pa de ni/ ming zhes bya ste/ ming dang gzugs kyi phung po lnga pos skad cig ma gcig la lus blangs nas sdug bsngal myong bar byed pa la yang ngas bsngags pa
385a1(dkon brtsegs): rjod par mi byed na/ yun ring por srid pa rnams su 'khor bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi gtsang ba ni/ nyung yang mnam na/
385a2(dkon brtsegs): mang po lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de lta bas na/ mer mer po'i lus nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la su zhig sred cing chags par byed/ gzhan yang dga' bo/ 'di ltar lus de
385a3(dkon brtsegs): ma'i mngal na gnas pa yang zhag bdun phrag sum cu rtsa brgyad lon nas gdod 'byung bar 'gyur te/ zhag bdun phrag dang po la ma'i mngal na gnas pa gang yin pa de ni/ mer mer
385a4(dkon brtsegs): po zhes bya ste/ lus kyi mtshan ma dang por snang ba yin pas/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ zho ma chags pa dang 'dra bas zhag bdun gyi bar du mngal gyi nang du btsos/ rab tu btsos nas 'byung
385a5(dkon brtsegs): ba chen po bzhi mthar gyis mngon par grub par byed do/ /zhag bdun phrag gnyis pa la ma'i mngal du gnas pa'i tshe las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ kun sdud
385a6(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/ rlung shin tu phra mo des ma'i rtsib logs g.yon pa dang / g.yas pa bus te mer mer po'i lus kyi mtshan ma rim gyis snang bar byed pas/ de'i dbyibs zho bska ba'am/
385a7(dkon brtsegs): mar 'khyags pa 'dra ste/ mngal gyi nang du btsos/ rab tu btsos pas nur nur po'i lus su gyur nas 'di ltar 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag mthar gyis mngon par grub par byed do/ /
385b1(dkon brtsegs): zhag bdun phrag gsum pa la ma'i mngal du gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ mdzod kha zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis nur nur po gang yin pa de mthar
385b2(dkon brtsegs): gyis mkhregs shing ltar ltar por byed pas de'i dbyibs ni/ sman brdungs pa'i gtun bu 'dra la thung zhing chung ste mngal gyi nang du btsos/ rab tu btsos pas 'di ltar 'byung ba chen po bzhi
385b3(dkon brtsegs): po 'di dag mthar gyis 'brel par byed do/ /zhag bdun phrag bzhi pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ nang rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ste/
385b4(dkon brtsegs): rlung de'i stobs kyis ltar ltar po gang yin pa de ni/ mkhrang bar byed pas/ de'i dbyibs ni/ mchig gu 'dra ba ste/ nang du btsos/ rab tu btsos pas 'byung ba chen po bzhi po mthar gyis
385b5(dkon brtsegs): 'phel bar byed do/ /zhag bdun phrag lnga pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ yang dag par sdud pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis
385b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhrang 'gyur gang yin pa de ni/ rkang lag 'gyur bar sgyur bar byed pas gor gor po gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par phye nas brla gnyis dang / dpung pa gnyis dang / mgo'i mtshan ma mngon du
385b7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dbyar gyi dus su char 'bab pa'i tshe ljon shing rnams yal ga dang / 'dab ma skyed par byed pa de bzhin du las kyi rlung gi stobs kyis kyang lus
386a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi mtshan ma rnams snang bar byed do/ /zhag bdun phrag drug pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ zas
386a2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mtshan ma bzhi 'byung bar byed do/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pus mo gnyis dang / dpung pa gnyis gang yin pa de ni/ mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi
386a3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o/ /zhag bdun phrag bdun pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'khyil bar byed pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs
386a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi 'byung bar byed de/ 'di lta ste/ lag pa'i mthil gnyis dang / rkang pa'i mthil gnyis te/ de'i mtshan ma ni/ shin tu mnyen pas dbu ba 'dus
386a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang 'dra'o/ /zhag bdun phrag brgyad pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ zlog cing sgyur bar byed pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i
386a6(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis mtshan ma nyi shu 'byung bar byed de/ 'di lta ste/ lag pa dang / rkang pa'i sor mo'i mtshan ma nyi shu 'byung bar byed pa gang yin pa'o/ /de ni/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dbyar
386a7(dkon brtsegs): char 'bab pa'i tshe ljon shing rnams kyi yal ga dang / 'dab ma mthar gyis skyes shing 'phel bar byed pa de bzhin du las kyi rlung gi stobs kyis kyang mtshan ma rnams mngon du snang bar
386b1(dkon brtsegs): byed do/ /zhag bdun phrag dgu pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mtshan ma
386b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa dgu 'byung bar byed do/ /dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mig gnyis dang / rna ba gnyis dang / sna gnyis dang / kha dang / bshang ba dang / gci ba'i gnas gang yin pa de dag ni/ mtshan
386b3(dkon brtsegs): ma rnam pa dgu zhes bya'o/ /zhag bdun phrag bcu pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ sra bar byed pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis
386b4(dkon brtsegs): sra zhing brtan par byed do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe kun nas sgo zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ des mngal na gnas pa'i lus bus pas lus kun tu rgyas shing gang bar byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
386b5(dkon brtsegs): rkyal pa gang ba ji lta ba bzhin no/ /zhag bdun phrag bcu gcig pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ rdo rje zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs
386b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi mngal na gnas pa de steng dang / 'og gi phyogs su 'gro zhing lus kyi bu ga rnams 'byin par byed do/ /gzhan yang rlung de'i stobs kyis ma de res 'ga' dga' ba dang / mi dga' bar yang byed/
386b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba na yang de'i rang bzhin du 'gyur zhing rkang lag bskyod par yang byed pas mngal na gnas pa'i bu ga rnams mthar gyis skye zhing 'phel bar yang
387a1(dkon brtsegs): byed la/ de'i kha nas khrag nag po yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ sna nas kyang chu mi gtsang ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rlung des dbang po rnams bzlog nas de nas zhi bar 'gyur
387a2(dkon brtsegs): ro/ /zhag bdun phrag bcu gnyis pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ yon pa'i sgo zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis rtsib logs
387a3(dkon brtsegs): g.yas g.yon gyi nang khrol gyi rgyu ma che chung rnams skyed par byed de/ de ni/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba shad shad po'am/ skud pa grims pa sa la bzhag pa lta bur lan bco brgyad
387a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor bar lus la brten te gnas so/ /de'i tshe gzhan yang sbu ba rgyus pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung de'i dbang gis tshigs kyi yan lag sum brgya nyi shu dang / gnad brgya rtsa
387a5(dkon brtsegs): gcig lus la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag bcu gsum pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ bkres shing skom
387a6(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mngal gyi lus de nyam chung zhing bkres pa dang / skom pa'i 'du shes skyed par byed pas/ de'i tshe mas zos shing 'thungs pa'i ro ji snyed pa
387a7(dkon brtsegs): dag lus kyi gnad dang / lte ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su 'dzin cing phan 'dogs par byed do/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ bu ni ma mngal
387b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa na/ /mngal gnas de la phan 'dogs pas/ /des na lus srog rab gnas shing / /rim gyis skye dang 'phel bar byed/ /mas ni zos shing 'thungs pa dang / mngal na gnas la
387b2(dkon brtsegs): phan 'dogs pas/ /rim gyis skye dang 'phel bar byed/ /zhag bdun phrag bcu bzhi pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ skud pa'i

387b4(dkon brtsegs): ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ pad+ma zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis rtsa rgyu ba nyi shu bskyed nas bza' ba dang / btung ba'i ro gang
387b5(dkon brtsegs): yin pa rtsa 'di bzhugs nas lus la phan 'dogs par byed do/ /nyi shu gang zhe na/ lus kyi mdun dang / rgyab dang / g.yas g.yon re re la yang rtsa lnga lnga yod de/ rtsa 'di dag re re
387b6(dkon brtsegs): la yang rtsa phra mo'i yan lag bzhi bcu bzhi bcu yod do/ /rtsa de dag re re la yang yan lag brgya brgya yod do/ /lus kyi mdun na yod pa nyi khri ni/ sa ga zhes bya'o/ /lus kyi rgyab na
387b7(dkon brtsegs): yod pa nyi khri ni/ stobs zhes bya'o/ /lus kyi g.yon phyogs na yod pa nyi khri ni/ brtan pa zhes bya'o/ /lus kyi g.yas phyogs na yod pa nyi khri ni/ mthu dang ldan pa zhes bya ste/ de ltar na
388a1(dkon brtsegs): rtsa'i yan lag che phra brgyad khri lus de la skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rtsa de dag kyang kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan te/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang /
388a2(dkon brtsegs): dmar po dang / dkar po dang / mar dang / zho dang / 'bru mar gyi kha dog go /rtsa brgyad khri po de dag re re la yang rtsa ba re re yod de/ rtsa ba re re la yang bu ga sna tshogs yod de/ bu ga gcig
388a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / bu ga gnyis nas bu ga bdun pa'i bar dang ldan te/ re re yang spu'i bu ga dang phan tshun 'brel te/ de ni/ dper na/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba la bu ga mang po yod pa ji lta ba bzhin no/ /zhag
388a4(dkon brtsegs): bdun phrag bcu drug pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ bdud rtsi zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang /
388a5(dkon brtsegs): kha'i sgo dang / mid pa dang / snying gi snying po'i kho ra khor yug gi bu ga dgu po de dag rnam par phye nas dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba steng dang / 'og tu rgyu zhing thogs pa med pa dang / bza' ba
388a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / btung ba zos shing 'thungs pa gang yin pa de dag kyang lus la phan 'dogs shing bsags pa'i gnas yod pa dang / legs par zhugs nas 'og gi phyogs su 'byung bar
388a7(dkon brtsegs): byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rdza mkhan nam rdza mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pas 'jim pa legs par sbyar te 'khor lo'i steng du bzhag nas 'og dang / steng du bsgyur zhing snod kyi
388b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa mngon par 'dus byas nas mngon par grub pa de bzhin du 'di yang rlung gi stobs dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i lam gyis mgo dang / rna ba la sogs pa rim gyis yongs su rdzogs
388b2(dkon brtsegs): par byed do/ /zhag bdun phrag bcu bdun pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'bri gdong zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i mig
388b3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis kun tu dang ba dang / rna ba dang / sna'i dbang po la sogs pa yang rim gyis yongs su smin par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ me long gi dkyil 'khor rdul gyis g.yogs pa sa'i
388b4(dkon brtsegs): phye ma dang / 'bru mar dang / thal ba blangs te byi dor byas na/ yongs su gsal bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du las kyi rlung gi stobs kyis mig la sogs pa bus nas mig la sogs pa kun
388b5(dkon brtsegs): tu dang bar byed pa yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o/ /zhag bdun phrag bco brgyad pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ brtan par 'gyur
388b6(dkon brtsegs): ba zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i dbang po rnams mthar gyis yongs su smin cing gsal ba dang / mthar gyis yongs su dag par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma dang / zla ba'i
388b7(dkon brtsegs): dkyil 'khor sprin dang / khug rna rnams kyis bsgribs shing khebs par gyur pa glo bur du rlung drag po langs te bus nas phyogs bzhir gtor bar gyur na/ nyi ma dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de
389a1(dkon brtsegs): s hin tu yongs su gsal bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du 'di ltar las kyi rlung gi dbang po rnams bus pas ches shin tu gsal zhing yongs su dag par byed pa yang
389a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du rig par bya'o/ /zhag bdun phrag bcu dgu pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang snga ma'i rlung gi stobs kyis mig dang / sna ba dang / sna dang / lce'i dbang po bzhi po dag yongs
389a3(dkon brtsegs): su smin par byed do/ /dang po mngal du 'jug pa'i tshe ni/ dbang po gsum dang ldan te/ lus kyi dbang po dang / srog gi dbang po dang / yid kyi dbang po ste/ de ltar dbang po rnams yongs su
389a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par byed do/ /zhag bdun phrag nyi shu pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ shin tu sra ba zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis
389a5(dkon brtsegs): de'i lus las rus pa sna tshogs skyed par byed de/ rkang pa g.yon pa la brten te rus pa nyi shu bskyed do/ /rkang pa g.yas pa la brten te rus pa nyi shu bskyed do/ /gzhan yang rkang pa'i
389a6(dkon brtsegs): rting pa'i rus pa bzhi dang / rje ngar gyi rus pa gnyis dang / lha nga'i rus pa gnyis dang / brla'i rus pa gnyis dang / rked pa dang / dpyi'i rus pa gsum gsum dang / sgal tshigs kyi
389a7(dkon brtsegs): rus pa bco brgyad dang / rtsib ma'i rus pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang / brang gi rus pa sum cu dang / lag pa g.yas g.yon re re la rus pa nyi shu nyi shu dang / lag ngar gyi rus pa bzhi dang /
389b1(dkon brtsegs): dpung pa'i rus pa gnyis dang / 'gram pa'i rus pa gnyis dang / mgo'i rus pa bzhi dang / so'i rtsa ba'i rus pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang skyed par byed do/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ gzugs mkhan nam
389b2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pas sngar shing sra ba blangs te phyis srad bus bcings nas gzugs rnams byas pa la 'jim pa ma bskus mod kyi/ 'on kyang de'i tshe rus pa'i mtshan
389b3(dkon brtsegs): nyid ces brjod pa de bzhin du las kyi rlung gi stobs kyis rus pa rnams bskyed pa'i dus kyi tshe yang de bzhin te/ de lta bas na zhag bdun po de dag tu rus pa phra mo ma gtogs par rus pa
389b4(dkon brtsegs): chen po skye ba'i grangs ni/ nyis brgya yod par rig par bya'o/ /zhag bdun phrag nyi shu gcig pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ yang dag
389b5(dkon brtsegs): skyed pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mngal na gnas pa de'i lus kyi sha skyed par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ zhal zhal mkhan nam zhal zhal mkhan gyi slob mas 'jim pa legs
389b6(dkon brtsegs): par sbyangs nas rtsig pa rnams la zhal zhal byed pa de bzhin du las kyi rlung gi dbang gis de'i lus kyi sha skyed pa yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o/ /zhag bdun phrag nyi shu gnyis pa la ma'i
389b7(dkon brtsegs): mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ kun tu rgyal ba zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i lus kyi khrag skyed par byed do/ /zhag bdun phrag nyi shu
390a1(dkon brtsegs): gsum pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ yongs su dag par 'dzin pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis
390a2(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi pags pa skyed par byed do/ /zhag bdun phrag nyi shu bzhi pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ sprin 'dzin zhes bya ste/
390a3(dkon brtsegs): rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i lus kyi lag pa rkyong zhing mdog dang ldan par byed do/ /zhag bdun phrag nyi shu lnga pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa
390a4(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de ni/ grong khyer 'dzin ces bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mngal na gnas pa de'i lus la sha dang / khrag 'phel zhing rim gyis rab tu dang bar byed do/ /zhag bdun phrag
390a5(dkon brtsegs): nyi shu drug pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ skye ba mngon par grub pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i skra dang / spu dang /
390a6(dkon brtsegs): sen mo rnams bskyed nas thams cad rtsa rgyus rnams dang 'brel par byed do/ /zhag bdun phrag nyi shu bdun pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa
390a7(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de ni/ sman yon chen po zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i lus kyi mtshan ma rnams mthar gyis mngon par grub par byed do/ /gang tshe rabs snga ma la sdig pa mi dge
390b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i las rnams mngon par 'dus byas shing yo byad rnams la ser snas phangs shing sbyin pa gtong bar mi byed pa dang / pha ma dang / mkhan po dang / bla ma'i gnas rnams kyis rjes su
390b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa nyan par mi byed pa zhig yin na ni/ las de'i dbang gis yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs thob par 'gyur bas/ gal te lus ring zhing sbom pa dang / tsho zhing dkar
390b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / mnyen pa gang yin pa des mdzes par gyur na ni/ lus thung zhing phra ba dang / rid cing gnag pa dang / rtsub pa dag thob par byed do/ /gal te lus thung zhing phra ba dang / rid cing gnag
390b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rtsub pa gang yin pa des mdzes par gyur na ni/ lus ring zhing sbom pa dang / tsho zhing dkar ba dang / shin tu mnyen pa dag thob par byed do/ /gal te lus kyi yan lag mtho ba dang /
390b5(dkon brtsegs): dma' ba dang / mang ba dang / nyung ba dang / thags bzang ba dang / thags ngan pas mdzes par gyur na ni/ mtho ba dang / dma' ba dang / mang ba dang / nyung ba dang / thags bzang ba dang /
390b6(dkon brtsegs): thags ngan pa dang / mi ldan pa'i lus yang dag par len par byed do/ /gzhan yang 'on pa dang / long pa dang / lkugs pa dang / rkang lag 'phye zhing 'gro ba dang / dbang po rnams ma
390b7(dkon brtsegs): tshang ba dang / tshig smras pa gzhan gyis nyan par mi 'dod pa dang / lus mi sdug cing yi dwags dang 'dra ba yang yang dag par len par 'gyur te/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi dbang
391a1(dkon brtsegs): gis yid du mi 'ong ba'i lus rnam pa sna tshogs len par 'gyur bas/ pha ma dang nye bshes rnams kyis kyang mthong bar mi 'dod na/ gzhan lta smos kyang ci
391a2(dkon brtsegs): dgos/ gal te tshe rabs snga ma la dge ba bcu'i las mngon par 'dus byas shing sbyin pa legs par btang ba dang / ser sna dang / g.yo sgyu'i bsam pa med pa dang / pha ma dang /
391a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhan po dang / bla ma'i gnas rnams kyis rjes su bstan pa dag la mngon par yid ches shing yang dag par blangs pa zhig yin na ni/ rgyu dang / rkyen des gal te mi'i lus thob par
391a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur na yang gong du bstan pa lta bu'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las las mngon par grub pa'i lus len par mi 'gyur zhing gya nom sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i lus thob par 'gyur bas/ byad bzhin mdzes pa dang /
391a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan rnams dang ldan zhing tshig smras pa rnams mang po kun gyis mnyan par 'dod pa'i 'os su 'gyur te/ de lta bas na/ dge ba'i las kyi dbang gis
391a6(dkon brtsegs): khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa de lta bu thob par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /dga' bo/ de lta bu'i lus de yang gal te pho yin na ni/ ma'i mngal na g.yas
391a7(dkon brtsegs): phyogs su tsog pur 'dug la/ lag pa gnyis kyis gdong g.yogs nas ma'i sgal tshigs logs su bltas te 'dug go /gal te mo yin na ni/ rtsib logs g.yon phyogs su
391b1(dkon brtsegs): tsog pur 'dug go / lag pa gnyis kyis gdong g.yogs te ma'i lto ba la kha bltas nas ma zhu ba'i gnas kyi ni/ 'og/ zhu ba'i gnas kyi ni/ steng na nang du btsos/ rab tu btsos shing
391b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas lnga kun tu bcings pas 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rtswa'i rkyal ba'i nang na 'dug pa dang 'dra'o/ /gal te de'i mas shin tu mang du zos sam/ shin tu nyung du zos sam/ gal te zas
391b3(dkon brtsegs): shin tu mngar ba'am/ shin tu rtsub pa'am/ shin tu bska ba'am/ shin tu snum pa'am/ shin tu lan tshwa bro ba'am/ shin tu kha ba'am/ shin tu skyur ba'am/ shin tu grang ba'am/
391b4(dkon brtsegs): shin tu tsha ba dag zos par gyur tam/ gzhan yang 'dod chags spyad par gyur tam/ drag tu song ngam/ mchong ba byas sam/ yun ring du nyal lam/ yun ring du 'dug par gyur
391b5(dkon brtsegs): na yang mngal na gnas pa de sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur te/ de lta bas na/ ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe sdug bsngal mang po dag gis rab tu gzir bar rig par bya'o/ ngas mir
391b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i sdug bsngal mdo tsam du bstan pa yang de 'dra na/ sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal dpe byar dka' ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ mkhas pa su zhig 'khor ba'i
391b7(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtshor lus 'di lta bu la rab tu mos par byed/ zhag bdun phrag nyi shu brgyad pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe phyin ci log gi 'du shes rnam pa brgyad 'byung bar 'gyur te/
392a1(dkon brtsegs): brgyad gang zhe na/ bzhon pa'i 'du shes dang / khang bu brtsegs pa'i 'du shes dang / khri stan gyi 'du shes dang / chu mig gi 'du shes dang / rdzing
392a2(dkon brtsegs): gi 'du shes dang / chu bo'i 'du shes dang / kun dga' ra ba'i 'du shes dang / skyed mos tshal gyi 'du shes te/ 'di ni/ 'du shes rnam pa brgyad ces bya'o/ /zhag bdun phrag nyi
392a3(dkon brtsegs): shu dgu pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ me tog phreng ba zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mngal na gnas pa de'i lus
392a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi pags pa'i mdog kun tu bzang zhing mtshan ma rnams rab tu gsal bar byed de/ thams cad kyang 'das pa'i dus su las rnams mngon par 'dus byas pa'i bye brag mi
392a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pas rnam pa ji lta ba bzhin du kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan par 'gyur bas/ kha cig ni/ kha dog dkar por 'gyur/ kha cig ni/ kha dog nag por 'gyur/ kha
392a6(dkon brtsegs): cig ni/ kha dog dkar ba yang ma yin/ nag pa yang ma yin par 'gyur/ kha cig ni/ kha dog sngon par 'gyur/ kha cig ni/ kha dog rtsub cing skam par 'gyur/ kha cig ni/
392a7(dkon brtsegs): kha dog snum par 'gyur te/ 'di lta bu'i kha dog gi mtshan nyid dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag sum cu pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon
392b1(dkon brtsegs): par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ lcags kyi sgo zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i skra dang / spu dang / sen mo rnams rab tu bskyed pa dang / kha dog dkar nag rnams rab tu gsal
392b2(dkon brtsegs): byar byed de/ las kyi rkyen gyis mtshan ma 'di dang 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag sum cu gcig pa nas zhag bdun phrag sum cu lnga pa'i bar du ma'i mngal na
392b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'i tshe ni/ lus kyi mtshan ma rnams cher skye bar 'gyur bas/ mthar gyis lus kyi yan lag phun sum tshogs shing yangs par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag sum cu drug pa
392b4(dkon brtsegs): la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe ni/ de 'byung ba'i bsam pa skye bas mngon par mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag sum cu bdun pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe ni/ phyin
392b5(dkon brtsegs): ci log tu ma gyur pa'i 'du shes rnam pa lnga 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /lnga gang zhe na/ mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes dang / dri mi zhim pa'i 'du shes dang / btson ra'i 'du shes dang / mun nag
392b6(dkon brtsegs): gi 'du shes dang / yongs su skyo nas phyir 'byung ba'i 'du shes skye ba gang yin pa ste/ mngal na gnas pa de yongs su skyo ba'i bsam pa de lta bu dag skye bar 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun
392b7(dkon brtsegs): phrag sum cu brgyad pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ thogs pa'i rkyen ces bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis de rab tu bsgyur bar byed
393a1(dkon brtsegs): do| |gzhan yang kha thur du lta ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ de'i mgo thur du lta zhing lag pa gnyis brkyang ste mthar gyis 'byung bar 'dod par 'gyur
393a2(dkon brtsegs): ro| |mngal na gnas pa de gal te tshe rabs snga ma la mngal du 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i las bsags pa zhig yin na ni/ de'i lag pa dang / rkang pa snol mar gyur nas bsgyur mi
393a3(dkon brtsegs): nus pas/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi rkyen gyis ma'i mngal nyid du 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/ de'i ma yang de'i tshe sdug bsngal chen po myong ba'am/ yang na 'chi ba'i
393a4(dkon brtsegs): dus byed par 'gyur ro/ /gal te tshe rabs snga ma la dge ba'i las rnams mngon par 'dus byas shing tshe ring por 'gyur ba'i rgyu bsags pa zhig yin na ni/ btsas su nye
393a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshe ma dang / bu gnyis ka rab tu bde zhing / sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi sdug bsngal gong ma lta bu med do/ /zhag bdun phrag sum cu rtsa brgyad 'das nas mngal
393a6(dkon brtsegs): nas 'byung bar 'dod pa'i tshe sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong nas gdod 'byung bar 'gyur ba de'i phyir lus 'di lta bu len pa 'di ni/ yang dag par sdug bsngal chen po yin
393a7(dkon brtsegs): par rig par bya'o/ /dang po mngal nas 'byung ba'i tshe khye'u'am bu mo yang rung ste/ sa la lhung ma thag tu lag pas bzung ngam/ gos kyis blangs sam/ khri la bzhag
393b1(dkon brtsegs): gam/ khang pa'i nang du bzhag gam/ sa la bzhag gam/ bla gab med par bzhag gam/ nyi ma la bzhag gam/ dgun nam dbyar gyi dus grang ba dang / tsha ba'i rlung
393b2(dkon brtsegs): gis btsas ma thag pa'i lus de la reg par gyur na yang sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ba lang gson por bshus rtsig pa la reg gam/
393b3(dkon brtsegs): bla gab med pa'i thang la lhung bar gyur na/ srog chags dag gis za bar 'gyur ba'am/ gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi zhig la sbrang bu mchu ring rnams kyis za ba la yang
393b4(dkon brtsegs): lcag gis bzhus pa de bzhin du dang po mngal nas 'byung ba'i tshe chu dron po dag gis lus dkrus pas reg pa'i sdug bsngal myong ba yang de dang 'dra'o/ /btsas nas mthar gyis
393b5(dkon brtsegs): cher 'gyur ba dang / ma'i lus las khrag dang 'dres pa'i nu zho byung nas gso bar byed de/ ngas sngar mdo sde gzhan dag las rgya cher bstan pa yin no/ /de lta bas na/ lus
393b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni/ mi gtsang ba dang / sdug bsngal mang po las mngon par grub pa yin pas mkhas pa su zhig 'khor ba na 'di 'dra ba'i lus la rjes su chags par byed/ gzhan yang
393b7(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo/ /dang po mngal nas byung nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / srog chags srin bu'i rigs stong phrag brgyad cu lus las skyes nas de las za bar byed do/ /de la skra la za ba zhes
394a1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i srin bu'i rigs gnyis yod de/ skra la gnas nas skra la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs gnyis ni/ mig la gnas nas mig la za bar byed do/ /
394a2(dkon brtsegs): srin bu'i rigs ba ha na dang / rkan ldan dang / nad rlong dang / yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba bzhi yod de/ klad pa la gnas nas klad pa la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs sA lu nag po'i
394a3(dkon brtsegs): lo ma zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ rna ba la gnas nas rna ba la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs mdzod sgo zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ sna la gnas nas sna la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs
394a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phen pa dang / kun tu 'phen pa zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ mchu la gnas nas mchu la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rig khab mchu zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ lce la gnas nas lce la za bar
394a5(dkon brtsegs): byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs kha rno zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ lce'i drung la gnas nas lce'i drung la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs lag rdzogs zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ rkan la gnas nas
394a6(dkon brtsegs): rkan la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs lag pa dra ba can dang / phyed gyur zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ lag mthil la gnas nas lag mthil la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs
394a7(dkon brtsegs): dpung ba dang / nye ba'i dpung ba zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ dpung pa la gnas nas dpung pa la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs lcags can dang / nye ba'i lcags can zhes bya ba gnyis
394b1(dkon brtsegs): yod de/ mid pa la gnas nas mid pa la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs rdo rje dang / rdo rje chen po zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ snying la gnas nas snying la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs
394b2(dkon brtsegs): dman pa dang / dman pa'i zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ sha la gnas nas sha la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs kha dog ldan dang / grags ldan zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ khrag la
394b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas khrag la 'thung bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs dpa' bo dang / dri gtong zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ chu ba la gnas nas chu ba la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs mi mtho ba dang /
394b4(dkon brtsegs): khas rdub ces bya ba gnyis yod de/ rgyab kyi sgal tshigs la gnas nas rgyab kyi sgal tshigs la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs tshil gyi kha dog ces bya ba zhig yod de/ tshil la gnas nas
394b5(dkon brtsegs): tshil la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs mkhris pa'i kha dog ces bya ba zhig yod de/ mkhris pa la gnas nas mkhris pa la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs mu tig ces bya ba zhig yod de/
394b6(dkon brtsegs): mchin pa la gnas nas mchin pa la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs 'dam bu zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ mtsher ba la gnas nas mtsher ba la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs lnga brgya yod de/
394b7(dkon brtsegs): rigs brgya ni/ zla ba zhes bya'o/ /rigs brgya ni/ zla ba'i kha zhes bya'o/ /rigs brgya ni/ bsil byed ces bya'o/ /rigs brgya ni/ bsil byed gtong zhes bya'o/ /rigs brgya ni/ yangs
395a1(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ste/ rtsib logs g.yon pa la gnas nas rtsib logs g.yon pa la za bar byed do/ /gzhan yang srin bu'i rigs lnga brgya yod pa yang ming gong ma
395a2(dkon brtsegs): dang mthun te/ rtsib logs g.yas pa la gnas nas rtsib logs g.yas pa la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs cung zad 'bigs pa dang / cher 'bigs pa dang / rus pa 'bigs
395a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rus pa'i gdong zhes bya ba bzhi yod de/ rus pa la gnas nas rus pa la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs tshor dkar ba dang / cung zad dkar ba dang / snom pa'i stobs
395a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / stag lam zhes bya ba bzhi yod de/ rtsa rgyus la gnas nas rtsa rgyus la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs mos pa'i yid dang / seng+ge'i stobs dang / ri bong lto dang / 'dod
395a5(dkon brtsegs): pa la mngon par zhen pa zhes bya ba bzhi yod de/ ma zhu ba'i gnas la gnas nas ma zhu ba'i gnas la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs dpa' bo dang / dpa' bo'i bdag po zhes
395a6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba gnyis yod de/ zhu ba'i gnas la gnas nas zhu ba'i gnas la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs mu ka dang / dra ba kha dang / phung po'i kha dang / bye'u kha zhes bya ba bzhi yod
395a7(dkon brtsegs): de| gci ba'i lam la gnas nas gci ba'i lam la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs byed pa dang / byed pa chen po dang / phye ma dang / po tar ka zhes bya ba bzhi yod de/ bshang ba'i
395b1(dkon brtsegs): lam la gnas nas bshang ba'i lam la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs gdong nag dang / 'jigs su rung ba'i gdong zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ brla la gnas nas brla la za bar byed do/ /
395b2(dkon brtsegs): srin bu'i rigs mdze can dang / mdze can chung du zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ pus mo la gnas nas pus mo la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs myos pa'i rtsa ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ byin
395b3(dkon brtsegs): pa la gnas nas byin pa la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs mgon ces bya ba zhig yod de/ rkang pa la gnas nas rkang pa la za bar byed do/ /dga' bo/ ngas deng khyod la srin bu'i rigs
395b4(dkon brtsegs): stong phrag brgyad cu lus 'di la gnas nas nyin mtshan du za bar byed pas nyams stobs chung zhing mdog ngan par byed pa dang / nad kyi sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs lus 'di la 'dus nas
395b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang de'i sems gdung ba dang / rab tu gdung ba dang / yongs su gdung bar byed pas sman pa mkhas pa yod kyang de la rmongs nas sman gang gis nad 'di dag gso bar nus pa shes
395b6(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur ba mdor bstan pa yin te/ mkhas pa su zhig 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'di 'dra ba'i lus la rjes su chags par byed/ gzhan yang dga' bo/ dang po btsas nas cher skye bar
395b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i bar du gos dang / zas kyis gsos nas lus 'di mngon par grub par 'gyur kyang de'i tshe'i tshad lo brgya thub pa yang yod de/ de bas thung ba yang yod do/ /lo brgya po de yang dus gsum

396a2(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni/ char 'bab pa'i dus so/ /dgun gang yin pa de ni/ grang ba'i dus so/ /dus gsum po de dag re re la yang zla ba bzhi bzhi yod pas lo gcig la zla ba bcu gnyis yod

396a4(dkon brtsegs): nyin mtshan ni/ stong phrag gsum cu rtsa drug yod do/ /nyin gcig la lan gnyis su za bas zas ni/ lan stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis za bar 'gyur te/ res 'ga' ni/ mi za ba yang
396a5(dkon brtsegs): grangs der 'dus so/ /de ni/ 'di lta ste/ na ba dang / ra ro ba dang / ched du zas bcad pa dang / gnyid log pa dang / rtsed mo rtses pa dang / las gzhan gyis brel ba dang / ma'i

402a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du thams cad bdag gis de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /zhes khas blangs so/ /de nas dge slong rnams snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs bgos/ chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs te grong khyer
402b1(dkon brtsegs): ser skya'i gnas su bsod snyoms la bzhud pa dang / dga' bos gtsug lag khang na su yang med par mthong nas bdag gis phyag dar byas zin pa dang / slar khyim du 'gro'o/ /zhes phyag dar byed pa la
402b2(dkon brtsegs): zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de gzigs shing mkhyen pas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis phyags zin pa'i sa gtsang ma rnams slar phyag dar gyis gang bar byin gyis brlabs pa dang / des
402b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis phyag dar bor te slar khyim du 'gro'o/ /snyam du bsam nas des phyags ma slar bsdus nas phyag dar bor bar brtsams pa dang zad par ma gyur nas des bsam pa gnas
402b4(dkon brtsegs): khang rnams kyi sgo bcad de 'gro'o/ /snyam nas des gnas khang rnams kyi sgo bcad par brtsams pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo gcig bcad zin nas sgo gzhan bcad tsam na sgo gzhan yang bye bar
402b5(dkon brtsegs): byin gyis brlabs pas/ de nyon mongs pa skyes nas gzhan yang 'di snyam du gal te rkun pos gtsug lag khang 'di nyams par byas kyang 'di la gnod pa ci yod de/ bdag rgyal por gyur pa na 'di
402b6(dkon brtsegs): bas ches lhag pa'i gtsug lag khang bzang po brgya stong rtsig par zad pas/ bdag ni/ slar khyim du 'gro ba'i rigs so/ /zhes gal te lam po cher zhugs nas 'gro na ni/ bcom ldan 'das dang
402b7(dkon brtsegs): phrad du dogs pas gseb lam du zhugs te 'gro'o/ /snyam du bsam mo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas gseb lam de nyid du zhugs te gshegs so/ /des rgyang
403a1(dkon brtsegs): n as bcom ldan 'das mthong nas mi 'phrad par bya ba'i phyir lam gyi 'gram na ljon shing yal ga dang grib mar ldan pa thur du 'jol ba zhig gi drung du gab ste 'dug

403a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'di snyam du 'di chung ma la chags shing zhen par gyur pas/ 'di de dang dbral zhing phan gdags pa'i phyir grong khyer ser skya nas byung ste grong khyer mnyan yod du gshegs so/ /snyam
403a5(dkon brtsegs): du dgongs nas der byon pa dang / ri dwags dgra'i ma sa ga'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di snyam du dga' bo blun po 'di ni/ rtag tu chung ma la chags shing
403a6(dkon brtsegs): zhen nas gtong bar mi byed pas/ 'di la thabs shig sbyar te sems nye bar zhi bar bya'o/ /snyam du dgongs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis sngon chad dri ldan zhes

403b1(dkon brtsegs): d ang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du nam mkha' la lding ste ri dri ldan du gshegs nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang thabs cig tu g.yas g.yon du gzigs pa las shing drung zhig na spra mo mig ya gcig

404a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gnas rnams la ltos shig / ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos kyang dga' ba'i tshal dang / shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal dang /

408b7(dkon brtsegs): su chus chag chag btab ba'i tshe myur du skam par 'gyur ba bzhin no/ /bud med gang lus kyi mthu stobs dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu bde ba myong ba dang / byad bzhin sdug pa dang / bza' ba
409a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / btung ba bsod pa dag zos shing 'thungs pa de dag gi zla mtshan ni/ myur du 'chad par mi 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa gsher ba'i phyogs
409a2(dkon brtsegs): su chus chag chag btab pa'i tshe myur du skam par mi 'gyur ba bzhin no/ /ji ltar ma'i mngal du 'jug par mi 'gyur zhe na/ gal te pha'i khu ba byung la ma'i khu ba ma byung ba dang / ma'i khu ba
409a3(dkon brtsegs): byung la pha'i khu ba ma byung ba'am/ gal te gnyis ka ma byung bar gyur na/ thams cad mngal len par mi 'gyur ro/ /gal te ma yongs su dag par ma gyur la pha yongs su dag par
409a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'am/ gal te pha yongs su dag par ma gyur la ma yongs su dag par gyur pa'am/ gal te gnyis ka yongs su dag par ma gyur na yang mngal len par mi 'gyur ro/ /gal te
409a5(dkon brtsegs): ma'i mngal gyi gnas rlung nad kyis yongs su zin par gyur tam/ mkhris pa dang / bad kan gyis yongs su zin par gyur tam/ khrag gis non pas mngal mdud pa can du gyur tam/
409a6(dkon brtsegs): shas gang bar gyur tam/ sman 'thungs sam/ dbus gnas 'dra ba'am/ grog ma'i rked pa 'dra ba'am/ mngal gyi sgo rnga mo'i kha lta bur gyur tam/ dbus shing rtsa ba mang po can
409a7(dkon brtsegs): lta bur gyur tam/ sgo gshol mda' lta bur gyur tam/ shing rta'i rtsibs bzhin sog kar 'dug pa'am/ sba lta bur 'dug pa'am/ nas kyi gra ma skyes pa lta bur gyur tam/
409b1(dkon brtsegs): mngal 'og tu zab pa'am/ steng du zab pa'am/ mngal gyi snod du rung ba ma yin pa'am/ rtag tu khrag zag pa'am/ chu zag pa'am/ bya rog gi mchu ltar rtag tu phye zhing btsum du mi btub
409b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'am/ steng dang / 'og dang / tha ma zheng che chung mi mnyam pa'am/ mthon dman mi snyoms shing 'bar 'bur du gyur ba'am/ nang srin bus gtses pa'am/ rul zhing myags nas mi gtsang
409b3(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur pa gang yin pa ste/ gal te ma'i mngal 'di lta bu'i skyon dang ldan par gyur na thams cad mngal du 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/ /gal te pha ma cho rigs btsun zhing bar ma do'i srid
409b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dman par gyur tam/ bar ma do'i srid pa cho rigs btsun zhing pha ma dman par gyur na yang mngal du 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/ /gal te pha ma dang bar ma do'i srid pa gnyis ka cho rigs
409b5(dkon brtsegs): btsun par gyur kyang / gal te las mthun par ma gyur na yang mngal du 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/ /gal te bar ma do'i srid pa mdun na snang ba'i yul la pho dang / mo'i srid pa gnyis
409b6(dkon brtsegs): med par gyur na yang skye ba len par mi 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ /bar ma do'i srid pa ji ltar ma'i mngal du 'jug pa thob par 'gyur zhe na/ gal te ma'i mngal yang yongs su gtsang bar
409b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur la bar ma do'i srid pas 'dod pa'i bya ba spyod pa mngon sum du mthong bar gyur pa nas gong du bstan pa lta bu'i skyon mang po'i bar yang med par gyur te/ pha ma dang / bu yang
410a1(dkon brtsegs): phan tshun mngon par 'phrad pa'i las dang ldan par gyur na/ gdod ma'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang bar ma do'i srid pa de ma'i mngal du
410a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa'i tshe sems phyin ci log tu gyur te/ gal te pho yin na ni/ ma la chags pa skye bar 'gyur la/ pha la ni/ zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te mo yin na ni/ pha la ni/ chags
410a3(dkon brtsegs): pa skye bar 'gyur la/ ma la ni/ zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur te/ sngon 'das pa'i dus su mngon par 'dus byas pa'i las kyi dbang gis yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyis
410a4(dkon brtsegs): log par shes pa'i bsam pa skyed par byed de/ gang grang ba'i 'du shes dang / rlung chen po langs pa dang / char chen po 'bab pa dang / gnam rmus pa'i 'du shes dang / skye
410a5(dkon brtsegs): bo mang po'i sgra ca co thos pa'i 'du shes skyed par byed pas las kyi mthon dman ji lta bzhin du yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes rnam pa bcu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/
410a6(dkon brtsegs): deng bdag ni/ khang pa'i nang du 'jug go /snyam pa dang / bdag ni/ khang pa brtsegs ma'i steng du 'dzeg go /snyam pa dang / bdag ni/ gzhal med khang du 'jug go /snyam
410a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bdag ni/ khri la 'dzeg go /snyam pa dang / bdag ni/ rtswa'i spyil bur 'jug go /snyam pa dang / bdag ni/ lo ma'i khyim du 'jug go /snyam pa dang / bdag ni/ rtswa
410b1(dkon brtsegs): stug por 'jug go / snyam pa dang / bdag ni/ nags kyi nang du 'jug go /snyam pa dang / bdag ni/ rtsig pa'i bu gar 'dzul lo/ /snyam pa dang / bdag ni/ sog ma'i gseb tu 'jug go /
410b2(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems pa gang yin pa ste/ dga' bo/ de'i tshe bar ma do'i srid pa de de snyam du bsam nas ma'i mngal du 'jug par 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /skye ba len pa de ni/ mer mer po zhes bya
410b3(dkon brtsegs): bar rig par bya ste/ de ni/ pha'i khu ba dang ma'i khrag yin te/ dngos po gzhan ma yin yang pha dang ma'i khu ba dang / khrag 'dus pa'i rgyu rkyen dang / rnam par shes pa'i rkyen la brten
410b4(dkon brtsegs): te lhan cig gnas par byed pas 'di lta ste/ dper na/ zho dang / rdza ma dang / srub shing dang / skyes bu'i rtsol ba la brten nas mar 'byung gi /gzhan las mi 'byung ba bzhin du
410b5(dkon brtsegs): pha ma'i mig gtsang ba'i khu ba dang khrag las mngon par grub pa'i lus mer mer po yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o/ /gzhan yang dga' bo/ dpe rnam pa bzhi yod kyi/ khyod legs par
410b6(dkon brtsegs): nyon cig / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rtswa sngon po la brten te srin bu skye bar 'gyur bar 'gyur ba rtswa sngon po yang srin bu ma yin/ rtswa las gud na yang srin bu med mod kyi/ 'on kyang rtsa la brten pa'i
410b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dang rkyen 'dus pa'i dbang gis srin bu skyes nas lus kyi kha dog kyang sngon por 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ dga' bo/ pha'i khu ba dang / ma'i khrag gi lus mer mer po yang 'di ltar rgyu dang
411a1(dkon brtsegs): rkyen 'dus pa las 'byung ba chen po'i dbang po skye bar rig par bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ ba lang gi lci ba la brten nas srin bu skye bar 'gyur ba ba lang
411a2(dkon brtsegs): gi lci ba yang srin bu ma yin/ ba lang gi lci ba las gud na yang srin bu med mod kyi/ 'on kyang ba lang gi lci ba la brten pa'i rgyu rkyen 'dus pa'i dbang gis srin bu skyes nas lus
411a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi kha dog kyang ser por 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ dga' bo/ pha'i khu ba dang / ma'i khrag gi lus mer mer po yang 'di ltar rgyu rkyen 'dus pa las 'byung ba chen po'i dbang po skye bar
411a4(dkon brtsegs): rig par bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya shug la brten nas srin bu skye bar 'gyur ba rgya shug kyang srin bu ma yin/ rgya shug las gud na yang srin bu med mod kyi/ 'on kyang rgya shug la
411a5(dkon brtsegs): brten pa'i rgyu rkyen 'dus pa'i dbang gis srin bu skyes nas lus kyi kha dog kyang dmar por 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ dga' bo/ pha'i khu ba dang / ma'i khrag gis lus mer mer po yang 'di
411a6(dkon brtsegs): ltar rgyu dang rkyen 'dus pa las 'byung ba chen po'i dbang po skye bar rig par bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ zho la brten nas srin bu skyes par gyur pa lus kyi kha dog kyang dkar por 'gyur ba
411a7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba nas rgyu dang rkyen 'dus pa las 'byung ba chen po'i dbang po skye bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du yang rgyas par sbyar ro/ /gzhan yang dga' bo/ pha ma'i mi gtsang ba la brten pa'i
411b1(dkon brtsegs): mer mer po'i dbang gis sa'i khams mngon du snang bas ni/ sra ba'i bya ba byed do/ /chu'i khams mngon du snang bas ni/ gsher ba'i bya ba byed do/ /me'i khams mngon du snang bas ni/
411b2(dkon brtsegs): dro ba'i bya ba byed do/ /rlung gi khams mngon du snang bas ni/ yang zhing g.yo ba'i bya ba byed do/ /dga' bo/ gal te pha ma'i mi gtsang ba'i lus mer mer po de sa'i khams 'ba' zhig dang
411b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan la chu'i khams med par gyur na ni/ bskams te gyes par 'gyur bas/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ lag pas phye dang / thal ba skam po la sogs pa bcangs pa bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /
411b4(dkon brtsegs): gal te chu'i khams 'ba' zhig dang ldan la sa'i khams med par gyur na ni/ bo bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'bru mar ram chu lta bur gyur pa zhig na/ chu'i khams kyi dbang
411b5(dkon brtsegs): gis ni| sa'i khams gyes par mi 'gyur la/ sa'i khams kyi dbang gis ni/ chu'i khams po bar mi 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ gal te mer mer po'i lus sa dang chu'i khams dang ldan par
411b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur la| me'i khams med par gyur na ni/ rul zhing myags par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dbyar gyi dus su sha'i gong bu grib ma la bzhag pa bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ gal te
411b7(dkon brtsegs): mer mer po'i lus sa dang chu dang me'i khams 'ba' zhig dang ldan la rlung gi khams med par gyur na ni/ 'phel zhing rgyas par mi 'gyur te/ 'di dag thams cad ni/ sngon gyi las kyis
412a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu byas nas phan tshun gcig gis rkyen gcig gis rgyu byas pa'i dbang gis rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur bas sa'i khams kyis ni/ rten byed do/ /chu'i khams
412a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni/ sdud par byed do/ /me'i khams kyis ni/ yongs su smin par byed do/ /rlung gi khams kyis ni/ 'phel bar byed de/ dga' bo/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ khur ba mkhan
412a3(dkon brtsegs): nam| de'i slob mas khur ba legs par btsos nas dbugs kyis bus nas rgya cher 'phel zhing nang khong stong du byed pa ji lta ba bzhin no/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba
412a4(dkon brtsegs): ji lta ba bzhin du nang gi lus kyi 'byung ba chen po sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung gi khams las kyi stobs kyis 'phel bar byed pa yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o/ /dga' bo/ pha
412a5(dkon brtsegs): ma'i mi gtsang ba las mer mer po'i lus 'byung ba yang ma yin/ pha'i rkang las kyang ma yin/ ma'i mngal nas kyang ma yin/ las las kyang ma yin/ rgyu las kyang ma yin/
412a6(dkon brtsegs): rkyen las kyang ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang rgyu rkyen mang po 'di dag tshogs pa'i dbang gis mngal 'grub par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa bon gsar pa rlung dang nyi mas nyams par
412a7(dkon brtsegs): ma byas pa/ sra zhing snying po dang bcas pa/ bu ga ma byung ba shin tu legs par sbas pa zhing gshin pa la btab nas rlan gyis rgyu dang rkyen 'dus par gyur na/ gdod myu gu dang / sdong
412b1(dkon brtsegs): bu dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rim gyis skye zhing 'phel bar 'gyur te/ dga' bo/ sa bon de yang rkyen 'dus pa dang bral ba las myu gu la sogs pa skyed par
412b2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa ma yin pa de bzhin du pha ma 'ba' zhig dang / las 'ba' zhig dang / rkyen gzhan 'ba' zhig las mngal du skye ba thob pa ma yin gyi/ pha ma'i khu ba dang / khrag dang / rgyu dang / rkyen
412b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa'i dbang gis mngal mngon par 'grub par rig par bya'o/ /dga' bo/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mig dang ldan pa'i skyes bus me yongs su 'tshol ba'i phyir nor bu me shel khyer nas

412b5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'grub pa yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o/ /pha ma'i mi gtsang ba las mer mer po mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs zhes bya'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
412b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni/ ming zhes bya ste/ de ni/ ming dang gzugs zhes bya'o/ /ming dang gzugs kyi phung po shin tu smad par bya ba'i srid pa rnams su skye ba len par byed
412b7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di la ni/ ngas phyogs cung zad tsam mam/ skad cig tsam du yang bsngags pa rjod par mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ srid pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni/ sdug bsngal
413a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po yin pas so/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyug pa ni/ ji ltar chung yang mnam par byed pa de bzhin du sring pa rnams su skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/
413a2(dkon brtsegs): chung yang sdug bsngal yin par rig par bya'o/ /nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de dag
413a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni/ skye ba dang / gnas pa dang / 'phel ba dang / nyams shing 'jig pa dang ldan te/ skye ba gang yin pa de ni/ sdug bsngal ba yin no/ /gnas pa gang yin pa de
413a4(dkon brtsegs): ni| na ba yin no/ /'phel ba dang nyams shing 'jig pa gang yin pa de ni/ rga shi yin te/ de lta bas na/ dga' bo/ mkhas pa gang zhig srid pa'i rgya mtsho 'dir srid pa'i ro bskyed
413a5(dkon brtsegs): nas ma'i mngal na nyal zhing 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa yang dag par nyams su myong bar byed/ gzhan yang dga' bo/ 'di ltar ma'i mngal du zhugs pa de'i grangs kyang
413a6(dkon brtsegs): mdor bsdu na zhag bdun phrag sum cu rtsa brgyad yong par rig par bya ste/ zhag bdun phrag dang po'i tshe ma'i mngal mi gtsang ba thog ma'i gnas su nyal bas 'di lta ste/ dper na/ zangs
413a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu tsha ba'i nang du btsos shing brdos pa bzhin du lus kyi dbang po dang rnam par shes pa lhan cig tu sdug bsngal mi bzad pa myong ba gang yin pa de ni/ mer mer po zhes bya'o/ /de'i

414a2(dkon brtsegs): 'bung bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ mkhrang 'gyur zhes bya'o/ /de'i dbyibs ni/ bong ba'am/ mchi gu 'dra ste/ zhag bdun gyi bar du zhes bya ba nas khams bzhi po dag mngon du

414a6(dkon brtsegs): dag rab tu snang bar byed do/ /dga' bo/ zhag bdun phrag drug pa la ni/ ma'i mngal nas rgya chen po zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal la reg par gyur pa na mtshan mi

414b4(dkon brtsegs): ste| lag pa dang / rkang pa'i sor mo bcu bcu thog ma kho nar snang bar byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dbyar char 'bab pa'i tshe ljon shing gi rtsa ba dang por skyes pa ji lta ba bzhin no/ /dga' bo/ zhag

414b7(dkon brtsegs): mngal na gnas pa sra zhing brtan par byed do/ /zhag bdun pa de nyid kyi tshe ma'i mngal nas gzhan yang kun nas skye ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung nas rlung des mngal gyi gnas bus nas rgyas par byed de/
415a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rkyal pa bus pa rgyas par gyur pa ji lta ba bzhin no// //bam po gnyis pa/ dga' bo/ zhag bdun phrag bcu gcig pa la ni/ ma'i
415a2(dkon brtsegs): mngal nas bu ga snang ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal la reg par gyur pa na mngal na gnas pa de khong stong du byed pas bu ga dgu po dag rab tu snang bar 'gyur te/ gal te ma 'gro
415a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'am| 'greng ba'am/ 'dug pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ las dag byas par gyur na/ de'i tshe rlung de 'khyil ba nyid kyis khong stong du gyur nas bu ga rnams mthar gyis che bar byed do/ /gal
415a4(dkon brtsegs): te rlung de steng gi phyogs su song na ni/ steng gi bu ga 'byin par byed la/ gal te 'og gi phyogs su song na ni/ 'og gi bu ga 'byin par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mgar ba'am/ de'i slob
415a5(dkon brtsegs): mas sbud pa bus pa na steng dang 'og tu rlung rgyu zhing rlung gi bya ba byas nas 'gag par 'gyur ba bzhin no/ /dga' bo/ zhag bdun phrag bcu gnyis pa la ni/ ma'i mngal nas yon po'i sgo
415a6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal bus pas g.yas g.yon gyi nang khrol gyi rgyu ma dang / gnye ma dag par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba bzhin du lus la brten
415a7(dkon brtsegs): te bsnol mar gnas so/ /zhag bdun pa de nyid kyi tshe gzhan yang spu rgyus pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ mngal gyi nang nyid du lhag chad med par tshigs brgya sum cu skyed par byed do/ /
415b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang rlung de'i stobs kyis nad brgya rtsa gcig 'byung bar byed do/ /dga' bo/ zhag bdun phrag bcu gsum pa la ni/ ma'i mngal nas snga ma'i rlung de nyid kyi stobs kyis bkres pa dang / skom
415b2(dkon brtsegs): par shes par byed pas/ mas zos shing 'thungs pa'i bcud ji snyed pa dag lte bar zhugs nas de'i lus la phan 'dogs par byed do/ /dga' bo/ zhag bdun phrag bcu bzhi pa la ni/ ma'i
415b3(dkon brtsegs): mngal nas skud pa'i kha zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i rtsi rgyus stong skyed par byed de/ nyis brgya lnga bcu ni/ lus kyi mdun na gnas so/ /nyis brgya lnga
415b4(dkon brtsegs): bcu ni/ lus kyi rgyab na gnas so/ /nyis brgya lnga bcu ni/ lus kyi g.yas phyogs na gnas so/ /nyis brgya lnga bcu ni/ lus kyi g.yon phyogs na gnas so/ /dga' bo/ zhag bdun phrag
415b5(dkon brtsegs): bco lnga pa la ni/ ma'i mngal nas pad+ma zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ mngal na gnas pa de'i lus la rtsa rgyu ba rnam pa nyi shu bskyed nas ro rnams gzhib par byed de/ de yang lus kyi mdun
415b6(dkon brtsegs): na lnga dang / lus kyi rgyab na lnga dang / lus kyi g.yas na lnga dang / lus kyi g.yon na lnga yod do/ /rtsar rgyu ba de yang ming sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pas/ ming ni/ sa
415b7(dkon brtsegs): ga zhes kyang bya/ stobs zhes kyang bya/ brtan pa zhes kyang bya/ mthu dang ldan pa zhes kyang bya'o/ /kha dog ni/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / bab la lta bu'i
416a1(dkon brtsegs): ser skya dang / mar dang / 'bru mar dang / zho la sogs pa'i kha dog dang ldan pa gang yin pa dang / gzhan yang kha dog mang po phan tshun 'dres pa gang yin pa'o//
416a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo/ rtsar rgyu ba nyi shu po de dag re re la yan lag bzhi bcu bzhi bcu yod pas gcig tu bsdus na/ dbugs bzhi pa'i rtsar rgyu ba brgyad brgya yod par 'gyur te/ lus kyi mdun dang /
416a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyab dang / g.yas dang / g.yon gyi phyogs re re la yang nyis brgya nyis brgya yod do/ /dga' bo/ rtsar rgyu ba brgyad brgya po de dag re re la yang rtsar rgyu ba'i yan lag phan tshun 'brel
416a4(dkon brtsegs): ba brgya brgya yod pas gcig tu bsdus na/ stong phrag brgyad cu yod par 'gyur te/ stong phrag nyi shu ni/ lus kyi mdun na yod do/ /stong phrag nyi shu ni/ lus kyi rgyab na yod do/ /
416a5(dkon brtsegs): stong phrag nyi shu ni/ lus kyi g.yas phyogs na yod do/ /stong phrag nyi shu ni/ lus kyi g.yon phyogs na yod do/ /dga' bo/ rtsar rgyu ba stong phrag brgyad cu po de dag la yang bu ga
416a6(dkon brtsegs): mang po yod pas bu ga gcig dang / gnyis dang ldan pa nas bu ga bdun gyi bar dang ldan pa yang yod do/ /de dag re re la yang spu'i khung bu re re dang so sor phan tshun 'brel te/ 'di
416a7(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ dper na/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba la bu ga mang po yod pa ji lta ba bzhin no/ /dga' bo/ zhag bdun phrag bcu drug pa la ni/ bdud rtsi 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung de'i

416b7(dkon brtsegs): pa zhig gis me long gi dkyil 'khor rdul gyis g.yogs pa blangs nas 'bru mar dang / thal ba dang / sa'i phye ma zhib mo dag gis byi dor byas na gsal bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du las kyi rlung gi

417a2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ mngal na gnas pa de'i skye mched drug po dag yongs su dag par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sprin chen pos khebs

417b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi rlung gi stobs des rus pa rnams rnam par 'jog pa yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o/ /dga' bo/ de dag zhag bdun phrag nyi shu pa la ni/ rus pa phra mo ma gtogs par rus pa chen po skye ba'i

419a5(dkon brtsegs): bshes rnams kyang mthong bar mi 'dod na/ gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las ji snyed btsal ba dag gzhan la smras na yang gzhan gyis
