421a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ zhag bdun phrag sum cu drug pa la ni/ ma'i mngal na gnas pa de ma'i mngal na 'dug mi 'dod par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ zhag bdun
421a7(dkon brtsegs): phrag sum cu bdun pa la mngal na gnas pa de phyin ci log ma yin pa'i 'du shes rnam pa gsum po 'di lta ste/ mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes dang / dri mi zhim pa'i 'du shes dang / mun
421b1(dkon brtsegs): nag gi 'du shes skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni/ phyogs gcig gi dbang du byas te bstan to/ /dga' bo/ /zhag bdun phrag sum cu brgyad pa la ni/ ma'i mngal nas yan lag sdud pa zhes bya ba'i
421b2(dkon brtsegs): rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de lus bsgyur nas thur du phyogs shing lag pa gnyis bcum nas skye ba'i gnas kyi sgo logs su phyogs par byed do/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe kha thur
421b3(dkon brtsegs): du blta ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ las kyi stobs kyis rlung des mngal na gnas pa de bus pas mgo ni/ thur du blta zhing / rkang pa gnyis ni/ gyen du phyogs par byas nas skye ba'i
421b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyi sgo nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ gal te mngal na gnas pa de cher bas snga ma la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mang po mngon par 'dus byas shing / gzhan gyi mngal ltung bar
421b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i las byas pa zhig yin na ni/ rgyu dang / rkyen des mngal nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i tshe rkang lag log cing bsnol mar gyur nas bsgyur mi nus pas ma'i mngal de nyid du 'chi ba'i dus
421b6(dkon brtsegs): byed par 'gyur te/ de'i tshe shes pa dang ldan pa'i bud med dam/ sman pa mkhas pas mar dang / 'bru mar 'jam pa'am/ shing shal ma la'i shun pa'i khu ba'am/ gzhan yang dngos po
421b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam po dag gis lag pa bkrus nas lag pa'i sor mos gri rnon po blangs te snam phyis dang 'dra zhing mchog tu dri mi zhim pa/ skyug bro ba'i 'dam khung / srin bu'i rigs brgya stong tshad med pa
422a1(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu gnas pa/ mi gtsang ba'i khu ba rtag tu 'dzag pa/ khu ba dang khrag blangs rnams rul zhing myags pa mthong na skyo bar 'gyur ba/ pags pa srab mos
422a2(dkon brtsegs): g.yogs pa/ sdig pa'i las las byung ba'i lus rma dang bcas pa/ mi gtsang ba'i gnas der sor mo bcug ste/ der bcug nas gri rnon pos mngal na gnas pa de'i lus dum bu dum
422a3(dkon brtsegs): bur gtubs nas ma'i mngal nas 'byin par byed pas des na yid du mi 'ong ba'i sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzad cing tsha ba rtsub pa dag myong ba'i rgyus ma de yang 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/ gal te shi bar ma gyur na yang shi ba dang bye brag med do/
422a4(dkon brtsegs): /dga' bo/ gal te mngal na gnas pa de dge ba'i las mngon par grub pa zhig yin na ni/ gal te log par gyur na yang ma la
422a5(dkon brtsegs): gnod pa med par bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur bas sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ gang gegs 'di lta bu dang mi ldan pa de dag ni/ zhag bdun phrag sum cu rtsa brgyad 'das
422a6(dkon brtsegs): nas btsa' bar 'gyur ba'i tshe sdug bsngal chen po srog la bab pa myong nas gdod ma'i mngal nas 'byung bar 'gyur bas na/ dga' bo/ khyod kyis shin tu legs par brtags nas nges
422a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'byung ba yongs su btsal bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ khyod kyis mngal na gnas pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
422b1(dkon brtsegs): btsas pa'i sdug bsngal shes par byas nas so so'i skye bo mngal nas skye ba len pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ shin tu sdug bsngal ba yin par rig par bya'o/ /dang po btsas pa'i tshe khye'u'am
422b2(dkon brtsegs): bu mo yang rung ste/ lag pa'i steng ngam/ gos la sogs pa'i steng du lhung nas nyi ma'am/ grib ma'am/ sgul ba'i shing leb bam/ stan nam/ bang ba'i steng du bzhag pa na
422b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dang rkyen des thams cad du sdug bsngal mi bzad pa tsha ba rtsub pa yid du mi 'ong ba myong bar 'gyur te/ dga' bo/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ba lang gson por pags pa bshus
422b4(dkon brtsegs): pa rtsig pa dang thag nye bar gyur na/ rtsig pa la gnas pa'i srog chags kyis za bar 'gyur ba'am/ gal te shing dang rtswa'i phung po dang nye bar gyur na/ shing dang rtswa la gnas pa'i
422b5(dkon brtsegs): srog chags kyis za bar 'gyur ba'am/ gal te bla gab med par 'dug par gyur na bla gab med pa na gnas pa'i srog chags kyis za bar 'gyur zhing thams cad sdug bsngal myong bar
422b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba de bzhin du dang po btsas pa yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o/ /dang po btsas pa de la chu dron ran pas bkrus na yang sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper
422b7(dkon brtsegs): na| skyes bu mdze can pags pa rul zhing myags pa/ rnag khrag zag pa la yang lcag gis bzhus na sdug bsngal mi bzad pa tsha ba dang rtsub pa myong bar 'gyur pa de bzhin du dang po btsas
423a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lus chu dron gyis bkrus pa yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o/ /dang po btsas pa'i lus de yang phyis ma'i khrag gis dri ma 'thungs nas cher skye bar 'gyur te/
423a2(dkon brtsegs): de la ma'i khrag gi dri ma zhes bya ba ni/ 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba las nu zho nyid la bya bar bstan pas/ de lta bas na dga' bo/ 'di ltar shin tu mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna
423a3(dkon brtsegs): tshogs dang ldan zhing bde ba cung zad kyang med na/ mkhas pa su zhig sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho 'di la rjes su chags pa bskyed nas rtag tu 'khor ba'i rgyun phyogs su 'jug cing rgyun 'chad pa med
423a4(dkon brtsegs): par byed/ dang po btsas pa de zhag bdun lon pa dang / lus de nyid las srog chags srin bu'i rigs stong phrag brgyad cu byung nas lus la za bar byed do/ dga' bo/ srin bu'i rigs
423a5(dkon brtsegs): skra la za ba zhes bya ba gcig yod do/ /skra'i rtsa ba la gnas nas rtag tu skra la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs khar ba'i mdzod dang / mgo sbom zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ mgo la brten
423a6(dkon brtsegs): te gnas nas rtag tu mgo la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs mig 'khor zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ mig la gnas nas rtag tu mig la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs ded pa dang /
423a7(dkon brtsegs): 'bros pa dang / khang khyim dang / yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba bzhi yod de/ klad pa la gnas nas rtag tu klad pa la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs sa lu'i lo ma zhes bya ba zhig yod de/
423b1(dkon brtsegs): rna ba la gnas nas rna ba la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs mdzod sgo zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ sna la gnas nas sna la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs 'phen pa dang / kun tu 'phen pa zhes
423b2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba gnyis yod de/ mchu la gnas nas mchu la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs sbrang rtsi'i lo ma zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ so la gnas nas so la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs
423b3(dkon brtsegs): shing gdong zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ so'i rtsa ba la gnas so'i rtsa ba la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs khab mchu zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ lce la gnas nas lce la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i
423b4(dkon brtsegs): rigs kha gnon zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ lce'i rtsa ba la gnas nas lce'i rtsa ba la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs lag rdzogs zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ rkan la gnas nas rkan
423b5(dkon brtsegs): la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs lag pa dra ba can dang / khyed sgur zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ lag mthil la gnas nas lag mthil la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs 'phyang ba dang /
423b6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'phyang ba zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ lag ngar la gnas nas lag ngar la za bar byed do/ /srin ba'i rigs dpung pa dang / nye ba'i dpung ba zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ dpung pa la gnas
423b7(dkon brtsegs): nas dpung pa la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs mid pa dang / nye ba'i mid pa zhes bya ba gnyis yod do/ mid pa la gnas nas mid pa la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs dpa' ba dang / dpa' ba
424a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ brang la gnas nas brang la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs dung dang / dung kha zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ sha la gnas nas sha
424a2(dkon brtsegs): la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs kha dog dang ldan pa dang / stobs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ khrag la gnas nas khrag la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs dpa' bo dang / dri
424a3(dkon brtsegs): gdong zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ chu ba la gnas nas chu ba la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs mi mtho ba dang / kha sbub ces bya ba gnyis yod de/ rgyab kyi sgal tshigs la gnas nas rgyab
424a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi sgal tshigs la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs gnyis ka yang tshil gyi kha dog ces bya ba gnyis yod de/ tshil la gnas nas tshil la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs mkhris pa'i
424a5(dkon brtsegs): kha dog ces bya ba gcig yod de/ mkhris pa la gnas nas mkhris pa la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs mu tig ces bya ba yod de/ mkhal ma la gnas nas mkhal ma la za bar
424a6(dkon brtsegs): byed do| |srin bu rigs mu tig chen po zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ rked pa la gnas nas rked pa la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ mtsher pa la
424a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas mtsher pa la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs chu srog dang / chu srog chen po dang / khab kyi mchu dang / mtshon cha'i mchu zhes bya ba bzhi yod de/ rgyu ma la gnas nas rgyu ma la za
424b1(dkon brtsegs): bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs zla ba rdzogs dang / zla ba gtong dang / bsil byed dang / bsil byed gtong dang / so sor gnas pa zhes bya ba lnga yod de/ rtsib logs g.yas pa la gnas nas rtsib logs g.yas pa
424b2(dkon brtsegs): la za bar byed do/ /gzhan yang srin bu'i rigs gong ma dang ming mthun pa lnga yod do/ /rtsib logs g.yon pa la gnas nas rtsib logs g.yon pa la za bar byed do/ /gzhan yang srin bu'i rigs
424b3(dkon brtsegs): mdun du 'bigs pa dang / rgyab tu 'bigs pa dang / brtan par 'bigs pa dang / 'bigs te gnas pa zhes bya ba bzhi yod de/ rus pa la gnas nas rus pa la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i

424b7(dkon brtsegs): lam la gnas nas gci ba'i lam la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs byed pa dang / byed pa chen po dang / dbyibs chung dang / po ta ra ka zhes bya ba bzhi yod de/ bshang ba'i lam la gnas nas bshang
425a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lam la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs kha nag dang / kha nag chen po zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ brla la gnas nas brla la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs mdze
425a2(dkon brtsegs): can dang / mdze can chung ngu zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ pus mo la gnas nas pus mo la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs myos pa'i rtsa ba zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ byin pa la gnas nas

425a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / skom par byed cing / gzhan yang sems kyi sdug bsngal sna tshogs dang ldan zhing gdung ba dang / rab tu gdung ba dang / yongs su gdung ba dang / nad mang po rnams mngon du
425a6(dkon brtsegs): snang bar byed pas sman pa mkhas pa gang gis kyang gso zhing bsal bar mi nus te/ dga' bo/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho chen po 'khor ba 'dir sdug bsngal de lta bu dang ldan pa yin na/
425a7(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir 'di la rjes su chags pa skyed par byed/ gzhan yang gdon mang pos yongs su bzung ba 'di lta ste/ lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / ka ta pu ta na'i bar gyi gdon rnams
425b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis yongs su zin pa dang / gzhan yang gcan gzan gyi gdon rnams kyis yongs su zin pa dang / gzhan yang nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar gyi gdon la sogs pas yongs su
425b2(dkon brtsegs): zin nas nad sna tshogs kyis lus dang sems nyon mongs par byed pa yod de/ brjod kyis mi lang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ mkhas pa su zhig 'khor ba
425b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dir ma'i mngal du 'jug par mos shing sdug bsngal mi bzad pa myong bar byed/ de ltar btsas shing / de ltar cher gyur nas ma'i nu zho khrag dang 'dres pa 'thungs shing / bza' ba dang / btung ba
425b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams zos shing 'thungs pa na yang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i sems kyis zhim pa'i 'du shes skyed par byed do/ /mthar gyis cher skyes nas lus bde zhing nad med pa dang / gos dang / bza' ba dang /

425b6(dkon brtsegs): du yang mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu gzir zhing sdug bsngal gyi reg pa brgya stong tshad med pa brjod kyis mi lang ba rnams kyis lus nyon mongs
425b7(dkon brtsegs): par byed pas/ lus kyis sdug bsngal dang du len par mi nus pa'i tshe gson par mi smon cing shi bar dga' bas na/ lus 'di ni/ sdug bsngal mang la bde ba chung ba yin te/ re zhig tsam
426a1(dkon brtsegs): du gnas par byed kyang mthar 'jig par 'gyur bas dga' bo/ skye ba rnams ni/ thams cad kyang 'chi bar 'gyur bas rtag par gnas pa gang yang med do/ /
426a2(dkon brtsegs): gal te sman dang / zas kyis gsos nas tshe ring por 'gyur na yang mthar 'chi bdag gi rgyal pos gsod cing yul stong du skye bar 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir skye ba la dga' ba gcig
426a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang med par rig par byas nas nan tan brtson 'grus kyis ma 'ongs pa'i tshogs gsog pa la bag yod par bya ba dang / tshangs par spyod pa la brtson zhing le lo mi bya ba dang / don gyi
426a4(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa dang / chos kyi spyod pa dang / yon tan gyi spyod pa dang / dge ba 'ba' zhig gi spyod pa la rtag par mos pas bsgom par bya'o/ /rtag par bdag nyid kyi dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i

426a6(dkon brtsegs): zhing / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las ji lta ba bzhin du tshe phyi ma len par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ tshe lo brgya thub pa de yang gnas skabs bcu dang ldan par gyur te/ dang po ni/ byis pa'i gnas
426a7(dkon brtsegs): skabs te/ nyam chung zhing gan rkyal du nyal bar byed do/ /gnyis pa ni/ gzhon nur gyur pa ste/ byis pa'i rtsed mo la dga' bar byed do/ /gsum pa ni/ lang tsho la bab pa ste/ 'dod
426b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bde ba rnams myong bar byed do/ /bzhi pa ni/ mthu dang ldan par gyur pa ste/ dpa' zhing stobs dang ldan pa yin no/ /lnga pa ni/ dar la bab pa ste/ shes rab kyi spobs pa dang ldan par gyur pa
426b2(dkon brtsegs): yin no| |drug pa ni/ yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ dran pa dang ldan zhing spyod pa la mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin no/ /bdun pa ni/ mthar gyis rgas pa ste/ chos kyi gzhung lugs rab tu
426b3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa yin no/ /brgyad pa ni/ rgas par gyur pa ste/ bya ba mang po rnams la mthu chung bar gyur pa yin no/ /dgu pa ni/ shin tu rgas pa ste/ ci yang mi nus pa yin no/ /bcu pa ni/ lo
426b4(dkon brtsegs): brgya pa ste/ 'chi ba'i gnas skabs gang yin pa'o/ /dga' bo/ gnas skabs chen po de dag kyang mdor bsdus te bstan na/ 'di ltar zla ba bzhi zhing dus gcig tu byas nas lo brgya la
426b5(dkon brtsegs): dus sum brgya yod par 'gyur te/ dpyid dang / dbyar dang / dgun gyi dus re re la yang dus brgya brgya yod pas so/ /lo gcig la zla ba bcu gnyis yod pas zla ba yang brgya phrag bcu gnyis

426b7(dkon brtsegs): bsdus na/ nyin mtshan sum khri drug stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /nyin zhag gcig la lan gnyis su za bas mdor bsdus na/ zas ni/ lan stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis za bar 'gyur te/
427a1(dkon brtsegs): rkyen gyis bar chad byas nas ma zos pa'i grangs kyang der gtogs so/ /zas ma zos pa'i rkyen ni/ 'di lta ste/ khros nas ma zos pa dang / sdug bsngal
427a2(dkon brtsegs): myong nas ma zos pa dang / btsal te ma rnyed nas ma zos pa dang / gnyid kyis log nas ma zos pa dang / sdom pa blangs pa dang rtse bas myos te ma zos pa dang / brel te ma zos pa ste/
427a3(dkon brtsegs): zos pa dang / ma zos pa gcig tu bsdus na/ grangs de snyed yod de/ ma'i nu zho 'thungs pa yang grangs der gtogs so/ /de ltar na/ ngas mi rnams kyi 'tsho ba'i tshe lo brgya pa'i lo dang /
427a4(dkon brtsegs): zla ba dang / nyin mtshan dang / bza' ba dang btung ba zos pa dang / 'thungs pa'i grangs yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa yin gyi/ khyod kyis 'di la yongs su skyo ba bskyed par bya'o/ /dga' bo/

427a6(dkon brtsegs): snying na ba dang / lto na ba dang / lag pa na ba dang / rkang pa rna bas gnod pa dang / g.yan pa dang / mdze dang / smyos pa dang / skrangs pa dang / lud pa dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan la
427a7(dkon brtsegs): sogs pa nad mang po rnams kyis yan lag dang / nying lag na zhing sdug bsngal myong bar byed de/ dga' bo/ mi'i lus la 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyi sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs yod
427b1(dkon brtsegs): do| |gzhan yang rlung nad brgya rtsa gcig dang / mkhris pa'i nad brgya rtsa gcig dang / bad kan gyi nad brgya rtsa gcig dang / 'dus pa'i nad brgya rtsa gcig yod pas mdor bsdus na/ nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi
427b2(dkon brtsegs): nang gi lus las skyes par 'gyur bas/ dga' bo/ lus 'di ni/ 'bras dang 'dra zhing zug rngu dang 'dra bas nad mang po las mngon par grub pa skad cig tsam du yang mi gnas shing skad cig mar 'gyur

427b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bcing ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / ngal ba'i sdug bsngal dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / rlung dang / char pa dang / sbrang bu mchu ring dang / sha sbrang
427b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / gcan gzan dang / sdig sbrul la sogs pa'i reg pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs tshad med dpag tu med pa brjod kyis mi rdzogs pa dag rjes su myong bar 'gyur te/ sems
428a1(dkon brtsegs): can rnams ni/ rtag tu 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa yid du mi 'ong ba la gnas shing rjes su chags pa dang bying bar gyur pa yin pas/ 'dod pa rnams
428a2(dkon brtsegs): ni| sdug bsngal gyi rtsa bar gyur pa yin yang de spang bar bya ba yin par mi shes shing / yang yongs su gnyer bar byed pas nyin mtshan du lus dang / sems yongs su gdung ba dang / nad
428a3(dkon brtsegs): sreg cing tshig par byed pa la yang rgyun chad pa med de/ de bzhin du skye ba yang sdug bsngal yin no/ /rga ba yang sdug bsngal yin no/ /na ba yang sdug bsngal yin no/ /'chi ba yang sdug bsngal
428a4(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /sdug pa dang bral ba yang sdug bsngal yin no/ /mi sdug pa dang phrad pa yang sdug bsngal yin no/ /gang 'dod pa btsal te ma rnyed pa yang sdug bsngal yin no/ /nye bar len pa'i phung
428a5(dkon brtsegs): po lnga yang sdug bsngal yin no/ /'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba'i spyod lam bzhi po dag kyang sdug bsngal yin pas gal te rtag tu 'gro zhing 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang /
428a6(dkon brtsegs): nyal bar ma gyur na yang sdug bsngal myong zhing bde ba med par 'gyur ro/ /gal te rtag tu 'greng zhing 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal bar gyur tam/ gal te rtag tu 'dug la/ 'gro ba dang /
428a7(dkon brtsegs): 'greng ba dang / nyal bar ma gyur tam/ gal te rtag tu nyal la/ 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug par ma gyur na yang thams cad sdug bsngal mi bzad pa myong zhing bde ba thob bar mi 'gyur

428b2(dkon brtsegs): byed rnams kyi rgyu dang rkyen rgyun chad pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'di dag thugs su chud pa'i phyir sems can rnams kyi 'khor ba'i chos 'du byed pa rnams mi
428b3(dkon brtsegs): rtag cing yang dag pa'i mthar phyin pa ma yin pa/ rnam bar 'gyur ba'i chos can/ yid brtan du mi rung ba yin pas chog shes pa yongs su btsal nas shin tu skyo ba bskyed de/ nan tan brtson
428b4(dkon brtsegs): 'grus kyis rnam par grol ba yongs su gnyer bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /dga' bo/ bde 'gror skyes pa'i sems can yang skye gnas mi gtsang ba dag tu sdug bsngal mi bzad pa yang
428b5(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ma yin pa rnam pa sna tshogs myong ba yang brjod kyis mi rdzogs na/ ngan song gsum po yi dwags dang / dud 'gro dang / sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyis myong bar 'gyur

429a1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba yang yod/ kha cig ni/ yang dag par shes bzhin du 'jug /yang dag par shes bzhin du gnas la/ yang dag par mi shes bzhin du 'byung ba yang

429a6(dkon brtsegs): par drang por sems shing bag med par mi byed pa dang / shes rab chen po dang ldan pas 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe 'gyod pa med par skye ba yang dag par len pa byed pa rgyun du zhugs pa skye

429b1(dkon brtsegs): dus kyi tshe sdug bsngal nye bar 'ongs shing na ba dang tsha ba nyams su myong bar gyur kyang sems la g.yeng ba med par yang dag par dran bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byas te/ yang dag par dran bzhin

430a3(dkon brtsegs): 'chos shing bldad pa na mchil snabs su gyur nas mid par 'jug cing rkang dang klad pa phan tshun 'dres nas lto bar 'bab par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ khyi rus pa skam po

434b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos yongs su gnyer ba'i dbang gis de ltar gyur ba yin no/ /dga' bo/ 'bar/ rab tu 'bar bar byed pa'i me gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod
434b6(dkon brtsegs): chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi me dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i me dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang /
434b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khrug pa'i me dag gis rtag tu bsregs shing 'bar bar byed pas 'ga' tsam yang de las thar pa med do/ /dga' bo/ le lo la rab tu gnas pa dag ni/ sdug bsngal mang po myong zhing
435a1(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pas kun tu dkris nas sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos mngon par 'du byas pas 'khor bar 'khor yang nye bar zhi zhing rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/ /
435a2(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus brtsams pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ bde ba mang du myos zhing brtul ba'i sems skyed par byed pas nyon mongs pa yongs su bsal nas dge ba'i chos sgom pa'i rab tu brtson
435a3(dkon brtsegs): pa mi gtong ba la rgyun 'chad pa med do/ /de lta bas na/ deng khyod kyi lus 'di'i pags pa dang / sha dang / chu ba dang / rus pa dang / khrag dang / rtsa rgyus dang / rkang rnams ni/ ring por mi
435a4(dkon brtsegs): thogs par gyes shing 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /snyam du so sor brtags nas rtag par sems rtse gcig tu le lo mi byed par mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir nan tan brtson
435a5(dkon brtsegs): 'grus kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /dga' bo/ nga ni/ 'jig rten pa rnams dang rtsod par mi byed na/ 'on kyang 'jig rten pa rnams ni/ nan gyis nga dang rtsod par byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
435a6(dkon brtsegs): gang chos shes pa rnams ni/ gzhan dang rtsod par mi byed de/ /bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bral ba yin na/ su dang lhan cig rtsod par byed/ 'on kyang mthong ba dang shes pa med pa
435a7(dkon brtsegs): dag yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'dzin pa bskyed par byed pa'i phyir ngas yang dag par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'di skad du ngas ni/ chos rnams gang yang mi shes pa med do/ /zhes
435b1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa yin te/ dga' bo/ ngas de skad smras pa de la tha dad du gyur pa yod dam/ dga' bos gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs pas de skad gsungs pa la
435b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so/ /legs so/ dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsungs la gdon mi za bar tha dad du gyur pa med
435b3(dkon brtsegs): pas de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ yang dag par gsung ba/ bden par gsung ba/ de bzhin nyid du gsung ba/ tha mi dad par gsung ba/ slu ba med par gsung ba/ 'jig rten pa rnams la yun
435b4(dkon brtsegs): ring por phan pa dang / bde ba dang / phan yon chen po thob par mdzad pa/ lam mkhyen pa/ lam rig pa/ lam ston pa/ lam 'byed pa/ lam 'dren pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
435b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi
435b6(dkon brtsegs): ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur pa yin no/ /'jig rten pa rnams ni/ shes pa med pa/ mngon par yid ches pa med pa/ rtag par dbang po rnams kyi bran byed pa/ lag mthil
435b7(dkon brtsegs): na yod pa kho na mthong zhing / don chen po la mi lta ba/ sla ba'i dngos po mi bsgrub par gang bya dka' ba rgyun du byed pa yin no/ /dga' bo/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i spyod yul 'di ltar re zhig zhog
436a1(dkon brtsegs): la/ deng khyod kyis sha'i mig gis lta bas shes pa dang / mthong ba ji snyed pa dag yang dag pa ma yin par so sor brtags na/ de nyid rnam par thar pa zhes
436a2(dkon brtsegs): bya bas/ dga' bo/ khyod nga la dad pa'i phyir mi 'gro zhig /nga la 'dun pa'i phyir 'brang bar ma byed cig /nga'i tshig la rton par ma byed cig /nga'i mtshan ma la rtog par ma byed cig /dge
436a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyong gi lta ba dang shes pa'i rjes su ma 'brang zhig / dge sbyong la gus par ma skyed cig /'di skad du dge sbyong gau ta ma ni/ bdag gi ston pa chen po yin no/ /zhes ma zer bar ngas mngon
436a4(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos gang yin pa de gcig pu dben par song la yid la bsam ste 'jal bar gyis shig / so sor rtogs shig /rtag par mang du sgoms shig /sems
436a5(dkon brtsegs): rtse gcig tu chos rnams so sor brtags te/ chos de dag las sgom pa'i 'du shes yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ yang dag pa'i dran pa la gnas nas bdag nyid kyis gling byos shig
436a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid kyi gnas dang / skyabs byos shig /chos kyis gling byos shig /chos kyis gnas dang / skyabs byos shig dang / de las gzhan pa'i gling dang / gnas dang / skyabs med do/ /
436a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo/ ji ltar na dge slong bdag nyid gling du gyur pa dang / bdag nyid gnas dang / skyabs su gyur pa dang / chos kyi gling du gyur pa dang / chos kyi gnas dang / skyabs su gyur cing / de
436b1(dkon brtsegs): las gzhan pa'i gling dang / de las gzhan pa'i gnas dang / skyabs med par gyur pa yin zhe na/ dga' bo/ 'di ltar dge slong la la zhig bdag nyid kyis nang gi lus la lus kye rjes su lta
436b2(dkon brtsegs): b a la rab tu gnas nas brtson 'grus kyi dran pa rtse gcig tu byas pas yang dag pa'i shes pa thob nas 'jig rten pa'i khong khro ba ji snyed pa dag rtag tu yid la sems shing rab tu dul bar gyur ba
436b3(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de ni/ nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba zhes bya ste/ gang gis phyi rol gyi lus dang / nang dang phyi rol gnyis ka'i lus la rjes su lta ba yang de bzhin no/ /dga' bo/ de'i 'og tu
436b4(dkon brtsegs): kun 'byung ba'i chos la lus su bltas nas rab tu gnas pa dang / 'gog pa'i chos su bltas nas rab tu gnas par byed la/ gzhan yang kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa'i chos gnyis la lus kyi
436b5(dkon brtsegs): rjes su lta zhing gnas par byed pa nyid kyis lus 'di la yang dag par dran par byed pas res 'ga' ni/ shes pa kho na dang ldan par 'gyur/ res 'ga' ni/ mthong ba kho na dang ldan par 'gyur/
436b6(dkon brtsegs): res 'ga' ni/ dran pa kho na dang ldan par 'gyur zhing rten pa med par gnas par 'gyur bas/ 'jig rten la 'di la blang bar bya ba ci yang med par rab tu shes par 'gyur te/ de ltar na dga'
436b7(dkon brtsegs): bo/ 'di ni/ dge slong bdag nyid kyis nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba la gnas pa zhes bya ste/ phyi rol gyi lus dang / nang dang phyi rol gnyis ka'i lus la lta ba yang de bzhin no/ /de'i 'og
437a1(dkon brtsegs): tu nang gi tshor ba dang / phyi rol gyi tshor ba dang / nang dang phyi rol gnyis ka'i tshor bar lta ba la rab tu gnas pa dang / nang gi sems dang / phyi rol gyi sems dang / nang
437a2(dkon brtsegs): dang phyi rol gnyis ka'i sems su lta ba la gnas pa dang / nang gi chos dang / phyi rol gyi chos dang / nang dang phyi rol gnyis ka'i chos su lta ba la rab tu gnas nas brtson 'grus kyis dran pa rtse
437a3(dkon brtsegs): g cig tu byas pas yang dag pa'i shes pa thob nas 'jig rten pa'i khong khro ba'i snyed pa dag rtag tu yid la mi sems shing rab tu dul bar gyur nas kun 'byung ba'i chos su bltas nas

437a5(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa nyid kyis lus 'di nyid la yang dag par dran par byed pas res 'ga' ni/ shes pa kho na dang ldan par 'gyur/ res 'ga' ni/ mthong ba kho na dang ldan par 'gyur/ res
437a6(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' ni/ dran pa kho na dang ldan par 'gyur bas/ 'jig rten 'di la blang par bya ba ci yang med par rab tu shes par 'gyur te/ de ltar na/ dga' bo/ /'di ni/ dge slong bdag
437a7(dkon brtsegs): nyid gling du gyur pa dang / bdag nyid gnas dang skyabs su gyur pa dang / chos gling du gyur pa dang / chos gnas dang skyabs su gyur cing / de las gzhan pa'i gling med pa dang / de las
437b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan pa'i gnas dang skyabs med pa zhes bya'o/ /dga' bo/ skyes bu rang bzhin drang zhing g.yo sgyu spangs pa gang la la zhig snga dro'i dus kyi tshe nga'i thad du 'ongs pa la ngas dbang po ji lta ba bzhin
437b2(dkon brtsegs): du dge ba'i chos de la rjes su bstan nas de phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe bdag nyid thob pa dang ldan pa smra bar gyur la/ phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe chos rjes su bstan pa yang bdag nyid thob pa dang ldan par smra bar byed
437b3(dkon brtsegs): pas na dga' bo/ ngas legs par bstan pa'i chos ni/ mthong ba'i chos la mngon sum du rtogs pa/ rab tu gdung ba sel bar byed pa/ dus dang dbang po dang rab tu 'tsham par 'gyur
437b4(dkon brtsegs): pa thabs dang ldan pa rang gis rig pa'i chos legs par skyob par byed pa yin pas/ gang gis nga'i mngon sum du chos bstan pa thos par gyur na/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i rjes su mthun

437b6(dkon brtsegs): n as chos 'di la rtag par yang dag par bslab ste rab tu byung ba'i chos bag yod par bsgrubs nas chud mi gsan cing 'bras bu khyad par du 'phags pa 'dus ma byas kyi bde ba thob par byas nas
437b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyis byin pa'i chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman la sogs pa blang bar bya zhing / sbyin bdag rnams bsod nams kyi phan yon chen po thob pa
438a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'bras bu rnam par smin pa khyad par du 'phags pa yangs shing rgya che ba dag 'thob par 'gyur ba de ltar dga' bo/ khyod kyis bslab par bya'o/ /gzhan yang
438a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo/ gzugs 'ga' tsam yang rjes su chags par bya ba'am/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rnam par 'gyur zhing 'jig par mi 'gyur ba gang yang med de/ de'i gnas med do /gang

438a5(dkon brtsegs): bsngal ba zhig yin/ btsun pa/ de ni/ sdug bsngal ba lags so/ /gang mi rtag cing sdug bsngal ba de ni/ rnam par 'gyur zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin na/ nga'i nyan thos 'phags
438a6(dkon brtsegs): pa mang du thos pa dang ldan pa dag ci gzugs 'di ni/ bdag yin no/ /bdag ni/ gzugs rnams dang ldan no/ /gzugs ni/ bdag gi yin no/ /bdag ni/ gzugs la gnas
438a7(dkon brtsegs): so/ /zhes khas len par byed dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /'di ji snyam du sems/ ci tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
438b1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa de dag rtag pa zhig yin nam/ 'on te mi rtag pa zhig yin/ btsun pa/ thams cad rang bzhin gyis mi rtag pa lags so/ /dga' bo/ gal te rang bzhin gyis mi rtag pa yin na/ ci

438b6(dkon brtsegs): rung ste/ ji tsam du gzugs su gyur pa thams cad kyang bdag ma yin la/ bdag kyang gzugs dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang / gzugs kyang bdag ma yin la/ bdag kyang gzugs lag nas pa ma

439a2(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cad kyang bdag ma yin la/ bdag kyang de dag dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang / de dag kyang bdag gi ma yin la bdag kyang de dag la gnas pa ma yin par legs par so sor brtag par

440b6(dkon brtsegs): gti mug mtshon bkye nas/ /ci rigs par ni rgyan par byed/ /rus pa'i grong khyer skyug bro ba/ sha khrag 'brel cing 'dus pas na/ /rtag tu sdug pa'i grogs po yis/ /phyi nang sdug bsngal gdung
440b7(dkon brtsegs): bar byed/ /dga' bo/ khyod kyis shes par byos/ /ngas ni ji skad bstan pa bzhin/ /nyin mtshan rtag tu dran byos la/ /'dod pa'i yul la sems ma byed/ /gal te 'dod pa spong 'dod na/ /rtag tu
441a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin rab sgoms la/ /rnam grol yongs su tshol bar gyis/ /myur du 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'da'/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis mngal du 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
441a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di bka' stsal pa na tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / dge slong lnga brgya po de dag rab tu dga' bar gyur pas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo/
441a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'brog dgon pa las yang dag par 'das te mthar thug pa'i bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i gnas su phyin nas dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pas bdag nyid shin tu
441a4(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar gyur nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gus sems khrus ni bstab pa dang / /tshu gtsang byug spos phul ba dang / /bsod nams rnams ni bsgrubs pas na/ /rnam smin mchog 'di thob
441a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yin| |de nas 'khor mang po rnams de skad ces smras pa thos pas thams cad the tshom skyes par gyur nas the tshom gcod pa'i phyir ston pa chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ tshe
441a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa dga' bo 'dis sngon sug las ci bgyis na/ de'i rnam par smin pas lus kyi mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bur gyur la/ mtshan sum cu dang ldan pas bdag nyid brgyan cing
441a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi sku bas sor bzhis thung bar gyur/ ci'i slad du 'dod pa'i yul la shin tu mngon par zhen pa las ston pa chen pos thugs brtse bar dgongs nas mthus 'khor ba'i rgya
441b1(dkon brtsegs): mtsho las bsgral te/ thabs kyis shin tu mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la rnam par bzhag pa bkas bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/
441b2(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dga' bos sngon las mngon par 'dus byas pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yongs su smin pas na/ thams cad mngon du gyur pa yin no/ /zhes gzhan las bstan pa bzhin du rgya cher
441b3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal nas tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gal te bskal pa brgya lon kyang / /las byas chud zar mi 'gyur te/ /rgyu dang rkyen ni tshogs pa na/ /lus can nyid la 'bras bur smin/ /
441b4(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dag /khyod nyon cig /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi sngon rol na skye rgu rnams tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
441b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa'i skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas

441b7(dkon brtsegs): brang 'khor du gshegs nas mnyen ldan gyi tshal na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de'i g.yas khyim gyi gcung zhig yod pa de 'dod pa'i yul la shin tu mngon par zhen cing chags pa
442a1(dkon brtsegs): l as| de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs des 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las yongs su bzla ba'i phyir rab
442a2(dkon brtsegs): tu 'byung bar bskul nas thabs kyis mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rnam par bzhag go / de'i tshe na yul de'i bdag po mnyen ldan zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/ 'di ltar

442a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das des rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa la shin tu gya nom pa'i chos kyi gtam
442a7(dkon brtsegs): kun tu bstan cing gzengs bstod pas/ khyad par du 'phags pa'i shes pa thob par gyur to/ /de'i nu bo 'dod pa la zhen cing khyim nas 'byung du ma btub pa dang / de'i tshe de la blon po'i bu

442b2(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas te de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs ga la ba der dong ste gus pas dam pa'i chos mnyan pas khyad par du 'phags pa'i shes pa thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar khyod kyang mi lus

442b5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'di gcig pu khrid nas lhan cig 'grogs te 'gro zhes dris pa dang / de dag gis kyang ji ltar gyur pa zhib tu smras so/ /dge slong des smras pa/ bdag ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gcung yin te/

447b4(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshangs par spyad kyang tshe 'di nyid la mngon par rtogs pa ci yang med pas/ bdag gis 'dir tshangs par spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bcom ldan 'das
447b5(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung gis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bya ba 'di yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ mchan yang shAkya thub pa
447b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan pas/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa rnams spangs nas dgra bcom pa'i
447b7(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu thob par gyur te/ ji ltar bdag gis mkhan po 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la dbang po'i sgo rab tu sdom pa'i mchog tu gyur pa de bzhin du bdag kyang bcom ldan
448a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das de'i bstan pa la dbang po'i sgo sdom pa'i mchog tu gyur cig / ces smon lam btab pas na/ smon lam de'i stobs kyis deng 'dir nga'i bstan pa la
448a2(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi nang na dbang po'i sgo rab tu sdom pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin no/ /'di ltar dge slong dag /gang gcig tu nag pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nag go /gang
448a3(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu dkar ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ro/ /las 'dren ma gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma myong bar 'gyur te/ de lta bas na/ khyed
448a4(dkon brtsegs): stong phrag brgya pa las/ mngal na gnas pa bstan pa'i 'dus pa ste/ 'dus pa bcu bzhi pa rdzogs so// //
